Kutishimira kwambara imyenda imenyekanisha amahanga byatumye bakora ifite ikirango cya ‘KGL’
Y bishatse kuvuga New York, L.
A isobanura Los Angeles na Chicago ni bimwe mu birango dukunze gusanga ku myenda irimo imipira y’imbeho n’ingofero kandi ukabona abantu bayambaye barabyishimiye, ariko mu by’ukuri bari kwamamaza iyi Mijyi yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Y bishatse kuvuga New York, L.
A isobanura Los Angeles na Chicago ni bimwe mu birango dukunze gusanga ku myenda irimo imipira y’imbeho n’ingofero kandi ukabona abantu bayambaye barabyishimiye, ariko mu by’ukuri bari kwamamaza iyi Mijyi yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Nyuma y’igihe babyitegereza bakabona bidakwiye guhora abantu bagenda bamenyekanisha imijyi y’amahanga, urubyiruko rwibumbiye mu nzu y’imideli yitwa DCIB (Dawn Central Investiment Bureau), rwahisemo gukora imyambaro ifite ikirango cya KGL, bifatwa nk’impine ya Kigali, Umurwa Mukuru w’u Rwanda umaze kumenyekana ku Isi yose kubera isuku n’iterambere rikomeje kwihuta.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Tuyishimire Desiré, umwe mu basore babiri bashinze iyi nzu y’imideli yavuze ko intego yabo ari ukumenyekanisha Umujyi wa Kigali, babinyujije mu gutanga umusanzu muri gahunda ya leta yo guca caguwa, hatezwa imbere imyenda ikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nyuma yo kumva no gusobanukirwa gahunda ya Leta y’u Rwanda twabonye ko ari ngombwa ko dutanga umusanzu wacu nk’urubyiruko, tugashishikariza abantu gukunda imyenda ikorerwa mu gihugu cyacu.
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma yo kwitegereza baje gusanga abantu benshi bahitamo kwambara umwambaro runaka kubera ikirango cyawo, bituma batekereza gukora ifite icya ‘KGL’ kuko bazi neza ko Abanyarwanda bakunda umujyi wabo kandi ubateye ushema.
Ati “Twabonye ko igihe mu Rwanda hazaba hari ikirango abantu bakunze, ntabwo bazajya bajya gushaka icyo mu mahanga.
Murabizi umwana ntabwo akura ngo ahite yuzura ingobyi, niyo mpamvu twahereye ku ngofero, uko ubushobozi buzagenda buza, tuzakora amakoti, imipira n’ibindi.
Tuyishimire yavuze ko kugeza ubu byinshi ku ngofero zabo bikorerwa mu Bushinwa, kuko batarabasha kugira ubushobozi bwo kugura imashini zidoda n’izishyiraho ikirango bitewe n’uburyo zihenda.
Bateganya ko mu myaka itanu iri imbere byose bazaba baratangiye kubikorera mu Rwanda, ibi bikazagerwaho bitewe n’uburyo ikirango cyabo kizakundwa n’ubushobozi bw’inganda zikora imyenda mu Rwanda.
Ati “Mu myaka itanu iri imbere turabona uretse Abanyarwanda aho bari hose ku Isi n’abanyamahanga turabona bazaba bambara imyenda yacu ifite ikirango cya KGL.
Turashaka gushimangira iterambere ry’umujyi wacu wa Kigali binyuze mu myambaro.
Uru rubyiruko ruvuga ko uretse kuba rwifuza kurushaho kumenyekanisha Kigali, rufite n’intego yo gutanga akazi kenshi ku rungano rwabo, rugasaba Abanyarwanda kubanza kwikunda mbere yo gukunda iby’abandi kugira ngo inzozi zabo ari nazo z’igihugu zo guteza imbere ‘Made in Rwanda’ zigerweho.

Imideli yakorewe mu Rwanda yamuritswe bwa mbere muri Ghana
Imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda n’inzu y’imideli ya Tanga Designs yamuritswe bwa mbere mu iserukiramuco rikomeye muri Ghana rizwi nka ‘Mercedes Benz Fashion Festival’ yishimirwa n’abitabiriye ibyo birori.
Imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda n’inzu y’imideli ya Tanga Designs yamuritswe bwa mbere mu iserukiramuco rikomeye muri Ghana rizwi nka ‘Mercedes Benz Fashion Festival’ yishimirwa n’abitabiriye ibyo birori.
Tanga Designs ihanga imideli kuva mu 2014, yatangijwe n’umusore witwa Olivier Niyitanga ufite impano y’imideli, umaze kumenyekana cyane ukaba witwa ‘Tanga’.
Iyi nzu yibanda ku myambaro izwi nka ‘Haute Couture’ yambarwa mu birori.
Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri, Tanga Designs itangijwe ku mugaragaro yerekanye imyambaro mishya yise ‘I Am Mercedes Bae’ mu iserukiramuco ry’imideli rizwi nka Mercedes Benz Fashion Festival ribera mu Mujyi wa Accra muri Ghana.
Niyitanga yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo serukiramuco yitabiriye ryamusigiye byinshi mu buryo bw’ubumenyi no kubishyira mu ngiro.
Ati “Nigiye byinshi ku bahanzi b’imideli bo muri Ghana kandi niteguye kubishyira mu ngiro.
" Yongeyeho ati “Ntabwo ari amahirwe gusa nagize yo kwitabira Mercedes Benz African Fashion Festival 2017 i Accra muri Ghana ahubwo narabikoreye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Mu minsi itanu namaze, nungutse byinshi byiza ku bijyanye n’uburyo abantu baho bategura ibirori by’imideli biri ku yindi ntera yo hejuru, nanahaboneye n’amahirwe yo guhura n’abashoramari bakomeye mu by’imideli nubwo igihe cyo kubitangaza byose kigihari.
Niyitanga avuga ko yavuye muri ibi birori abashije kwereka ababyitaniriye imideli yakoze ku buryo byabasigiye ishusho y’iterambere uwo mwuga ugezeho mu Rwanda.
Uyu musore amaze gukorana n’abanyamideli bakomeye n’abahanzi bazwi barimo Yvan Buravan na Mr.
Eazi yambitse ubwo aheruka gukorera igitaramo i Kigali.

Umuhanzi Nkurunziza yamuritse ubugeni bwerekanwa hakoreshejwe imideli (Amafoto)
Umuhanzi w’ubugeni bwo gushushanya no gukora ibibumbano, Innocent Nkurunziza, unakuriye inzu y’ubugeni yitwa ‘Inema Art Center’ iherereye ku Kacyiru, yamuritse ibikorwa by’ubugeni bwe akoresheje abanyamideli ibizwi nka ‘Illusion’.
Umuhanzi w’ubugeni bwo gushushanya no gukora ibibumbano, Innocent Nkurunziza, unakuriye inzu y’ubugeni yitwa ‘Inema Art Center’ iherereye ku Kacyiru, yamuritse ibikorwa by’ubugeni bwe akoresheje abanyamideli ibizwi nka ‘Illusion’.
Ku wa Kane tariki 4 Gicurasi 2017 abantu benshi biganjemo abanyamahanga n’abahanzi basanzwe basura Inema Art Center, bahuriye .
mu gikorwa cyari kigamije kwerekana ibikorwa by’ubugeni bitandukanye hakoreshejwe abanyamideli biyerekanaga babyambaye, ibimenyerewe nka ‘Fashion Show’ mu ndimi z’amahanga.
Mu gice cya mbere cy’iki gikorwa abanyamideli 10 barimo abazwi cyane nka Jay Rwanda, Kalisa Winnie, Neza Rachel, biyerekanye bambaye ibihangano bisanzwe bimanikwa ku nkuta, banambaye inkweto zikozwe mu ibihingwa n’ibimera bisanzwe (Vegan) zakozwe n’uruganda rwa Native Shoes.
Nkurunziza yatangarije IGIHE ko icyo yifuza ari uko ubugeni butera imbere cyane kuko azi ko buba ahantu hose no mu ruganda rw’imideli.
Yagize ati “Iki gikorwa si icy’ubugeni gusa cyangwa imideli gusa ahubwo byose birajyana kuko byose bisaba ko umuntu aba umuhanzi kugira ngo abikore.
Yakomeje avuga ko iyi ari intangiriro kuko yifuza kuzageza no hanze y’u Rwanda ubu buryo budasanzwe bwo kwerekana ubugeni hakoreshejwe imideli.
Ashishikariza abantu kwerekana impano zabo kandi bakazirikana gukoresha ibintu bisanzwe bafite mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi batagendeye ku bituruka mu Isi y’ikoranabuhanga.
Iki gikorwa cyitabiriwe na bamwe mu bahanzi barimo, Jolie Claudine Murenzi uzwi cyane mu ruhando rwa sinema, washimye cyane ibikorwa bya Nkurunziza.
Yagize ati “Nkurunziza ni umuhanzi mu birebana n’imideli wuzuye [fashion designer], ntabwo ari umutayeri [tailleur] nka benshi mu bo tubona hano hanze bakunze kwiyita ko bahanga imideli.
Asobanura ko impamvu amwemera nk’umuhanzi ari uko ibihangano bye ubisangana umwihariko udashobora kubona ahandi.
Inema Art Center ni itsinda ry’abahanzi 10 b’ubugeni b’abanyarwanda bishyize hamwe bagamije guhuza impano yabo yo gushushanya no kuyibyazamo umurimo wabatunga, cyane cyane ibijyanye n’ubugeni Nyafurika, ubukorikori, umuziki n’imbyino.
Abahanzi bo mu nzu Inema bakora ubugeni bwo gushushanya [Painting], gukora ibibumbano [Sculpture], n’ibihangano bimanikwa ku nkuta.
Inema Art Center itanga n’amahugurwa n’ubumenyingiro mu bijyanye n’ubugeni.
Hatangijwe irushanwa ry’abafite impano zo kumurika imideli mu bakiri bato i Kigali (Amafoto)
Ihuriro ry’Urubyiruko Champions Competition Arts Promoters (CCAP) ryatangije irushanwa ryo guteza imbere impano z’abakiri bato no gukomeza gushishikariza urubyiruko gutangira kubaka ejo hazaza habo bakibyiruka.
Ihuriro ry’Urubyiruko Champions Competition Arts Promoters (CCAP) ryatangije irushanwa ryo guteza imbere impano z’abakiri bato no gukomeza gushishikariza urubyiruko gutangira kubaka ejo hazaza habo bakibyiruka.
CCAP yatangije iki gikorwa ku mugaragaro kuwa 2 Mata 2017 mu birori byabereye ku nyubako y’Umurenge wa Remera binyuze mu irushanwa ryiswe “CCA Style Awards" rigamije guteza imbere urubyiruko rufite impano yo gukora imideli (Fashion Designing) no kuyerekana mu ruhame (Modelling).
Rutamu Omar ukuriye CCAP yatangaje ko ibi bikorwa bigamije gutinyura urubyiruko rufite impano.
Ati “Twe tugamije guteza imbere urubyiruko kugira ngo rureke kwitinya kandi rugire uruhare mu kubaka igihugu no kugera ku nzozi zabo, muri CCAP twakira impano zose maze duharanira kuziteza imbere.
Irushanwa rya CCA Style Awards ryahuje amatsinda umunani ahatanira gutwara icyo gihembo, yiyerekana imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka; agera kuri atatu niyo yatoranyijwe ahabwa amahirwe yo gukomeza mu irushanwa.
Abakomeje mu kindi cyiciro barimo Planet Fashion Agency, Young Generation Models Agency na 1000 Hills Agency.
Ku nshuro ya mbere, ibi bikorwa byatewe inkunga n’Umurenge wa Remera ndetse na Goshen Finance.
Abitabiriye ibi birori basusurukijwe n’umuhanzikazi ukunzwe by’umwihariko mu njyana gakondo Mariya Yohana wari waje gushyigikira urubyiruko.
Uwase ari mu banyamideli bo mu bihugu 50 bazitabira World Next Top Model
Umunyamideli Uwase Clementine abaye Umunyarwandakazi wambere ugiye mu irushanwa rya World Next Top Model hashakishwa uwahize abandi mu nguni zose z’Isi.
Umunyamideli Uwase Clementine abaye Umunyarwandakazi wambere ugiye mu irushanwa rya World Next Top Model hashakishwa uwahize abandi mu nguni zose z’Isi.
World Next Top Model ni rushanwa ngarukamwaka rihuza abanyamideli bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi, bahatanira ikamba riruta ayandi mu berekana imideli maze uryegukanye akaba ari we uhangwa amaso nk’umunyamideli uzaba ukomeye ku Isi mu gihe kizaza.
Irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka rizaba kuva ku itariki ya 14 Nyakanga kugeza kuwa 5 Kanama 2017, rizabera mu Mujyi wa Beirut muri Liban.
Kuri iyi nshuro ya 18 hatumiwe abanyamideli bagera kuri 44 bo mu bihugu birenga 50 byo ku migabane itandukanye.
Muri aba banyamideli batoranyijwe uyu mwaka harimo umunyarwandakazi umwe Uwase Clementine [Tina] umaze imyaka ine yinjiye mu byo kumurika imideli nk’umwuga uhoraho.
Uwase yabwiye IGIHE ko yishimiye kuba azaba ateye intambwe ikomeye mu kazi ke ko kwerekana imideli akaba asaba Abanyarwanda kuzamushyigikira muri iri rushanwa rizasozwa ku itariki ya 5 Kanama 2017.
Uwase Clementine w’imyaka 21 yitabiriye ibikorwa bitandukanye by’imieli birimo Red Carpet Fashion Awards, Kigali Fashion Week 2017 na Top Model Africa yabereye muri Zimbabwe agira n’amahirwe yo kubonana n’abategura World Next Top Model bahise bamuha ubutumire bwo kuzahangana n’abandi uyu mwaka.
Abasore n’inkumi barindwi bazaserukira u Rwanda mu iserukiramuco ry’imideli muri Guinée
Abanyamideli barindwi bamaze kumenyakana mu Rwanda batumiwe mu bazitabira iserukiramuco ry’imideli rikomeye muri Guinée, rizamara icyumweru ribera muri iki gihugu muri Gicurasi 2017.
Abanyamideli barindwi bamaze kumenyakana mu Rwanda batumiwe mu bazitabira iserukiramuco ry’imideli rikomeye muri Guinée, rizamara icyumweru ribera muri iki gihugu muri Gicurasi 2017.
Iserukiramuco ‘Festival International de la Mode Guinéenne’ rimaze kumenyekana muri Afurika, ni ku nshuro ya gatatu rigiye kuba.
Iry’uyu mwaka rizamara icyumweru guhera kuwa 8 Gicurasi kugeza ku itariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2017.
Abahanzi b’imideli n’aberekana imideli bazahagararira u Rwanda barimo Franco Kabano ihuriro ry’abamurika imideli mu gihugu [Rwanda Fashion Models Union], Shema Ryabasinga , Cissy Ngamije, Mucyo Sandrine, Ntabanganyimana Jean de Dieu [Jay Rwanda], Ganza Irihose Jean Fidèle [Ganza Gabey] ndetse na Sekamana Eric Louis .
Iri serukiramuco risanzwe ritegurwa na Bah Alpha Oumar Ly abicishije mu nzu y’imideli yitwa Alphao Fashion ku bufatanye na Minisiteri ya Siporo, Umuco, umurage n’amateka muri Guinée.
Mu kiganiro Bah Alpha Oumar Ly yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Guinée Matin, yavuze ko icyerekezo iri serukiramuco rifite ari ugufasha urubyiruko rwa Afurika n’urwa Guinée by’umwihariko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu guhanga umurimo no kubyaza inyungu ubuhanzi n’impano ya buri wese.
Yagize ati “Icyerekezo nyamukuru dufite ni ukuzamura impano z’urubyiruko no guteza imbere gahunda yo gutungwa n’impano, waba uri umunyamideli cyangwa wambika abantu.
Twahereye mu gihugu imbere tunareba no mu bindi bihugu aho imideli igenda izamuka…"
Alpha yavuze ko uyu mwaka hatumiwe abanyamideli bo mu bihugu 14 hakiyongeraho na Guinée izaba ihagarariwe n’abasore n’inkumi 15 bazatoranywa mu gihugu hose.
Ibi bihugu byatumiwe bizerekana imideli buri wese mu cyiciro cye mu kugaragaza umwihariko wa buri gace ka Afurika mu birori bizaba kuwa 12 Gicurasi 2017.
Laduma, umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye agiye kuyimurikira i Kigali
Umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye ku Isi, Laduma Ngxokolo, yatumiwe i Kigali mu gikorwa cyiswe “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" azerekaniramo imideli akora ndetse hakanagaragazwa intera abakora umwuga nk’uwe bagezeho mu Rwanda.
Umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye ku Isi, Laduma Ngxokolo, yatumiwe i Kigali mu gikorwa cyiswe “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" azerekaniramo imideli akora ndetse hakanagaragazwa intera abakora umwuga nk’uwe bagezeho mu Rwanda.
Laduma Ngxokolo ukomoka muri Afurika y’Epfo mu gace ka Port Elizabeth, ni umwe mu bahanzi b’imideli bakomeye muri Afurika umaze no kumenyekana hirya no hino ku Isi bitewe n’umwimerere agaragaza mu myambaro akora ndetse no kwambika abantu b’ibyamamare batandukanye.
Laduma yamenyekanye cyane biturutse ku nzu ya "Maxhosa" yashinze muri 2010, ikora imideli y’ubudodo igaragaramo uruvangitirane rw’amabara atandukanye agaragaza ubwiza n’umwimerere w’ibyo ahanga.
Igikorwa cya “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" uyu muhanzi w’imideli yatumiwemo kizamara icyumweru, kizabera Camp Kigali, ku wa 10 Kamena 2017.
Hazerekanwa imideli itandukanye yiganjemo ikorerwa mu Rwanda ndetse n’iyakozwe na Laduma.
Umuyobozi w’itsinda ritegura iki gikorwa, Manzi Munana Derick, yabwiye IGIHE ko imyiteguro ikomeye y’iki gikorwa bayirangije igisigaye akaba ari ukwakira uyu muhanzi w’imideli ufite ibigwi akambika n’Abanyarwanda bakora umwuga wo kumurika imideli.
Ati “Kuzana umuhanzi w’imideli uzwi ku isi ku rwego nk’urwe, ni byiza cyane kuko bituma uruganda rw’imideli rutera imbere kandi rukavugwa hose, tutiyibagije ko azambika abana b’Abanyarwanda bakora akazi ko kwerekana imideli.
Iki gikorwa cya “Collective Rw Week of Fashion" kizerekanirwamo imideli y’inzu icumi zikomeye mu Rwanda ari zo Haute-Baso, Inzuki Designs, House Of Tayo, Sonia Mugabo, UZI Collections, Moshions, Amizero, Ikwiize, Maxhosa ya Laduma na AFRIEK yo mu Buholandi.
Ibikorwa bya Laduma byagiye bishimwa n’abantu bakomeye ku rwego mpuzamahanga barimo n’umuririmbyi Beyonce.
Imyambaro ikorwa n’uyu mugabo inambarwa na Jidenna waririmbye ’Classic Man’.
Yagiye yegukana ibihembo bitandukanye birimo icya Design Indaba cyitwa "Most Beautiful Object in South Africa", "Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University Rising Star Award", "Best Emerging Designer Award", "Marie Claire Prix D’Excellence" n’icya "ASFA" yatwaye mu mwaka ushize nk’umuhanzi mwiza w’imideli w’umwaka mu bakorera mu bihugu byo muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo.
Nyuma yo kwerekana imideli akora mu nzu ya “Maxhosa" mu mijyi itandukanye ku Isi irimo Milan, Toyko, New York, Paris na London, ubu Laduma Ngxokolo amaso ayahanze i Kigali.
Menya ihame rikomeye cyane ryagufasha kwambara neza ukaberwa
Ese wari wareba ku mbuga nkoranyambaga imyenda runaka nk’ikanzu nziza cyangwa ikote ribereye umuntu ubonye ku ifoto maze warigura wakwireba ugasanga ntaho bihuriye nibyo wari witeze?
Ugasanga ntibikubereye na gato?
Niba byarakubayeho, nturi wenyine kuko ibi ni ibintu biba kuri benshi cyane cyane iyo bataramenya icyatuma baberwa.
Ese wari wareba ku mbuga nkoranyambaga imyenda runaka nk’ikanzu nziza cyangwa ikote ribereye umuntu ubonye ku ifoto maze warigura wakwireba ugasanga ntaho bihuriye nibyo wari witeze?
Ugasanga ntibikubereye na gato?
Niba byarakubayeho, nturi wenyine kuko ibi ni ibintu biba kuri benshi cyane cyane iyo bataramenya icyatuma baberwa.
Icyo buri wese akwiye kumenya ni abantu duteye mu buryo butandukanye, ndahamya neza ko icyo ikintu wari ukizi ariko ushobora kuba wibaza aho bihuriye n’imyambarire ariko igisubizo si ikindi ahubwo ni uko buri wese akwiye kwambara imyenda ijyanye n’uwo ariwe aho kwambara ijyanye n’ibigezweho.
Abantu benshi bakunze gukora amakosa atababarirwa mu myambarire aho babona umwenda mushya wambawe n’ikirangirire mu ndirimbo runaka cyangwa umuhanzi bakunda yashyize hanze urukweto runaka bakajya kurugura bakiyibagiza ko ibibereye abo bantu bo hari igihe bitababera.
Urugero rw’imiterere y’umugabo
Umusore w’imyaka 24 ukora imyitozo ngororamubiri buri umunsi, ujya mu mbyumba byabugenewe agaterura ibiremereye (Gym) ntazagira umubiri umwe nk’umugabo ufite imyaka 62 uhora wicaye mu biro aho amara amasaha arenze umunani buri umunsi.
Bitewe n’uko imibiri yabo idateye kimwe nta nubwo bakwiye kwambara kimwe ahubwo buri wese akwiriye kureba imyambaro ijyanye n’imiterere ye mbere y’uko areba igezweho cyangwa se ifite amabara akunda.
Irindi banga ni uko buri wese akwiriye kumenya umubiri we neza ndetse akamenya icyamubera n’ikitamubera bityo mu ihitamo ry’umwambaro ari bwambare akagendera ku mwenda umwerekana uko yifuza kugaragara.
Mu inkuru zacu zitaha tuzakomeza kwiyungura ubumenyi mu byerekeye imyambarire n’ibigendanye nayo ku buryo tubikurikije twazajya dutambukana umucyo aho tunyuze hose ariko mwibuke kandi muzirikane ihame twarebeye hamwe kandi ntimukibagirwe ko tugomba kwambara ibijyanye n’imiterere yacu aho kwambara ibigezweho.
Abanyamideli 60 bazitabira Kigali Fashion Week bamenyekanye (Amafoto)
Mu gihe imyiteguro y’ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwerekana imideli ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ ku nshuro ya karindwi irimbanyije, abanyamideli 60 baziyerekana bateye intambwe igana mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Mu gihe imyiteguro y’ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwerekana imideli ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ ku nshuro ya karindwi irimbanyije, abanyamideli 60 baziyerekana bateye intambwe igana mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
Amajonjora y’ibanze yahuje abanyamideli bagera kuri 300 baturutse mu bihugu birimo Kenya, u Bwongereza, Uganda, u Buhinde na Congo mu muhango wabaye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 14 Gicurasi 2017.
Iki gikorwa cyamaze amasaha arenga atandatu cyabereye One Love ahazwi nko kwa Rasta ku Kimihurura.
Ndayishimiye Daniel uri gutegura iki gikorwa yatangarije IGIHE ko Kigali Fashion Week izitabirwa n’abakora imideli baturuka ku migabane yose.
Yagize ati “Kigali Fashion Week ni kimwe mu bikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu bo mu ngeri zose bava mu bihugu bitandukanye bakaza kureba intera ikomeye abanyamideli bo mu Rwanda bamaze kugeraho ugereranyije n’abo mu bindi bihugu.
Muri uyu mwaka abakora imideli barimo n’Abanyarwanda bari kuzamuka bazagaragaza ibikorwa byabo.
Abanyamahanga bazabyitabira bazerekana ibikorwa byabo mu gihugu bambika abanyamideli b’Abanyarwanda.
Ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week biteganyijwe kuva kuya 25 kugeza ku ya 27 Gicurasi 2017, bizabera muri Serena Hotel.
Seraphina, inzu ikora imideli ibereye Abanyarwandakazi
Uko imyaka ishira indi igataha niko uburyo bw’imyambarire buhinduka ndetse bikaba umwihariko ku banyamideli b’Abanyarwanda aho usanga umunsi ku wundi barema ibintu bishya bigaragaza umuco w’igihugu.
Uko imyaka ishira indi igataha niko uburyo bw’imyambarire buhinduka ndetse bikaba umwihariko ku banyamideli b’Abanyarwanda aho usanga umunsi ku wundi barema ibintu bishya bigaragaza umuco w’igihugu.
Mu nkubiri y’ivuka ry’inzu z’imideli no muri Nzeri 2016 hashinzwe iyitwa ‘Seraphina’ yatangijwe na Ines Claudia Hirwa na mugenzi we Diane Umugwaneza, yazanye umwihariko wo gukora imyenda igaragaza umuco gakondo idakunze kugaragara ku isoko.
Igitekerezo cyo gukora inzu y’imyenda, Ines Hirwa yagikuye mu Bubiligi, igihugu yagezemo afite imyaka ine y’amavuko akanagikuriramo.
Agarutse mu Rwanda yashatse imyenda yari asanzwe abona hanze abantu bakunda kwambara no kugura arayibura; abibwiye inshuti ze zimushishikariza gutangiza inzu y’imyenda nibwo yahisemo kuyishinga ayita Seraphina, izina rya Nyirakuru nawe wahoze ari umudozi.
Ines Hirwa na mugenzi we batangije iyi nzu ya Seraphina nyuma y’imyaka ibiri bari mu myiteguro yo kuyitangiza.
Yatangiranye n’umudozi umwe gusa n’igishoro cya miliyoni eshatu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Nyuma y’amezi asaga umunani ishinze imizi ubu igenda ikura cyane ndetse n’imyambaro ihakorerwa iri gutumizwa buri munsi bitewe no kwishimirwa na buri wese n’umwihariko wo kugaragaza umuco w’Abanyarwanda.
Ines Hirwa yagize ati “Twifuza gukora imyambaro izabera Abanyarwandakazi ariko n’abandi bo hanze bakayifuza, tuzi ko iyo dukoresheje umudozi w’Umunyarwanda, tugakorera mu Rwanda ndetse tugacuruza imyambaro ihavuye biteza imbere ubukungu bw’igihugu kandi natwe bikadushimisha kuko abantu bamenya ibivuye iwacu".
Intego ya Seraphina akaba ari ugukomeza kuba igisubizo mu gukora imyambaro yihariye itagaragara ku masoko haba ay’imbere mu gihugu no hanze yacyo.
Seraphina iherereye mu iduka rya Bold Kigali riherereye mu nyubako ya Kigali Heights.
Hirwa uri mu batangije Seraphina ari mu bitabiriye inama mpuzamahanga ‘Accelerate Summit 2016’ ndetse atoranywa muri ba rwiyemezamirimo 26 batanga icyizere.
Ibikwiye kuranga abitabira urugendo rwo kwibuka
Buri mwaka tariki ya 7 Mata ni umunsi abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batangira ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kuri uyu munsi kandi hakorwa urugendo rwo kwibuka.
Buri mwaka tariki ya 7 Mata ni umunsi abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batangira ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kuri uyu munsi kandi hakorwa urugendo rwo kwibuka.
Bamwe mu bitabira uru rugendo ruzwi nka Walk to remember biganjemo urubyiruko, bakunze kuvugwaho kutaruha uburemere n’agaciro rukwiye, aho abenshi bivugwa ko bambara imyambaro idakwiriye, abandi bakagenda baganira, abandi bashyize mu matwi ’ecouteur’ bagenda biyumvira imiziki, ibyo abenshi babona nk’ibidakwiye.
Urubyiruko rutandukanye rwiganjemo abanyeshuri bari mu biruhuko, batanze ibitekerezo by’imyitwarire ikwiye kuranga umuntu uba witabiriye urugendo rwo kwibuka, mu rwego rwo kuruha agaciro rukwiye.
Kayisire Kevin utuye i Nyarutarama yagize ati “ Walk to Remember ni urugendo rwo kwibuka ariko abenshi bajyayo basa n’abagiye guhura n’inshuti zabo.
Ibyo ntibikabe ahubwo mbona ibyiza ari uko bazirikana kwambara amabara asanzwe akoreshwa mu igihe cyo kwibuka nk’umukara, Ibara risa nk’ivu cyangwa umweru naho hasi bakambara imyenda itabafashe cyane ku buryo biteza ikibazo.
Elie Gashagaza utuye i Gikondo we yatubwiye ko imyambarire idafite icyo ivuze cyane ahubwo ko abantu bitabira uru rugendo bakwiriye kwita ku myitwarire yabo mu gihe barukora birinda kuganira cyangwa ngo basakuze ku buryo byateza umutekano muke.
Isimbi Ines utuye Kicukiro na mugenzi we Kevin Mujiji utuye Kimironko bombi bagarutse ku ihame ry’uko buri wese ugiye mu rugendo rwo kwibuka, akwiye kumva uburemere bw’icyo gikorwa n’ubusobanuro bwacyo bityo akambara ku buryo atanengwa n’abo bari kumwe.
Umutoni Fiona, umwe mu bakurikiranira hafi itegurwa ry’urwo rugendo akaba anafite inshingano zo kwandika urubyiruko rwitabira yabwiye IGIHE ko hari imyambaro idakwiriye gukoreshwa n’abitabira urugendo rwo kwibuka nk’ipantaro icitse (Dechirée), imyambaro ifite ibara ry’umutuku, imyenda iriho ibishushanyo bitera ubwoba nk’uduhanga, amaraso, intwaro n’ibindi.
Uwitabira uru rugendo kandi ngo ntabwo akwiriye kwambara ingofero cyangwa se utwuma bashyira mu matwi bumva indirimbo.
Abari n’abategarugori kandi ngo ntibakwiriye no kwishyiraho ibyongera ubwiza byinshi.
Uyu mwaka, urugendo rwo kwibuka ruratangira saa kumi n’imwe n’igice z’umugoroba aho abarwitabira bahagurukira ku ngoro y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko berekeza kuri Stade Amahoro ahari bukomereze ijoro ryo kwibuka.
Amafoto y’ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week byaranzwe n’imyambarire ihebuje
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bikomeye bihuza abanyamideli bizwi “Kigali Fashion Week" byongeye kubera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, byerekanirwamo imyambaro idasanzwe yakozwe n’abafite ubuhanga mu kuyiha ishusho, barimo n’abaturuka hanze y’u Rwanda.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bikomeye bihuza abanyamideli bizwi “Kigali Fashion Week" byongeye kubera mu Mujyi wa Kigali, byerekanirwamo imyambaro idasanzwe yakozwe n’abafite ubuhanga mu kuyiha ishusho, barimo n’abaturuka hanze y’u Rwanda.
Ni ku nshuro ya karindwi Kigali Fashion Week ibaye nyuma y’izabaye mu myaka itandatu ishize.
Ibirori by’uyu mwaka byabaye mu minsi itatu, byerekaniwemo imodoka, imyambaro isanzwe n’itamenyerewe ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza umwihariko n’intera ibijyanye no kumurika imideli bimaze kugeraho mu Rwanda.
Ibirori bisoza byabaye mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatandatu, tariki 27 Gicurasi 2017, byitabiriwe n’abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye barimo abanyamahanga n’abayobozi mu nzengo nkuru z’igihugu na Minisitiri w’Imicungire y’Ibiza n’Impunzi, Seraphine Mukantabana wari waje gushyigikira iki gikorwa.
Imyiyereko y’abanyamideli n’imyambarire yagaragaye muri Kigali Fashion Week byanyuze benshi mu bitabiriye, hashimwa cyane uburyo u Rwanda rugeze ku ntera yo kugirana imikoranire n’abatunganya imideli bakomeye baturuka mu bihugu byo hanze.
Uwitwa Gatesi Yvette uri mu bitabiriye ibi birori waganiriye na IGIHE, yagize ati "Ibirori nabikunze cyane njye nabonye imyambaro ihebuje ku buryo nanjye nifuza kuyambara.
Ikindi nishimiye kubona ni abakora imideli bo hanze baza bakambika abamurika imideli bo mu Rwanda.
Ibi birori byari biyobowe n’umushyushyarugamba Makeda Mahedeo byagaragayemo imyiyereko y’abamurika imideli bagera kuri 60 bambitswe n’abayikora 15 barimo n’abaturutse hanze y’u Rwanda barindwi.
Kigali Fashion Week y’uyu mwaka yitabiriwe n’abakora imyuga ijyanye n’imideli bo mu bihugu nka Cameroun, Sudani, Kenya, Uganda, u Buhinde, Nigeria, u Bwongereza, u Bubiligi, Afurika y’Epfo, Ethiopia, u Buyapani, u Burundi n’ahandi.
Inzu z’imideli zirimo ’Delphine House of Fashion’, ’Tanga Designs’, ’Christa Bella’, ’Hakym Reagan’, ’Lupita Collection’, ’Cynthia Rupari’, ’Patrick Inkanda’, ’Fathia’ ni zimwe mu zerekanye imyambaro zikora muri ibi birori byatangijwe bwa mbere mu Rwanda mu 2011 bifite intego yo kuzamura abanyamideli.
Umwihariko udasanzwe mu birori by’imideli ya ‘Made in Rwanda’ (Amafoto)
Abahanzi b’imideli bibumbiye muri Collective Rw bamuritse imyambaro n’imirimbo bahanze yiganjemo iyo mu Rwanda mu birori bikomeye byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuwa 10 Kamena 2017.
Abahanzi b’imideli bibumbiye muri Collective Rw bamuritse imyambaro n’imirimbo bahanze yiganjemo iyo mu Rwanda mu birori bikomeye byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuwa 10 Kamena 2017.
Ibi birori by’imideli CollectiveRW Fashion Week byabereye mu ihema rya Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village[KCEV], byateguwe n’ikompanyi Collective Rw.
Iyi yashinzwe mu 2015, ihuriwemo n’abanyamideli bo mu Rwanda bagamije guteza imbere imideli yahangiwe mu Rwanda ndetse no kuzamura ireme ry’abakora uyu mwuga bakamenyekana ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ibirori bya Collective Rw byitabiriwe n’abahanzi b’imideli batangije iki gikorwa Sonia Mugabo, Teta Isibo, Mathew Rugamba, Linda Mukangoga na Candy Basomingera.
Muri uyu mwaka hiyongereyemo abashya barimo inzu z’imideli za Amizero, Moshions na Uzi Collections.
Imideli yerekanywe irimo amakanzu, amashati, amapantaro, inkweto, ibikapu byo mu moko yose, ingofero n’imirimbo inyuranye byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Iyi mideli yerekanwe muri ibi birori harimo iyakorewe mu Rwanda n’iyahanzwe n’abanyamideli mpuzamahanga.
Ibirori byatangiye saa kumi n’imwe n’igice, abantu babanje gusangira, kungurana ibitekerezo no kwishima babifashijwemo n’umuziki uyunguruye wacurangwaga mu busitani bwa KCEV.
Ku isaha ya saa tatu z’ijoro nibwo MC Regis Isheja na Kemiyondo Coutinho bari bayoboye ibirori batangije igikorwa ari nabwo abahanzi b’imideli icumi batangiye kwerekana ibyo bahanze.
Mu ihema rya Akagera hari umuteguro ubereye ijisho ku buryo buri mutumirwa wese yarebaga ibirori nta kimukoma imbere.
Abanyamideli biyerekanaga banyuranamo mu nzira zari zateguwe hagati mu bakunzi b’imideli ku buryo wabonaga ko batojwe kandi biteguye neza.
Saa yine z’ijoro icyiciro cya mbere cy’imideli cyari gisojwe habaho undi mwanya wo gusangira, kungurana ibitekerezo no gukata umuziki.
Saa tanu z’ijoro ikindi cyiciro cy’imideli cyahise kimurikwa herekanwa ibyakozwe n’abahanzi bo muri Inzuki Designs, Haute Baso, House of Tayo na Sonia Mugabo.
Umuhanzi w’imideli ukomeye muri Afurika y’Epfo Laduma Ngxokolo na we yerekanye imideli yahanze yiganjemo iyerekana akarango k’imyambaro yo mu muco w’iwabo.
Yabaye n’umwe mu bahanzi berekanye imideli yishimiwe ku rwego rukomeye muri ibi birori.
Icyumweru cyahariwe imideli cya CollectiveRW Fashion Week cyatangiye kuwa 6 Kamena 2017 kuri Repub Lounge iherereye ku Kimihurura.
Mu ntangiriro abanyamideli bahawe amasomo arimo kubigisha kuba abanyamwuga no kumenya gukoresha iyi mpano.
Umuhanga mu mideli witwa Rachel Young ni we wabahaye aya masomo.
Ku munsi wa kabiri habaye imyiteguro nyir’izina y’ibirori, kuri uwo munsi Mizero Cedric ari muberekanye ubuhanga budasanzwe mu mideli aho yadoze ikanzu mu gihe kitarenze amasaha abiri ahita ayimurika.
Nyuma habaye ikiganiro nyunguranabitekerezo cyahuje abafite ubumenyi mu by’imideli mu ngeri zitandukanye haba abo mu Rwanda n’abo mu mahanga barimo Laduma Ngxokolo wo muri South Africa, Lamic Kirabo wo muri Uganda, Paul Peter Siniga wo muri Tanzania, Sunny Dolat wo muri Kenya, Kemiyondo Coutinho waturutse muri Uganda na Lauren Rwema wo mu Rwanda.
Mu byibanzweho muri iki cyumweru, abahanzi b’imideli bahurije hamwe imbaraga mu kuzamura no guteza imbere iby’imideli mu Rwanda ndetse bihaye umugambi umwe wo kugira umwimerere mu byo bakora haba abo mu gihugu n’abo mu bindi bihugu bya Afurika.

Umunya-Ireland yaguye ubucuruzi bw’imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda kuri internet
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Isoko ryo guhahira kuri internet rirarushaho kwaguka mu Rwanda, abaranga n’abagura ibicuruzwa kuva ku biribwa kugera ku myambaro banyuze kuri internet bagenda biyongera.
Mu kwagura ubu bucuruzi, Lorcan Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangije urubuga Ronkos.
rw rugiye guhuza inzu zikora imyenda mu Rwanda n’abakiriya bazo bagahahirana nta nkomyi.
rw igamije kwita ku igurisha n’igura ry’imyambaro izatuma uyikora akomeza akazi ke gasanzwe, bikamworohereza kubona isoko n’uyifuza akabona aho ayigura; Uru rubuga rushyiraho imyambaro yose rwerekana n’inzu ziyikora.
Mu mezi atandatu ashize uru rubuga rwegereye inzu zikora imyenda zirenga icumi ruri mu igeragezwa, muri zo hari izakunze imikorere yarwo n’uburyo rucuruza.
rw yafunguye ku mugaragaro ku ya 5 Gicurasi 2017.
Kuva icyo gihe nyuma y’iminsi itatu gusa ibikorwa byarwo byageze ku bantu barenga ibihumbi mirongo ine, rwakira ubusabe bufite agaciro k’amafaranga miliyoni imwe n’igice.
Igitekerezo cyo gutangiza uru rubuga Lorcan Cathain yakigize ubwo yari agiye guhahira mu isoko rya Kimironko akabona uburyo ryuzuye abantu benshi bifuza imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda, bamwe ntibayibone.
Cathain ukomoka muri Ireland yatangarije IGIHE ko yahise atekereza ku gutangiza isoko rimwe ryahuza inzu zose zikora imyambaro mu Rwanda bikazorohereza kwerekana imyambaro yazo n’umuguzi akagira amahitamo.
Lorcan Cathain ateganya kwagura ibikorwa by’uru rubuga hanze y’u Rwanda mu kurushaho kwamamaza imyenda ikorerwa mu gihugu.
rw yita ku igurisha n’igura, kwamamaza, guhuza abadozi n’abaguzi, kuganira n’abaguzi, gufotora imyambaro, kwakira amafaranga no kugeza imyambaro kuri nyirayo.
Ku rubuga rwa Ronkos.
rw hari imyambaro myinshi aho umukiliya ahitamo uwo ahaka akawugura hanyuma bakawumushyira aho aherereye.
Umukiriya ni we wihitiramo ingano y’umwenda yifuza ndetse ashobora no gutanga uko awifuza, bakamwoherereza abadozi bo gufata ibipimo, bakamudodera ibimukwiriye.
Intego nyamukuru ya Ronkos.
rw ni ugushyiraho ahantu hahurira ibikorwa byinshi byo kugura no kugurisha imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda bityo bikorohereza ababibamo binateza imbere uruganda rw’imideli.
Kigali International Fashion Week igiye kubera mu bihugu bitatu i Burayi
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura mu bufatanye n’ikigo cya BerexInvest Corporation, bigiye gutangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bitangijwe mu Rwanda.
Ibi birori byaherukaga kubera i Kigali muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, aho byamaze iminsi itatu biba, hakerekanwa imodoka, imyambaro isanzwe n’itamenyerewe ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bigaragaza umwihariko n’intera ibijyanye no kumurika imideli bimaze kugeraho mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Umuyobozi wa Kigali Fashion Week, John Bunyeshuri, yatangaje ko umwaka wa 2018 uzasiga isura nshya n’iterambere ridasanzwe ku bakora n’abamurika imideli b’Abanyarwanda biturutse ku mushinga udasanzwe bafite wo gutangira kubafasha kumenyekanisha ibikorwa mu mahanga.
Yagize ati "Nk’uko twambara Gucci, Nike n’indi myenda tukumva turabyishimiye cyane, kuki abanyamahanga nabo batakwambara amashati n’imyenda byanditseho ’Made in Rwanda?
’" Yongeyeho ati "Ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week tugiye kubigeza ahashimishije kurushaho, turifuza ko n’Abanyarwanda bakora imideli bamenyekana ku Isi n’ibyo bakora bikarenga imbibi.
Yavuze ko byibuze abakora imideli bagera ku icumi mu Rwanda bazahabwa amahirwe yo kumurika ibikorwa byabo mu birori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera mu bihugu bitatu i Burayi ndetse n’abamurika imideli bagera kuri 16 akaba ari bo bamaze kwemererwa guhabwa amahirwe yo kugaragaza impano zabo.
Ku ikubitiro, ibirori bya Kigali International Fashion Week bizabera i Berlin mu Budage kuva ku itariki 12 kugeza kuri 14 Mutarama 2017, bizerekeza i Amsterdam mu Buholandi kuva ku wa 26 kugeza ku wa 28 Mutarama, hanyuma mu i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi habere ibisoza urugendo muri uwo mwaka i Burayi kuva ku itariki 19 kugeza kuri 25 Werurwe 2017.
Dieudonne Ntasinzira, Umuyobozi wa BerexInvest Corporation ikorera mu Bubiligi, yasinye amasezerano y’ubufatanyabikorwa na Kigali International Fashion Week, yavuze ko amarembo afunguye ku banyarwanda bifuza kugira ibyo bamenyekanisha yizeza umusanzu ukomeye mu guteza imbere abakora ibijyanye n’imideli mu Rwanda.
Abateguye Kigali International Fashion Week batangaje ko iki gikorwa batangije cyo kugeza hanze y’u Rwanda ibi birori, nibigenda neza i Burayi, hazarebwa uko byagezwa no ku yindi migabane nka Amerika, Aziya n’ahandi hatandukanye ku Isi.
Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza yashyinguwe: Uko umuhango wagenze mu mafoto
Ibihumbi by’Abarundi, inshuti n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Burundi, bazindukiye kuri Stade Ingoma mu Mujyi wa Gitega mu muhango wo gusezera no gushyingura Nkurunziza Pierre wahoze ayoboye icyo gihugu.
Ibihumbi by’Abarundi, inshuti n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo mu Burundi, bazindukiye kuri Stade Ingoma mu Mujyi wa Gitega mu muhango wo gusezera no gushyingura Nkurunziza Pierre wahoze ayoboye icyo gihugu.
Perezida Nkurunziza yapfuye tariki 8 Kamena 2020 aguye mu bitaro byiswe ‘Cinquantenaire Natwe turashoboye’ bya Karusi.
Itangazo Guverinoma y’u Burundi yasohoye tariki 9 Kamena ryavugaga ko Nkurunziza yazize guhagarara k’umutima.
Mu bitabiriye umuhango wo gushyingura Nkurunziza harimo Perezida mushya w’u Burundi Gen Evariste Ndayishimiye n’umugore, Visi Perezida w’u Burundi, Prosper Bazambanza n’abandi bayobozi bakuru n’abaturage bari bahagarariye uturere dutandukanye.
Abashyitsi bakuru muri uyu muhango bari Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Tanzania, Kassim Majaliwa n’umugore wa Perezida wa Zambia.
Wanitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo ndetse n’amadini.
Umurambo wa Nkurunziza wagejejwe muri Stade Ingoma, uhabwa icyubahiro mu buryo bwa gisirikare, uzengurutswa muri Stade mu buryo bwo kumuha icyubahiro cya gisirikare, ukorerwa amasengesho n’ibindi hanyuma ujya gushyingurwa mu irimbi ryihariye rimaze iminsi ryubakirwa i Gitega.
Umugore wa Nkurunziza, Denise Bucumi, yavuze ko abuze umukunzi, abana bakaba babuze umubyeyi.
Yashimye Imana ko yabashoboje gukomera muri ibi bihe bitoroshye.
Ati “Kubura umuntu mu mwanya mutoya wari ugikunze kubana nawe ntibiba byoroshe, ariko mu muryango Imana yaduhaye imbaraga zo guhagarara muri ibi bihe".
Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko we n’Abarundi bose bazahora bakurikiza umurage Nkurunziza abasigiye wo gukunda igihugu nk’uko nawe yabikoze yishingikirije abakurambere bamubanjirije.
Ati “Ubwanjye ndahombye, umujyanama mukuru, wa wundi ubaza byose, akaba azi n’akari mu nda y’ingoma nk’uwayikanye, wa wundi umenya icyasongoye ihwa".
Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Tanzania, Kassim Majaliwa, yashimye Nkurunziza avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko agiye atinjije u Burundi mu muryango w’Ubukungu bwa Afurika y’Amajyepfo, SADC, ariko igihugu cye kizabufasha kubigeraho.
Pierre Nkurunziza yavutse ku wa 18 Ukuboza 1964, ayobora u Burundi kuva mu 2005 yongera gutorwa mu 2015 muri manda yagombaga kurangira muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.

1905: Albert Einstein, yashyize ahagaragara inyandiko yise On the Electrodynamics of Moving Bodies.
Iyi nyandiko ni yo yashyizemo umwihariko w’ umutwe w’inyandiko yise special relativity.
1935: Bwa mbere, mu gihugu cya Senegal hateranye inama y’umutwe wa Politiki witwa Senegalese Socialist Party washinzwe na Lamine Guèye mu mwaka w’1934.
1960: Igihugu cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo cyabonye ubwigenge nyuma yo kumara imyaka n’imyaka gikolonizwa n’Ababiligi.
1963: Hakozwe ubwicanyi mu gitero cy’ubwiyahuzi cyari cyateguwe n’umukuru w’abagizi ba nabi (mafia) Salvatore Greco, ubwo imodoka ipakiye ibisasu yasandariraga hagati y’abayobozi ba Polisi n’abasirikare kigahitana abagera kuri barindwi.
Ubu bwicanyi bwiswe Ciaculli bwabereye mu gihugu cy’u Butaliyani.
1990: Habayeho ubwiyunge hagati y’u Budage bw’Iburasirazuba ndetse n’ubw’Iburengerazuba.
1997: U Bwongereza bweguriye u Bushinwa ububasha bwari bufite kuri Hong Kong.
Bamwe mu bavutse kuri uyu munsi
1755: Paul François Jean Nicolas Barras, umunyapolitiki ukomoka mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa.
1807: Friedrich Theodor von Vischer, Umwanditsi n’umufilozofe ukomoka mu gihugu cy’u Budage.
1966: Michael Gerard "Mike" Tyson wahoze ari umukinnyi w’umukino w’iteramakofe (Box) wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika.
Uyu yabaye ikirangirire mu cyiciro cy’abakinnyi b’uyu mukino baremereye ku rwego rw’isi (Heavyweight Champion of the World).
Bamwe mu batabarutse uyu munsi
1953: Charles William Miller, umukinnyi ukomeye w’umupira w’amaguru mu gihugu cya Brazil, ufatwa nk’umubyeyi wa Football muri Brazil.
2005: Clancy Eccles, umuhanzi w’umuririmbyi wo mu njyana ya reggae.
Hashimangiwe ko Centre Culturel Francophone izafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka urangira
Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda ikomeje imyiteguro yo gufungura ku mugaragaro Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Igifaransa, Centre Culturel Francophone, biteganyijwe ko kizafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda ikomeje imyiteguro yo gufungura ku mugaragaro Ikigo Ndangamuco cy’Igifaransa, Centre Culturel Francophone, biteganyijwe ko kizafungurwa mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Gufungura iki kigo ndangamuco biri mu byaganiriweho kuri uyu wa Kane hagati ya Chargé d’Affaires w’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, Jérémie Blin n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Prof Nshuti Manasseh.
Ni igikorwa byashimangiwe ko cyitezwe mbere y’uko uyu mwaka wa 2020 urangira.
Blin aheruka gutangaza ko iki kigo kizaba giherereye iruhande rwa Kigali Convention Centre, nibura kizafungurwa mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE yemeza ko Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda yamaze gukodesha inzu izakurerwamo n’icyo kigo, ubu hari gukorwa inyigo y’uko hazatunganywa hakurikijwe ibikorwa bizajya bihabera.
Biteganywa ko hazaba hari ahabera imurikabikorwa rishingiye ku muco, inama, kikazaba ari ikigo giha urubyiruko uburyo bwose bwo kwiga ururimi rw’Igifaransa, n’abanyabugeni b’abanyarwanda hakababera aho kwitoreza no guteza imbere umwuga wabo.
Iyi nzu ndangamuco izasimbura iyahahoze yitwaga Ikigo ndangamuco cy’u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda (Centre D’Echanges Culturels Franco-Rwandais) cyafunzwe ndetse n’inzu cyakoreragamo igasenywa.
Iyi nyubako yari iherereye iruhande rwa rond-point nini yo mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati ku ruhande rugana mu Kiyovu, yafunzwe ndetse isenywa mu 2014 n’ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali, bwavuze ko ubutaka bw’aho yari iherereye butakoreshwaga neza ndetse iyo nyubako itari ikitajyanye n’imyubakire ihagenewe.
Ni ibikorwa byabaye mu gihe umubano w’ibihugu byombi utari wifashe neza.
Ibi biganiro kandi byibanze ku ngingo zirimo isubukurwa ry’ibikorwa by’Ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’Abafaransa gishinzwe Iterambere, AFD, by’umwihariko mu gufasha mu guhangana n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Mu zindi nzego zaganiriweho harimo ubutabera, ishoramari, ubukerarugendo, ikoranabuhanga n’iterambere ry’imibereho y’abaturage.
Mu bufatanye bw’impande zombi, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima, RBC, giheruka gusinyana amasezerano na Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, agamije gushyira ikoranabuhanga muri telefoni zigezweho, Smartphones z’abajyanama b’ubuzima bagera kuri 400, rizabafasha mu guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ubu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwakozwe n’Ikigo Institut Pasteur na AP-HP (Assistance publique – Hôpitaux de Paris) cyo mu Bufaransa, butuma hamenyekana ku buryo bwagutse kandi bwihuse abafite iki cyorezo cyane cyane mu bice by’icyaro.
Amasezerano hagati y’impande zombi agaragaza ko uyu mushinga uzatwara 223 077 789 Frw, igice kimwe kizatangwa n’Urwego rw’u Bufaransa rushinzwe ubushakashatsi kuri Sida na Hepatite, aho ruzatanga 126 783 000 Frw, naho Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda itange 94 010 152 Frw.
Mu mwaka ushize Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD yaje mu Rwanda yizeza gukomeza gufatanya mu bikorwa by’iterambere.
Umuyobozi w’icyo kigo yahaherukaga mu 1992.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi AFD yahaye Banki ya Kigali inguzanyo ya miliyoni 20 z’amayero (asaga miliyari 20 Frw) yo guteza imbere ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse mu Rwanda, inemera gutanga ibihumbi 300 by’amayero (asaga miliyoni 300 Frw) azifashishwa mu bya tekiniki.
Aya mafaranga y’inguzanyo azatangwa mu nzego ziganjemo ikoranabuhanga, ubuhinzi, ubworozi ndetse n’ingufu.

Huye: Babiri mu bakekwaho kwica umuntu bafashwe, inka ze zifatirwa i Nyaruguru
Babiri mu bagizi ba nabi bakekwaho kwica umugabo wari uragiye inka ze mu Murenge wa Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye batawe muri yombi naho izo nka uko ari esheshatu zifatirwa mu Murenge wa Mata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Babiri mu bagizi ba nabi bakekwaho kwica umugabo wari uragiye inka ze mu Murenge wa Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye batawe muri yombi naho izo nka uko ari esheshatu zifatirwa mu Murenge wa Mata mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 28 Kamena 2020 nibwo abagizi ba nabi bishe umugabo wo mu Murenge Gishamvu mu Karere ka Huye bamutsinda mu kabande kari mu gishanga cy’Akagera aho yari aragiye inka ze.
Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 57 y’amavuko witwa Ndabunguye Vincent yamenyekanye saa sita z’ijoro ubwo umugore we yatabazaga ubuyobozi ko yagiye kuragira inka aramutegereza aramubura.
Abatabaye basanze yamaze kwicwa ndetse n’inka esheshatu yari aragiye ziburirwa irengero.
Inzego z’umutekano ku bufatanye n’ubuyobozi ndetse n’abaturage bakomeje ubufatanye mu gushakisha abamwishe no kumenya irengero ry’izo nka; mu ijoro ryakeye ni bwo zafatiwe mu Murenge wa Mata ariko abari bazishoreye barirukanka bacika abanyerondo.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru, Habitegeko François, yabwiye IGIHE ko abari bashoreye izo nka bahuye n’abanyerondo mu ijoro ryakeye mu Kagari ka Ramba barazibatesha bariruka.
Ati “Twazifashe, ni irondo ry’abaturage ryazifatiye ahitwa mu i Ramba mu Murenge wa Mata mu Mudugudu wa Cyafurwe ariko abari baziyoboye birukanse.
Twazifashe nka saa cyenda z’ijoro.
Ubu ni ukuzisubiza ba nyirazo, twamenyesheje Akarere ka Huye kugira ngo baze bazifate.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwahise buhanahana amakuru n’Umurenge wa Maraba mu Karere ka Huye ko abo birukanse ari ho berekeje, barabatangatanga bafatamo babiri.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Maraba, Hakuzimana Jean Baptiste, yabwiye IGIHE ko abo babiri bafashwe bamaze gushyikirizwa ubugenzacyaha ngo bakorweho iperereza.
Ati “Mu Murenge wa Mata bamaze kuduha amakuru twahise dutangatanga maze ahagana saa kumi n’ebyiri z’igitondo dufata abagabo babiri bakekwa barimo umwe wo mu Murenge wa Cyahinda mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’undi wo mu Murenge wa Tumba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abo bagabo bombi bafatiwe mu Kagari ka Buremera; kuri ubu bafungiye kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB ya Ngoma mu Karere ka Huye.
