Imikino isoza UEFA Champions League izakinirwa hamwe mu gihe cy’iminsi 12 gusa
Imikino isigaye ngo irushanwa rya UEFA Champions League rihuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi rirangire, byitezwe ko izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon, muri Kanama mu gihe cy’iminsi 12.
Imikino isigaye ngo irushanwa rya UEFA Champions League rihuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi rirangire, byitezwe ko izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon, muri Kanama mu gihe cy’iminsi 12.
Umurwa mukuru wa Portugal uzakira imikino ya ¼ , ½ n’umukino wa nyuma, yose izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 23 Kanama uyu mwaka.
Imikino yose isigaye izajya ikinwa ari umwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura) mu byiciro bitandukanye, izabera ku bibuga bibiri byo muri Lisbon- Estadio da Luz na Estadio Jose Alvalade.
Byitezwe ko iyi gahunda yo gukina imikino isigaye nk’irushanwa rito, izemezwa na Komite Nyobozi ya UEFA mu nama izaba ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 17 Kamena 2020.
Imikino ya ¼ izaba hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 15 Kanama, iya ½ ibe hagati ya tariki y 18 n’iya 19 Kanama mu gihe umukino wa nyuma uzaba tariki ya 23 Kanama.
Uburyo imikino ine isigaye ya 1/8 izakinwa na byo bigomba kwemezwa.
Manchester City yagombaga kwakira Real Madrid mu mukino wari kuba tariki ya 17 Werurwe nyuma y’uko yari yatsindiye muri Espagne ibitego 2-1.
Bayern Munich yari yatsinze Chelsea ibitego 3-0, Juventus itsindwa na Lyon igitego 1-0 mu gihe FC Barcelone yari yanganyije na Napoli igitego 1-1.
Amakipe ya Paris Saint-Germain, Atalanta, Atlético Madrid na RB Leipzig yari yamaze kubona itike ya ¼.
Umujyi wa Istanbul wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League uyu mwaka, ushobora guhabwa uw’umwaka utaha.
Nta cyemezo kirafatwa ku irushanwa rya Europa League ry’uyu mwaka, ariko byitezwe ko naryo rizakinwa muri ubu buryo, rigasorezwa mu Mujyi wa Frankfurt cyangwa uwa Düsseldorf mu Budage.
Ku bijyanye n’irushanwa ry’umwaka utaha w’imikino, UEFA iri kwiga uburyo imikino y’amatsinda yatangira mu Ukwakira hagati mu gihe ubusanzwe habaga hari gusozwa imikino ibanza yo mu matsinda.
Simba SC ikinamo Kagere Meddie yegukanye Shampiyona ya Tanzania ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya
Simba SC ikinamo Umunyarwanda Kagere Meddie, yegukanye igikombe cya gatatu cyikurikiranya cya Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere muri Tanzania nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa na Tanzania Prisons mu mukino wabaye kuri iki Cyumweru kuri Stade Sokoine i Mbeya.
Simba SC ikinamo Umunyarwanda Kagere Meddie, yegukanye igikombe cya gatatu cyikurikiranya cya Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere muri Tanzania nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa na Tanzania Prisons mu mukino wabaye kuri iki Cyumweru kuri Stade Sokoine i Mbeya.
Muri uyu mukino w’umunsi wa 32, umuholandi Sven Vandenbroeck yari yagiriye icyizere Kagere Meddie wakinnye iminota yose y’umukino.
Simba SC yari ikeneye inota rimwe kugira ngo yegukanye igikombe nyuma y’uko Azam FC yanganyije na Biashara United igitego 1-1 ikagira amanota 59 mu gihe Yanga SC yatsinze Ndanda FC ibitego 3-2 ku wa Gatanu, ikagira amanota 60.
Umunyezamu wa Tanzania Prisons, Jeremiah Kasubi na Aishi Manula urinda izamu rya Simba SC bagize uruhare rukomeye mu gutuma uyu mukino urangira nta gitego kiwubonetsemo.
Kunganya byatumye Simba SC igira amanota 79 mu mikino 32, yegukana igikombe harimo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 19 mu gihe hasigaye imikino itandatu.
Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya iyi kipe yegukanye iki gikombe mu gihe ari ku nshuro ya 21 yegukanye shampiyona ya Tanzania, irushwa inshuro eshanu na Yanga SC igifite inshuro 26.
Kuri Kagere Meddie, ni igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona yegukanye ari kumwe na Simba SC nyuma yo kuyigeramo mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2018/19, avuye muri Gor Mahia FC yo muri Kenya.
Biteganyijwe ko Simba SC izashyikirizwa igikombe mu mikino iri imbere bitewe n’ibiganiro bizahuza ubuyobozi bwayo n’abayobora Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF).
AS Muhanga yabonye umutoza mushya w’Umurundi
Umurundi Nduwantare Ismail Jean Marie Vianney ni we wemejwe nk’umutoza mushya wa AS Muhanga, ku masezerano y’umwaka umwe ushobora kongerwa.
Umurundi Nduwantare Ismail Jean Marie Vianney ni we wemejwe nk’umutoza mushya wa AS Muhanga, ku masezerano y’umwaka umwe ushobora kongerwa.
AS Muhanga nta mutoza yari ifite nyuma y’uko Mbarushimana Abdu wayitozaga yerekeje muri Bugesera FC mu kwezi gushize.
Iyi kipe yabaye iya 11 mu mwaka ushize w’imikino wa 2019/20, yari imaze iminsi iri mu biganiro n’abarimo Ruremesha Emmanuel nyuma wasinyiye Gorilla FC, Nduwantare Ismail na Bisengimana Justin.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa AS Muhanga, Bisangwabagabo Youssuf, yabwiye IGIHE ko bamaze kwemeza Nduwantare Ismail nk’umutoza mushya ku masezerano y’umwaka umwe.
Ati “Nibyo umutoza twamaze kumubona, ni Nduwantare Jean Ismail Marie Vianney, twamuhaye amasezerano y’umwaka umwe ushobora kongerwa mu gihe byaba bigenze neza.
“Intego yacu ni ugukomeza kuzamura abakinnyi bakiri bato kandi beza ariko tukaguma mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Nduwantare yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu mwaka ushize ubwo yatozaga Gicumbi FC, ariko akaba yarirukanwe mu Ugushyingo nyuma y’amezi abiri gusa, kubera umusaruro muke.
Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu, Nduwantare aje gutoza mu Rwanda nyuma yo kuba umutoza Aspor FC mu 2008 mbere y’uko asubira muri Prince Louis, ayifasha gusubira mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Yatoje kandi amakipe arimo Inter Stars, Flambeau de l’Est, Kayanza United, Delta Star na Les Jeunes Athletics z’iwabo mu Burundi.
Hatangajwe igihe Shampiyona ya NBA izasubukurirwa ikinwa mu buryo bwihariye
Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA) ikunzwe kurusha izindi ku Isi, yatangaje ko izasubukurwa tariki ya 30 Nyakanga nyuma y’uko ihagaze guhera muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA) ikunzwe kurusha izindi ku Isi, yatangaje ko izasubukurwa tariki ya 30 Nyakanga nyuma y’uko ihagaze guhera muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 27 Kamena nibwo hashyizwe ahagaragara imikino izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 30 Nyakanga n’iya 14 Kanama 2020.
Amakipe 22 azitabira isubukurwa rya NBA, azakina imikino umunani (kuri buri imwe) izabera ku bibuga bya ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex i Walt Disney World Resort muri Florida.
Imikino ibiri izabimburira indi ku wa Kane tariki ya 30 Nyakanga ni uzahuza Utah Jazz na New Orleans Pelicans, ndetse n’uzahuza LA Clippers na Los Angeles Lakers mu gihe bukeye bwaho, tariki ya 31 Nyakanga, hazaba imikino itandatu irimo uwo Boston Celtics izakinamo na Milwaukee Bucks naho Houston Rockets ihure Dallas Mavericks.
Muri iri subukurwa rya NBA, buri munsi hazajya hakinwa imikino igera kuri irindwi ku bibuga bitatu bitandukanye byo muri ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Buri kipe izabarwa nk’iyakiriye imikino ine ndetse yongere kugirwa nk’iyakiniye hanze mu yindi mikino ine.
Ubwo NBA yasubikwagwa tariki ya 11 Werurwe, hari hasigaye imikino 259 mu mwaka usanzwe w’imikino ariko hazakinwa 88 gusa.
Amakipe 22 azakina iyi mikino ni umunani yari aya mbere muri buri gace (conference) [ni ukuvuga ane muri buri gace] kongeraho andi atandatu (atanu yo mu Burengerazuba n’imwe yo mu Burasirazuba) hagendewe ku manota yari afite.
Iyi mikino izasozwa tariki ya 14 Kanama mu gihe biteganyijwe ko hazabaho play-in izahuza ikipe ya munani n’iya cyenda muri buri gace hagati ya tariki ya 15 n’iya 16 Kanama mu gihe byaba bibaye ngombwa.
Iya Play-offs yitabirwa n’amakipe umunani ya mbere muri buri gace, izatangira tariki ya 17 Kanama 2020 ikageza mu Ukwakira.
Rayon Sports yavuze ku isinyishwa rya Nishimwe Blaise n’abandi bakinnyi
Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports buvuga ko butarasinyisha Nishimwe Blaise ukina muri Marines FC gusa bwemeza ko ari mu bakinnyi bari kuganirizwa kugira ngo bazayikinire mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports buvuga ko butarasinyisha Nishimwe Blaise ukina muri Marines FC gusa bwemeza ko ari mu bakinnyi bari kuganirizwa kugira ngo bazayikinire mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Bivugwa ko Nishimwe Blaise yasinye amasezerano y’imyaka itatu ku wa Gatanu ndetse ari mu bakinnyi bashya Rayon Sports yamaze kugura.
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports, Nkurunziza Jean Paul, yabwiye IGIHE ko bari kuganira n’abakinnyi batandukanye ariko hari abatarasinya.
Ati “Hari komisiyo ishinzwe kugura abakinnyi, hari benshi iri kuganira nabo ariko nta gusinya birabaho.
Uwo [Nishimwe] ntabwo nakubwira ngo arimo cyangwa ntabwo ari mu bari kuganirizwa ariko igihe nikigera muzamenya abakinnyi bashya ba Rayon Sports.
Ku wa Gatanu w’icyumweru gishize, ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwavuze ko hari abakinnyi batanu bwamaze kugura mu gihe hari n’abandi batandatu bakiri bato bazatizwa andi makipe.
Nkurunziza yakomeje agira ati “Abo barahari tuzabatangaza tariki ya 21 Kamena kandi tuzatangaza abakomeye.
Mugheni Fabrice wari wasezeye Rayon Sports, Michael Sarpong wari wirukanywe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri watandukanye na Emirates FC, bari mu bavugwa muri iyi kipe yambara ubururu n’umweru nubwo ubuyobozi bwayo bwirinda kugira icyo bubivugaho.
Imikino isigaye ya UEFA Champions League na Europa League izaba muri Kanama, ikinwe nk’Igikombe cy’Isi
Inama ya Komite Nyobozi y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Mugabane w’Uburayi (UEFA) yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu, yanzuye ko amarushanwa yayo ya Champions League na Europa League azasubukurwa mu ntangiriro za Kanama nyuma y’uko ahagaritswe muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Inama ya Komite Nyobozi y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Mugabane w’Uburayi (UEFA) yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu, yanzuye ko amarushanwa yayo ya Champions League na Europa League azasubukurwa mu ntangiriro za Kanama nyuma y’uko ahagaritswe muri Werurwe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
UEFA yemeje ko aya marushanwa yombi ahuza amakipe akomeye i Burayi, azasozwa akinwa mu buryo bw’Igikombe cy’Isi.
Hemejwe ko imikino isigaye kugira ngo irushanwa rya Champions League rirangire izakinirwa mu Mujyi wa Lisbon.
Umurwa mukuru wa Portugal uzakira imikino ya kimwe cya kane, iya kimwe cya kabiri n’umukino wa nyuma, yose izakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 12 n’iya 23 Kanama uyu mwaka mu gihe imikino ya kimwe cy’umunani yo kwishyura yari isigaye, izakinirwa aho yagombaga kubera cyangwa muri Portugal kuri Estádio do Dragão y’i Porto na Estádio D.
Afonso Henriques y’i Guimarães hagati ya tariki ya 7 n’iya 8 Kanama.
Imikino yose isigaye muri kimwe cya kane na kimwe cya kabiri izajya ikinwa ari umwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura), izabera ku bibuga bibiri byo muri Lisbon- Estadio da Luz na Estadio Jose Alvalade.
Champions League yakomwe mu nkokora na Coronavirus kuva tariki ya 11 Werurwe, ubwo imikino ya kimwe cy’umunani yari igeze hagati.
Manchester City yagombaga kwakira Real Madrid mu mukino wo kwishyura wari kuba tariki ya 17 Werurwe nyuma y’uko yari yatsindiye muri Espagne ibitego 2-1.
Bayern Munich yari yatsinze Chelsea ibitego 3-0, Juventus itsindwa na Lyon igitego 1-0 mu gihe FC Barcelone yari yanganyije na Napoli igitego 1-1.
Amakipe ya Paris Saint-Germain, Atalanta, Atlético Madrid na RB Leipzig yari yamaze kubona itike ya kimwe cya kane.
Umujyi wa Istanbul (Atatürk Olympic Stadium) wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League uyu mwaka, wahawe kwakira uw’umwaka utaha.
Europa League izakinirwa mu Budage
UEFA yemeje ko kandi irushanwa rya Europa League naryo rizakinwa muri ubu buryo bumeze nk’Igikombe cy’Isi, aho guhera muri kimwe cya kane imikino izabera mu Budage mu Mijyi ya Cologne, Duisburg, Düsseldorf na Gelsenkirchen muri Kanama, haba umukino umwe.
Imikino yo kwishyura yari isigaye nayo izakinirwa aho yagombaga kubera cyangwa mu Budage mu gihe Inter Milan na Getafe, Seville FC na AS Roma zitakinnye umukino n’umwe, zizahura inshuro imwe (nta mukino wo kwishyura uzabaho).
Umujyi wa Gdańsk wo muri Pologne wagombaga kwakira umukino wa nyuma w’uyu mwaka, wahawe kwakira uw’irushanwa ry’umwaka utaha.
Europa League yahagaze tariki ya 12 Werurwe, izasubukurwa tariki ya 5 n’iya 6 Kanama haba imikino yo kwishyura (ahabaye imikino ibanza) mu gihe umukino wa nyuma uzakinwa tariki ya 21 Kanama 2020.
Siporo zikorwa abantu bategeranye zakomorewe: Ni ryari amakipe ashobora gutangira imyitozo?
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 16 Werurwe yafatiwemo umwanzuro uvuga ko ibikorwa bya siporo zikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye zemerewe gukomeza.
Icyakora siporo ikorerwa mu nyubako z’imyidagaduro irabujijwe.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 16 Werurwe yafatiwemo umwanzuro uvuga ko ibikorwa bya siporo zikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye zemerewe gukomeza.
Icyakora siporo ikorerwa mu nyubako z’imyidagaduro irabujijwe.
Imyanzuro y’iyi nama ivuga ko "Amabwiriza arambuye kuri iyi ngingo azatangwa na Minisiteri ya Siporo.
" Ni amabwiriza yitezweho kureba niba ashobora gutanga umurongo nk’amakipe ashobora gukoramo imyitozo, abakinnyi bategeranye, mbere y’uko imikino imwe n’imwe yazasubukurwa.
Tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nibwo ibikorwa byose by’imikino byahagaritswe mu Rwanda, umunsi umwe nyuma y’uko Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaje ko hari umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus wabonetse mu gihugu.
Tariki ya 5 Gicurasi, Minisiteri ya Siporo yagiranye inama na Komite Olempike n’abahagarariye imikino, hemezwa ko hafi imikino ishobora gusubukurwa ari muri Nzeri mu gihe imyitozo yatangira muri Kanama.
Ku wa 4 Kamena Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje ko guhera ku wa 8 Kamena, imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye irimo uwo kunyoga igare, gutwara imodoka, Tennis, Golf, kugenda n’amaguru (Hiking) n’imikino ngororamubiri ishobora gusubukurwa ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda.
Amwe mu bwiriza yari yashyizweho yarimo kuba nk’abasiganwa ku maguru bagomba guhana intera mu gihe bakorera muri Stade Amahoro n’ahandi haba inzira y’abasiganwa no kuba buri wese akoresha ibikoresho bye ku bajugunya.
Muri Tennis hemejwe ko buri mukinnyi azajya azana imipira ye, akaba ariyo akina (ashobora gufata mu ntoki) itari iye akayitanga kuri mugenzi we akoresheje ikirenge cyangwa racket, kuba abakinnyi batemerewe guhinduranya ibibuga no gusiga intera ya metero eshatu hagati yabo (Tennis ikinwa na babiri ntiyemewe).
Hari n’abibajije impamvu umukino wa Cricket utabamo kwegerana, utigeze ushyirwa mu yemerewe gusubukura.

Amakipe ashobora kongera gusubukura imyitozo?
Nk’uko no mu bindi bihugu birimo iby’i Burayi biri gukorwa muri iyi minsi, hari ibyiciro bacamo mu kongera gusubukura ibikorwa by’imikino.
Ni intambwe amakipe yo mu Rwanda ategereje kuzahabwaho umurongo.
Mu Bwongereza, u Budage, Espagne n’ahandi imikino yasubukuwe, babanje kwemerera abakinnyi gukora ku giti cyabo imikino irimo ngorangingo nko kwiruka.
Icyiciro cya kabiri cyabaye kwemerera amakipe gusubukura imyitozo, bigakorwa abakinnyi bategerena, aho mu cyumweru cya mbere imyitozo yakorwaga mu matsinda ku buryo mu kibuga hatarenga abakinnyi batanu mu gihe mu cyumweru cya kabiri batarengaga 10.
Iki cyiciro cyakurikiwe no kwemerera amakipe gukorera imyitozo hamwe, ariko hakagira ingamba zo kwirinda zubahirizwa zirimo no gupimwa kenshi kw’abakinnyi dore ko ibi bihugu byo mu Burayi biri mu byazahajwe cyane na Coronavirus.
Hari icyo byafasha amakipe yitegura amarushanwa
Lomami Marcel utoza Gorilla FC yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri izakina imikino ya Playoffs yo guhatanira kuzamuka mu cyiciro cya mbere, yabwiye IGIHE ko nyuma y’amezi atatu imikino imaze ihagaze hari abakinnyi biyongereye ibiro ku buryo baramutse bemerewe gusubukura imyitozo hubahirizwa gusiga intera hagati y’abantu, hari icyo byafasha amakipe.
Ati “Baramutse batanze uburenganzira byadufasha kuko abakinnyi bacu benshi bafite ibilo, basigaye baremereye kuko sinavuga ko gukora ku giti cyabo bibafasha cyane.
Urwego rwabo rwasubiye hasi bizaba ari gutangira bundi bushya kandi tuzagira imvune nyinshi cyane bitewe n’uko imibiri yabo yabaye.
Bakundakabo Rachid utoza Etoile de l’Est nayo yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri, na we avuga ko amakipe aramutse yemerewe gusubukura imyitozo kare bishobora kuyafasha kugira imyiteguro myiza cyane ku ashobora kuzamuka mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Ati “Batwemereye twabishobora gusubukura imyitozo hubarijwe amabwira kuko natwe byadufasha ko tutagira imyiteguro mike kuko hashize ikirekire cyane, hafi amezi ane abakinnyi bakorera ahantu hato.
Byose bitangiye mu kwa munani bizaba bigoye kuko shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere iba iri hafi gutangira.
Kuba hari haremejwe ko hafi imikino ishobora gusubukurwa ari muri Nzeri, byatumye amashyirahamwe y’imikino arimo iry’Umupira w’Amaguru, Basketball, Volleyball, Handball n’ayandi afata ibyemezo birimo gusoza amwe mu marushanwa imburagihe no kuba hari ayasubitswe kugeza igihe gukina biza bishoboka.
Hategerejwe amabwiriza ya Minisiteri ya Siporo, ngo hamenyekane niba bishoboka ko imyitozo imwe n’imwe abakinnyi bategeranye ishobora gutangira.
Rayon Sports yasinyishije rutahizamu w’Umurundi
Rayon Sports ikomeje kwiyubaka, yasinyishije rutahizamu Nihoreho Arsène ukomoka mu Burundi, wabaye uwa gatatu mu batsinze ibitego byinshi muri Shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri icyo gihugu n’ibitego 17 mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/2020.
Rayon Sports ikomeje kwiyubaka, yasinyishije rutahizamu Nihoreho Arsène ukomoka mu Burundi, wabaye uwa gatatu mu batsinze ibitego byinshi muri Shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri icyo gihugu n’ibitego 17 mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/2020.
Nihoreho w’imyaka 20, yakiniraga Olympic Star, akaba yasinyiye Rayon Sports amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri nk’uko Umuvugizi w’iyi kipe, Nkurunziza Jean Paul, yabyemereye IGIHE.
Ati “Ni byo yamaze gusinyira Rayon Sports amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri kandi ni rutahizamu mwiza twizeye ko azadufasha.
Nihoreho Arsène yatsinze ibitego 17 muri shampiyona y’u Burundi iheruka gusozwa, akaba yari ku mwanya wa gatatu arushwa ibitego bibiri na Iddy Museremu ukinira Le Messager Ngozi, we watsinze ibitego 19.
Aje yiyongera ku bandi bakinnyi bashya Rayon Sports iheruka kugura barimo Umunya-Togo Alex Harlley ukina mu kibuga hagati afasha abataha izamu, Niyonkuru Sadjati wakiniraga Marines FC, Uwingiyimana Christophe wakiniraga Gicumbi FC n’abandi bakinnyi 10 bakiri bato bazamuwe, ubuyobozi buvuga ko bazatizwa andi makipe.
Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje igihe izakomorera indi mikino
Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje ko bitarenze tariki ya 6 Nyakanga hazaba hamaze gutangazwa indi mikino izakomorerwa nyuma y’uko isubitswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje ko bitarenze tariki ya 6 Nyakanga hazaba hamaze gutangazwa indi mikino izakomorerwa nyuma y’uko isubitswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa 16 Kamena 2020 yafatiwemo umwanzuro uvuga ko ibikorwa bya siporo zikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye zemerewe gukomeza.
Icyakora siporo ikorerwa mu nyubako z’imyidagaduro irabujijwe.
Uyu mwanzuro wafashwe nyuma y’uko guhera ku wa 8 Kamena, imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye irimo uwo kunyoga igare, gutwara imodoka, Tennis, Golf, kugenda n’amaguru (Hiking) n’imikino ngororamubiri yemerewe gusubukurwa ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 26 Kamena 2020, Minisiteri ya Siporo yatangaje ko indi mikino izakomorerwa izatangazwa tariki ya 6 Nyakanga.
Yagize iti “Minisiteri ya Siporo iramenyesha abantu bose ko aya mabwiriza yo ku wa 4 Kamena 2020 (yo gusubukura imwe mu mikino ku wa 8 Kamena) akomeza kubahirizwa mu gihe hagiterejwe raporo ku isesengurya ryimbitse ryerekeye amabwiriza yakusanijwe mu mashyirahamwe y’imikino.
“Ibindi bikorwa by’imikino byemerewe gusubukurwa bizatangazwa ku wa 6 Nyakanga hashingiwe ku nama zitanzwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima (Minisante).
Minisiteri ya Siporo yakomeje ivuga ko “Ahakorerwa siporo hose hazakomeza gufungwa keretse ahakorerwa siporo zavuzwe haruguru.
Tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nibwo ibikorwa byose by’imikino byahagaritswe mu Rwanda, umunsi umwe nyuma y’uko Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaje ko hari umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus wabonetse mu gihugu.
Tariki ya 5 Gicurasi, Minisiteri ya Siporo yagiranye inama na Komite Olempike n’abahagarariye imikino, hemezwa ko hafi imikino (amarushanwa) ishobora gusubukurwa ari muri Nzeri mu gihe imyitozo yatangira muri Kanama.
Amabwiriza yo kubungabunga ubuzima hirindwa COVID-19
Kiyovu Sports yashoye asaga miliyoni 50 Frw igura abakinnyi, byaba biyiha igikombe mu mwaka utaha w’imikino?
Kiyovu Sports ni yo kipe imaze kwigaragaza kurusha izindi ku isoko ry’abakinnyi, aho imaze gutanga agera kuri miliyoni 55 Frw mu kugura abakinnyi bashya no kongerera amasezerano abasanzwe.
Kiyovu Sports ni yo kipe imaze kwigaragaza kurusha izindi ku isoko ry’abakinnyi, aho imaze gutanga agera kuri miliyoni 55 Frw mu kugura abakinnyi bashya no kongerera amasezerano abasanzwe.
Iyi kipe ikinira ku Mumena, yamaze kumvikana n’Umutoza Karekezi Olivier uzayitoza guhera mu mwaka utaha w’imikino wa 2020/21, yaguze abakinnyi benshi bafite amazina akomeye.
Umunyezamu wa mbere w’ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’, Kimenyi Yves yatanzweho miliyoni 16 Frw avuye muri Rayon Sports mu gihe rutahizamu Babuwa Samson watsinze ibitego byinshi kurusha abandi mu mwaka ushize w’imikino, na we yerekeje muri iyi kipe avuye muri Sunrise FC kuri miliyoni 7 Frw.
Abandi bakinnyi Kiyovu Sports yaguze ni Irambona Eric na Ngendahimana Eric batanzweho miliyoni 10.
5 Frw uko ari babiri mu gihe Serumogo Ally, Ishimwe Saleh, Mbogo Ally na Mutangana Derrick bongerewe amasezerano batanzweho agera kuri miliyoni 18.
5 Frw uko ari bane.
Ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports buvuga ko bushaka kubaka ikipe ikomeye ihatanira ibikombe nyuma y’uko mu myaka yashize n’abeza yabaga ifite, andi makipe yaragaza akabatwara.
Visi Perezida wa mbere wa Kiyovu Sports, Ntalindwa Théodore yabwiye itangazamakuru ati “Shampiyona yari yabanje twari twatakaje abakinnyi benshi babanza mu kibuga bituma twongera kubaka ikipe nshya, ubu twiyemeje gushaka abakinnyi beza mu gihugu kandi turasa n’ababigezeho.
Uretse abakinnyi bashya Kiyovu Sports yamaze kugura, bivugwa ko ikomeje ibiganiro n’abarimo Bigirimana Abed wakinaga mu Burundi na Ngandu Omar wakiniye APR FC na AS Kigali, akaba avukana na Niyonzima Ally.
Ntalindwa avuga ko mu myaka Kiyovu Sports imaze idatwara igikombe, batekereje gukora byinshi bitandukanye bimwe bikanga, ariko ubu bafashe icyemezo cyo gushingira ku ikipe ikomeye.
Ati “Tumaze imyaka 26 nta gikombe dutwara, twatekereje byinshi birimo gukinisha Abanyarwanda gusa, gukinisha abana mwabonye icyo byatanze n’ibindi.
Twavuze ko duhindura, tugatekereza byagutse kuko umupira ni ugucuruza.
Amafaranga ari kuva mu banyamuryango ba Kiyovu.
Turashaka kwerekana ko Kiyovu ari imfura y’umupira w’u Rwanda.
Amafaranga Kiyovu Sports iri gukoresha ari kuva he?
Bivugwa ko Mvukiyehe Juvénal usanzwe ufite sitasiyo za lisansi, akaba n’umukunzi wa Kiyovu Sports yahaye iyi kipe agera kuri miliyoni 100 Frw ngo igure abakinnyi mu rwego rwo kwiyubaka.
Uyu ni we wasinyishije abarimo Kimenyi Yves, Babuwa Samson, Ishimwe Saleh, Irambona na Ngendahimana Eric ndetse yahaye Karekezi Olivier miliyoni 3 Frw azamufasha kwiyubaka i Kigali ubwo azaba agarutse mu Rwanda muri Nyakanga.
Andi makuru avuga ko hari n’amafaranga yashowemo n’Umuyobozi wa Kiyovu Sports, Mvuyekure François ‘Kabulimbo’ uba hafi cyane y’iyi kipe.
Ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports buvuga ko “ari amafaranga atangwa n’abanyamuryango ba Kiyovu Sports bari hirya no hino ku Isi kuko babonye ko ikipe yabo hari icyo ishaka kugeraho.
“Hari ababonye tuguze abakinnyi batangira kubona ko bishoboka, baraduhamagara bati ‘natwe rero turi itsinda ry’abantu 10’, ntabwo ari mu Rwanda gusa, no muri Amerika, mu Burayi n’ahandi baraduhamagara bakatubwira bati ‘twumvise gahunda ihari turi itsinda ry’abantu 10, twishyize hamwe twabona miliyoni 5 Frw, ni aho ubushobozi buri kuva.
Kiyovu Sports isanganywe abaterankunga barimo UAP iyiha miliyoni 5 Frw ku mwaka n’andi mafaranga ava ku bwishingizi bwafashwe n’abakunzi bayo, Acqua Rwanda iyiha miliyoni 10 Frw ku mwaka, Azam yayemereye miliyoni 132 Frw mu gihe cy’imyaka ine n’Umujyi wa Kigali uyiha miliyoni 120 Frw ku mwaka.
Byaba biha Kiyovu Sports ubushobozi bwo gutwara igikombe?
Kiyovu Sports imaze imyaka 59 ibayeho nyuma yo kwemezwa n’iteka rya minisitiri mu 1961, imaze kwegukana shampiyona y’u Rwanda inshuro eshanu zirimo iyo mu 1990 yatwaye idatsinzwe.
Iyi kipe ifite kandi ibikombe bitatu by’igihugu, aho icya nyuma igiheruka mu 1993 ubwo yanatwaraga shampiyona.
Kiyovu Sports yaherukaga kugura abakinnyi bakomeye mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2010/11 ubwo yazanaga umutoza Jean Marie Ntagwabira wazanye n’abakinnyi benshi yatozaga muri Atraco FC yari imaze gusenyuka, ariko bikarangira ibaye iya kabiri muri shampiyona inyuma ya APR FC.
Ku bwa Munyangabe Omar wigeze kuba Umunyamabanga Mukuru n’ Umuyobozi wa Tekinike muri Kiyovu Sports, asanga ikipe iri kwiyubaka neza gusa ngo gutwara igikombe bisaba byinshi.
Ati “Igikombe dushobora kugitwara ariko bisaba ko byose biba byiza haba mu bayobozi, abatoza n’abakinnyi.
Ni ukuvuga ngo agahimbazamusyi n’imishahara bikabonekera igihe kugeza shampiyona irangiye.
“Umutoza akamenya kubyaza umusaruro abakinnyi afite ndetse ikipe ikitegura neza umukino.
Ikindi ni ukumenya amafaranga ahari ni ayahe, araturuka he, aho ava bakayakurayo bitarateza icyuho mu ngengo y’imari.
Mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2017/18, ubwo yatozwaga na Cassa Mbungo André, abakunzi ba Kiyovu Sports bubatse ikipe nziza ishobora guhangana ariko isoreza ku mwanya wa kane, hari nyuma y’uko mu mwaka wari wabanje wa 2016/17 yari yamanutse mu cyiciro cya kabiri.
Mu 2019, Kiyovu Sports yashobora kongera guserukira u Rwanda, ariko itsindirwa ku mukino wa nyuma w’Igikombe cy’Amahoro na AS Kigali ibitego 2-1, inzozi zayo zirangirira i Nyamirambo.
Premier League: Abatoza basabwe kutegera abasifuzi ahubwo bakagaragaza mu nyandiko ibitagenze neza
Abatoza bo muri Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere mu Bwongereza, Premier League, basabwe kwandika ibyo batishimiye ku basifuzi, bakabitanga mu nyandiko mu gihe kitarenze amasaha 24, aho kubegera baburana muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Abatoza bo muri Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere mu Bwongereza, Premier League, basabwe kwandika ibyo batishimiye ku basifuzi, bakabitanga mu nyandiko mu gihe kitarenze amasaha 24, aho kubegera baburana muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Premier League irasubukurwa ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, nyuma y’iminsi 100 ihagaritswe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Ni ibisanzwe ko abatoza bajya kureba abasifuzi bakababwira ko hari ibitagenze neza haba hagati mu mukino (ku musifuzi wa kane) cyangwa umukino urangiye.
Gusa kuri ubu, babwiwe ko ibyo kujya kuburana ku basifuzi, amaso ku maso, bitemewe bitewe n’amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus by’umwihariko kuba abantu bagomba gusiga intera hagati yabo n’abandi.
Abatoza babwiwe ko batagomba kwegera abasifuzi cyangwa ngo binjire mu cyumba cyabo ako kanya nyuma y’umukino.
Ahubwo, amakipe yahawe amabwiriza yo kwandikira Ishyirahamwe ry’Abasifuzi (PGMOL) ibitagenze bitarenze umunsi ukurikiyeho.
Babwiwe ko uzagaragara yarenze kuri ayo mabwiriza azaba yishyize mu mwanya wo gufatirwa ibihano.
Premier League irasubukurwa imikino ibera mu muhezo ndetse buri stade ntiyemerewe kurenza abantu 300.
Andi mabwiriza yatanzwe ni uko ikipe yasuye ariyo izajya isohoka mbere ijya mu kibuga kugira ngo hatabaho kubyiganira mu rwambariro.
Abakinnyi nabo baburiwe ko batagomba gusagarira abasifuzi mu gihe cy’umukino cyangwa gusuhuzanya n’abo mu yindi kipe hadakoreshejwe inkokora, ubwo umukino uzajya uba urangiye.
Rayon Sports yasinyishije Sibomana Théogène, nta gahunda ifite yo gukinisha abana
Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwemeje ko bwasinyishije umunyezamu ukiri muto, Sibomana Théogène, wakuriye mu ikipe yayo y’abato ku masezerano y’imyaka itanu.
Ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwemeje ko bwasinyishije umunyezamu ukiri muto, Sibomana Théogène, wakuriye mu ikipe yayo y’abato ku masezerano y’imyaka itanu.
Sibomana Théogène ni umwe mu bakinnyi bakiri bato bari gusinyishwa n’iyi kipe kugira ngo bazagenderweho mu mushinga wo kubaka ikipe y’ahazaza nk’uko IGIHE yabitangarijwe n’Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports, Nkurunziza Jean Paul.
Ati “Dufite umushinga w’igihe kirekire kuko twajyaga tuzamura abana bavuye mu academie yacu y’i Nyanza kuko nitwe tuyimenyera imipira n’imyambaro.
Hari abakinnyi benshi bahazamukiye barimo Bosco [Kayitaba], Ange [Mutsinzi] n’abandi, kubera ko tutabakurikiranye ngo tubahe amasezerano, abandi bakabitwarira.
“Ntabwo ari Sibomana gusa twasinyishije, ni abakinnyi 10 bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 21, twabahaye amasezerano n’umushahara, tuzabatiza andi makipe yo mu cyiciro cya mbere dufitanye umubano cyangwa ayo mu cya kabiri kugira ngo bamenyere.
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports avuga ko mu myaka iri imbere abo aribo iyi kipe izaba ishingiyeho aho gutanga amafaranga menshi ijya kugura abakinnyi mu yandi makipe, ahubwo izajya igarura abo yizamuriye.
Ati “Buri mwaka tuzajya twohereza abakinnyi bavuye mu bato bacu, bajye mu makipe atandukanye hano mu Rwanda noneho abitwaye neza tubazane mu ikipe nkuru yacu.
Nk’aba tuzamuye twizeye ko mu mwaka umwe cyangwa ibiri byibura tutazaburamo batandatu tugarura kandi ibyo bizatuma tudatanga amafaranga menshi tugura abakinnyi bashya.
Nkurunziza yongeye gushimangira ko iyi gahunda yo kuzamura abana ntaho ihuriye n’intego z’ikipe nkuru mu mwaka utaha w’imikino kuko yo izifashisha abakinnyi bakomeye bahatanira igikombe ndetse abamaze kugurwa bazatangazwa guhera mu cyumweru gitaha.
Ati “Rayon Sports ntabwo izakinisha abana ntabwo bishoboka, twe ntabwo turatangira gutangaza abakinnyi twasinyishije.
Abavugwa bose harimo abo twarangizanyije hari n’abo tukiri kuvugana kandi bakomeye.
“Dutegereje ko FERWAFA ifungura isoko ry’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinnyi ku itariki ya 21 Kamena, tugahita dutangira kubatangaza ku mugaragaro abo twasinyishije.
Mugheni Fabrice wari wasezeye Rayon Sports, Michael Sarpong wari wirukanywe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri watandukanye na Emirates FC, bari mu bavugwa muri iyi kipe yambara ubururu n’umweru.
Kapiteni wa Watford yatunguranye avuga ko muri buri kipe haba harimo umukinnyi w’umutinganyi
Kapiteni wa Watford yo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Bwongereza, Troy Deeney, yavuze ko bishoboka ko haba hari umukinnyi w’umutinganyi umwe muri buri kipe y’umupira w’amaguru.
Kapiteni wa Watford yo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Bwongereza, Troy Deeney, yavuze ko bishoboka ko haba hari umukinnyi w’umutinganyi umwe muri buri kipe y’umupira w’amaguru.
Troy Deeney ngo kuri we asanga abakinnyi b’abatinganyi ari benshi ariko bakaba badashobora kubigaragaza mu ruhame, ariko akaba yizera ko hagize umwe ubyemeza n’abandi bamukirikiza.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Deeney w’imyaka 31 yagize ati “Navuga ko byibuze haba hari umutinganyi umwe cyangwa umuntu uryamana n’ibitsina byombi muri buri kipe y’umupira w’amaguru.
Barahari, 100% barahari.
“Ntekereza ko abantu b’abatinganyi cyangwa se abameze gutyo baba bafite impungenge zo kuba babigaragaza mbere.
Nibaza ko umwe abigaragaje, hari benshi bahita babyemera.
Troy Deeney avuga ko nta kibazo kirimo kuba umukinnyi ufite izina rikomeye yaba umutinganyi cyangwa aryamana n’abantu b’ibitsina byombi.
Ati “ Iyaba hari uje akabivuga, ndizera ntashidikanya ko mu cyumweru cya mbere byibuze abantu 100 baza bavuga ngo ‘nanjye ni uko’.
Kubera ko badashaka ko aribo barebwaho cyane.
Kapiteni wa Watford wagarutse mu myitozo vuba aha nyuma yo gutinya icyorezo cya Coronavirus, yavuze ko atiyumvisha impamvu bamwe bategereza gusezera mu mikino bakabona kwemeza ko ari abatinganyi.
Ati “Na none nibaza impamvu abantu basoza gukina umupira w’amaguru, Rugby cyangwa undi mukino uwo ari wo wose, noneho bakagenda bakavuga ngo “Ndi umutinganyi"…Njye numva wakabaye nk’umutwaro bigoye gutwara mu gihe cyose umara ukina.
Mu mateka y’umupira w’amaguru mu Bwongereza, Justin Fashanu wahoze ari rutahizamu wa Norwich na Nottingham Forest, ni we wenyine wavuze ku mugaragaro ko ari umutinganyi.
Yabitangaje mu 1990, yitaba Imana muri 1998.
Ngandu Omar n’Umurundi Bigirimana Abed berekeje muri Kiyovu Sports
Kiyovu Sports ikomeje kwiyubaka, yaguze myugariro wo hagati, Umunyarwanda Ngandu Omar ndetse n’Umurundi Bigirimana Abed ukina hagati mu kibuga afasha ba rutahizamu.
Kiyovu Sports ikomeje kwiyubaka, yaguze myugariro wo hagati, Umunyarwanda Ngandu Omar ndetse n’Umurundi Bigirimana Abed ukina hagati mu kibuga afasha ba rutahizamu.
Ngandu Omar wakiniye APR FC na AS Kigali mbere yo kujya muri Oman, yari amaze iminsi avugana na Kiyovu Sports kimwe na Bigirimana Abed wakiniraga Rukinzo FC yo mu Burundi.
Ngandu uvukana na Niyonzima Ally, ariko we akaba akinira Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Burundi, yasinye imyaka ibiri kuri miliyoni 10 Frw, aya akaba ari nayo yahawe Bigirimana Abed waguzwe nk’umusimbura wa Twizeyimana Martin Fabrice werekeje muri Police FC.
Bigirimana Abed yari umwe mu bakinnyi beza muri Shampiyona y’u Burundi, aho yatsinze ibitego umunani, agatanga imipira 12 yavuyemo ibindi bitego kuri bagenzi be muri uyu mwaka w’imikino.
Aba bakinnyi bombi, baje biyongera ku bandi bane Kiyovu Sports yaherukaga kugura barimo umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves wavuye muri Rayon Sports ahawe miliyoni 16 Frw ndetse na Babuwa Samson wahawe miliyoni 7 Frw avuye muri Sunrise FC, ariko we agasinya umwaka umwe.
Hari kandi myugariro w’ibumoso Irambona Eric wahawe miliyoni 5.
5 Frw avuye muri Rayon Sports na Ngendahimana Eric ukina imbere ya ba myugariro, wahawe miliyoni 5 Frw avuye muri Police FC.
Kiyovu Sports izatozwa na Karekezi Olivier, iheruka kongera amasezerano abarimo Serumogo Ally, Ishimwe Saleh, Mbogo Ally na Mutangana Derrick batanzweho agera kuri miliyoni 18.
5 Frw uko ari bane.
Umusifuzi Nyinawabari yishinganishije kuri FERWAFA avuga ko yatewe ubwoba
Umusifuzi Mpuzamahanga w’Umunyarwandakazi, Nyinawabari Spéciose, yandikiye Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) yishinganisha, avuga ko yatewe ubwoba na Gasingwa Michel uyobora Komisiyo y’Abasifuzi.
Umusifuzi Mpuzamahanga w’Umunyarwandakazi, Nyinawabari Spéciose, yandikiye Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) yishinganisha, avuga ko yatewe ubwoba na Gasingwa Michel uyobora Komisiyo y’Abasifuzi.
Nyinawabari usanzwe ari umusifuzi mpuzamahanga wo ku ruhande kuva mu 2012, yandikiye FERWAFA ku wa Mbere avuga ko kuva muri Gashyantare aribwo yatangiye kutumvikana na Gasingwa Michel wamusabye kuva ku rubuga rw’abasifuzi ntawe abibwiye, akanga kubikora.
Ati "Yansabye kuva ku rubuga rw’abasifuzi ntawe mbwiye, sinabimwemerera kuko nabonaga ari kuntegeka ibintu byanyicira izina, ibyo mbona bizanye agatotsi hagati yanjye na we, ndetse nkabona ashaka no kunyinjirira no mu bindi nkora.
Muyobozi nabibagejejeho hakoreshejwe telefoni kuko nabonaga bimaze kundenga.
Nyinawabari yavuze ko kandi ku wa 11 Kamena, Gasingwa Michel uyobora Komisiyo y’Abasifuzi, yongeye kumuhamagara akamubwira ijambo yafashe nko kumutera ubwoba.
Ati "Yongeye kumpamagara ambaza ibijyanye n’akazi ariko mu magambo yambwiye ashyiramo ijambo njye nabaze ko ari iterabwoba mu magambo akurikira: Yambajije niba naritabiriye inama ya Komite Nyobozi ya ARAF yateranye mu mpera z’ukwezi kwa Gicurasi 2020, yize kuri bimwe mu bibazo afitanye n’abasifuzi, ambwira ko ngomba kwibuka ko nkiri mu kibuga, ko ntari nkwiye kugaragara mu bintu nk’ibyo [ibibazo Gasingwa afitanye n’abandi basifuzi], ko nari nkwiye kubirekera abatakiri mu kibuga.
Nyinawabari yavuze ko bitewe n’impamvu yavuze haruguru, yishinganisha kuko ashobora kuzakurwa kuri lisiti y’abasifuzi mpuzamahanga kuko ngo yigeze no kubikora mu 2013 ubwo yari Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAFA, agakuraho Bahizi Edouard nta mpamvu ifatika.
Ati “Muyobozi, mbisuzumye nsanga nkwiye kwandika nishinganisha kuko ashobora kunkura kuri lisiti ya FIFA itangwa mu kwa 10 kubera ko byaba atari ubwa mbere abikoze.
Yasabye FERWAFA ko yazamufasha ntarengane kuko kuva mu 2012 ibizamini abasifuzi mpuzamahanga bakora, abitsinda neza ndetse n’indi mirimo ashinzwe mu basifuzi ayikora neza.
Cristiano Ronaldo na Messi bavuye ku wundi mubumbe- Samuel Eto’o
Samuel Eto’o wabaye umukinnyi ukomeye mu makipe arimo FC Barcelone, Inter Milan na Chelsea, yavuze ko Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi bafatwa nk’abakinnyi ba mbere ku Isi bavuye ku wundi mubumbe.
Samuel Eto’o wabaye umukinnyi ukomeye mu makipe arimo FC Barcelone, Inter Milan na Chelsea, yavuze ko Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi bafatwa nk’abakinnyi ba mbere ku Isi bavuye ku wundi mubumbe.
Samuel Eto’o wasezeye gukina umupira w’amaguru mu 2019, kuri ubu ni umwe mu ba ambasaderi b’Igikombe cy’Isi cya Qatar 2022 ndetse asanzwe ari Umujyanama wa Perezida wa CAF, Ahmad Ahmad.
Aganira n’itangazamakuru ryo muri Qatar, Samuel Eto’o yabajijwe niba yumva hari undi mukinnyi ukomoka muri Afurika uzegukana Ballon d’Or nk’uko Umunya-Liberia George Weah yabikoze mu 1995.
Mu gusubiza, Eto’o yavuze ko biterwa n’abatora, ariko Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi bihariye kuko bavuye ku wundi mubumbe.
Ati “Biterwa n’abatora.
Hari bamwe mu Banyafurika batemera abakinnyi bo ku mugabane wabo, ibyo biba muri Afurika gusa.
Urebye mu myaka ya vuba, mpora mvuga ko Messi ari we mukinnyi mwiza ku Isi yose, akurikiwe na Cristiano Ronaldo.
Ntekereza ko ari abo ku wundi mubumbe.
“Uretse ibyo, muri iyi myaka, hari abakinnyi bakoze ikinyuranyo nka Sadio Mané.
Yatsinze ibitego mu marushanwa yose, ariko umusaruro wabaye ko atatwara Ballon d’Or.
Kubera iki?
Kubera ko abatora bakeka ko umukinnyi mwiza aba afite igisobanuro cyihariye, agomba kuva ku wundi mugabane utari uwacu.
Niyo mpamvu dutsindwa.
Samuel Eto’o afatwa nk’umwe mu bakinnyi b’umupira w’amaguru beza Afurika yagize ndetse yabaye Umukinnyi w’Umwaka muri Afurika inshuro enye.
Yihariye agahigo ko kuba ari we mukinnyi watsindiye Cameroun ibitego byinshi mu mateka yayo ndetse akaba ari mukinnyi watsinze ibitego byinshi mu mateka y’Igikombe cya Afurika.
Manchester City na West Ham zazirikanye urupfu rwa Marc-Vivien Foé waguye mu kibuga
Tariki ya 26 Kamena 2003, Marc-Vivien Foé ari mu bakinnyi Cameroun yifashishije ikina na Colombia muri ½ cya FIFA Confederation Cup mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Garland i Lyon mu Bufaransa.
Tariki ya 26 Kamena 2003, Marc-Vivien Foé ari mu bakinnyi Cameroun yifashishije ikina na Colombia muri ½ cya FIFA Confederation Cup mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Garland i Lyon mu Bufaransa.
Yari yiteguye kwegukana igikombe dore ko yari yaragize uruhare rukomeye mu gufasha ikipe ye kugera muri iki cyiciro kibanziriza umukino wa nyuma, aho yari yatsinze Brésil na Turikiya mu mikino ibanza.
Ntibyakunze ko arangiza umukino kuko mu buryo butunguranye, mu gice cya kabiri, uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 28 yaguye mu kibuga nta wundi muntu begeranye.
Marc-Vivien Foé yarabiranye ari hafi mu kibuga hagati.
Nubwo yahawe ubuvuzi bwihuse, Foé yitabye Imana nyuma yaho gato, Isi y’umupira w’amaguru ijya mu cyunamo.
Nyuma y’ibizamini bibiri by’isuzuma byakorewe umurambo we, hagaragajwe ko icyateye uru rupfu rutunguranye ari uguhagarara k’umutima.
Mu gihe kigera hafi ku myaka 10 yakinnye, uyu Munya-Cameroun yakiniye amakipe ya Lens na Olympique Lyon mu Bufaransa, atwara Shampiyona n’Igikombe cy’Igihugu inshuro ebyiri.
Yakinnye kandi inshuro ebyiri muri Premier League, bwa mbere muri West Ham United naho nyuma akinira Manchester City ubwo yari yaratijwe akaba ari nabwo yapfuye.
Marc-Vivien Foé yari umukinnyi ngenderwaho mu Ikipe y’Igihugu ya Cameroun, yayikiniye imikino 62.
Amakipe yose yakiniye yashyize amafoto ye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo kumwibuka.
Marc-Vivien Foé
1 May 1975 - 26 June 2003
Never forgotten.

Imikino ya FEASSSA y’uyu mwaka yimuriwe mu 2021
Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda rya Siporo mu Mashuri (FRSS) ryatangaje ko amarushanwa mpuzamahanga ahuza amakipe y’abanyeshuri yitwaye neza muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (FEASSSA) yagombaga kubera i Kakamega muri Kenya muri uyu mwaka, yimuriwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2021.
Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda rya Siporo mu Mashuri (FRSS) ryatangaje ko amarushanwa mpuzamahanga ahuza amakipe y’abanyeshuri yitwaye neza muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (FEASSSA) yagombaga kubera i Kakamega muri Kenya muri uyu mwaka, yimuriwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2021.
Kimwe n’ibindi bikorwa byose, imikino n’amasomo y’abanyeshuri byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyageze muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba muri Werurwe uyu mwaka.
Mu Rwanda, Ishyirahamwe rya Siporo mu Mashuri, ryari ryatangije amarushanwa y’uyu mwaka tariki ya 2 Gashyantare, ariko nyuma y’ukwezi kumwe n’igice, amashuri ahita afungwa kugeza muri Nzeri kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Byari biteganyijwe ko iyi mikino yitiriwe Umukuru w’Igihugu ‘Amashuri Kagame Cup’ yari gusozwa muri Kamena, hakamenyekana amakipe azakina FEASSSA 2020 yari kubera mu Mujyi wa Kakamega muri Kenya.
Ribinyujije kuri Twitter, Ishyirahamwe rya FRSS ryagize riti “Amarushanwa mpuzamahanga ya FEASSSA ahuza amakipe yitwaye neza mu banyeshuri bo mu bihugu bya Afrika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) ntakibaye muri uyu mwaka w’amashuri wa 2020, yimuriwe mu mwaka w’amashuri utaha wa 2021 mu Mujyi wa Kakamega mu gihugu cya Kenya.

Zinedine Zidane yasabye Real Madrid gufata imikino isigaye ya shampiyona nk’Igikombe cy’Isi
Umutoza wa Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, ashaka ko Real Madrid ifata imikino 11 isigaye muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri Espagne ‘La Liga’ nk’Igikombe cy’Isi kugira ngo ibashe kwigobotora FC Barcelone, yegukane igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona mu myaka umunani.
Umutoza wa Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, ashaka ko Real Madrid ifata imikino 11 isigaye muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri Espagne ‘La Liga’ nk’Igikombe cy’Isi kugira ngo ibashe kwigobotora FC Barcelone, yegukane igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona mu myaka umunani.
Real Madrid irarushwa amanota atanu na FC Barcelone yaraye itsinze Real Mallorca ibitego 4-0 ubwo hafungurwaga La Liga nyuma y’amezi atatu ihagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ikipe y’umutoza Zinedine Zidane ifitanye umukino na Eibar kuri iki Cyumweru, aho ikinira ku kibuga gishya cy’imyitozo cya Stade Alfredo di Stefano.
Biteganyijwe ko La Liga izasozwa tariki ya 19 Nyakanga, bivuze ko imikino yose isigaye izaba iba buri munsi mu gihe amakipe azajya akina byibuze umukino mu minsi itatu mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitanu n’igice.
Abajijwe niba abibona nk’Igikombe cy’Isi gitangiye, Zidane yagize ati “Nishimiye iryo gereranya.
Niko mbibona.
Abakinnyi banjye bazi icyo gukina imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cy’Isi cyangwa Igikombe cy’Uburayi bivuze.
“Icy’ingenzi ni ukwitegura kandi ndatekereza ko twiteguye neza, neza cyane.
Umukino wacu wa mbere uratangira ejo [uyu munsi] kandi tuzatanga buri kimwe.
Mfite icyizere ko ibyo twakoze hamwe n’abakinnyi aribyo tugomba kugaragaza mu kibuga.
Imikino ya La Liga iri gukinirwa mu muhezo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus nubwo umuyobozi w’iyi shampiyona, Javier Tebas, yavuze ko stade zemerewe kwakira abantu bari hagati ya 10 na 15% mbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’imikino urangira.
Zidane yakomeje agira ati “Ntabwo nkunda gukina nta bafana, icyo ni igitekerezo cyanjye.
Ariko ngomba kugerageza kubimenyera.
Ni uko ibihe turimo bimeze.
Hari guverinoma n’abaturage bakora akazi kabo, natwe tugomba gukora akacu.
Real Madrid irakinira kuri Stade Alfredo di Stefano mu gihe Santiago Bernabeu igomba kuvugururwa muri iyi mpeshyi.
Abafana bakirwa n’iyi stade ni 6000, bivuze ko abakwemererwa kureba uyu mukino baba ari bake cyane mu gihe byaba byemewe.
Ati “Abakinnyi banjye baba bashaka gukinira imbere y’abafana babashyigikiye, ariko ubu siko bimeze.
Ariko ababishinzwe nibavuga ko bishoboka, tuzareba.
Nahoze ndi umukinnyi, nakwifuza gukinira ahari abafana.
Gusa urwo si urwitwazo, tuzakina neza.

Bushali agiye gushyira hanze album nshya yakomoye ku nkuru ya Nebukadinezali wo muri Bibiliya
Umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul mu muziki uzwi nka Bushali The Trigger, agiye gushyira hanze album ye nshya yise ‘!b!he B!7’ ishushanya ubuzima bwo ku Isi y’iki gihe n’ubuzima Nebukadinezali uvugwa muri Bibiliya wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.
Umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul mu muziki uzwi nka Bushali The Trigger, agiye gushyira hanze album ye nshya yise ‘!b!he B!7’ ishushanya ubuzima bwo ku Isi y’iki gihe n’ubuzima Nebukadinezali uvugwa muri Bibiliya wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.
Iyi album ya Bushali izagaragaraho abandi bahanzi batandukanye bo mu Rwanda ndetse n’abo hanze nka Magnom uri no mu bayikozeho ndetse n’itsinda rya Daara J Family ryo muri Sénégal.
Izajya hanze ku wa 26 Kamena 2020, ariko indirimbo ziyigiye zizajya zisohoka imwe ku yindi mbere y’icyo gihe.
‘!b!he B!7’ yakozweho n’aba-Producers batandukanye nka Kenny Pro beats, The Major wo muri Symphony Band, $cott, Pacento, Holy Beat Murda, Faada Freddy ( wo muri Sénégal), Magnom wo muri Ghana na Dr.
Nganji usanzwe atunganya ibihangano byo muri Green Ferry Music.
Iriho indirimbo 15.
Bushali yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora iyi album agendeye ku buzima yanyuzemo mu minsi ishize ariko atekereza n’ubundi buzima bwa buri munsi abantu banyuramo.
Ati “Mvuga ku buzima bwa buri munsi kandi tuzi twese ibyo naciyemo yaba ibyiza cyangwa ibibi.
Aho iyi album itandukaniye n’izindi urebye harimo gukura nk’umuhanzi udatekereza u Rwanda gusa, ahubwo wakora umuziki ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
“Izina ryayo narikuye mu nkuru yo muri Bibiliya ivuga ku mwami witwaga Nebukadinezali wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.
Ugomba gutuza ukikorera ibyawe ukubaha n’iby’abandi, ni by’Isi byose.
Urebye n’ibintu maze iminsi nyuramo, mba nibwira kandi nkanabwira undi wese kwishakamo igisubizo agakomeza ubuzima.
Iyi album ije ikurikira iyo yashyize hanze mu 2019 yitwa ‘Ku Gasima’ igaragaza ubuzima buri wese ashobora kubamo butari bwiza mbere y’uko agira amafaranga.
Iyi album y’uyu musore iriho indirimbo 12 zirimo iyitwa ‘Kinyatrap’, ‘Sindi Mubi’, ‘Zunguzayi’, ‘Ipafu’, ‘Kinyarock’, ‘Mamayiwe’, ‘Kugasima’, ‘Inganjyi’, ‘Ayura’, ‘Bitinze’, ‘Impanda’ na ‘Niyibizi’.
‘Ku gasima’ ni album ye ya kabiri yaje nyuma y’iya mbere yagiye hanze muri Gashyantare mu 2018 yise ‘Nyiramubande’.
Bushali yatangiye umuziki mu mpera za 2013.
Uyu musore ni umuhanga mu gushushanya ndetse mu mabyiruka ye yatangazaga benshi, uretse ibyo yanabaye umuririmbyi mu korali muri ADEPR ariko aza kubivamo akomereza umuziki muri Hip Hop.
Ku ikubitiro, Bushali indirimbo ya mbere kuri iyi album ni iyitwa ‘Bwoba’.
Beyoncé agiye gushimirwa by’ikirenga muri BET Awards
Abategura BET Awards kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 25 Kamena 2020, batangaje ko umuhanzikazi Beyoncé washinze umuryango yise BeyGOOD ufasha abantu batandukanye ukanasabira ubutabera abarenganyijwe, azashimirwa mu buryo bwihariye mu itangwa ry’ibi bihembo, kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 28 Kamena.
Abategura BET Awards kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 25 Kamena 2020, batangaje ko umuhanzikazi Beyoncé washinze umuryango yise BeyGOOD ufasha abantu batandukanye ukanasabira ubutabera abarenganyijwe, azashimirwa mu buryo bwihariye mu itangwa ry’ibi bihembo, kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 28 Kamena.
Hazaba umwanya wo kwibuka Kobe Bryant wamamaye muri Basketball uherutse gupfira mu mpanuka y’indege, bizakorwa na Lil Wayne mu gihe Little Richard wamamaye mu muziki wa Rock azunamirwa mu gikorwa kizayoborwa na Wayne Brady.
Gushimira by’umwihariko ibyamamare bikora ibikorwa byo gufasha, byatangijwe muri BET Awards mu 2002, mu rwego rwo guha icyubahiro ibyamamare bitanga umwanya wabyo n’amafaranga ku bababaye.
Kugeza ubu abamaze guhabwa ibi bihembo barimo Muhammad Ali, Earvin "Magic" Johnson, Danny Glover, Denzel Washington n’abandi.
Gutanga ibi bihembo uyu mwaka bizayoborwa n’umunyarwenya Amanda Seales.
Mu gihe abahanzi nka Alicia Keys, Roddy Ricch, Chloe X Halle, DaBaby, Black Thought, Jay Rock n’abandi bazaririmba.
Ni ibirori bigiye kuba ku nshuro ya 20 bizaba bimaze bitangwa ndetse hazaba hizihizwa isabukuru y’imyaka 40 Black Entertainment Television ibitegura imaze itangiye gukora.
Mu bari guhatanira ibi bihembo batangajwe ku wa 15 Kamena 2020, Drake niwe uri imbere mu kujya mu byiciro byinshi kuko arimo inshuro esheshatu mu gihe akurikirwa na Megan Thee Stallion na Roddy Ricch bose barimo inshuro eshanu.
Beyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Brown, Lizzo na DaBaby bari guhatana mu byiciro bine buri wese.
Mu bihembo by’abanyamahanga harimo abahanzi bo muri Afurika aho mu cyiciro cy’umuhanzi mwiza utari uwo muri Amerika, ‘Best International Act’ harimo Burna Boy wo muri Nigeria, Innoss’B wo muri RDC, Sho Madjozi wo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Dave na Stormzy bo mu Bwongereza ndetse na Ninho na S.
Pri Noir bo mu Bufaransa.
Mu cyiciro cy’abahanzi bashya b’abanyamahanga [Viewer’s Choice: Best New International Act] harimo Rema wo muri Nigeria; uyu indirimbo ye yitwa ‘Iron Man’ yagaragaye ku rutonde rw’izo Barack Obama wayoboye Amerika yakunze mu 2019.
Muri iki cyiciro hariho kandi Sha Sha wo muri Zimbabwe, Celeste na Young T & Bugsey bo mu Bwongereza, Hatik na Stacy bo mu Bufaransa.
Bitandukanye n’indi myaka ishize ibi bihembo bimaze bitangwa, uyu mwaka hariho umwihariko w’uko hatazakorwa igitaramo gishobora kwitabirwa n’abantu ahubwo byose bizakurikiranwa hifashishijwe BET tv, BET Her na CBS ndetse n’imbuga nkoranyambaga kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Israel Mbonyi agiye gutaramana n’abakunzi be mu gitaramo kizaca kuri Youtube
Umuhanzi uzwi cyane mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana uri mu bagezweho muri iki gihe, Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora igitaramo kizatambuka kuri Youtube.
Umuhanzi uzwi cyane mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana uri mu bagezweho muri iki gihe, Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora igitaramo kizatambuka kuri Youtube.
Iki gitaramo kizaba tariki 20 Kamena 2020 guhera saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba kikazatambuka kuri shene ya Youtube yitwa MK1 TV muri iyi minsi isigaye ikunda gutambutsa ibitaramo by’abahanzi.
Israel Mbonyi agiye kugikora nyuma yuko mu ntangiriro za Gashyantare 2020 yataramiye bikomeye abanyeshuri bo muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda i Huye.
Iki gitaramo kigiye kubera kuri Internet kiri muri gahunda abashoramari batandukanye bihaye zo gususurutsa abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe Covid-19 yakamejeje ku Isi yose igahagarika ibitaramo byinshi ndetse mu bihugu bitandukanye.
Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora iki gitaramo nyuma y’ibyabanje by’abahanzi banyuranye nka; Tom Close, The Ben, Tuff Gangz, Igor Mabano n’abandi banyuze kuri iyi shene ya Youtube kimwe n’abandi benshi bagiye bakora ibitaramo ku yandi mashene ya Youtube.
Uyu muhanzi muri ibi bihe azwi cyane mu ndirimbo nka; Ibihe, Number one, Hari impamvu, Hari ubuzima, n’izindi nyinshi zatumye uyu muhanzi ari mu bakunzwe cyane mu Rwanda.
Iki gitaramo gitangajwe mu gihe mu minsi iri imbere hitezwe ibindi bizanamara igihe bya Iwacu Muzika Festival bitegurwa na EAP.
Babaho mu munyenga w’urukundo bakanafatanya umurimo w’Imana: Couple z’abaramyi ziririmbana zimaze kwamamara
Kuva mu mwaka ushize, amatsinda atandukanye mu muziki wo kuramya Imana yatangiye kunguka imbaraga ziganjemo iz’ama-Couple, yashyize hanze ibihangano byakunzwe na benshi.
Kuva mu mwaka ushize, amatsinda atandukanye mu muziki wo kuramya Imana yatangiye kunguka imbaraga ziganjemo iz’ama-Couple, yashyize hanze ibihangano byakunzwe na benshi.
N’ubwo hari abari basanzwe baririmbana abenshi babikoraga gake nabwo nko mu nsengero ariko ntibabishyiremo imbaraga ngo babe batangira gushyira hanze ibihangano.
Byaje guhinduka, ku buryo uyu munsi hari benshi bari gukorana nk’itsinda mu muziki ariko na none babana nk’umugabo n’umugore.
IGIHE yakusanyije Couple zitandukanye zimaze kwamamara mu muziki wo kuramya Imana ukwiye gutega amatwi uburyohe bw’ibihangano bwazo.
James & Daniella
James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ni imwe muri Couple zimaze gushinga imizi mu muziki wo kuramya Imana.
Yamamaye mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Mpa Amavuta’, ‘Nkoresha’ n’izindi.
Baherutse no kumurika album yabo ya mbere.
Iyi couple ifitanye abana babiri, ni imwe mu yakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho.
Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo zamamaye cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana ndetse n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 na 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga iby’ububanyi n’amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga ibaruramari.
Mu 2015 nibwo barushinze.
James avuga ko ajya guhitamo Daniella ikintu yamukundiye ari uko yari umukobwa w’umutima kandi ukunda Imana cyane.
Ati “Twari inshuti cyane ntabwo navuga ko namukundiye iki ariko yari umukobwa ukunda Imana, kandi burya hari n’ukuntu uhuza n’umuntu.
Natwe twarahuye biba mahwi.
Byahereye cyane ko yakundaga Imana ari umuririmbyi mwiza ugasanga duhuza ibintu byose.
Daniella we yemeza ko umugabo ari umuntu w’inyangamugayo mu buryo bukomeye ku buryo ari ikintu ashimira Imana, ikindi akaba ari umuntu uvuga biri ngombwa.
Yemeza ko kumusaba ko bakundana bitamugoye cyane ko akenshi babaga bari kumwe cyane ndetse babitsanya amabanga.
Ubu bafite abana babiri umuhungu n’umukobwa.
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo w’Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Daniella we avuga ko umuryango ukorera Imana hamwe ntaho uba uhuriye na wundi usanga buri umwe aba muri ibi undi mu bindi.
Papi Clever & Dorcas
Iyi Couple nayo imaze kwamamara cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana wiganjemo uw’indirimbo zo mu gitabo.
Bazwi mu cyo bise ‘Morning Worship’ aho baririmba ibihangano bitandukanye byo mu gitabo bigafasha benshi.
Papi Clever yasezeranye imbere y’Imana na Ingabire ku = wa Gatandatu tariki ya 7 Ukuboza 2019 muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi.
Ubukwe bw’aba bombi bwabaye nyuma y’icyumweru Papi Clever asabye akanakwa Ingabire mu birori byabereye mu Karere ka Musanze ku wa 30 Ugushyingo 2019.
Kuri uwo munsi banasezeranye byemewe n’amategeko y’u Rwanda mu muhango wabereye mu Murenge wa Muhoza.
Isezerano ryo kubana byemewe n’Itorero rya ADEPR babarizwamo ryaheshejwe umugisha na Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe, ubarizwa muri Ntora English Church Service aho Papi Clever asengera.
Manzi & Eunice
Manzi Nelson n’umugore we Irakiza Eunice basanzwe ari abaririmbyi, batangiye kuririmbana nk’umugabo n’umugore (Manzi & Eunice) ndetse kuri ubu bamaze kuririmbana indirimbo eshatu.
Manzi & Eunice bambikanye impeta mu 2017.
Ubu bafitanye umwana umwe bise Iriza Tona Manzi.
Bombi ni abaririmbyi bakomeye banabarizwa mu makorali afite izina rikomeye mu Rwanda.
Manzi Nelson aririmba muri Ambassadors of Christ choir ndetse ari no mu bayobozi bayo naho umugore we Irakiza Eunice ni umwe mu baririmbyi b’imena muri Epee du Salut choir yavukiye i Gitwe gusa kuri ubu ibarizwa kuri Kigali SDA Bilingual church.
Manzi & Eunice bavuga ko kuririmbana ari babiri babitewe n’uko babikunda ndetse bakaba babisanzwemo nk’abantu babiri b’abaririmbyi babana.
Ben na Chance
Aba bazwi cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Amarira ya Yohana’, ‘Yesu Arakora’ n’izindi.
Uyu muryango usanzwe uri nkingi za mwamba za Alarm Ministries, bamaze imyaka icyenda bakundana mu gihe bamaze itandatu babana nk’umugabo n’umugore.
Bigeze kubwira Kiss FM ko bafashe umwanzuro wo kuririmbana nyuma yo kubona andi ma-couple abikora bikaba byiza cyane.
Bati “Tumaze kubona abaramyi benshi bubakanye ingo kandi bafasha benshi barimo James na Daniella, Kavutse Olivier na Amanda, Fabrice na Maya Nzeyimana, Ben na Chance n’abandi batandukanye.
Icyo gihe Chance yavuze ko icyatumye yegurira umutima we Ben ari uko yakunze imico ye myiza ndetse akamubonamo impano y’Imana.
Ati “ Icya mbere naramukunze, kandi nkunda imico ye, nkunda uko ateye, mubonamo impano y’Imana, mubonamo ubukirisitu biranyorohera mu buzima kubana na we.
Chance abajijwe icyamugoye ubwo yatangiraga kubana na Ben, yavuze ko ari uburyo umugabo we yamuhaga umwanya muto kurusha gitari, ibintu byaje no gutuma batangira kuririmbana.
Kugeza ubu Ben na Chance bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo enye mu gihe bamaze batangiye gukorera hamwe umuziki, bakaba bavuga bazakomeza gushyira hanze n’izindi.
Maya na Fabrice
Fabrice Nzeyimana n’umugore we Maya Nzeyimana nabo ni bamwe mu bazwi cyane muri iki gihe nka couple ifite ibihangano bihembura benshi byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana.
Aba bazwi cyane mu ndirimbo nka ‘Muremyi w’Isi’.
Ni abakirisitu kuri CLA (Christian Life Assembly) i Nyarutarama ndetse Fabrice ni n’umucuranzi ukomeye muri iri torero.
Bakunze gutegura umugoroba wo kuramya ubanziriza inama y’iminsi itatu yiswe ‘Over Flow Africa Conference’ itegurwa n’itsinda rikorera mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Uganda, u Burundi n’u Rwanda Heavenly Melodies Africa (aha habarizwamo Fabrice na Maya) igamije guhuriza hamwe abaramyi batandukanye mu kurushaho kwimakaza ubwami bwo guhimbaza butajegajega.
Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes na Prayer House
Kavutse na Amanda Fung barushinze ku ya 9 Nyakanga 2016.
Ubukwe bw’umuririmbyi Kavutse Olivier na Amanda Fung babarizwa mu Itorero New Life Bible Church, bwabereye ku nkengero z’Ikiyaga cya Kivu mu Mujyi wa Rubavu mu 2016 bwitabiriwe n’abarenga igihumbi.
Kavutse Olivier na Amanda Fung beruye urukundo rwabo mu 2014, muri Gicurasi 2016 basezeranye imbere y’amategeko muri Canada, ku wa 9 Nyakanga 2016 bambikana impeta mu rusengero mu Rwanda.
Bafitanye abana babiri, barimo imfura yabo y’umuhungu bibarutse mu 2018 bahaye izina rya Jireh Reign Shi-Rong Kavutse mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka baherutse kwibaruka umukobwa bise Jadah Justice Asante Mei-En Kavutse.
Beauty For Ashes, aba bombi babarizwamo yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo ‘Surprise’, ‘Turashima’, ‘Yesu ni we Super Star’, ‘Yesu ni sawa’, ‘Hari ayandi mashimwe’, ‘Ni wowe gusa’ n’izindi ziri mu njyana ya Rock n’umudiho wa Kinyafurika.
Baherutse gutangiza iri tsinda ry’abaramyi n’abanyamasengesho ryitwa ‘Payer House’ ririmo na Kwizera Peace Ndaruhutse wabaye igisonga cya mbere cya Miss Rwanda 2016 n’abandi.
Umunyamahirwe uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo nshya ya Nsengiyumva François yashyiriweho ibihembo
The Boss Papa ya Alain Muku ireberera inyungu z’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François yateguye irushanwa ku muntu uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo y’uyu muhanzi nshya yise ‘Isubireho’.
The Boss Papa ya Alain Muku ireberera inyungu z’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François yateguye irushanwa ku muntu uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo y’uyu muhanzi nshya yise ‘Isubireho’.
Ni mu irushanwa ryiswe #IsubirehoChallenge rizabera ku mbuga nkoranyambaga aho abakunzi b’uyu mugabo basabwe kwifata amashusho bakayishyira ku rukuta rwabo bakabimenyesha (tag) instagram ya Nsengiyumva.
Amandine Nzasangamariya ukurikirana abahanzi babarizwa muri The Boss Papa yabwiye IGIHE ko bateguye iri rushanwa mu rwego rwo gufasha abakunzi b’uyu muhanzi mu kuba bakwikenura.
Kuri Instagram abandi basabwe kwifata video babyina nidirimbo Isubireho ya Nsengiyumva François, bagakora tag @nsengiyumva_francois_online na @amandine_250 una hashtag ya #isubirehochallenge.
Ibi byatangiye ku wa 16 Kamena 2020 birangire ku wa 16 Nyakanga 2020.
Video izagira likes na comments byinshi, izahembwa US$ 150.
Mu gihe abo kuri Facebook basabwe gufata link y’indirimbo Isubireho kuri YouTube bakabisangiza inshuti zabo.
Batanu ba mbere bazahembwa Us $30 buri wese.
Isubireho ni indirimbo yagiye hanze kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 10 Kamena 2020, irimo ubutumwa bukebura abakobwa cyangwa se abahungu bishora mu ngeso mbi cyane cyane iz’ubusambanyi.
Ishushanya umukobwa uba warananiye iwabo akajya ararana n’abasore mu ma hoteli, kugeza aho bamufashe ku ngufu bakamukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina barenze umwe.
Mu gitero cyayo cya mbere, Nsengiyumva araririmba ati “Mukamana ubwo aragiye saa munani na nijoro ntatinya ashaka amafaranga.
Kukinyonga ni ijana, kudingisa ni bitanu Mukamana urananiranye ngaho isubireho.
Iyi ndirimbo yayihimbye ashaka gukebura abakobwa bakora umwuga w’uburaya.
Iyi ndirimbo ni iya karindwi mu zo uyu muhanzi amaze gushyira hanze.
Ije ikurikira iyo yamenyekanyemo cyane yitwa ‘Mariya Jeannne’ yanatumye bamwita Igisupusupu, ‘Rwagitima’ n’izindi.
Bitandukanye n’izindi ndirimbo yagiye akora, Nsengiyumva muri iyi ndirimbo nshya agaragara yambaye imikufi itandukanye yanahinduye umweru imisatsi ye.
Nsengiyumva w’imyaka 41 y’amavuko yize gucuranga umuduri mu 1999 ubwo yari afite imyaka 20 mu gihe cy’amezi atanu.
Yize amashuri abanza gusa, ubu afite abana babiri.

Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood yapfuye yiyahuye
Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yapfuye yiyahuye.
Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yapfuye yiyahuye.
Iby’uko uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 55 yiyahuye byemejwe n’Ubuyobozi bwa Los Angeles bushinzwe gukurikirana abantu basanzwe bapfuye hagakorwa isuzumwa ku cyateye urupfu rwe.
Bwavuze ko yari yari afite ihungabana ryinshi’ ari naryo ryatumye ahitamo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Uyu mugabo wari usanzwe afitanye umwana w’umuhungu n’umukinnyi wa Filime Elizabeth Hurley, yasanzwe yapfuye ku wa Mbere w’iki Cyumweru.
Muri Hollywood Bing yari azwi cyane kubera filime yagize uruhare mu iyandikwa ryayo mu 2003 ya Kangaroo Jack, kuba yarateye inkunga mu buryo bw’amafaranga filime ya The Polar Express yagiye hanze mu 2004 n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi byatumye aba umwe mu nkingi za mwamba muri Hollywood.
Steve Bing ni we wakoze ‘Shine a Light’, yayobowe na Martin Scorsese ivuga ku itsinda rya Rolling Stones ryamamaye cyane mu Bwongereza.
Hurley babyaranye yanditse kuri Instagram agaragaza ko atewe agahinda n’urupfu rwa Steve Bing.
Yagize ati “Mbabajwe birenze n’uko uwahoze ari umukunzi wanjye Steve Bing atakiri kumwe natwe.
Ni iherezo riteye ubwoba.
Ku myaka 18 Steve Bing yarazwe umutungo wa Miliyoni $600 na sekuru Leo Bing.
Azajya yibukirwa ku kuntu yashyigiye bikomeye Bill Clinton wigeze kuba Perezida wa Amerika, agatanga nibura miliyoni $10 mu muryango we ndetse akanishyura urugendo yigeze kugirira muri Koreya ya Ruguru mu 2009 agiye mu biganiro byo gufunguza abanyamakuru babiri b’Abanyamerika bari bahafungiwe.
Stephen Leo Bing [Steve Bing] yavutse ku wa 31 Werurwe 1965.
Yakundanye n’abagore babiri; Elizabeth Hurley na Lisa Bonder.
Asize abana babiri Damian Hurley na Kira Bonder.
Ambara uberwe bijyanye n’igihe: Imyambaro 10 abagore bakwambara bakaberwa muri iyi mpeshyi
Impeshyi yageze, benshi mu banyamujyi bakunze kurimba batangiye kubika imyambaro bari bamaze iminsi bambara ijyanye n’igihe cy’ubukonje kimwe n’imvura, ari nako batekereza ku myambaro bashobora kwifashisha muri iki gihe cy’ubushyuhe.
Impeshyi yageze, benshi mu banyamujyi bakunze kurimba batangiye kubika imyambaro bari bamaze iminsi bambara ijyanye n’igihe cy’ubukonje kimwe n’imvura, ari nako batekereza ku myambaro bashobora kwifashisha muri iki gihe cy’ubushyuhe.
Mu nkuru zacu zitandukanye ndetse zizajya zibageraho kenshi tuzajya twifashisha abahanga mu kwambika abantu badufashe mu kurangira abanyarwanda uburyo bakwambara bakaberwa kandi bijyanye n’igihe.
Kuri iyi nshuro twifashishije umuhanga mu kwambika abantu, Ingabire Sylvie, ufite iduka ryambika abakobwa n’abagore ryitwa Diva Shop riherereye mu mujyi wa Kigali mu nyubako ya CHIC.
Ingabire yatweretse imyambaro y’abakobwa n’abagore bifuza kurimba muri ibi bihe by’impeshyi ayishyize mu byiciro bitatu;
Ku ikubitiro yatweretse imyambaro ushobora kwambara ugiye mu kazi ariko ukaba wanayirimbana, imyambaro ushobora kwambara usohotse ariko ushaka no kuruhura umubiri ndetse n’imyambaro y’ibirori.
Iyi ni imyambaro iri hagati y’amafaranga ibihumbi mirongo itanu ndetse n’ibihumbi Magana atatu nk’igiciro fatizo ku muntu wifuza kwambara neza akaberwa muri iki gihe cy’impeshyi.
Ibi byiciro asobanura impamvu yabihisemo yagize ati "Turi mu bihe by’impeshyi ndetse bitoroshye kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19, ariko abantu kenshi baba bashaka kurimba cyane ko nubwo ibirori bisigaye birangira kare ariko hari ibikiba.
“Abakunzi bo gusohoka n’ubundi baracyasohoka mu mahoteli ndetse na restaurants zitandukanye rero abifuza kurimba rwose niyo baba bari mu rugo bahora barimbye.
Reba imyambaro icumi wakwambara ukaberwa muri iki gihe cy’impeshyi
Icyiciro cya mbere ni imyambaro ushobora kurimbana ugiye mu kazi mu gihe cy’impeshyi ariko ukaba wanayisohokana mu gihe wagira gahunda itunguranye;
Icyiciro cya kabiri ni imyenda yo kwambara usohotse mu gihe cy’ubushyuhe kandi ukaba uberewe
Icyiciro cya gatatu ni amakanzu y’ubukwe ushobora kwambara mu mpeshyi mu gihe hashyushye ugataha kare
Nyuma yo gukora Seburikoko na Citymaid zakunzwe, Misago agiye gusohora iyitwa “Indoto"
Wilson Misago uzwi ku izina rya Nelly akaba ari we wakoze filime z’uruherekane zamenyekanye cyane nka Friends, Seburikoko na City Maid agiye gutangira kwandika indi yise’ Indoto.
’ Asezeranya abakunda Sebu na City Maid ko ntaho zizajya.
Wilson Misago uzwi ku izina rya Nelly akaba ari we wakoze filime z’uruherekane zamenyekanye cyane nka Friends, Seburikoko na City Maid agiye gutangira kwandika indi yise’ Indoto.
’ Asezeranya abakunda Sebu na City Maid ko ntaho zizajya.
Iyi filime izajya isohoka mu buryo bw’uruhererekane kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda nk’uko na Seburikoko na City Maid biyicaho.
Yanditswe na Roger Niyoyita ikaba iri gutunganywa na Misago Wilson ariwe wagiye atunganya izindi zamamaye mu Rwanda nka Inshuti (Friends), Seburikoko na Citymaid.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Misago yavuze ko iyi filime ivuga ku buzima bw’abanyeshuri cyane cyane abiga muri kaminuza z’i Kigali.

Ageze i Kigali yaramubeshye aramubura.
Muri ubwo buzima bukomeye, Muhire yabonye akazi k’izamu kugeza ubwo afashe icyemezo cyo gusubira ku ishuri aza gukabya inzozi ze zo gukora application".
Ngo ni filimi izaba igamije kwigisha ariko nanone hakagaragaramo abakinnyi bashya bafite impano.
Uwineza Clarisse, umunyamakuru uzwi kuri Radiyo Rwanda uherutse kwemeza ko yamaze kwinjira muri sinema, azagaragara muri iyi filime y’uruhererekane “Indoto" izatangira guca kuri televiziyo Rwanda mu minsi mike, akaba ari umwe mu bazwi bazayikinamo.

Adrien Misigaro yasohoye indirimbo “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa uvukana na Gentil Misigaro
Umuhanzi w’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, akaba umwe mu bafite indirimbo zikundwa n’abatari bake Adrien Misigaro yasohoye inshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa, uvukana na Gentil Misigaro.
Umuhanzi w’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, akaba umwe mu bafite indirimbo zikundwa n’abatari bake Adrien Misigaro yasohoye inshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa, uvukana na Gentil Misigaro.
Benshi bacyumva amazina y’aba bagabo batekerezaga ko bavukana.
Ibi bihabanye n’ukuri gusa bafitanye isano ya hafi kuko aba bombi ari ababyara.
Kuba ari ababyara bivuze ko na mushiki wa Gentil Misigaro ari mubyara wa Adrien Misigaro wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa akaba mubyara we.
Miss Dusa usanzwe atuye muri Canada ni we muvandimwe wa Gentil Misigaro winjiye mu muziki cyane ko mu minsi ishize yabwiye IGIHE ko abavandimwe be bose bafite urukundo rw’umuziki ndetse bakaba n’abahanga.
Mu ndirimbo za mbere Miss Dusa yumvikanyemo harimo “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Adrien Misigaro.
Niyo yamutangije urugendo rw’umuziki yinjiyemo afatanyije na mubyara we.
Adrien Misigaro avuga ko ari indirimbo yanditse mu gihe cyatambutse, asaba Imana ngo ijye imwibutsa mu gihe yaba yibagiwe kuyisenga.
Muri iyi ndirimbo bagira bati "Nyigisha kubyuka hakiri kare, mu gitondo izuba ritararasa, nzafatanye n’inyoni mu rukerera kuvuga gukomera kwawe, ibiguruka n’inyamaswa z’ishyamba birahimbaza ndetse nabyo ukabyumva.
Ni kuki se umuntu waremye yakwibagirwa umuremyi wa byose?
Iyi ndirimbo yakozwe na Knoxx beat ukorera muri Monster Record ndetse na Gentil Misigaro, producer ukomeye ariko umaze kumenyekana nk’umuhanzi uri mu bafite izina mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana.
Adrien Misigaro ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bakorera umuziki wabo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo nka "Ntacyo nzaba" yakoranye na Meddy n’izindi.
Uyu aheruka mu Rwanda mu mezi ashize aho yari afite igitaramo cyahagaritswe ku munota wa nyuma bitewe n’ingamba zari zafashwe zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19.

Covid-19 yambereye imbogamizi ariko ntizampagarika - Miss Nishimwe Naomie
Amezi arenga ane arashize Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba, ariko nyuma yo gutorwa ibikorwa yari yiyemeje byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyibasiye Isi, nubwo avuga ko yatangiye kwiga uburyo bwiza bwo kubishyira mu ngiro.
Amezi arenga ane arashize Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba, ariko nyuma yo gutorwa ibikorwa yari yiyemeje byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyibasiye Isi, nubwo avuga ko yatangiye kwiga uburyo bwiza bwo kubishyira mu ngiro.
Uyu mukobwa kuva atangiye kwiyamamaza kugeza yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, umushinga we wari ugufasha abantu barwaye agahinda gakabije, bizwi nka ’depression’.
Yavuze ko ari indwara iri mu banyarwanda ariko badakunze kumenya, ku buryo azagerageza kuyirwanya binyuze mu kugaragaza ko ihari n’uburyo abantu bayirinda.
Nyuma y’uko yambitswe ikamba muri Gashyantare 2020, nyuma y’iminsi mike icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyahise kigera mu Rwanda gikoma mu nkokora umushinga yiyemeje.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Miss Nishimwe yagize ati "Nibyo icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyarambangamiye gusa natangiye gutekereza uko nakomeza umushinga wanjye, ndashaka guhura n’abantu barwayeho depression tukagirana ibiganiro bizatambutswa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zanjye, mu rwego rwo kubisangiza abantu.
Uyu mukobwa yongeyeho ko ubu ari mu myiteguro ya nyuma yo gutangira ibi biganiro kuko abo bazabigirana benshi yamaze kubabona, ndetse nyuma yo kumva umushinga we hari benshi bahuye na ’dépression’ bakomeje kumwandikira.
Yakomeje ati “Abo tuzaganira ndabafite kuko nyuma y’uko bamenye umushinga wanjye hari abatangiye kunyandikira n’ubu baracyanyandikira, ndashaka gutangira ibiganiro nabo mu minsi iri imbere bakatuganiriza ku rugendo rwabo kuva barwaye kugeza bakize.
Ntekereza ko ubuhamya bwa bamwe buzafasha abandi"
Miss Nishimwe avuga ko mu minsi mike iri imbere azaba atangiye umushinga we ndetse icyo gihe azanaboneraho gutangaza imbuga nkoranyambaga abantu bazaba babonaho ibi biganiro, harimo na Youtube.
Miss Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda muri Gashyantare 2020 asimbuye Nimwiza Meghan wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2019.
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda agiye kujyana Museveni mu nkiko
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda Big Eye yavuze ko agiye kujyana mu nkiko Perezida Museveni n’ishyaka NRM riri ku butegetsi kubera ideni rya miliyoni 270 z’Amashilingi ya Uganda bamurimo.
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda Big Eye yavuze ko agiye kujyana mu nkiko Perezida Museveni n’ishyaka NRM riri ku butegetsi kubera ideni rya miliyoni 270 z’Amashilingi ya Uganda bamurimo.
Ikinyamakuru Sqoop cyandika imyidagaduro muri iki gihugu cyatangaje ko Big Eye avuga ko afite umugambi wo kurega Perezida wa Uganda kubera uburyo yanze kumwishyura nyuma yo kumufasha ubwo yiyamamarizaga kuba Perezida wa Uganda mu 2011.
Uyu muhanzi ubusanzwe witwa Ibrahim Mayanja, yavuze ko ibaruwa igaragaza ko agiye kurega, yandikiwe Perezida cyane cyane ko ari we muyobozi w’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi rya National Resistance Movement (NRM) ryari ryamuhaye akazi.
Yagize ati “Ndasaba Perezida Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, umuyobozi wa NRM.
Nakoreye Perezida mu 2011 ubwo yahataniraga uyu mwanya.
Nari umwe mu bantu bamwamamarije nkajya ndirimba ahantu hatandukanye yagiye kwiyamamariza ariko sinigeze nishyurwa.
Uyu muhanzi uzwi mu ndirimbo yitwa ‘Mango Juice’ avuga ko ishyaka rya NRM na Museveni bamurimo miliyoni 270 z’amashilingi kandi ko afite ibimenyetso byose byerekana ko yatanze serivisi ariko atigeze ahembwa.
Yavuze ko ahaye Museveni n’ishyaka rye iminsi 14, yaba atishyuwe akagana inkiko ngo arenganurwe.
Ibi bije nyuma y’aho ku wa kabiri, Kapiteni w’Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Umupira w’Amaguru ya Uganda, Denis Onyango, na we yavuze ko we na bagenzi be bifuza gusobanurirwa ibijyanye n’inkunga y’amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $1 bemerewe na Perezida Yoweri Museveni nyuma y’uko bitabiriye Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2019 cyabereye mu Misiri.
Umukirigitananga Ngarukiye yarase ubuhanga n’uburanga by’Abanyarwandakazi mu ndirimbo ye nshya
Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Mu gitero cya mbere cy’iyi ndirimbo aragira ati “Ikizakubwira Umwali w’i Rwanda arangwa n’umutuzo kandi no mu buhanga arahanga ntahangarwa.
Iyo aserukiye u Rwanda iyo mu mahanga abahiga ubuhanga kuko no mu buranga abahiga bose, kuko ari uwo kwa Gihanga Ngoma 100.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora iyi ndirimbo agendeye ku myitwarire y’Abanyarwandakazi ituma bahesha ishema igihugu cyabo.
Avuga ko yari amaze kubona uburyo abakobwa b’ahandi bitwara mu buryo buteye inkeke, ashaka kwerekana uko Abanyarwandakazi bitwararika bidasanzwe.
Ati “Akanyoni katagurutse ntikamenya iyo bweze, nagize amahirwe yo kugera imahanga mbona abantu baho uko babayeho, nsanga imico yabo ifite itandukaniro ryinshi n’iyacu.
Narebye ukuntu abakobwa baho baba bameze mbona batandukanye n’ab’iwacu cyane.
Ni uko rero bimpa igitekerezo cyo kuririmba ‘Umwali w i Rwanda’ mvuga umwihariko we haba mu buhanga, uburanga n’ubwitonzi.
Avuga ko nk’aho aba mu Bufaransa abana b’abakobwa ku myaka 14, 15, 16 usanga banywa itabi batitaye ko ribicira ubuzima ndetse n’aho abantu bateraniye ntibatinya kurinywa kimwe no mu muhanda bagenda, ndetse no mu myambarire “hari igihe bambara ukibaza niba bambaye bikakuyobera.
Ni ibintu bitandukanye no ku Banyarwandakazi kuko hari benshi bagikomeye ku muco, aho umukobwa arangwa n’ubuhanga n’ubwitonzi.
Ngarukiye Daniel ni umwe mu bahanzi bake bafite ubuhanga buhanitse mu gucuranga inanga.
Iyi mpano ayikomora kuri sekuru Semivumbi Simake wari intore y’intyoza mu guhamiriza kwa Rudahigwa i Nyanza mu Rukari.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Didiertouch mu gihe amashusho yatunganyijwe na Karpetpixelz.
Shira amatsiko kuri Ange Hillz, Umunyarwanda washushanyije mu minota itatu George Floyd ku kiriyo
Itangazamakuru ryo ku Isi yose ryacitse ururondogoro kubera umunyabugeni w’umwirabura wabashije gushushanya ifoto ya George Floyd mu gihe cy’iminota itatu, icyo gihe byari mu muhango wo kumusezera mu cyubahiro.
Itangazamakuru ryo ku Isi yose ryacitse ururondogoro kubera umunyabugeni w’umwirabura wabashije gushushanya ifoto ya George Floyd mu gihe cy’iminota itatu, icyo gihe byari mu muhango wo kumusezera mu cyubahiro.
Ange Hillz umusore bitari bizwi ko ari umunyarwanda, ni we wesheje ako gahigo imbere y’ibitangazamakuru bikomeye nka; CNN, ABC n’ibindi byahise bimusamira hejuru kubera impano ye aba abaye icyamamare atyo.
Nyuma y’amasaha make abashije kwesa aka gahigo byamenyekanye ko Ange Hillz ari umunyarwanda wiyongereye ku bandi bagiye bakora amateka ku Isi.
Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na IGIHE mu Kinyarwanda cyiza, Ange Hillz, yavuze ko amaze imyaka irenga 20 ataba mu Rwanda, agaruka birambuye ku rugendo rwe mu bugeni.
Ange Hillz yavukiye mu Rwanda aza kuhava afite imyaka 16 yerekeza muri Kenya, mu 1998.
Nyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu gituranyi imyaka itari mike yahise ajya muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yigiye ibijyanye n’Ubugeni.
Ati “Nagiye muri Amerika kwiga ibijyanye n’ubugeni, narabikundaga cyane.
Niho nabyize kugeza mu 2004, nahise mbona akazi nkamaramo imyaka itanu.
Mu 2010 nibwo natangiye kwikorera ninjira mu byo gushushanya gutyo.
Kugeza ubu Ange Hillz afite ikigo cye gishushanya yise “Visual paint" aho akunze gushushanya mu birori bitandukanye ndetse agakorana n’abantu bafite amazina azwi cyane.
Bamwe mu bakiriya be bazwi harimo; Jada Pinkette Smith (umugore wa William’s Smith), Spike Lee (uzwi cyane muri filime zo muri Amerika nk’umuyobozi wa nyinshi zakunzwe, James Harden (Umukinnyi wa Basketball ukomeye muri NBA), Anthony Davis umukinnyi wamenyekanye cyane muri Los Angeles Lakers, Chris Tucker umukinnyi wa filime ukomeye muri Amerika, Erykah Badu umuhanzi w’icyamamare mu muziki wa Amerika, Dwyane Wade uzwi cyane muri NBA, Louis Farrakhan umunyapolitike ukomeye muri Amerika.
Ange Hillz avuga ko kugera kuri ibi byose abikesha umujyanama we umufasha cyane.
Ati "Mfite umujyanama [manager] umfasha cyane gukorana n’abantu b’ibyamamare, ni nawe wamfashije guhura n’umuryango wa George Floyd, nyuma yo gukora iriya foto benshi mu muryango we bansabye ko nayibakorera ubu mfite akazi ko kuyibakorera.
Yavukiye mu Rwanda anahafite umuryango nubwo atahaheruka
Ange Hillz avuga ko yavukiye mu Rwanda nubwo atibuka neza agace bari batuyemo, yavuze ko ’aho nibuka ni i Remera nahavuye cyera’.
Uyu abanziriza bucura mu bana barindwi iwabo babyaye, abavandimwe be kimwe n’ababyeyi be bose baba mu Rwanda.
Icyakora nubwo umuryango we utuye mu Rwanda, Ange Hillz we ahaheruka mu 1998, avuga ko akumbuye u Rwanda kuko akunda kurubona kuri Televiziyo akumva agize amatsiko.
Ati" Nshaka kubona ukuntu hasa bavuga ko ari ahantu hafite isuku, kuvugana n’abantu bavuga ikinyarwanda, gusura ingagi.
Amafoto mbona kuri televiziyo ubona ko mu Rwanda ari heza cyane.
Asoza ikiganiro twagiranye yasabye ababyeyi kureka abana bafite impano yo gushushanya bakabikora kuko nabyo bishobora kuba akazi katunga umwana.
Ati" Njye ndibuka kera nkiri umwana najyaga nshushanya ku ntebe nicaragaho no mu bitabo byanjye umwarimu akankubita ariko kenshi narabikomezaga.
Umuhango wo gushyingura George Floyd yawubonye gute nk’uwari uhibereye
Ange yagize ati “Wari umuhango uteye agahinda abantu bari bababaye barakaye, ni iby’agaciro bikaba n’amateka kuba ndi umunyarwanda wabashije gukora ibyo nakoze kuko televiziyo nyinshi mpuzamahanga zararebaga bizandikwa.
Ange Hillz avuga ko abirabura barakajwe n’urupfu rwa George Floyd ariko yemeza ko ari ibintu byari bisanzwe bibaho ntibihabwe agaciro cyangwa ntibivugwe cyane nkuko byagenze bityo bakaba bashaka ko igihe cyose hishwe umwirabura azira uko yavutse byajya bivugwa bigasakuza.
