Ikiganiro na Ange Hillz umunyarwanda umaze kubaka izina muri Amerika kubera gushushanya
Hari abari banyobewe! ‘Igisupusupu’ yavuze ku mafoto y’umusatsi we urimo teinture anambaye amaherena
Nyuma yo gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise Isubireho, Nsengiyumva François uzwi nka Igisupusupu mu muziki yakomoje ku mafoto ye aherutse guca ibintu kubera uko yari yambaye n’uko yari yahinduye imisatsi ye.
Nyuma yo gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise Isubireho, Nsengiyumva François uzwi nka Igisupusupu mu muziki yakomoje ku mafoto ye aherutse guca ibintu kubera uko yari yambaye n’uko yari yahinduye imisatsi ye.
Muri Gicurasi 2020 nibwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hakwirakwiriye amafoto agaragaza Igisupusupu mu isura nshya.
Amugaragaza yashyize teinture mu mutwe, umusatsi wera ndetse afite imirimbo y’ubwiza irimo amaherena ku mubiri we.
Igisupusupu avuga ko yakunze ukuntu yasaga mu mafoto yasohotse icyo gihe ndetse n’inshuti ze zabyishimiye.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati "Buriya mfite abandeberera bavuze bati Gisupusupu wa 2019 agomba kuba atandukanye n’uw’uyu mwaka, ni uko byaje.
Nanjye narabibonye mbona bimeze neza.
Nubwo avuga ko yishimiye uko yagaragaraga, ngo umugore we yarabibonye aratangara ariko yishimira ko umugabo we yabaye icyamamare.
Yagize ati "Mu cyaro abenshi bari banyobewe ariko icyiza ni uko babyishimiye babonaga nabaye neza kuruta mbere.
“Njye ndi umu jeune, ntabwo ndasaza.
Umusaza ntabasha guceka umuziki, nta mujeune usaza rwose njye ndiwe.
Ntibakabare imyaka rwose bajye bareba ibikorwa.
Igisupusupu uhamya ko yakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 yavuze ko igihe cyateraga yigumiye mu rugo aho atuye ndetse Boss Papa kompanyi inamufasha mu muziki, ikomeza kumwitaho.
Nsengiyumva François aheruka gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Isubireho’, yagiye hanze ku wa 10 Kamena 2020; irimo ubutumwa bukebura abakobwa cyangwa se abahungu bishora mu ngeso mbi cyane cyane iz’ubusambanyi.
Ishushanya umukobwa uba warananiye iwabo akajya ararana n’abasore mu mahoteli, kugeza aho bamufashe ku ngufu bakamukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina barenze umwe.
Iyi ndirimbo ni iya karindwi mu zo uyu muhanzi amaze gushyira hanze.
Ije ikurikira iyo yamenyekanyemo cyane yitwa ‘Mariya Jeannne’ yanatumye bamwita Igisupusupu, ‘Rwagitima’ n’izindi.
Bitandukanye n’izindi ndirimbo yagiye akora, Nsengiyumva muri iyi ndirimbo nshya agaragara yambaye imikufi itandukanye yanahinduye imisatsi ye umweru.
Nsengiyumva w’imyaka 41 y’amavuko yize gucuranga umuduri mu 1999 ubwo yari afite imyaka 20, mu gihe cy’amezi atanu.
Uyu mugabo ufite abana babiri yize amashuri abanza gusa.
Icyihariye atandukaniyeho n’abahanzi bamwe bakomeye mu Rwanda ni uko indirimbo ze zikundwa n’abanyamujyi, zagera mu cyaro ho zigakurirwa na benshi ingofero.
Ubu ‘Umuduri’ wafatwaga nk’igicurangisho gikoreshwa n’abacurangira gusomywa intama ku rwagwa, usigaye wumvwa na benshi kubera uyu mugabo.

Ku wa 25 Kamena 2009 nibwo igihangange mu muziki wa Pop, Michael Jackson, yitabye Imana.
Ubu imyaka 11 irashize nyakwigendera atakibarizwa ku Isi y’abazima.
Ku wa 25 Kamena 2009 nibwo igihangange mu muziki wa Pop, Michael Jackson, yitabye Imana.
Ubu imyaka 11 irashize nyakwigendera atakibarizwa ku Isi y’abazima.
Michael Jackson wafatwaga nk’Umwami w’Injyana ya Pop ku Isi yitabye Imana afite imyaka 50.
Uyu muhanzi yasize urwibutso rukomeye mu mfuruka z’Isi yose bitewe n’urukundo yagwije imbere ya benshi rushingiye ku ijwi rye ryiza n’imbyino ze zirimo ubuhanga.
Umunsi yitaba Imana Isi yacitse ururondogoro ku bwo kubura uyu mugabo wari umaze imyaka isaga 30 yarayigaruriye, kugeza ubwo ishakiro ry’amakuru rya Google ryahagaze bitewe n’abantu benshi cyane barikoreshaga, bashaka kumenya amakuru y’impano.
Michael Jackson yapfuye ubwo yiteguraga ibitaramo yagombaga gukorera mu Bwongereza.
Muri icyo gihe yari afite ikibazo cyo kubura ibitsotsi, ku buryo umuganga we Dr Murray yabanzaga kumuha imiti kugira ngo agoheke.
Mbere y’amasaha make kugira ngo apfe, yari yabuze ibitotsi burundu, asaba uyu muganga wahembwaga ibihumbi $150 ku kwezi, kumuha umuti witwa Propofol ubundi uhabwa abantu bagiye kubagwa kugira ngo basinzire.
Isuzuma ryakorewe umurambo wa Michael Jackson ryagaragaje ko iyo miti ari yo yamuhitanye ndetse umuganga we akatirwa igifungo cy’imyaka ine.
Indirimbo zirenga ijana Michael Jackson yakoze zarakunzwe kandi n’ubu ziracyakunzwe, ibintu bimwambika ikamba ry’Umwami wa Pop.
Benshi bibuka Michael Jackson nk’umuhanzi n’umubyinnyi w’umuhanga n’umuhate we mu guharanira Isi nziza abinyujije mu ndirimbo ze zakunzwe nka "Heal the World", "Will you be there" n’izindi.
Umunsi wa nyuma wa Michael Jackson ku Isi…
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 25 Kamena 2009, Michael Jackson yararembye bikomeye yihutanwa mu bitaro.
Ikinyamakuru TMZ cyariho kizamura kwizerwa kwacyo mu kwandika amakuru yihuse y’imyidagaduro nicyo cya mbere cyanditse ko uyu muhanzi ari muri koma.
Bitewe n’izina rikomeye yari amaze kugira, benshi ntibizeye ko Michael Jackson ari mu bihe bitamworoheye kandi ashobora kuva ku Isi y’abazima.
Umunyamakuru w’imyidagaduro wa BBC, Ian Youngs, wakurikiraniraga hafi iby’uyu muhanzi w’icyamamare yatangaje ko hari hashize igihe bivugwa ko uyu muhanzi arwaye kanseri y’uruhu, nubwo nyuma uruhande rwe rwabihakanye.
Muri iryo joro abanyamakuru benshi ku Isi bahise batangira gukurikirana cyane iby’ubuzima bwa Jackson.
Ibiro bya BBC i Los Angeles byahamagaye abavugizi, inshuti n’abakorana na Jackson ariko nta n’umwe wagize icyo yemeza kuko bamwe bakuragaho telefoni zabo.
Iby’ubuzima bwe byari bimaze iminsi bizwi ko atameze neza, ariko iby’iryo joro nta makuru afatika Isi yabashije kubona.
Nyuma gato, TMZ yahise yandika ko Michael Jackson yapfuye.
Hari hashize ibyumweru bike avuye mu bitaramo i Londres ndetse ku wa 25 Kamena mu masaha y’igicuku yari yakoze imyiteguro i Los Angeles y’igitaramo yiteguraga.
Urupfu rwa Jackson ni inkuru yatunguranye gusa muganga we nyuma yemeje ko yari amaze imyaka myinshi adashobora gusinzira kereka ahawe imiti imusinziriza.
Dr Conrad Murray, umuganga we bwite wahembwaga $150,000 ku kwezi, yari amutegereje mu rugo atashye.
Mu cyumba cye habaga harimo amacupa y’ibinini, uducupa tw’imiti banywa cyangwa bitera, inshinge n’ibindi.
Dr Murray yabwiye polisi ko yari amaze iminsi aha Jackson umuti witwa Propofol - umuti uterwa abagiye kubagwa ku bitaro - mu majoro 60 kugeza tariki 22 Kamena 2009 kugira ngo abashe gusinzira.
Mu masaha ya mu gitondo kare tariki 25 Kamena, Dr Murray yahaye Jackson indi miti kugira ngo asinzire, ariko ngo ntiyakoze kuko Jackson yari afite igishyika cy’ibitaramo yateguraga.
Byageze saa Yine n’iminota 40 z’igitondo Jackson atarasinzira.
Dr Murray yabwiye Polisi ko Jackson yamwinginze ngo amuhe ’amata’ kugira ngo asinzire - aha ngo yasobanuraga Propofol- kuko bifite ibara rijya gusa.
Dr Murray avuga ko yari afite ibikoresho byose bituma abasha gukurikirana umutima, umwuka mu maraso n’ibindi kuri Jackson ndetse ko yamugumye iruhande nyuma gato akajya kwiyuhagira.
Nyuma y’akanya amuvuye iruhande yagiye koga ariko agarutse ngo yasanze Jackson adahumeka.
Gusa iby’amasaha yavuze bishidikanywaho hagendewe ku majwi ye yafashwe kuri telefoni aho yavugaga ko ibyo byabayeho mbere gato ya saa sita z’amanywa.
Uyu muganga avuga ko yakurikijeho kugerageza gusubiza umwuka uyu muhanzi ndetse ngo ntiyari no gusaba ubutabazi kuko nawe aribyo yageragezaga.
Icyo yakoze ni uko yahamagaye umwe mu bashinzwe umutekano wa Jackson.
Dr Murray avugwaho ko yabanje gusaba ushinzwe umutekano kuvana mu cyumba ibikoresho by’imiti byose.
Abana ba Jackson, Prince na Paris bari mu rugo ibi byose biba, ariko bahiye ubwoba.
Ubwo abatabazi bageraga mu rugo bavuga ko batabashije kumenya Jackson kuko yagaragaraga nk’umuntu wazonzwe, unanutse cyane.
Arebye uko yari ameze, Umutabazi Richard Senneff yavuze ko yabonaga ari nk’umurwayi w’indembe igeze mu minsi ya nyuma.
Bahise bamujyana ku bitaro bya UCLA medical center aho bakomereje ibikorwa byo kumugarurira umwuka.
Hashize isaha imwe n’iminota 13 bemeje ko byarangiye.
Muri icyo gihe abafana be n’abanyamakuru bari bamaze kugera ku bitaro.
Saa Munani n’iminota 44 z’amanywa TMZ niyo yatangaje inkuru bwa mbere ko Jackson yapfuye, hari saa sita na 44 z’ijoro mu Rwanda.
Abenshi ku Isi bari bagikeneye kumenya niba koko Michael Jackson byarangiye, abantu basuye internet mu buryo budasanzwe.
Google yageze aho itabasha gutanga amakuru (results) ku bayibajije Michael Jackson kuko uburyo ikoresha bwibeshye ko kuyibaza kenshi iri jambo ari igitero bwagabweho.
Twitter, Los Angeles Times, TMZ, Wikipedia na Messenger zose zagize ibibazo bya tikinike kubera abazisuye benshi uwo mugoroba.
Hashize imyaka ibiri, Dr Conrad Murray yahamijwe icyaha cy’ubwicanyi butagambiriwe afungwa igihe kituzuye neza imyaka ibiri muri ine yakatiwe.
Iby’urupfu rwa Jackson n’iby’ibyaha yashinjwaga byo gufata abana bato ku ngufu byavuzweho byinshi mu myaka 10 ishize, muzika ye nayo izaguma mu mitima ya benshi.
Itorero Inganzo Ngari rigiye kujya ritaramira abantu hifashishijwe Youtube
Mu gihe ibitaramo byahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, abanyamuziki nabo bayobotse inzira yo gutaramana n’abakunzi babo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.
Mu gihe ibitaramo byahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, abanyamuziki nabo bayobotse inzira yo gutaramana n’abakunzi babo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.
Mu gihe mu Rwanda hamaze iminsi umurindi w’ibitaramo by’abahanzi batandukanye, Itorero Inganzo Ngari ryamaze gutegura ibitaramo bya buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abakunzi b’umuziki gakondo.
Ibi bitaramo bizajya bitambuka ku rukuta rwa Youtube rw’iri torero bizatangira kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 26 Kamena 2020.
Ibi bitaramo by’Itorero Inganzo Ngari byatekerejweho nyuma yuko ibyo risanzwe rikorera kuri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru byakomwe mu nkokora n’ingamba zo kwirinda no gukumira COVID-19.
Nahimana Serge ubarizwa mu Itorero Inganzo Ngari yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi bitaramo babiteguye kugira ngo bashimishe abakunzi b’imbyino gakondo bari batakibona aho bataramira bakanyurwa.
Yagize ati “Twari dusanzwe dutaramira abakunzi bacu muri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru, twanze gukomeza kwicisha irungu abakunzi b’umudiho gakondo niyo mpamvu twahisemo kubategurira ibi bitaramo.
Iki gitaramo kizaba cyiganjemo indirimbo zigaragaza uturango tw’umuco w’u Rwanda mu mbyino zizwi mu duce tunyuranye tw’urukiga [izo mu murera no gice cya Byumba], mu Buganza, mu Mutara w’Indorwa, mu Buhoma, mu Bufundu, mu Gisaka, mu Buganza n’ahandi.
Uretse imbyino muri ibi bitaramo, Inganzo Ngari zizashyiramo igice cy’ibisakuzo, kwivuga, kuvuza ikondera no guca imigani.

Ibihembo bya MNI bigiye gutangwa ku ndirimbo zikunzwe ku nshuro ya kabiri
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.
Ibi bihembo byatangiye bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, kuri ubu byatangiye kubona abaterankunga aho ku isonga RALC, yamaze kwinjiramo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Ibi bihembo bigiye gutangwa bwa kabiri bizashyikirizwa abahanzi babitsindiye mu minsi ishize, ibirori byo kubahemba bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro binyuranye, ubuyobozi bw’iri rushanwa bwemeje ko ibi bihembo bizashyikirizwa abahanzi binyuze kuri Televiziyo Rwanda ku wa 26 Kamena 2020.
MNI yatangaje ko ibihembo bitangirwa kuri RTV kuri uyu wa Gatanu saa tanu z’amanywa aho kuba ku wa Gatandatu nk’uko byari byatangajwe mbere kubera gahunda zo Kwibohora ziteganijwe ku matariki yari yatangajwe mbere.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.
Ni umuhango uzatangirwamo ibihembo bya Muzika (Music Awards) ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, aho indirimbo ya mbere izahabwa 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri igahabwa 700,000 Frw, iya gatatu igahabwa 300,000 Frw.
Indirimbo ya Tonzi niyo yabashije kuza ku mwanya wa mbere, yegukana igihembo.
Usibye miliyoni agiye guhabwa nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.
Usibye Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere, Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje kubera indirimbo ye "Umunyenga w’intsinzi" mu gihe Bryan Lead we yabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
Ni ubwa kabiri igikorwa cyo gutora umuhanzi watsinze iri rushanwa kibaye.
Ubwa mbere cyabaye muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo igihembo cyegukanwaga n’itsinda ‘Umuti Mu nganzo’.
Umuhanzi Ganza yabaye uwa kabiri ahembwa ibihumbi 700 Frw naho umuhanzi Sam Muvunyi aba uwa Gatatu ahembwa ibihumbi 300 Frw.
rw ni urubuga rwa internet rushyirwaho indirimbo z’abahanzi batandukanye b’abanyarwanda maze abakunzi b’umuziki bagatora izo bakunze, ihize izindi nyuma y’amezi atatu igahabwa igihembo.
Umuhanzi ubwe ni we ufata iya mbere kugira ngo indirimbo ye igaragare kuri uru rubuga ashyiraho umubare w’indirimbo yifuza zose.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga ni bwo bwemeza ko indirimbo ijya ku rutonde rw’izihatanira igihembo nyuma yo kureba niba yujuje ibisabwa birimo no kuba uwayitanze ari nawe nyirayo.
Gutora bikorerwa ku rubuga rwa internet ariko utoye inshuro imwe acibwa amafaranga mirongo itanu (50Frw) yishyura akoresheje telefone ngendanwa akanze *611#.
Umuhanzi ahabwa 60% by’amafaranga yinjiye bitewe n’abamutoye naho 40% agasigarana ba nyir’umushinga.
Sushant Rajput, icyamamare muri sinema yo mu Buhinde yapfuye
Icyamamare muri gukina filime mu Buhinde, Sushant Singh Rajput, yasanzwe yapfiriye mu nzu yabagamo mu mujyi wa Mumbai, bigakekwa ko yabaya yiyahuye.
Icyamamare muri gukina filime mu Buhinde, Sushant Singh Rajput, yasanzwe yapfiriye mu nzu yabagamo mu mujyi wa Mumbai, bigakekwa ko yabaya yiyahuye.
Uyu mukinnyi wamenyekanye muri filime no mu biganiro bitandukanye kuri televiziyo, yamenyekanye cyane muri filime ya siporo yiswe MS Dhoni: The Untold Story, aho agaragaramo nk’umukinnyi wa cricket.
Rajput w’imyaka 34 apfuye nyuma y’iminsi mike uwahoze amufasha mu buhanzi bwe (manager) na we apfuye mu cyumweru gishize.
Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Buhinde, Narendra Modi ni umwe mu babajwe cyane n’urupfu rwa Rajput, aho yavuze ko ari umujyambere ugiye kare.
Rajput filime yaherukaga kugaragaramo ni iyitwa Chhichhore, yasohotse umwaka ushize.
Urupfu rwa Rajput ruje mu gihe abakunzi ba filime zo mu Buhinde bacyunamiye abandi bakinnyi bakomeye barimo Rishi Kapoor na Irrfan Khan bapfuye muri Mata uyu mwaka.

Uyu mugabo yakunzwe bikomeye mu bihangano bitandukanye kuva mu myaka yo 1980 ubwo yerekezaga umutima we wose mu buzima bw’umuziki wiganje mu njyana nka Zouk, Soukous na Afropop.

Tuyisenge Intore yahishuye ibyishimo yagize umunsi aramutsa Perezida n’uko yari yibwe indirimbo "Tora Kagame"
Intore Tuyisenge, ni umuhanzi umaze kuba ubukombe mu Rwanda azwi cyane nk’umuhanzi ukora indirimbo zigisha Abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.
Intore Tuyisenge, ni umuhanzi umaze kuba ubukombe mu Rwanda azwi cyane nk’umuhanzi ukora indirimbo zigisha Abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.
Uyu mugabo ayobora ihuriro ry’abahanzi ba muzika mu Rwanda, iyo muganiriye ku rugendo rwe mu muziki usanga yarahereye kuri zero ariko umuhate n’urukundo rw’ibyo yakoraga rugatuma yihuta mu iterambere.
Tuyisenge wakuranye impano y’ubuhanzi, yabwinjiyemo neza ubwo yari arangije icyiciro cya mbere cy’amashuri yisumbuye iki gihe yari asanzwe aririmba indirimbo z’amarushanwa.
Mu 2006 nibwo Intore Tuyisenge yitabiriye amarushanwa y’umuziki, aba uwa mbere mu karere ka Kirehe no mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba, aba uwa gatatu ku rwego rw’igihugu.
Nyuma gato y’aya marushanwa, Tuyisenge yagize amahirwe yo kwitabira Itorero ry’Igihugu nk’umwe mu bahagarariye abanyeshuri.
Bitewe n’inyigisho yaryigiyemo yavuyeyo yiyemeje gutangira gukora ibihangano bikangurira abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.
Mu 2007 nibwo Tuyisenge yakoze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise “Intore izirusha intambwe", 2008 akora Intore z’abahizi’.
Ajya gukora indirimbo ye ya mbere, Tuyisenge yavuze ko yari afite ikimasa mu cyaro agatekereza kukigurisha.
Ati “Icyo gihe muzehe yambereye ibamba yanga ko nkigurisha ahubwo yemera kumpa 40 000 Frw yo gukora indirimbo.
Tuyisenge yahuye n’umunyamakuru yahaye indirimbo ye ya mbere yanga kuyicuranga amusobanurira ko batajya bacuranga indirimbo za Politiki.
Ati “Kuva icyo gihe natangiye gukora umuziki numva ko ntazongera kujyana ibihangano byanjye ku maradiyo kuko nari maze kumva ko batacuranga ibyanjye.
Mu matora y’abadepite, Tuyisenge yakoze indirimbo yise Tora RPF, “Nayifashishije mu kwamamaza umuryango mu bice bitandukanye by’u Rwanda.
Iki gihe uyu muhanzi wari umaze gusa n’utangiye kumenyekana cyane, mu 2010 yaje guhindura ya ndirimbo noneho ayigira Tora Kagame, aha hakaba hari mu matora ya Perezida wa Repubulika.
Tuyisenge ati “Icyo gihe narayivuguruye nzana ibitekerezo bishya mu ndirimbo, nshyiramo umurongo yari amaze guha igihugu n’ibindi bitandukanye iba nziza cyane kandi benshi bambera abagabo bo kubihamya.
Akomeza agira ati "Ubwo najyaga gukora indirimbo Tora RPF, Hon.
Saidate yampaye ibihumbi 150 nkoreshaho make bituma nsigarana make nakomeje kwifashisha.
Tuyisenge avuga ko indirimbo ye “Tora Kagame" hari umuhanzi (yirinze gutangaza izina rye) washatse kuyimwiba.
Ati "Naje kumenya ko hari umuhanzi wari uri gushaka uko yayiba yaranatangiye kuyikora, ndashimira Hon.
Mukazibera Agnes, namubwiye ko bagiye kunyiba igihangano angira inama zo kujya kuyandikisha muri RDB.
Umwe washakaga kuyiba yaje kumenya ko nayandikishije biraduteranya rwose ariko sinaba nkibwe.
Iyi ndirimbo Tora Kagame yahinduye ubuzima bwa Tuyisenge kuko yamenyekanye cyane ndetse inakundwa na benshi mu banyarwanda bashyigikiye Perezida Kagame.
Ubwo yayiririmbaga Perezida Kagame yaramushimiye.
Tuyisenge yagize ati" Umunsi yankoze mu ntoki yarambwiye ngo ‘Warakoze kandi komereza aho’.
Iki gihe Tuyisenge atashye benshi mu baturanyi ntibigeze bamworohera kuko bashakaga kumukora mu ntoki ngo bumve ikiganza cyasuhuje Perezida wa Repubulika.
Usibye abaturanyi be, Intore Tuyisenge nawe ngo ageze mu rugo ntabwo yigeze anakaraba intoki, “Uretse nanjye n’abaturanyi bazaga kunsuhuza bambwira ko batari bukarabe, ubwo nanjye byibaze nyine.
Iyi ndirimbo yamufunguriye imiryango myinshi, urugero ni uko ari umwe mu bitabiriye ibirori bya Rwanda Day yabereye muri Amerika mu 2010.
Kugeza ubu usibye kuba Intore Tuyisenge ari umuhanzi ukomeye cyane mu ndirimbo zigisha abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta, ni n’umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’abahanzi ba muzika umwanya amazeho igihe kinini.

Urugendo rwa Uwimana Aliane ukorana n’inzu y’imideli iri mu zikomeye mu Bufaransa
Uwimana Aliane yakuze atiyumvamo ibijyanye no kumurika imideli! Yabisunikiwemo n’inshuti ze, arabikunda none abimazemo imyaka irindwi ndetse biramutunze aho abarizwa mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa.
Uwimana Aliane yakuze atiyumvamo ibijyanye no kumurika imideli! Yabisunikiwemo n’inshuti ze, arabikunda none abimazemo imyaka irindwi ndetse biramutunze aho abarizwa mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa.
Uyu munyamideli yageze mu Bufaransa mu 2008, icyo gihe yari asanze umuntu wo mu muryango we wari waramuboneye ishuri muri icyo gihugu.
Muri icyo gihe, Uwimana nta gitekerezo yari afite cyo kwinjira mu bijyanye no kumurika imideli.
Inshuti ze zahoraga zimubwira ko akwiye kugerageza amahirwe akareba.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Uwimana yavuze uko yatangiye guharura inzira yo kwinjira mu kumurika imideli.
Yagize ati “Numvaga [kumurika imideli] atari bwo buzima bwanjye.
Mu 2012 ubwo nari ngiye gufata gari ya moshi nahuye n’umuntu ambaza niba nkora ibintu byo kwerekana imideli, ndamuhakanira.
Yambwiye ko ngomba kubigerageza.
Mbifashijwemo n’inshuti zanjye, nibwo nabyinjiyemo.
Ni icyemezo yafashe yabanje kugisha imitima inama cyane ko yibazaga umusaruro azabikuramo.
Yakomeje ati “Nibazaga icyo bizangezaho, inama inshuti zanjye zampaga nazo zigakomeza kubinkangurira.
Naravuze nti ko kugerageza ntacyo binsaba uwagerageza.
Mu 2013, nibwo Uwimana yabonye inzu y’imideli bakorana nyuma yo kwitabira ibikorwa byo guhitamo abanyamideli (casting) byafashe igihe kirekire.
Yagize ati “Ntibihita bitangira, bifata igihe.
Hagategurwa casting, ugahura n’abakiliya, ugakora amafoto menshi atishyura kugira ngo utunganye igitabo cyawe kuko aricyo wifashisha wereka abakiliya uko uhagarara, uko wifata, uko uvuga n’ibindi.
Hagati y’umwaka wa 2013 na 2016, Uwimana yabonaga akazi katari kenshi ndetse rimwe na rimwe ntikamwishyure neza ku buryo yakubakiraho imibereho.
Ati “Hari imbogamizi yari ukutamenya uko ubuzima bw’ejo buzaba bumeze.
Ese nzashobora kubaho nte?
Ibindi byo birasanzwe, ni ukugerageza kwitwara neza no kubaha abo dukorana.
Uwimana yaje kwinjira mu mikoranire na Mademoiselle agency, inzu y’imideli ikorera mu Mujyi wa Paris aho yashinzwe mu 1994.
Mademoiselle agency ya Sylvie Grincourt na Pascal Grincourt, iri mu zubashywe mu Burayi ikorana n’izindi nzu zirimo Armani, Lancôme, Lanvin, l’Oreal, ELLE n’izindi.
Uwimana yavuze ko iyo mikoranire yahinduye ubuzima bwe, ubu yishimira kuba umunyamideli.
Ati “Natangiye mu 2013 bigoye kubona akazi ugereranyije n’uyu munsi.
Uyu munsi biragenda neza, kuko ibijyanye no kumurika imideli nibyo bimbeshejeho 100%.
Nta kandi kazi nkora.
Uwimana akorana n’Umuryango M Foundation washinzwe na Mademoiselle Agency, uhindura ubuzima bw’abana n’abagore batagira kivurira binyuze mu kubongerera ubushobozi no gufasha abato kwiga.
Mu mwaka ushize, we na M Foundation bari mu Rwanda aho bagiranye ubufatanye n’Umuryango Uharanira Uburenganzira bw’Umugore n’ubw’Umwana ‘‘HAGURUKA’’.
Icyo gikorwa cyari kigamije gushyigikira gahunda ya Haguruka yo gufasha abakobwa babyariye iwabo guharanira uburenganzira bwabo no kongera kwisanga muri sosiyete.
Mu mishinga ye, Uwimana ateganya gukora ibikorwa biteza imbere ibijyanye n’imideli ndetse yatangiye no gutekereza ku buryo bwo kubigeza mu Rwanda.
Isomo rikomeye yakuye mu kumurika imideli mu myaka irindwi abimazemo ni uko umuntu adakwiye guhindura umwimerere we.
Ihuriro rya ba Nyampinga b’u Rwanda ryahaye abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda COVID-19
Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Muri uru rugendo, aba bakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda bari bahagarariwe na Miss Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ufite iri kamba muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Urugendo rwabo rwari rugamije gushyikiriza imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 bigizwe ahanini n’udupfukamunwa 1000.
Aba bakobwa bakigera muri uyu mudugudu bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bwawo ndetse n’ubw’Umurenge wa Nyarugunga kimwe n’ubuyobozi bw’abasezerewe mu ngabo mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Mu ijambo ry’ikaze babwiwe n’umuyobozi w’umurenge wa Nyarugunga Uwamahoro Geneviève, yashimiye ba Nyampinga kuba babagendereye abashimira ubushake bagize bwo gufasha abamugariye ku rugamba.
Yabijeje ko ubufasha batanze buzafasha imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba cyane ko udupfukamunwa bahawe tuzafasha abagorwaga no kutubona ndetse n’usanzwe agafite akaba abonye ako guhinduranya mu gihe yaba yakameshe.
Yasabye abaturage bo muri uyu mudugudu gukomeza gukurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 cyane ko ari icyorezo gihangayikishije igihugu cyane n’Isi muri rusange.
John Bagabo komiseri muri komisiyo yo gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare mu mujyi wa Kigali, yashimye bikomeye igikorwa cy’aba bakobwa ndetse asaba aba bamugariye ku rugamba n’imiryango yabo kumva impanuro z’aba bakobwa cyane ko nubwo ari bato ariko hari byinshi babigisha.
Yashimiye aba bakobwa kuba batekereje ku bamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, asaba abagiye guhabwa ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 kugerageza kubikoresha neza cyane ko nk’abafite ubumuga ari bamwe mu bafite imbaraga nke z’umubiri bityo igihe iki cyorezo cyaba kibagezeho kikaba cyabibasira.
Yagize ati" Nibyiza ko bazanye udupfukamunwa two kudufasha kwirinda Covid-19 kandi bakaba banaje kudukangurira kumenya kudukoresha neza no gukomeza kwirinda, natwe rero tugomba gufatanya n’abandi kwirinda iki cyorezo kuko ni urugamba rukomeye.
Jolly Mutesi wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ari nawe uhagarariye Nyampinga Foundation mu Rwanda, yibukije abamugariye ku rugamba bari muri uyu muhango ko nk’abana babo bahora babatekereza kandi babazirikana.
Ati "Nimwe mwafashe imbunda mujya ku rugamba muduha igihugu cyiza nk’iki, ntacyo dufite twabaha ngo tubashimire gusa turabazirikana, turashimira cyane buri umwe muri mwe ndetse tukazirikana byimazeyo abatakarije ubuzima ku rugamba bari bagenzi banyu.
“Mukwiye ishimwe ry’icyubahiro, turabakunda cyane kandi dufite ishimwe ku bwanyu.
Muri ababyeyi bacu mukaba n’ababyeyi b’Igihugu ntabwo tuzabatenguha ikivi cyanyu tuzacyusa.
Nyampinga Foundation ni ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye icyakora yatangiranye abanyamuryango batandatu barimo; Bahati Grace, Kayibanda Aurore, Kundwa Doriane, Akiwacu Colombe, Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ndetse na Muganwa Larry, umugabo watangiranye na bo.
Miss Iradukunda Elsa, Iradukunda Liliane na Nimwiza Meghan ntabwo bahise binjira muri Nyampinga Foundation, Miss Jolly Mutesi akaba yongeye gushimangira ko ari uko igihe batangizaga uyu mushinga aba bakobwa bari bafite ibindi bikorwa wenda byabazitiye ariko ahamya ko nibabohoka bazaba bakinguriwe imiryango.

Ishimwe rya Vd Frank ku bamugobotse bakamufasha kwivuza stroke yari imuhitanye
Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.
Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.
VD Frank umaze kongera gutora agatege yasigaranye ishimwe ku Banyarwanda bamugobotse bakamufasha kwivuza.
Ku wa 10 Gicurasi 2020, VD Frank avuga ko yabyutse agasanga yarembye ndetse umunwa wahengamye ndetse n’igice kimwe cy’umutwe we kidakora.
Ubu burwayi bwamuzonze bwamufashe mu gihe hari hashize icyumweru kimwe gusa abantu bemerewe kongera kujya mu mirimo nyuma yuko hari haciyeho igihe Abanyarwanda muri rusange bari muri gahunda ya #Gumamurugo bisobanuye ko iyi ndwara yamufatiranye mu bukene nkuko nawe abyivugira.
Ibi byatumye ahita yihutira kujya kwivuza maze abwirwa ko yarwaye stroke, ubwoba bwahise bumutaha kuko yari imaze iminsi mike ihitanye muramu we “DJ Miller".
Yagize ati "Nahise mbaza abaganga nti ’ese igikurikiyeho ni iki, ngiye gupfa?
’ Kuko nari nzi ko urwaye iyi ndwara adapfa gukira, ariko abaganga bambwiye ko kuva narivuje neza kandi kare nzakira kandi neza.
VD Frank avuga ko nyuma y’inkuru yasohotse ku IGIHE ivuga ko arwaye abantu banyuranye biganjemo Abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora bamufashije bamuha amafaranga yo kwivuza.
Ykomeje agira ati “Ndashimira buri Munyarwanda wese wamfashije, indwara yamfashe nkennye nta n’ifaranga na rimwe mfite, nta bwishingizi mfite nagizwe n’abantu basomye inkuru bamenye ko ndwaye baramfasha ndivuza none ndabona ndi gukira.
Avuga ko igihe cyose yivuje yafashwaga n’abakunzi be bari bamenye ko arwaye, ati "Byibuza kwa Kanimba kuhivuriza nahatanze ibihumbi 700 Frw, ibaze iyo bataza kumfasha wenda ubu mba ngenda ngifite ikibazo cya (Paralyse).
VD Frank avuga ko Stroke yarwaye yari yayitewe n’ibintu bitatu birimo kutaruhuka, gutekereza no gukora cyane.
Ati "Mfite imishinga inyuranye irimo gukora uruganda rwenga inzoga, rero nari ndi gutekereza uko nawushyira mu ngiro nkumva birangoye cyane sinari nkiryama nararaga ntekereza rwose.
Uyu mugabo avuga ko nyuma yo gusobanurirwa neza icyamuteye kurwara yafashe icyemezo cyo kuruhuka bihagije ndetse no kugabanya gutekereza cyane kuko yasobanukiwe ko gushakisha ibintu bitaruta ubuzima.
Inzobere mu by’ubuzima zivuga ko ‘Stroke’ ari indwara ituma udutsi dukwirakwiza amaraso mu bwonko duturika bitewe n’umubyimba watwo utabasha kwakira ingano y’amaraso acamo, bigatuma yivanga n’ubwonko cyangwa tukaziba bitewe no kuvura kwayo, bigatuma adatemberamo uko bikwiye, maze igice atageramo kikangirika.
Ikiganiro na VD Frank wamaze koroherwa
RALC yinjiye mu baterankunga ba MNI igiye gutanga ibihembo by’igihembwe cya kabiri 2020
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC), yamaze kwinjira mu baterankunga ba Muzika Nyarwanda Ipande (MNI), ubu bukaba ari uburyo bwo guteza imbere muzika nyarwanda binyuze mu guhemba indirimbo yatowe cyane mu ziba zihatana.
Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC), yamaze kwinjira mu baterankunga ba Muzika Nyarwanda Ipande (MNI), ubu bukaba ari uburyo bwo guteza imbere muzika nyarwanda binyuze mu guhemba indirimbo yatowe cyane mu ziba zihatana.
Ibi bihembo byatangiye bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, kuri ubu byatangiye kubona abaterankunga aho ku isonga RALC, yamaze kwinjiramo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Ibi bihembo bigiye gutangwa bwa kabiri bizashyikirizwa abahanzi babitsindiye mu minsi ishize, icyakora ibirori byo kubahemba bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro binyuranye, ubuyobozi bw’iri rushanwa bwemeje ko ibi bihembo bizashyikirizwa abahanzi binyuze kuri Televiziyo Rwanda ku wa 27 Kamena 2020.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.
Ni umuhango uzatangirwamo ibihembo bya Muzika (Music Awards) ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, aho indirimbo ya mbere izahabwa 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri igahabwa 700,000 Frw, iya gatatu igahabwa 300,000 Frw.
Indirimbo ya Tonzi niyo yabashije kuza ku mwanya wa mbere, yegukana igihembo.
Usibye miliyoni agiye guhabwa nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.
Usibye Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere, Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje kubera indirimbo ye "Umunyenga w’intsinzi" mu gihe Bryan Lead we yabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
Ni ubwa kabiri igikorwa cyo gutora umuhanzi watsinze iri rushanwa kibaye.
Ubwa mbere cyabaye muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo igihembo cyegukanwaga n’itsinda ‘Umuti Mu nganzo’.
Umuhanzi Ganza yabaye uwa kabiri ahembwa ibihumbi 700 Frw naho umuhanzi Sam Muvunyi aba uwa Gatatu ahembwa ibihumbi 300 Frw.
rw ni urubuga rwa internet rushyirwaho indirimbo z’abahanzi batandukanye b’abanyarwanda maze abakunzi b’umuziki bagatora izo bakunze, ihize izindi nyuma y’amezi atatu igahabwa igihembo.
Umuhanzi ubwe ni we ufata iya mbere kugira ngo indirimbo ye igaragare kuri uru rubuga ashyiraho umubare w’indirimbo yifuza zose.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga ni bwo bwemeza ko indirimbo ijya ku rutonde rw’izihatanira igihembo nyuma yo kureba niba yujuje ibisabwa birimo no kuba uwayitanze ari nawe nyirayo.
Gutora bikorerwa ku rubuga rwa internet ariko utoye inshuro imwe acibwa amafaranga mirongo itanu (50Frw) yishyura akoresheje telefone ngendanwa akanze *611#.
Umuhanzi ahabwa 60% by’amafaranga yinjiye bitewe n’abamutoye naho 40% asigarane ba nyir’umushinga.
Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kugaruka mu isura nshya
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika ryateguwe mu gufasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda kwegerana n’abakunzi babo.
Ryatangijwe mu mwaka ushize aho ryanyuze mu ntara zitandukanye z’igihugu risorezwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kongera kuba, ariko izaba mu buryo butandukanye n’ubwa mbere.
Kuri ubu izajya ica kuri Televiziyo Rwanda no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’iri serukiramuco mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abantu batakibona uko bitabira ibitaramo by’abahanzi kubera COVID-19.
Mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Abanyarwanda bakwicwa n’irungu muri ibi bihe ibitaramo bitemewe ndetse no gufasha abahanzi gukora ibitaramo biteguye neza bagasabana n’abakunzi babo, ubuyobozi bwa East African Promoters (EAP) bwongeye gutegura Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri.
Amakuru ava imbere muri EAP ahamya ko iyi kompanyi isanzwe itegura iri serukiramuco yanze kuryama kuko ibitaramo byahagaritswe ihitamo gushaka inzira zo gukora ibitaramo byiza kandi bigezweho bizajya bica kuri internet no kuri televiziyo abantu bakabikurikirana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
IGIHE ifite amakuru yizewe yuko ibi bitaramo bigiye gutangira kuba mu minsi ya vuba ndetse bikazajya biba biteguwe neza mu rwego rwo gukomeza gutuma umuziki w’u Rwanda uguma ku rwego rushimishije.
Nubwo nta muntu uwo ariwe wese wo muri EAP wifuje kuduha amakuru kuri ibi bitaramo, ahari ni uko ari ibitaramo bizajya bica kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda (RTV) ndetse no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za Iwacu muzika Festival mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu bazaba batari hafi ya televiziyo.
Ni ibitaramo byatumiwemo abahanzi batandukanye kandi bagezweho nubwo amazina yabo ataratangazwa.
Ibi bitaramo bizamara amezi arenga atatu biba buri wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru.
Buri muhanzi azajya ahabwa umunsi we ataramire abakunzi be n’ab’umuziki Nyarwanda muri rusange.
Iwacu Muzika Festival ni ubwa kabiri igiye kuba, cyane ko mu mwaka wa 2019 yazengurutse mu ntara zose z’igihugu abahanzi batandukanye bashimisha abakunzi babo.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika Festival ryatangirijwe i Musanze ku wa 22 Kamena 2019 kuri Stade Ubworoherane risorezwa i Kigali mu gitaramo cy’imbaturamugabo cyatumiwemo umuhanzi ufite izina ryamamaye mu muziki wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Naseeb Abdul Juma [Diamond Platnumz] wataramiye ibihumbi by’abari muri Parking ya Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Humura Deborah yaririmbye inkuru mpamo y’uko yakunze umusore ntabimubwire kubera isoni
Mubyara wa Mani Martin witwa Humura Deborah yashyize hanze indirimbo ivuga ku nkuru mpamo y’ibyamubayeho, agakunda umusore ariko akananirwa kubimubwira.
Mubyara wa Mani Martin witwa Humura Deborah yashyize hanze indirimbo ivuga ku nkuru mpamo y’ibyamubayeho, agakunda umusore ariko akananirwa kubimubwira.
Indirimbo y’uyu mukobwa yitwa ‘Amasoni’ yayishyize hanze ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020.
Yabwiye IGIHE ati “Iyi ndirimbo ni inkuru mpamo y’ibyambayeho.
Nakunze umusore mu 2018 nanirwa kubimubwira, birangira tubaye inshuti bisanzwe.
Nyuma nanjye naje kumenya ko yankundaga ariko kubera ko nari naramwikuyemo dukomeza kubana bisanzwe.
Yagiriye inama abakobwa bagenzi be kutajya bagira isoni zo kubwira abahungu ko babakunda, cyane ko hari igihe ushobora kubivuga ugasanga worosoye uwabyukaga.
Yavuze ko afite imishinga myinshi ari gukoraho muri studio ku buryo nyuma y’iyi ndirimbo abantu bagiye kubona ibihangano bye byinshi.
Uyu mukobwa yyavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Kimisagara.
Ni umuririmbyi akaba umwanditsi ndetse agacuranga na Guitar Acoustic.
Ni umwana wa gatandatu mu muryango w’abana umunani.
Amashuri yisumbuye yayize muri Apace.
Yavutse ku babyeyi bakunda muzika, baririmba banacuranga muri korali mu rusengero bituma akunda umuziki mu buryo bukomeye ndetse yifuza kuwukora nk’umwuga.
Aherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo yise ‘Kibe’ avuga ko ariyo ya mbere muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 ariko afite n’indi yari yarakoze mbere yise ‘Umunyenga’.

Niragire Marie France ukina filime yabaye umugore wa mbere washinze televiziyo mu Rwanda
Mu myaka 26 ishize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda ni rimwe mu bice bimaze kwiyubaka bigaragara, radiyo zumvikana mu gihugu hose zariyongereye ubu zirarenga kuri 35; televiziyo zikora zavuye kuri imwe ubu Abanyarwanda barahitamo iyo bashatse mu zirenga 10 zigaragara kuva Nyagatare kugera Rusizi.
Mu myaka 26 ishize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda ni rimwe mu bice bimaze kwiyubaka bigaragara, radiyo zumvikana mu gihugu hose zariyongereye ubu zirarenga kuri 35; televiziyo zikora zavuye kuri imwe ubu Abanyarwanda barahitamo iyo bashatse mu zirenga 10 zigaragara kuva Nyagatare kugera Rusizi.
Iterambere ry’itangazamakuru kandi ntiryasize irikorerwa kuri internet kuko naryo ryateye intambwe ifatika mu kumenyesha abaturarwanda amakuru agezweho.
Umuvuduko w’iterambere rya Televiziyo mu Rwanda ntusanzwe, kuko mbere ya 2013 hari imwe rukumbi, Televiziyo y’u Rwanda yashinzwe mu 1991.
Mu myaka irenga gato itatu, hamaze gutangira izindi zirenga 10 z’abikorera ku giti cyabo zose zifite urunyurane rw’amakuru n’ibiganiro zigeza ku Banyarwanda.
Umubyeyi wa televiziyo mu Rwanda ntaracura kuko aherutse kwibaruka Genesis TV, yatangijwe ku mugaragaro ku itariki ya 11 Kamena 2020 nubwo yari imaze iminsi inyuzaho imiziki itandukanye, ikaba igaragara kuri Canal+.
Genesis TV yamaze gufungura imiryango ibaye iya mbere itangijwe n’umugore mu Rwanda by’umwihariko akaba n’umukinnyi wa filime, Niragire Marie France.
Niragire yavuze ko yatekereje gushinga televiziyo ubwo yari amaze gutunganya filime ye ya mbere akabura aho azajya ayinyuza, yatekereje atyo gushinga televiziyo.
Yagize ati "Igitekerezo cyaje mu 2018 ubwo nari maze gutunganya filime yanjye ‘Little angels’ mbura ahantu yazajya ica hano mu gihugu, ni uko igitekerezo cya Genesis Tv cyaje.
Kuba umugore wa mbere ushinze televiziyo mu Rwanda avuga ko abikesha impanuro z’ubuyobozi bw’igihugu budahwema gushishikariza abagore kwitinyuka bakihangira imirimo.
Yakomeje avuga ko “Uretse kuba mbikunda, urabona ko Leta idukangurira kwitinyuka nk’abagore kuko dushoboye kandi twabikora, rero naritinyutse cyane.
Niragire watangiye gukina filime mu 2008 kugeza ubu amaze kugaragara mu zirenga zirindwi, yakuze yumva afite inzozi zo kuba umunyamakuru no gukora mu ndege.
Kuri ubu uyu mubyeyi nubwo yagize televiziyo ye bwite, ntibizamubuza gukina filime kuko ari impano ye kandi amaze igihe akoraho.
Mu nama yatanze yabwiye abagore by’umwihariko bakitinya kugaragaza ibibarimo kuko aribwo buryo bwiza bwo gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Yagize ati "Nibatinyuke bakore burya ntabwo wahomba utashoye, nibakore nibiba bibi bigiremo bakore ibyiza ariko bakore ibyo bakunda kuko nibyo bizatuma bagera ku nzozi zabo.
Genesis TV yamaze gufungura imiryango izibanda cyane mu myidagaduro, ubukerarugendo n’ikoranabuhanga.
Iyi televiziyo nshya yatangiranye n’abanyamakuru bashya mu mwuga barimo Umutesi Denise wabaye Igisonga cya Kabiri cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2020.
Ikiganiro na Niragire Marie France umugore wa mbere washinze Televiziyo mu Rwanda
Gakwaya wamenyekanye nka Nkaka muri filime yatangiye gucururiza kuri internet izo yakinnyemo zigakundwa
Uruganda rwa Filime mu Rwanda rutangiye kwaguka, abakina filime ndetse bakanazitunganya bayobotse isoko ryo kuzicururiza kuri Internet nyuma y’igihe havugwa iyiganwa ryazo no kubura isoko.
Uruganda rwa Filime mu Rwanda rutangiye kwaguka, abakina filime ndetse bakanazitunganya bayobotse isoko ryo kuzicururiza kuri Internet nyuma y’igihe havugwa iyiganwa ryazo no kubura isoko.
Umwe mu bamaze igihe muri sinema nyarwanda, Gakwaya Célestin, yatangiye gusangiza Abanyarwanda zimwe muri filime yakinnye mu myaka ishize zikamenyekana ariko benshi batazi aho bazikura.
Gakwaya yamenyekanye muri filimi zirimo “Serwakira" .
Hari hashize igihe kinini atumvikana muri sinema nyarwanda.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko kuri ubu ahugiye mu gukora filime nshya ariko yanahisemo kumara ipfa abakunze zimwe muri filime yakinnyemo ariko benshi batazi aho bazikura.
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko yabitekerejeho nyuma yo kubona ko isoko rya filime risa n’iryahinduye imikorere aho uburyo bwakoreshwaga mu myaka ishize ubu bwataye agaciro.
Ati “Urumva mbere wasangaga dukora filime tukazicuruza kuri CD, benshi batabaga baraziguze byarabagoraga kuba bazibona.
Nyuma yo kwitegereza uko isoko ryo muri iyi minsi rihagaze, natekereje uburyo bushya bwo gusangiza abakunzi ba filime nyarwanda ibihangano byanjye.
Izi filimi zizajya zishyirwa kuri Youtube kuri shene yitwa Ingobe Films.
Ku ikubitiro iyagiyeho ni iyitwa Teta yasohotse mu 2018.
Iyi filime igaragaramo abakinnyi b’ibyamamare nka Nsanzamahoro Dennis wamenyekanye nka Rwasa uherutse kwitaba Imana, Munezero Aline uzwi nka Bijoux muri filime yo gusetsa yitwa Bamenya, Benimana Ramadhan [Bamenya] ukina yitwa Bamenya muri iyi filimi y’urwenya, Niragire Marie France, Gakwaya Célestin n’abandi.
Usibye iyi filime, Gakwaya avuga ko afite izindi nyinshi agiye gutangira gusangiza abakunzi ba filime nyarwanda harimo n’inshya yitegura gutangira gufatira amashusho.
Reba agace ka mbere ka Filime "Teta" Gakwaya yatangiye gushyira kuri Youtube
Ibyo wamenya ku iserukiramuco Africa in Colors, ryateguwe n’umunyarwanda rigatumirwamo mubyara wa Jay-Z
Iserukiramuco Mpuzamahanga “Africa in Colors" byari byitezwe ko ryari kubera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 rikaza gusubikwa kubera ibibazo bya COVID-19, ryasubukuriwe kuri Internet aho riri kubera kuva muri Kamena kugeza mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka.
Iserukiramuco Mpuzamahanga “Africa in Colors" byari byitezwe ko ryari kubera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 rikaza gusubikwa kubera ibibazo bya COVID-19, ryasubukuriwe kuri Internet aho riri kubera kuva muri Kamena kugeza mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka.
Iri serukiramuco ryatumiwemo abantu batandukanye barimo abazatanga ibiganiro, mu bamaze kumenyekana harimo Kareem Biggs Burke, mubyara wa Jay-Z uri no mu buyobozi bwa Roc Nation, sosiyete y’uyu muraperi.
Uyu byitezwe ko azatanga ikiganiro ku bijyanye no kwigisha urubyiruko ibijyanye n’imikino y’ikoranabuhanga [video game], hakareberwa hamwe akamaro kayo ndetse n’uko yagira uruhare mu iterambere rya Afurika.
Briant Biggs washinze ikigo cya Unanimous Games azatanga ikiganiro tariki 9 Nyakanga 2020.
Si Biggs uzaba atanga ibiganiro muri iri serukiramuco gusa kuko muri iki cyiciro hatumiwe abantu banyuranye kandi bafite amazina akomeye.
Mu bakurikiranira hafi iyi mikino nka Kevin Meltzer washinze Big5games, Desire Koussawo n’abandi.
Avuga kuri Briant Biggs, Raoul Rugamba umwe mu bagize igitekerezo cyo gutangiza iri serukiramuco ndetse uri no mu bayoboye ikipe iri kuritegura yagize ati" Tukimumenyesha ko azaza kudufasha yarabyishimiye ndetse yavuze ko azifashisha iri serukiramuco kugira ngo harebwe uburyo yaba we cyangwa sosiyete ari mu buyobozi bwayo ya Roc Nation ya Jay-Z bashora imari muri Afurika by’umwihariko mu ruganda rw’imyidagaduro.
Ibiganiro aba bazagiramo uruhare bizaba tariki 9 Nyakanga 2020 mu gihe tariki 11 Nyakanga hazaba amarushanwa y’imikino izwi nka E Sports kugeza ubu yatumiwemo ibihugu icumi.
Usibye ibijyanye n’iyi mikino, iri serukiramuco rizarangira mu Ukuboza 2020 riri kubamo ibindi bikorwa nk’aho kuva tariki 24 Kamena 2020 kugeza 27 Kamena 2020 hari gutangwa amahugurwa ku ikoranabuhanga rya 3D.
Hitezwe ko nyuma y’ibi bikorwa hazakurikiraho ibitaramo byaba ibya muzika ndetse n’ibyo kumurika imideri bikomeye byose byitezwe ko bizaba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Rugamba yavuze ko baritekereje bagendeye ku kuba imyidagaduro muri Afurika itaratangira kubyazwa umusaruro uhagije ndetse n’abayihuriyemo usanga badafite uburyo bwo guhuza imbaraga.
Yagize ati "Ku Isi yose miliyari ibihumbi bibiri z’Amadorali ya Amerika zinjira zivuye mu ruganda rw’imyidagaduro ndetse ni uruganda rutanga akazi ku barenga miliyoni 26.
Muri Afurika uru ruganda rwinjiza 2% ugereranyije no ku Isi hose.
Ngiyo impamvu yatumye dutekereza uburyo twazamura uruganda rw’imyidagaduro muri Afurika.
Iri serukiramuco ziritabirwa n’abantu batandukanye bafite aho bahuriye n’imyidagaduro muri Afurika bakazatanga ibiganiro binyuranye mu rwego rwo gushakira hamwe uko uru ruganda rwatanga umusaruro uhagije kuri uyu mugabane.
Nyura hano ujye ukurikirana ibikorwa bya "Africa in Colors"
Kode yasohoye indirimbo yakomoye ku rukundo rw’uhura na benshi nyuma akabona umurutira abandi
Ngeruka Fayçal wahisemo kwiyita Kode ukorera umuziki mu Bubiligi, yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Hot Choco’ aho agaragaza umusore waryohewe n’urukundo rwe n’umukobwa aba yarihebeye.
Ngeruka Fayçal wahisemo kwiyita Kode ukorera umuziki mu Bubiligi, yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Hot Choco’ aho agaragaza umusore waryohewe n’urukundo rwe n’umukobwa aba yarihebeye.
Ni indirimbo yakozwe na Simeon Viot wakoze indirimbo nyinshi ziri kuri EP ye nshya.
Iyi ndirimbo ni urukurikirane rw’izindi zabanje ziri ku mbumbe y’indirimbo ze ziri kuri Extended Play yise ‘4J’.
avuga ko iri zina ari umubare w’abakobwa bakundanye nawe n’ibyishimo yabakuyeho kugeza arushinganye n’uwa kane.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yanditse izi ndirimbo ashushanya urugendo yagiranye n’abakobwa batatu bavuyemo umwe barushinze, banabyaranye.
Uwa mbere yamwise “Vitamina", akurikizaho uwitwa “Sheri", “Hot Choco" wamubereye uwo yifuzaga bemeranya kurushinga ari nawe waje kuvamo “Julieta" akaba ari nayo ndirimbo ya nyuma azasohora iri kuri ’EP’.
Ati “Hot Choco ni indirimbo ivuga ku rukundo rwanjye n’umukobwa w’uruhu rwiza, akaba ari umukobwa uzamviramo uwo nzakundana nawe.
Iyi ndirimbo ivuga ku mukobwa ufite uburanga kurusha abandi akanyongerera ikindi kintu abandi batampaye.
Nashakaga kugaragaza ko hari igihe uhura n’abantu batandukanye hakavamo umwe ukurutira abandi akaba ariwe mubana ubuziraherezo.
Kode ni umwe mu bamamaye cyane mu Rwanda mu muziki mu myaka irenga icumi ishize.
Yaririmbye indirimbo zitandukanye zakunzwe zirimo ‘Impeta’ yabaye n’ikirango kuri we, ‘Ikirungo’, ‘Ese uzabyihanganira’, ‘Igikomere’, ‘Sinzahinduka’ yakoranye na Urban Boyz n’izindi.
Uyu muhanzi aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko yatangije inzu nshya (label) ifasha abahanzi n’abanyamideli nyuma yo gushinga studio yise ‘Red Magic Studio’.
Kode yavuze ko yari amaze igihe asa nk’uhugiye mu bindi bikorwa nabyo bitari kure cyane y’umuziki ariko na none akaba atabonaga umwanya wo kwisanzura ngo akore indirimbo ariko ubu akaba yagarutse.
Reba indirimbo ya Kode nshya yise ‘Hot Choco’
Uko Kiliziya Gatolika yeguriwe ahahoze gereza ya 1930 ngo hubakwe katederali y’abantu 5000
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.
5 z’ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.
5 z’ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Ubusanzwe Katederali ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, aho ari nto ku buryo ibikorwa binini bitabasha kuhabera.
Umwaka ushize ubwo Musenyeri wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Antoine Kambanda, yimikwaga, ibirori byabereye muri Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Icyo gihe kandi yagaragarije abanya-Kigali, icyifuzo cyo kubaka ingoro y’Imana, Katederali y’umujyi kandi ihesha Imana icyubahiro.
Perezida Kagame na we witabiriye ibyo birori yemeye inkunga mu kubaka iyo katederali, yongeraho ko bishobotse yanubakwa ahantu hashya.
Ati “Tuzafatanya kuyubaka, twubake katederali nziza kandi icyo gihe nibikunda twanayubaka ahandi hashya, ariko bizava mu bushake bwa Kiliziya cyangwa mu bwumvikane tuzaba twagize mu gutera inkunga tugere kuri icyo cyifuzo kandi bidatinze.
Mu kiganiro Musenyeri Kambanda yagiranye na TVR, yashimiye Umukuru w’Igihugu ko imvugo ye ari yo ngiro, kubera ko ubu yabafashije bagahabwa ikibanza.
Ati “Nyuma y’aho twagiye dusaba tureba n’ubuyobozi bw’umujyi, n’ubwa Minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu idushinzwe, tugenda tureba ahashoboka mu mujyi atari kure y’umujyi, ariko kandi hanatunganye, habereye, hanashoboka".
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko byahuriranye n’uko ahahoze gereza ya 1930 hari ikibanza kandi ubuyobozi bw’umujyi bwifuza ko hakorerwa ikindi kintu.
Ati “Muri ibyo bintu rero byari byifujwe natwe twashyizemo igitekerezo cya katederali.
Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yarabyumvise kandi igitekerezo aragishyigikira tukaba tumushimira ko bahaduhaye ngo habe hakubakwa kiliziya ibereye umujyi".
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ubu harimo gukorwa igishushanyo kigendanye n’icyerekezo 2050 u Rwanda rufite.
Ati “Turateganya kiliziya yajyamo abantu 5000, ariko ikagira n’umwanya imbere ya kiliziya, iyo habaye nk’iminsi mikuru katederali igira umwanya imbere yayo aho abantu bashobora guteranira bageze nko ku 10 000 no kugeza kuri 20 000".
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko hataramenyekana agaciro kubaka iyi katederali izatwara.
Ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali buherutse gutangaza ko mu mpera za Gashyantare, igishushanyo kizaba cyarangiye, kikazaba cyerekana imiterere ya katederali, ubushobozi bwayo n’ibindi, ku buryo imirimo yo kubaka izaba yarangiye mu mpera za 2021.
Bwavuze kandi ko mu rwego rwo gusigasira ibimenyetso by’amateka by’inyubako, Kiliziya yasabwe gutanga igishushanyo cyerekana uburyo bateganya kubungabunga inyubako zishaje zihari.
Mgr Kambanda yemeje ko ibyo bumvikanyeho n’umujyi ari ugukora inyigo y’uburyo amateka ya gereza yajya agaragara no mu kuhasura abantu bakamenya amateka yahabaye n’uko hahindutse ahantu h’umugisha.
Avuga ko kuba ahari gereza hagiye kujya Kiliziya ‘nk’abakristu tubibonamo ubutumwa bukomeye, ni ukuvuga ngo ahari ahantu ho gucibwa n’urupfu, ubungubu hagiye kuba ahantu h’umukiro n’ubuzima’.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ahubatse katederali ya St Michel hataratekerezwa ikizahakorerwa kuko ari ibintu byo kwigwahoku bufatanye n’ubuyobozi.
Yahakanye kandi ko aho bahawe ari ingurane ya St Michel.
Papa Francis yamaganye urupfu rwa George Floyd n’imvururu zarukurikiye muri Amerika
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika, Papa Francis yasabye ubworoherane n’ubwiyunge muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, no guhagarika imvururu n’ubugizi bwa nabi byakurikiye urupfu rw’umwirabura George Floyd.
Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika, Papa Francis yasabye ubworoherane n’ubwiyunge muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, no guhagarika imvururu n’ubugizi bwa nabi byakurikiye urupfu rw’umwirabura George Floyd.
Imijyi myinshi muri Amerika no hanze yayo irimo imyigaragambyo ikomeye yamagana irondaruhu nyuma y’urupfu rwa Floyd wishwe mu Cyumweru gishize, bikozwe n’umupolisi wamushikamiye akoresheje ivi kugeza aheze umwuka.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Papa Francis yavuze ko irondaruhu atari iryo kwihanganira, ariko yongeraho ko ubugizi bwa nabi nabwo ari inzira yo kwiyangiza no gusenya.
Yavuze ko urupfu rwa Floyd rubabaje ndetse ko ari kumusengera n’abandi bose bapfuye bazize “icyaha cy’ivanguramoko’.
Yagize ati “Nshuti zanjye ntabwo twakwihanganira cyangwa ngo twirengagize irondaruhu n’ihezwa ry’ubwoko bwose, hanyuma ngo tuvuge ko turengera igitinyiro cy’ubuzima bwa muntu.
Agaruka ku myigaragambyo yagaragayemo ubugizi bwa nabi imaze iminsi ikorwa muri Amerika, Papa yagize ati “Ni nako kandi tugomba kumenya ko ubugizi bwa nabi bumaze iminsi bwigaragaza, ari uburyo bwo kwiyangiza no kwitsinda.
Nta na kimwe wageraho ukoresheje ubugizi bwa nabi ahubwo wangiza byinshi.
Papa Francis yasabye abanyamerika kwiragiza Imana ikabafasha kugarura amahoro n’ubwiyunge.
Ni iki cyadutandukanya n’urukundo rw’Imana?
Iyo witegereje neza, ibibera mu isi ya none, ubona ibintu byinshi bitera kwibaza cyane! Turi mu isi yihuta cyane muri byinshi, turi mu isi irimo byinshi by’amayobera, turi mu isi irimo byinshi byarenze ubwenge bwa muntu.
Iyo witegereje neza, ibibera mu isi ya none, ubona ibintu byinshi bitera kwibaza cyane! Turi mu isi yihuta cyane muri byinshi, turi mu isi irimo byinshi by’amayobera, turi mu isi irimo byinshi byarenze ubwenge bwa muntu.
Muri urwo ruvangavange rw’ibishimisha, n’ibiteye ubwoba, ibibabaje ni iby’amayobera.
Abantu bagenda bishakira ibisubizo byabafasha kurenga ibyo byose, bakabishaka ku bubi na bwiza nubwo byabasaba kurenga cyangwa kwica nkana amategeko y’Imana cyangwa ayashyizweho kubera ineza y’abantu.
Nk’uko tubisanga mu gitabo cy’Abamakabe, ibyo babigereranije no guhatira abantu kurya inyama z’ingurube kandi zarabuzwaga n’amategeko(2Makabe7,1).
Twibuke ko kuva mu ntangiriro ubwo umuntu yiteshaga umubano mwiza yari afitanye n’Imana, icyaha cyahise gikwira isi, ni uko isi iba igushije ishyano guhera ubwo, amakuba, ibiza n’ibindi bizazane bigera ku kitwa icyaremwe cyose.
Uko muntu azarushaho kugenda atera Imana umugongo, abatuye isi ntituzabura kugenda duhura n’ingaruka z’uko kwivumbura no kwikorera ibyo twishakiye, uko ibihe bizahora bisimburana.
Pawulo Mutagatifu ati ibi ‘twabyongeraho iki’?
Twabishaka tutabishaka, ingaruka z’imigirire n’imyitwarire mibi ya muntu zigera kandi zizakomeza kugera ku cyaremwe cyose.
Abahatira abandi cyangwa bihatira ubwabo kurya kubyo bise inyama z’ingurube bazahoraho; ibintu bizayobya abantu n’ibizabagusha mu cyaha ntibizabura muri iyi si.
Niyo mpamvu Pawulo ahamagarira buri wese kubibona, kubyumva kandi akabyakira ariko ntihagire na kimwe kimukura mu mubano mwiza we n’Imana.
Aradushishikariza gukomeza guhanga amaso Imana ishobora byose.
Nimurebe namwe ukuntu ubutunzi burimo gutuma abantu bibagirwa Imana bakibagirwa n’abavandimwe.
Nimurebe ukuntu abantu bamaranira ikuzo n’icyubahiro nyamara tuzi neza ko ikuzo, icyubahiro ari iby’Imana !Mutagatifu Thérèse w’Umwana Yezu ati"Imbere y’Imana usumba abandi ni upfukamye".
Yezu Kristu nawe yabiduhayemo urugero, ubwo yacaga bugufi akoza ibirenge by’abigishwa be kuwa kane Mutagatifu.
Arongera ati: “ushaka kuba mukuru yigire umugaragu w’abandi".
Ibyago by’amoko yose ,uburwayi budakira, inzara n’ibindi bitagira ingano hirya no hino ku isi, biteye ubwoba, birahangayikishije ku buryo hari abafashe ibyemezo byo kwigira ku Mana ivuga y’ibitangaza ibabeshya umukiro w’akanya gato, nuko bitandukanya burundu na nyagasani Imana isumba byose, umuremyi w’ijuru n’isi.
Bamwe byabateye kwishyira hejuru, abandi batera Imana n’ibyayo umugongo, nuko bihimbira Imana zindi barazisenga ndetse bagahatira n’abandi kuziyoboka no kuzisenga.
Pawulo Mutagatifu we amaze kubibona, amurikiwe na Roho Mutagatifu, yateruye ashize amanga aburira abantu bo mugihe cye ndetse nabo mu gihe kizaza.
Ati “niba Imana turi kumwe ninde waduhangara"?
Kuri we kubana n’Imana mu buzima bwacu, tukayizirikaho, nicyo cyadutsindira ibi byose.
Pawulo arahamya ashize amanga, ko nubwo ibyo byose biba, bikatugwirira rimwe na rimwe nta ruhare tubigizemo, Imana idukunda ihorana umugambi wo kudukiza no kuturengera, igihe cyose.
Cyane cyane kubayemera n’abayikomeyeho, kandi yarabigaragaje, ubwo yatangaga Yezu kristu ngo acungure muntu.
(Rom 8,32).
Ntacyo tuzayiburana, ntacyo itazadukorera nidukomeza kubana nayo, amizero yacu yose tukayashyira muri yo.
Ibiteye ubwoba bizaza, ibyorezo bize, inzara, n’ibindi.
Ati“Nyamara muri ibi byose, turatsinda kakahava tubikesha uwadukunze kandi ukomeza kudukunda" (Rm8,39).
Bakristu bavandimwe, baca umugani mu kinyarwanda ngo "Uwigiza nkana arara butunda areba ikirago".
Yezu yaravuze ati “Imbuto y’ingano iyo itaguye mu gitaka ngo ihugute ikomeza kuba yonyine".
Kuki twakwirengagiza ingero nziza z’abantu cyagwa abakurambere bacu mu kwemera babayeho mu bihe bitandukanye, bagahura na byinshi bibarenze, nyamara nti ‘bateshuke inzira nziza, yo gukomeza kubaha no kumvira Imana muri byose.
Nk’uko tubisanga mu Ivanjili ya Yohani, Yezu Kristu aratubwira kandi atwereka ko ibitubaho byose, atari ukugira ngo bitubere impamvu yo gucumura, cyangwa guhunga Imana, ahubwo arifuza ko byatuma turushaho gukomera no kwera imbuto, mu bukristu bwacu, kandi zikagirira bose akamaro.
Ati “imbuto y’ingano iyo itaguye mu gitaka ngo ihugute, ikomeza kuba yonyine" (Yoh 12, 24).
Ingero ni nyinshi, mu gitabo cy’Abamakabe batubwiye uko abavandimwe barindwi banze rwose kwica amategeko, no guhemukira Imana y’abasekuruza, maze bagahitamo gupfa bababaye ariko bafite icyizere cy’ubuzima buzahoraho.
Urundi rugero, ni urw’abavandimwe bahowe Imana i Bugande, bakemera kuzira kumvira Imana, aho kuyisuzugura no kuyisimbuza amakuzo y’isi.
Twibuke kandi tuzirikane ubutumwa bw’Umubyeyi Bikiramariya i Kibeho, yaravuze ati “Umwana wa Bikiramariya ntatana n’Umusaraba".
None se bavandimwe, ni iki koko mubona cyadutandukanya n’Imana, n’urukundo idukunda?
Nituzirakane ko habaho ijoro hakabaho n’amanywa, tureke gushaka ko hahoraho amanywa gusa, ibihe biha ibindi; imvura iragwa, izuba rikava.
Tuzirikane ko nta cyasimbura Imana, mu buzima bwa muntu.
Twihatire kubana nayo, tuvugurura amasezerano atandukanye twagiye tugirana nayo mu bwicishe bugufi, nk’uko bavuga mu Kinyarwanda ngo “uwicisha bugufi ahinga itongo ry’inkuba".
Ibihinda, ibyorezo, ibiza, ibintu byinshi by’amayobera, bizaza kandi bigende uko byaje.
Mu kinyarwanda baravuga kandi bati“agasozi kanyerera ugatega Kamena na Nyakanga".
Nti mukuke umutima uwo ni Nyagasani Yezu ubivuga, ati “nimwemere Imana nanjye munyemere".
Dusenge: Nyagasani Yezu Kristu, Wahoraga ubwira intumwa zawe uti ‘mwigira ubwoba, ntihakagire ikibahagarika umutima kuko muri kumwe’.
Uhe abatuye isi imbaraga, zo kukugarukira no kubana nawe mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Muri iyi si yuzuye byinshi bishaka kutujyana kure yawe, kuko tutari kumwe twarindagira tukayoba, kuko tutifuza ko hari na kimwe cyadutangukanya nawe, wowe ubaho ugategeka iteka ryose.
Padiri Gilbert UWIZEYIMANA
Abayobozi bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu (Amafoto)
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Aya masengesho yitabiriwe n’abagera kuri 700, abaye mu gihe u Rwanda rusoje icyerekezo 2020 cy’iterambere, no gutangiza icyerekezo 2050.
Ategurwa n’Umuryango, Rwanda Leaders Fellowship, akaba afite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Imiyoborere Izana Impinduka:Kwishimira aho tugeze-Dutegura ejo hahaza.
Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagasangira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu n’abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ry’Imana.
Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa kitabirwa n’abayobozi batandukanye n’abandi.
Ay’uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bagashyirwa mu maboko y’Imana.
Aya masengesho abaye ahurirana kandi n’igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwarihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020.
Hagendewe kuri iyi nsanganyamatsiko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwagenzwe, ariko no kureba aho baganisha igihugu.
Agamije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo n’abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe n’indangagaciro z’Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere.
Mu masengesho y’umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo areberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyiriye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwaki.
Yagize ati “Njye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuzashorera abantu barwaye bwaki, bashonje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti ‘Mana ng’aba abantu bawe wanshinze’.
Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo.
Numva bidakwiye.
Kugira ngo utazashorera abantu bameze batyo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni.
Mugomba kugira isoni.
Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukazibura bikwiriye kugutera isoni.
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro y’imikorere hagati y’abayobozi n’abayoborwa.

Papa Francis yanze icyifuzo cyo kuba abapadiri ku bagabo bafite abagore muri Amazon
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ubuke bw’abapadiri.
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ubuke bw’abapadiri.
Abasenyeri bo muri ako gace bari bashyigikiye uwo mwanzuro umwaka ushize, ariko byagombaga kwemezwa na Papa.
Ubusanzwe abapadiri ba Kiliziya Gatolika basabwa gukomeza kuba imanzi igihe cyose bahamagariwe uwo murimo.
Ubwo abagabo muri Amazon basabirwaga kwemererwa kuba abapadiri bafite abagore, byararwanyijwe cyane mu bice by’Uburayi na Amerika, bavuga ko byaba biganisha ku kwemerera abapadiri bose ku isi gushaka abagore ari umwe mu myihariko Kiliziya yari ifite.
Itangazo ryavuye i Vatikani rigira riti “Amazon yaduhaye umukoro, Papa arandika, agamije ko tuva mu kibazo gihari bya nyabyo aho kwinezeza mu bisubizo bitanga umuti w’ikibazo igice.
Papa yavuze ko hakenewe abapadiri bumva neza ikibazo kiri muri Amazon n’umuco wo muri ako gace.
Yasabye abashumba gusengera abantu ngo bagire umuhamagaro w’ubupadiri ku bwinshi.
Umwaka ushize abasenyeri 184 bahuriye i Vatikani biga ku hazaza ha Kiliziya mu gace ka Amazon.
Hanaganiriwe niba abagabo bakuze n’abashatse abagore bakwemererwa kuba abapadiri.
Bivugwa ko nibura 85 % by’uduce two muri Amazon batabasha guhimbaza misa buri cyumweru kubera ko nta bapadiri bahagije bahari.
Hari abavuga ko babona padiri rimwe mu mwaka.
Ntabwo Yezu yagusize bupfubyi
Ababaye imfubyi nibo bazi uko bubabaza.
Yezu ntabwo ashaka ko abe baba mu kababaro, ahubwo yabahaye umuhoza, umurengezi.
Byashyizweho akadomo ku munsi wa mirongo itanu Pasika ibaye ubwo Abayahudi bahimbazaga umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti.
Ababaye imfubyi nibo bazi uko bubabaza.
Yezu ntabwo ashaka ko abe baba mu kababaro, ahubwo yabahaye umuhoza, umurengezi.
Byashyizweho akadomo ku munsi wa mirongo itanu Pasika ibaye ubwo Abayahudi bahimbazaga umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti.
Mu gihe cya Yezu bawuhimbazaga bibuka umunsi bahaweho amategeko ku musozi wa Sinayi.
Muri iki gihe abakristu bawuhimbaza bazirikana Roho Mutagatifu amanukira ku Ntumwa.
Roho w’Imana, ni we wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze
Roho Mutagatifu atuma tugira ubugingo bw’Imana, akatubera urumuri rutwumvisha Inkuru nziza ya Yezu Kristu kandi akaduha imbaraga zo kuyikurikiza twishimye!Ku buryo bwuzuye, Roho Mutagatifu yamenyekanye nyuma ya Pasika kandi amenyekanisha Imana Data na Mwana.
Mbere ya Pasika ye, Yezu yatangaje iyoherezwa ry’undi Muvugizi (Umurengezi), ari we Roho Mutagatifu.
We watangiye umurimo we kuva mu gihe cy’iremwa ry’ijuru n’isi akaba ari We kera wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze , ubu noneho ari kumwe n’abigishwa kandi akaba muri bo (Yh 14,26), kugira ngo abigishe kandi abayobore mu kuri kose (Yh 16, 13).
Nuko rero, Roho Mutagatifu agaragazwa nk’Undi ufitanye isano na Yezu na Se.
Inkomoko ihoraho ya Roho Mutagatifu yigaragariza mu butumwa bwe ku isi.
Roho Mutagatifu wohererejwe intumwa na Kiliziya yatumwe n’Imana Data mu izina rya Yezu, yoherezwa kandi na Mwana ubwe amaze gusubira kwa Se.
Iyoherezwa rya Roho Mutagatifu nyuma y’ikuzwa rya Yezu, rihishura byuzuye ibanga ry’Ubutatu Butagatifu.
Ijambo Roho risobanura ijambo ry’igihebureyi Ruah , risobanura; umwuka, umuyaga.
Tugendeye kuri icyo gisobanuro tubona ingingo ebyiri z’ingenzi dusanga muri Bibiliya :
Iremwa rya mbere : « Imana ihuha mu mazuru yabo umwuka w’ubuzima » (Intg2,7) ; Habayeho irema ryo mu gihe cyahise, ivuka rya mbere ry’ubuzima mbere y’ibihe.
Iremwa rya nyuma : Turisanga kwa Ez 37,9), hagira hati «Uhoraho aravuga ati :Wa mwuka we, turuka mu mpande zose uko ari enye uhuhera kuri iyi mirambo maze yongere ibeho » Hazabaho irema ryo mu gihe gishya, ukuzuka kwa nyuma, ku munsi w’imperuka maze ubuzima bwongere bwigaragaze.
Ntabwo guhumeka bikorwa rimwe gusa mu mwaka
Umunsi wa mbere w’icyumweru Inzugi z’aho abigishwa ba Yezu bari bari zari zifunze kubera gutinya abayahudi.
Nuko Yezu agira atya ahagarara hagati yabo, arababwira , ati « nimugire amahoro».
(Yh20, 19-20) Ni ukuvuga ko isi nshya n’ikiremwa gishya byavutse ; ni intangiriro nshya ! Imana yafashe muntu mu biganza byayo, imurema bundi bushya, mu ibumba rishyashya ryuje urukundo n’amahoro kandi ritsinda ubwoba.
Abakristu rero, guhera ubwo ntibahwemye guhura, buri munsi wa mbere w’icyumweru.
Kuva ku cyumweru kugera ku kindi.
Kiliziya yavutse kuri iryo huriro rya buri gihe, rikiriho kugeza na n’ubu.
Abakristu bakora iryo huriro buri cyumweru, kugeza igihe Yezu azagarukira.
Ntabwo dukwiye gufata icyumweru nk’aho ari itegeko gusa, ahubwo dukwiye kugifata nk’icya ngombwa kandi cy’ingenzi mu buzima bwacu.
« Birakwiye guhumeka umwuka muzima buri gihe » Ntabwo guhumeka bikorwa rimwe gusa mu mwaka.
N’ubwo duhimbaje Pentekosti Kiliziya Insengero n’Imisigiti bifunze kubera Coronavirus, ntibikwiye ko twakwibagirwa uwo munsi w’Imana, mu rugo iwacu Roho Mutagatifu arahadusanga.
Bavandimwe hariho irema rya buri munsi , Roho w’Imana ahora arema kandi agatanga ubugingo.
Umwuka wera/Roho Mutagatifu ni ubuzima.
Umwuka ni ikigereranyo rusange cy’Imana n’ibikorwa byayo mu bantu.
Ikiriho cyose gihumeka kifitemo ubuzima.
Ni ishusho igaragara y’Imana itugabira ubuzima ! Ubwo buzima butangirira muri Batisimu bukuzurizwa mu Butatu Butagatifu.
Yezu na we yagiye akoresha icyo kigereranyo gifatika cy’umuyaga, kugira ngo yumvishe Nikodemu (natwe twese) igikorwa gishya gihebuje cy’Uwitwa Umwuka w’Imana, ari we Roho w’Imana (Yh 3, 5-8).
Roho w’Imana twasezeranyijwe
Roho Mutagatifu Yezu ubwe yagiye amuvuga ku buryo bwinshi.
Hari aho yamwise umuvugizi, bisobanura « Ubana na twe », ahandi amwita Umurengezi (Yh 14,16.
Ubusanzwe iryo zina ‘Umuvugizi’ risobanurwa ko ari Umuhoza, kuko Yezu ari we Muhoza w’ibanze.
Ni Roho Nyir’ukuri (Yh 16, 13).
Ni we uyobora ku kuri kose, kuko atavuga yitumirije ahubwo avuga ibyo yumvise byose, kandi akaduhanurira n’ibizaza.
Uwo Roho asesekara kuri buri wese akurikije icyo amukeneyeho ariko byose akabyuzuriza muri Kiliziya ye, ariyo Pawulo yita umubiri umwe.
Pawulo ati « Umubiri ni umwe kandi ugizwe n’ingingo nyinshi ariko izo ngingo zose n’ubwo ari nyinshi zigize umubiri umwe» (1Kor1,12).
Abantu ni magirirane, baruzuzanya mu ngabire buri wese afite.
Kristu niwe waduhurije hamwe mu rukundo n’amahoro bimwe isi idatanga.
Bwa bumwe abantu batereye i Babeli (Ing11,1-10) bwaragarutse, bose bakumva kimwe (Intu 2,8-11), maze biba incamarenga y’ubutumwa Yezu yahaye intumwa ze bwo kwigisha amahanga yose.
(Yh20, 21-22).
Ubwo bumwe twese nibwo duhamagariwe kugaragaza ; kuko twabatirijwe muri Roho umwe ngo tube umubiri umwe (1Kor12,13).
Nk’uko Data yantumye, nanjye ndabatumye (Yh20, 21)
Muntu nk’ ikiremwa cy’Imana kidasanzwe kiri hagati y’ibindi biremwa, yagiye agaragaza ko abisumbye ndetse akajya abikoresha icyo ashaka , ibi byaje kugera ubwo na we yicamo ibice ; hazamo agasuzuguro kuri bamwe, ubwikunde n’ubwikanyize maze yubaka umunara w’itandukaniro rye n’abo batari mu rwego rumwe.
N’ubwo isi yacu ishaka kuducamo ibice, Yezu We ashaka ko tuba umwe.
Yaba abayahudi cyangwa se Abagereki, yaba abacakara cyangwa se abigenga yaba abazungu, abarabu cyangwa se abirabura, twese twuhiwe Roho umwe (1Kor 12,13).
Uyu munsi tuributswa ko nubwo umubiri ugizwe n’ingingo nyinshi, zose zigize umuntu umwe.
Mu yandi magambo ni nk’aho twakwibutswa ko n’ubwo dutandukanye yaba ku ruhu, mu bwenge, mu bukungu,… ariko twese turi abantu.
Twese rero duhamagariwe kubahana, ntihakagire ugenera mugenzi we uko abaho.
Twese turi abantu, twese tuva amaraso y’umutuku, twese turapfa, twese tugaragaza amarangamutima, twese icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyaradukanze.
Yezu arashaka ko dusubira ku isoko y’ubumwe, urukundo n’amahoro.
Buri wese ahamagariwe kubyamamaza, ni ubutumwa ahawe.
Dusenge: Roho Mutagatifu, Nyagasani utanga ubugingo, uturuka ku Mana Data na Mwana, usengwa agasingizwa hamwe n’Imana Data na Mwana, We wabwirije abahanuzi ibyo bavuze, nakomeze atuyobore, atwumvishe natwe ubumwe dufitanye nk’abantu twaremwe n’Imana imwe, bityo imbuto z’ubwo bumwe: urukundo, ibyishimo, amahoro, kwihangana, ubugwaneza, ubuntu, ubudahemuka, imico myiza no kumenya kwifata biganze iwacu.
Roho mutagatifu natuyobore.
Padiri Silivani SEBACUMI Padiri mukuru wa Paruwasi yisunze Mutagatifu Tereza w’Umwana Yezu, KABUGA, Diyosezi KABGAYI
Ese koko abantu bake nibo bazinjira mu ngoma y’ijuru?
Igihe Yezu yari agiye kuva kuri iyi si ngo asange Se, yasezeye ku Ntumwa ze, arababwira ati “Mbasigiye amahoro, mbahaye amahoro yanjye.
Ngiye kwa Data, kandi ngiye kubategurira imyanya, kwa Data hari imyanya myinshi".
Igihe Yezu yari agiye kuva kuri iyi si ngo asange Se, yasezeye ku Ntumwa ze, arababwira ati “Mbasigiye amahoro, mbahaye amahoro yanjye.
Ngiye kwa Data, kandi ngiye kubategurira imyanya, kwa Data hari imyanya myinshi".
Mbere y’uko agenda yasize abasezeranyije kuzaboherereza Roho Mutagatifu, uzabafasha muri uru rugendo.
Nuko arababwira ati “Namwe rero muzambere abagabo kuko twabanye kuva mu ntangiriro" (Yh 15, 26-27).
Kuva na kera Imana yagiye igendana n’abayo ngo bazaronke umukiro w’iteka.
Uhoraho abwira umuryango we ati“ Dore nzohereza umumalayika wanjye imbere yawe, kugira ngo akurinde mu rugendo, maze azakwinjize mu gihugu naguteguriye" (Iyim 23, 20-21).
Uwo Malayika w’Imana niwe ukuza ingabire za Roho Mutagatifu muri twe, zituma tumenya gutandukanya ikibi n’’icyiza.
Gukora icyiza cyonyine ni yo nzira nyayo izatugeza mu ijuru.
Ni inzira itoroshye kuko kuyisoza ari ubutwari.
Ijambo ry’Imana rigira riti “Nimwihatire kwinjira mu muryango ufunganye, kuko umuryango wagutse n’inzira y’igihogere ari byo bijyana mu cyorezo, kandi abahanyura ni benshi.
Mbega ukuntu umuryango ugana mu bugingo ufunganye, n’inzira ijyayo ikaba impatanwa, maze bikabonwa na bake" (Mt 7, 13-14).
Erega ijuru si “ahantu" ahubwo ni “ukuntu".
Ijuru ni ukuntu tuzabana n’Imana mu munezero Udakama.
Ab’Imana ijuru baritangirira hano ku isi.
Bamwe bati“Twaremewe kuzajya mu ijuru, niho twese tuzishima iteka" ! Abandi bati: “umubare w’abagomba kujya mu ijuru waruzuye ni 144.
Abandi turaruhira ubusa"! Abavuga gutya bashingira ku Ijambo ry’Imana dusanga mu gitabo cy’Ibyahishuriwe Yohani Intumwa, ahanditse ngo “Nuko numva umubare w’abashyizweho ikimenyetso: abantu ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bo mu miryango yose y’Abayisiraheli" (Hish 7, 4).
Igisobanuro cy’umubare 144.
Tugendeye kuri Bibiliya, nk’uko twabisomye haruguru, uyu mubare ushushanya abagaragu b’Imana bashyizweho ikimenyetso ku gahanga.
Bakaba bahagarariye imiryango yose ya Isiraheli (umuryango mugari w’abana b’Imana): Isiraheli igizwe n’imiryango 12 yo mu Isezerano rya Kera n’imiryango 12 yo mu isezerano Rishya, ihagarariwe n’Intumwa 12 za Yezu.
Nkuko tubisanga henshi muri Bibiliya, iyo bashaka kuvuga abantu benshi baravuga ngo “Abantu igihumbi n’ibihumbagiza"! Niyo mpamvu ku buryo buhinnye umubare 144.
000 wavuye aha: (12x12) x 1000 = 144.
Ibi kandi bigashimangirwa n’ibyo benshi birengagiza gusoma nkana ku murongo wa cyenda, ahanditse ngo “Nyuma y’ibyo, mbona imbaga nyamwinshi y’abantu, umuntu atabashaga kubarura, iturutse mu mahanga yose, mu miryango yose, mu bihugu byose no mu ndimi zose.
Bari bahagaze imbere y’ubwami n’imbere ya Ntama, bambaye amakanzu yererana kandi bafashe imikindo mu ntoki " (Hish 7, 9-10).
N’ubwo abantu bazaronka ijuru ari benshi, ijuru riraharanirwa nk’uko twabibonye mu ntangiriro.
Bityo rizinjiramo abazaba bararikoreye, barangwa n’ibikorwa byiza n’imirimo yo gukiranuka.
Iki gihe turimo cyo guhangana n’ibyorezo bitandukanye, kitubere akanya keza ko kwitagatifuza ngo natwe tuzabarirwe muri abo bazinjira mu bwami bw’ijuru.
Baba bake cyangwa benshi, duharanire kuzabarirwa muri bo.
Igihembo cy’abeza
Ababaye kuri iyi si neza, bakera imbuto nziza kandi nyinshi igihembo cyabo kirateguwe: Nyagasani azababwira ati “Nimuze abahawe umugisha na Data, muhabwe Ingoma mwateguriwe kuva isi ikiremwa" (Mt 25, 34).
Maze bahabwe ubugingo bw’iteka.
Nyagasani azahanagura icyitwa amarira cyose ku maso yabo.
Nk’uko Ijambo ry’Imana ribihamya: Abazaba indahemuka kugeza ku ndunduro, Uhoraho azabambika ikamba ry’ubugingo (reba Hish 2, 10).
Kumvira amategeko y’Imana ni byo bizadukiza, ariko twiringire impuhwe z’Imana kuko n’ubundi ibikorwa byacu bitihagije.
Nta wajya aho ngo avuge ko ibikorwa bye byonyine bihagije ngo azaronke ubugingo bw’iteka.
Icy’ingenzi ni ukugira ukwemera ukwizera n’urukundo bishingiye ku kubana n’Imana igihe cyose.
Pawulo Mutagatifu ati “Bavandimwe muri Kristu Yezu, ndabinginze nimureke Imana ibigarurire" (2 Kor 5, 17-21).
Mva imbere sinakumenye
Igihe Yezu yanyuraga mu nsisiro yigisha yerekeza i Yeruzalemu, haje umuntu aramubaza ati “Mwigisha, koko abantu bake ni bo bazarokoka"?
Nuko aramusubiza ati “Muharanire kwinjira mu muryango ufunganye; ndabibabwiye: benshi bazagerageza kwinjira, ariko boye kubishobora" (Lk 13, 22-24).
Ngo abatarakiranutse ku isi bazakomanga bati “Shobuja, dukingurire, azabasubize ati: Sinzi iyo muturutse, nimumve imbere sinabamenye".
Bati: “Koko ntabwo utuzi! N’ukuntu twaririye kandi tukanywera imbere yawe, twitabiriye amasengesho n’amateraniro kenshi! Ndetse twigishije Ijambo ry’Imana mu izina ryawe! Kandi twafashaga abakene uko bitegetswe" (reba Lk 13, 25-28).
Nyamara uko dutakamba kube imfabusa kuko n’ubwo bibwira ko bakoze neza mu maso y’abantu, bitigeze binyura Imana.
Nyagasani, uzandinde iri jambo ngo: “Mva imbere sinakumenye"!
Isi izashira ryari?
Hari benshi birirwa bashyushya abantu imitwe ngo: “ibi byorezo kanaka yarabihanuye! Ngo isi irarangiye"! Ijambo ry’Imana riravuga riti “ Si mwe mugenewe kumenya ibihe n’amagingo Data yageneye ubutegetsi bwe bwite, ahubwo mugiye guhabwa imbaraga za Roho Mutagatifu uzabazamo, bityo muzambere abahamya hose kuko muzahabwa Roho ubamara ubwoba (reba Intu 1, 7-8; .
Ubwo abigishwa babazaga Yezu igihe isi izashirira, maze Imana igakora umurimo wayo wo guca imanza, yarabasubije ngo: “Uwo munsi cyangwa iyo saha, nta we ubizi, habe n’abamalayika habe ndetse na Mwana; bizwi n’Imana Data wenyine.
Mwe rero, nimwitonde kandi mube maso, kuko mutazi igihe bizabera" (Mk 13, 32-33).
Bavandimwe, ni byo koko isi izashira, ariko gusesengura iby’uko bizagenda tubiharire Imana kuko nta wasobanura ibikorwa byayo byose: “Nasanze ibyo yaremye byose biberanye n’igihe cyabyo; yahaye abantu kumenya ibyahise n’ibizaza, ariko badashobora gusesengura ibikorwa by’Imana byose uko bingana" (Umubw 3,11).
Tube maso kandi duhore twiteguye.
Dushakishe ubutungane mu gukora ibyiza bityo tuzaronke ubugingo bw’iteka, aho kubushakira mu nyigisho z’iterabwoba zishobora kuturangaza, tukazaburira aho abandi baronkeye (reba Sir 28, 6-7).
Dusenge: Nyagasani Mana, turi mu bihe bikomeye byo kwiheba no gucika intege, ibihe byo guhangana n’ingaruka z’ibyorezo bikomeye, turakwinginze bana natwe.
Wadusezeranyije kugendana natwe kandi utwoherereza Roho Mutagatifu ngo adutoze gukora ugushaka kwawe maze natwe tuzabarirwe mu bo wagize abawe.
Kuri wa munsi w’urubanza uzaturinde iri jambo ngo: “Nimumve imbere sinabamenye"! Turashaka kukumenya kurushaho ngo natwe uzatwibuke, maze utugabire ubugingo bw’iteka ukurikije n’ubundi impuhwe usanzwe utugirira.
Ku bwa Yezu Kristu umwami wacu, wazutse mu bapfuye maze igihe kigeze agasubira mu ijuru ngo ajye kudutegurira imyanya iwawe Dawe.
Padiri Victor AMERIKA
Bizibukwa mu mateka! Isengesho rya Eid al-Fitr ryabereye kuri Televiziyo y’Igihugu
Abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bifatanyije n’abandi ku Isi mu kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Eid al-Fitr usoza igisibo gitagatifu cya Ramadhan bari bamazemo ukwezi.
Abayisilamu bo mu Rwanda bifatanyije n’abandi ku Isi mu kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Eid al-Fitr usoza igisibo gitagatifu cya Ramadhan bari bamazemo ukwezi.
Byari bisanzwe bimenyerewe ko isengesho rusange ryo kwizihiza Eid al-Fitr ribera kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo no mu tundi duce two hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Warangwaga no kubona urujya n’uruza rw’Abayisilamu bambaye amakanzu y’urwererane, ubabona bose bafite akanyamuneza ku maso, basuhuzanya ubutitsa indamukanyo yifurizanya Eid el-Fitr nziza bagira bati “Eid Mubarak".
Kuri iyi nshuro uyu munsi iri sengesho ryizihirijwe kuri Televiziyo na Radio by’Igihugu, kubera ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Isengesho ryo kuri uyu wa 24 Gicurasi 2020 ryayobowe na Mufti w’u Rwanda, Sheikh Hitimana Salim.
Abayoboke b’Idini ya Islam bakaba barikurikiye bari mu ngo zabo kuko batashoboraga kujya mu misigiti kuko amakoraniro y’abantu benshi atemewe.
Mu butumwa bwe, Sheikh Hitimana yikije ku kwimakaza ubucuti hagati y’Abayisilamu na bagenzi babo.
Yanabibukije ko bakwiye kubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho na Guverinoma hagamijwe gukomeza kwirinda Coronavirus, anabasabira kugira ubuzima bwiza.
Isengesho ryanyuze ku bitangazamakuru by’igihugu ryishimiwe cyane ndetse bamwe bagaragaza ko ari intambwe ikomeye yatewe bitandukanye n’uko byakorwaga hambere.
Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, Abdul K.

Ni nkaho ntacyabaga cyabaye.
Ntibyashyirwaga mu itangazamakuru rya Leta.
Ni ishimwe ku Rwanda rushya kuko kuva mu 1994, isengesho ryerekanwa mu buryo bw’ako kanya.
Eid al-Fitr ni umunsi uba ari ikiruhuko ku bakozi bose mu Rwanda, inshuti n’abavandimwe bakishimana n’abayisilamu kuri uwo munsi mukuru.
Igisibo ni rimwe mu mahame atanu ya Islam risaba abayoboke baryo kwigomwa amafunguro, ibinyobwa mu bihe bisanzwe n’ibindi bibashimisha bakarangamira Imana.
Gusa bemerewe gufata ifunguro izuba rirenze no mu rukerera.
