Korali Iriba y’i Huye igiye kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Iyi korali yashinzwe ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1995, yatangijwe n’abantu 18.
Izina ryayo ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘‘Nta kibasha’’, ‘‘Witinya’’, ‘‘Turiho ku bw’ubuntu’’, ‘‘Urakomeye’’ na ‘‘Icyampa’’.
Mu kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze ishinzwe, Korali Iriba yatangije ibikorwa byagutse byiswe “IribaWeek" bibanziriza ibyo birori biteganyijwe ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020.
Korali Iriba yinjiye mu cyumweru cy’ibikorwa bibimburira isabukuru y’imyaka 25 biteganyijwe ku 3-9 Gashyantare 2020.
Ni icyumweru cyateguwemo ibikorwa byo kubakira ubwiherero imiryango itanu itishoboye n’ibindi bikorwa by’urukundo.
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo kubakira abatishoboye, Umuyobozi wa Korali Iriba, Mukasine Jeanne D’arc, yavuze ko bifuje kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati “Twahisemo noneho kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa kuko binazamura imibereho y’abantu, iki gikorwa kizakomeza n’ibindi twateguye.
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 15 Gashyantare, Korali Iriba izagira umwiherero wo gushima Imana, naho ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020 kuva saa Munani, ikore igitaramo cy’amashimwe akubiye muri Zaburi ya 107, kizabera ku rusengero rwa ADEPR Taba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abazacyitabira bazataramirwa na Korali Iriba ifatanyije na Korali Itabaza.
Umuvugabutumwa uzakibwirizamo ni Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Karuranga Ephrem.
Mu myaka 25, Korali Iriba ishima buri wese wagize uruhare mu kugira ngo umurimo ukomeze gutera imbere.
Korali Iriba igizwe n’abarenga 130 bari mu byiciro bitandukanye biganjemo abatuye mu duce two mu Mujyi wa Huye turimo Matyazo no ku Itaba n’abakorera mu bindi bice by’igihugu.
Mu myaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa, Korali Iriba yashyize hanze album enye z’amajwi n’eshatu z’amashusho.
Insengero zahawe icyizere cyo gukomorerwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwanzuro w’inama y’abaminisitiri uvuga ko “Insengero zizakomeza gufunga, abanyamadini barashishikarizwa gukomeza gushyiraho ingamba zo gukumira no kwirinda Covid-19, mu rwego rwo kwitegura kuba insengero zafungurwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere hashingiwe ku bizava mu isesengura ry’ubuzima".
Ni umwanzuro ufashwe nyuma y’uko mu cyumweru gishize Ihuriro ry’Amadini n’Amatorero mu Rwanda, RIC, ryandikiye Urwego rw’Imiyoborere (RGB), ryerekana zimwe mu ngamba ryiteguye kubahiriza hirindwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu gihe leta yaba ibakomoreye bagakomeza ibikorwa byo gusenga.
Tariki 28 Gicurasi uyu mwaka, iri huriro ryandikiye Minisitiri w’Intebe risaba ko amateraniro yo gusenga n’ibindi bikorwa by’imiryango ishingiye ku myemerere byakoroherezwa kugira ngo nabyo bitangire gukora.
Tariki 5 Kamena uyu mwaka, habaye inama yahuje abahagariye guverinoma n’ubuyobozi bwa RIC, yari iyobowe na Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase.
Iyo nama yari igamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku byifuzo bya RIC bijyanye n’ibikorwa byo gusenga muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus.
RIC yasabwe gutegura no kwerekana ingamba zigaragaza uko biteguye kwirinda Coronavirus mu nsengero, kiliziya n’imisigiti, kugira ngo zisuzumwe n’inzego za leta.
Ingamba abanyamadini bagaragaje mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Ubuyobozi bwa RIC bwandikiye RGB buyimenyesha ingamba bwatekereje zirimo gusukura inyubako zisengerwamo nka Kiliziya, urusengero cyangwa umusigiti mbere na nyuma yo guteraniramo, hakoreshejwe isabune n’amazi meza.
Hari kandi gushyiraho uburyo bwo gukaraba intoki, kandagira ukarabe cyangwa hand sanitizer, kugura utumashini dupima umuriro kandi abantu bagapimwa mbere yo kwinjira mu nyubako basengeramo, kwicaza mu rusengero basiga nibura metero imwe hagati y’umuntu n’undi, no kwambara udupfukamunwa mu bihe by’amateraniro.
Hari kandi gushyiraho abashinzwe gusukura ubwiherero n’abashinzwe gufasha abantu kubukoresha muri gahunda yo kubahiriza umuco wo gukaraba mbere na nyuma yo kubujyamo no kumenyesha imiryango igize RIC amabwiriza ajyanye na COVD-19 agomba gukurikizwa n’imiryango ishingiye ku myemerere.
Hari kandi ko iteraniro rimwe ritagomba kurenza amasaha abiri, ahasengerwa hakaba ari ahari hasanzwe habera amateraniro kandi hujuje ibisabwa.
Harimo no guteganya nibura isaha hagati y’amateraniro abera mu cyumba kimwe kugira ngo haboneke umwanya wo gusukura.
Inyandiko ikomeza igira iti “Muri ibi bihe haba hasukuwe amateraniro amwe gusa, (ayo ku cyumweru ku aba-porotesitanti, abagatolika, abarokore).
Ku wa Gatandatu ku Badivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi, no ku wa Gatanu ku Bayisilamu.
Andi materaniro yazatekerezwaho nyuma hashingiwe ku buryo abayoboke bagenda bubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda coronavirus n’uko icyorezo kizagenda gishira mu gihugu.
RIC ivuga ko usoma misa n’undi wese uyoboye gahunda, yakwemererwa kutambara agapfukamunwa mu gihe ahagaze imbere kandi hakubahirizwa nibura intera ya metero ebyiri.
Hari kandi ko buri rusengero rugabanya umubare w’abantu bayobora indirimbo hubahirizwa intera ninini nibura metero ebyiri mu gihe baririmba, gusuhuzanya abantu bahana amaboko no guhobera bikaba bibujijwe, gusangira cyangwa gukoresha mikoro rusange na byo ntibibe byemewe.
"Guhazwa byakorwa hakoreshejwe kwakira mu biganza, uhaza n’uhazwa bambaye udupfukamunwa kandi hagati yabo hari intera ya metero imwe.
Hari no gukomeza kwita ku ntera ya metero imwe abantu bajya gufata ukarisitiya".
Mu byo amadini yagaragaje, harimo ko “amateraniro ya nijoro, ibiterane binini by’ivugabutumwa ntibyemewe, gusengera mu byumba by’amasengesho rusange ntibyemewe, amateraniro y’abana ntiyemewe, amateraniro yo mu matorero-remezo ntiyemewe n’ibikorwa byo gusengera abantu barambikwaho ibiganza.
RIC Kandi yabwiye RGB ko byaba bibujijwe guhanahana ibikoresho, urugero gufata ibitabo by’indirimbo, Korowani na Bibiliya.
Mu rwego rwo kwirinda guhanahana icyibo cyangwa igiseke cy’amaturo, RIC ivuga ko hagomba gushishikarizwa abayoboke guturira kuri Mobile Money, Money Transfer, Bank Transfer no gushyiraho ibiseke bitazengeruka mu bantu.
Bavuga ko mu gihe cyo gushyingura umurikistu witabye Imana, byakorwa hubahirizwa amabwiriza rusange ya leta, isakaramentu ryo gushyingirwa mu rusengero ntirigomba kurenza abantu 50.
Kuri iyi ngingo ariko inama y’abaminisitiri yemeje ko ‘Imihango yo gushyingirwa mu nsengero iremewe ariko ikitabirwa n’abantu batarenze 30.
Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu izatanga amabwiriza arambuye kuri iyi ngingo’.
RIC yagaragaje ko abashyingirwa n’ababaherekeje bagomba ngo gukurikiza amabwiriza yose, bashishikarizwa kandi ntibakore ibirori nyuma yo gushyingirwa.
Batisimu ku bizera ba Gatolika yajya ikorwa uyihabwa n’uyitanga bambaye udupfukamunwa kandi igakorwa muri misa y’abantu bake hanubahirizwa intera ikwiye.
Mu gihe ibi bikorwa kandi byasubukurwa, abanyamadini bemeye ko umubatizo ku baporotestanti, abarokore n’abadivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi kuko bo bashyirwa mu mazi menshi muri rusange, waba uhagaritswe.
RIC ivuga ko Abayisilamu basabwa buri muntu kujya gusari yitwaje umukeka we muto wo gusengeraho, kugenda yitwaje ibikoresho byo gutawaza, gukoresha korowani yo muri telefoni no kudakora muri korowani cyangwa ibindi bitabo biri mu musigiti.
Ibinezaneza ku bayoboke b’amadini
Abayoboke b’amadini bari bamaze amezi atatu batagera mu nsengero, bavuga ko bizeye ko isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima nta kabuza rizabemerera gusubira mu nzu z’Imana kuko ingamba abanyamadini bafashe zisobanutse.
Kayitare Jean Claude wo muri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rutonde muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, yavuze ko nubwo misa zakomeje binyuze kuri radiyo na televiziyo, yishimiye kuba insengero zigiye kongera gufungura.
Ati “Hari abantu usanga gusengera mu rugo bibagora kubera ibibarangaza.
Kuba insengero zishobora kongera gufungurwa turabyishimiye cyane kandi turabishimira Imana".
Bazambanza Enock wo mu itorero ry’Abadivantisiti b’Umunsi wa karindwi, avuga ko mu materaniro hari inyigisho nyinshi bigira hamwe ariko kuba yari wenyine bitamushobokeraga.
Ati “Dufatanya kwiga ijambo ry’Imana, tugasengera hamwe nk’umuryango wayo.
Ni ibinezaneza byinshi kuba Imana ikoze ibitangaza tukaba tugiye gusubira mu nzu yayo".
Korali Shalom y’i Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ibimburira iziri kuri album yayo nshya
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Iyi ndirimbo yiswe “Wampaye amahoro’’ yubakiye ku buhamya bw’abantu Imana yatuye imitwaro yari ibaremereye ikabaha amahoro yo mu mutima, bakaba basigaye bagenda bemye.
Korali Shalom imaze kugwiza igikundiro mu ruhando rw’abakunzi b’umuziki uhimbaza Imana iri mu zigezweho muri ADEPR.
Urukundo igirirwa rwazamuwe n’indirimbo zifitemo ubutumwa bwururutsa imitima y’abababaye zirimo “Nzirata’’, “Abami n’abategetsi’’, “Nzamamaza", ‘‘Nyabihanga’’ n’izindi.
‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni indirimbo ya mbere igiye hanze yatanzwe nk’impano ku bakunzi b’ibihangano bihimbaza Imana mu mwaka wa 2020.
Visi Perezida wa Korali Shalom, Ngamijimana Charles, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo itangiza umushinga wa album nshya iri gutegurwa.
Yagize ati “Indirimbo yitwa ‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni yo twatangiranye umwaka wa 2020, ibimburiye izindi ziri kuri album y’amajwi y’indirimbo umunani izajya hanze mu 2020.
Ubutumwa buri muri iki gihangano cy’iminota ine n’amasegonda 52 buganisha ku ‘mahoro atangwa n’Uwiteka ku wamwisunze arushye.
Ngamijimana yavuze ko uyu mwaka bazakomeza kwegera abakunzi b’ibihangano byabo no kubategurira ibikorwa byagutse cyane ko mu 2019, Korali Shalom yibanze cyane mu ngendo z’ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ntitwagiye kure y’abakunzi bacu.
Uyu mwaka dufitemo igitaramo cyagutse turi gutegura.
Umwaka ushize twawuhariye ingendo, twagiye aho twatumiwe kuvuga ubutumwa.
Korali Shalom yakoreye ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu birimo ibitaramo yakoreye mu turere twa Rubavu (Rubona), Rwamagana (Rwikubo), Musanze (Nyarubande), Huye (Matyazo) no mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho yaririmbye mu Umucyo Live Concert yabereye muri Dove Hotel, Ibihamya Live concert yabereye muri ADEPR Gatenga, mu Bibare i Remera no kuri Maison des Jeunes Kimisagara aho batangiye ubutumwa mu gikorwa cyo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Umwaka wa 2019 wayibereye mwiza kuko yanakoze ibitaramo mu yandi madini arimo irya Methodiste Libre n’iry’Abangilikani mu Giporoso kwa Rev.
Pasiteri Rutayisire Antoine.
Yanaremeye abatishoboye aho yakoreye umuganda rusange mu Karere ka Nyabihu.
Korali Shalom imaze imyaka 34 itangijwe ni ubuheta mu makorali y’i Nyarugenge nyuma ya Hoziana yayitanze mu ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo.
Yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali y’abana bato, yitwaga “Umunezero".
Icyo gihe muri ADEPR Nyarugenge hari korali nkuru imwe ariyo Hoziyana.
Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina, ifata “Shalom" rimaze gushinga imizi.
Iyi korali imaze gukora album enye z’amajwi n’ebyiri z’amashusho.
Iya kabiri iriho indirimbo umunani izamurikwa mu 2020.
Amashusho yayo yafatiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye cya Korali Shalom cyiswe ‘‘Imbere ni heza’’ cyabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu 2018.
Korali Shalom igizwe n’abaririmbyi 105 hatabariwemo ababa hanze y’u Rwanda.
Umva hano indirimbo ya Korali Shalom
Abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga bateguriwe igiterane kiziga ku kibazo cy’ingo zisenyuka
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘‘Ukuri n’amahoro mu bashakanye’’ cyateguwe n’Umuyobozi wa River Ministry, Mukabaramba Jacky afatanyije n’umugabo we.
Giteganyijwe kubera kuri Kigali Convention Centre ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020, aho kizatangira saa kumi n’imwe n’igice z’umugoroba.
Abazacyitabira bazaganirizwa n’Umuyobozi wa Evangelical Restoration Church ku Isi, Apôtre Joshua Ndagijimana Masasu n’umufasha we Pasiteri Lydia Masasu.
Aba bombi baheruka kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 30 bamaze babana nk’umugabo n’umugore mu birori byabaye mu Ukuboza 2019.
Iki giterane cyahuriranye n’Umunsi w’Abakundana, cyanatumiwemo abahanzi bagezweho barimo James na Daniella bakunzwe cyane mu ndirimbo “Mpa amavuta", “Nkoresha" n’izindi n’abandi barimo Arsene Tuyi waririmbye “Naranyuzwe", “Icyaremwe gishya" ndetse na Irimbere Christian ugezweho mu yitwa “Obligado" na “Ndi hano".
Umuyobozi wa The River Ministry, Mukabaramba akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo yabwiye IGIHE ko yahisemo gutegura iki gikorwa bitewe n’izamuka ry’ingo zisenyuka.
Uyu mubyeyi wanditse igitabo “Izahabu ihishe mu muryango" ni na we uyobora abagore kuri Restoration Church Masoro.
Yagize iyerekwa ashaka kongera guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abandi bari mu nzira yo kurwubaka kugira ngo baganire uko bakubaka ingo zihamye zubakiye ku rufatiro rutanyeganyezwa.
Imibare y’inkiko igaragaza ko gatanya zizamuka ubutitsa kuko kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2018, hari hamaze gucibwa imanza za gatanya 1311, ni ubwikubwe bw’inshuro 19 ugereranyije n’umwaka wa 2017.
Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016 ingo zatandukanye zari 21, mu 2017 ziba 69; yerekana ko gatanya zikubye inshuro 62 bingana na 6,200% mu myaka itatu ishize.
ERC ni itorero rishingiye ku musingi wo kubaka umuryango uhamye, aho imfubyi ibonera umubyeyi, umupfakazi akagira umwitaho.
Ihishurirwa ryo kuritangiza Apôtre Masasu yarihawe mu 1984, aza kurishinga mu 1994.
Amafaranga yo kwinjira muri iki giterane ku bashakanye ni 30 000 Frw ku bagura amatike mbere naho abazayagura uwo munsi ni 35 000 Frw; itike ku muntu umwe ni 15 000 Frw ariko izazamurwa ku 20 000 Frw.
Inkomoko y’umusaraba wifashishwa cyane mu madini ya Gikirisitu
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Ku madini aha agaciro cyane umusaraba ndetse akawufata nk’ikimenyetso cy’ibanze kiranga imyemerere yabo, bashingira ku kuba ari wo Yezu/Yesu Kirisito yabambweho bityo ukaba ari ikimenyetso cy’ugucungurwa kwabo.
Ibimenyetso byinshi biri mu nzu ndangamurage y’Abongereza birimo ibigaragaza Imana kazi y’Abagiriki ba kera iri iruhande rw’Umusaraba byerekana ko umusaraba wabayeho ibinyejana byinshi mbere y’ivuka ry’amadini ya Gikirisitu ndetse bikemezwa ko ufite inkomoko mu Abanya-Babuloni ba kera mbere y’uko ukwira mu bindi bice by’Isi.
Umusaraba wa mbere y’Ubukirisitu wakoreshwaga nk’ikimenyetso mu madini gakondo y’Abanyamisiri, Abanya-Syria n’Abagiriki.
Uyu musaraba wa mbere wari mu bwoko bubiri uzwi nka ‘Tau Cross’ wabaga ukoze nk’inyuguti nkuru ya T’ yo mu Kigiriki ndetse n’undi witwaga ‘fylfot cross’.
Uyu musaraba wa Tau niwo wakoreshwaga cyane n’abapagani gusa nyuma uza gutangira gukoreshwa n’Abakirisitu bo mu Misiri.
Umusaraba waje kuba gute ikimenyetso gikomeye kiranga Abakirisitu ?
Mu kinyejana cya 4, Umwami w’Abami Constantine yemeye Ubukirisitu ndetse yemeza ko hakwiye gushakishwa ahantu hari n’ibintu bifite amateka y’ingenzi mu buzima bwa Yezu.
Muri iki gikorwa cyo kuvumbura ahantu hafite amateka ku buzima bwa Yezu nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru ko Nyina wa Costantine witwaga Helene yavumbuye ibice by’umusaraba, ndetse biza kwemezwa ko ari iby’umusaraba wa Yezu kuko habaye igitangaza cy’uko ubwo byavumburwaga hari umugore wabikozeho arakira.
Kuva icyo gihe kubambwa kwa Yezu no gupfira ku musaraba byatanze isura nshya ku musaraba kuko gusa watangiye kwifashishwa mu nsengero ndetse nyuma ya Costantine ugirwa ikimenyetso kiranga Ubukirisito.
N’ubwo kugeza uyu munsi amadini menshi afata umusara nk’ikimenyetso gikomeye kuko ari wo Yezu yabambweho, hari andi makuru avuga ko Icyo Yesu Kirisito yabambweho ari igiti gisanzwe cy’Inginga aho kuba umusaraba.
Izi mpaka z’icyo Yesu yaba yabambweho mu by’ukuri ntizigarukira mu nyigisho z’amadini gusa kuko na Bibiliya iyo zigeze ku murongo uvugamo umusaraba ziranyuranya.
Bibiliya ntagatifu ikunze gukoreshwa cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika,ivuga ko igihe Yezu Yesu yicwaga, abamwitegerezaga baramunnyeze, maze bamushinyagurira bamusaba ko niba afite ubushake yakwikura kumusaraba.
Hari aho igira iti “Wowe usenya Ingoro y’Imana, ukongera kuyubaka mu minsi itatu, ikize ubwawe niba uri Umwana w’Imana, maze umanuke ku musaraba.
Abatware b’abaherezabitambo na bo bakamuseka, n’abigishamategeko, n’abakuru b’umuryango, bati ‘Yakijije abandi, none ntashoboye kwikiza ubwe!’Harya ngo ni Umwami wa Israheli, ngaho namanuke ku musaraba tumwemere!".
Ibi Bibiliya ntagatifu ivuga ibihuza na Bibiliya Yera ariko byagera kuri Bibiliya ikoreshwa n’Abahamya ba Yehova yo aho kuvuga ijambo umusaraba ivuga Igiti cy’Umubabaro.
Bagira bati “Wowe ngo wari gusenya urusengero ukarwubaka mu minsi itatu, ngaho ikize! Niba uri Umwana w’Imana, manuka kuri icyo giti cy’umubabaro!"
Abo muri mu madini atemera ibijyanye n’umusaraba bavuga ko Bibiliya Yera na Bibiliya Ntagatifu ubwo zashyirwaga mu Kinyarwanda, bashafe ijambo ry’Ikigiriki ‘Stauros’ risanzwe rivuga ingiga y’igiti akaba ariryo bahinduramo umusaraba.
James na Daniella bahurije couple z’abaramyi mu gitaramo cy’amateka gitegerejwe i Kigali
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe.
Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe.
Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple z’abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert" gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise “Mpa Amavuta’’ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, René Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri.
Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho.
Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano w’urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Aba bombi iyo bavuga amateka yabo bavuga ko batangiye baririmbana ariko mu 2019 bakaza gufata umwanzuro wo gutangira kuririmba nyuma y’uko baririmbiraga mu rugo bakumva ni byiza cyane.
James ati “Twararirimbaga tutarabana ubundi tugahurira mu matsinda atandukanye.
Tumaze kubana dutangira kujya turirimbana ariko bitari mu buryo bweruye.
Uyu mwaka nibwo nk’itsinda ryacu nibwo twagiye muri studio dukora indirimbo ya mbere twise ‘Mpa Amavuta’.
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 cyangwa 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga iby’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga Ibaruramari.
Ati “Twamenyanye kera kuko twari abaturanyi Kimironko nyuma tugiye kwiga muri Uganda nibwo twaje kubana.
Mu 2008 cyangwa 2009 nibwo twamenyanye noneho mu 2012 tujya kwiga kaminuza, tuyirangiza mu 2015 aba ari nabwo tuba umuryango.
Ubu bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo ‘Mpa Amavuta’ bahereyeho imaze no kurebwa n’abasaga miliyoni ku rubuga rwa Youtube, “Nkoresha", “Ububyutse" na “Narakijijwe".
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo w’Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert" ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.
Reba ‘Mpa Amavuta’ ya James&Daniella
Ese koko Yezu ari mu Ukaristiya?
Kimwe mu byo abakristu ba mbere bazize mu ntangiriro ya Kiliziya ni ugushyira mu bikorwa iri jambo Yezu yivugiye ubwe ati “Ndababwira ukuri koko: nimutarya umubiri w’umwana w’umuntu ntimunywe n’amaraso ye, ntimuzagira ubugingo muri mwe" (Yh 6, 53).
Ibyo rero byatumye babarega, barabahiga, barabatoteza ngo barya abantu.
Icyakora iyo urebye neza, kwari ukudasobanukirwa neza n’ayo magambo ya Yezu bwite.
Kimwe mu byo abakristu ba mbere bazize mu ntangiriro ya Kiliziya ni ugushyira mu bikorwa iri jambo Yezu yivugiye ubwe ati “Ndababwira ukuri koko: nimutarya umubiri w’umwana w’umuntu ntimunywe n’amaraso ye, ntimuzagira ubugingo muri mwe" (Yh 6, 53).
Ibyo rero byatumye babarega, barabahiga, barabatoteza ngo barya abantu.
Icyakora iyo urebye neza, kwari ukudasobanukirwa neza n’ayo magambo ya Yezu bwite.
Nk’uko Papa Piyo wa 12 yabisobanuye mu Ibaruwa ye “Mystici Corporis Christi", Ukaristiya ni umubiri wuje ikuzo wa Yezu Kristu udusabanya na we.
Ni igihango gikomeye Yezu yadusigiye kugira ngo tujye tumwibuka kandi bitume twigiramo ubugingo (reba 1Kor 11, 24-25).
Igisobanuro cy’ijambo
Ijambo “Ukaristiya", rikomoka ku ijambo ry’ikigereki “Eucharistia", riva ku nshinga “Eucharistein bivuga gushimira; rikavuga kandi kimwe n’irindi jambo “Eulogein".
Aya magambo yibutsa ugushimira kw’Abayahudi, igihe bamamazaga ibikorwa by’Imana cyane cyane mu gihe cya Pasika (Lk 22, 19; 1 Kor 11, 24).
Ukaristiya ni isengesho rikuru, risingiza Imana kandi rikayishimira.
Nk’uko Gatigisimu ibitubwira “Ukaristiya ni isakramentu ririmo Yezu Kristu ubwe rwose n’umubiri we n’amaraso ye, mu bimenyetso by’umugati na Divayi, akatubera icyarimwe igitambo, ifunguro n’inshuti tubana".
Gutura igitambo cy’Ukaristiya rero, ni ugusangira isengesho ryo kwibuka gushimira Imana ibyo yadukoreye.
Kuva kera, gushimira Imana biri mu muco w’abantu bayo.
“Uramenye ntuzibagirwe Uhoraho Imana yawe, wagukuye mu gihugu cya Misiri, mu nzu y’ubucakara, akagutambutsa ibihe bikomeye wanyuzemo" (reba Ivug 8, 14b-16b).
Ishingiro ry’Ukaristiya muri Bibiliya
Ukaristiya ni urwibutso Yezu yadusigiye avuga ati“Ibi mujye mubikora munyibuka" (1Kor 11, 24-25; Lk 24, 13-31).
Bityo igihe cyose duhazwa, tuba dusangira na Kristu Pasika (reba Lk 22, 19).
Mu Ivanjiri ya Yohani, Yezu yagize ati “Ni jye mugati muzima wamanutse mu ijuru.
Urya uwo mugati azabaho iteka; kandi umugati nzatanga ni umubiri wanjye, kugira ngo isi igire ubugingo" (Yh 6, 51).
Ni byo koko! Twacungujwe amaraso y’igiciro gikomeye.
Amateka yo gutambagiza Isakramentu
Gutambagiza Isakramentu ritagatifu ry’Ukaristiya ni ukwakira Yezu aho dutuye, tukamuha icyubahiro, tukamupfukamira, tukamuramya kandi tukamusingiza.
Ibyo bikatwibutsa uburyo Yezu yatambagijwe nk’Umwami w’abami i Yeruzalemu (reba Mt 21, 1-21).
Umuhango wo gutambagiza Isakramentu ushingiye ku gitangaza cyabereye i Lanciano mu Butaliyani ahagana mu Kinyejana cya 8, aho Yezu yabonekeye Umusaserdoti wari ufite ugushidikanya ko Yezu ari muzima mu Ukaristiya.
Igihe kimwe arimo gutura igitambo cy’Ukaristiya, Umugati wahindutse inyama na Divayi ihinduka amaraso.
Mu 1208, Yezu yabonekeye umwana w’umukobwa witwa “Yuliyana" aramubwira ati “Igihe cyose nshaka kujya ntambagizwa, bakambona kuko ndi umwami".
Nibwo mu 1247, hahimbajwe bwa mbere umunsi mukuru w’isakramentu ritagatifu (i Liège).
Uwo munsi waje kwemerwa na Papa Urbano wa IV mu 1264, maze mu 1318 Papa Yohani wa XXII asaba ko kuva ubwo hatambagizwa Isakramentu ritagatifu hanze ya Kiliziya ku isi hose.
Nk’uko tubisoma muri Bibiliya, umutambagiro w’Isakramentu ritagatifu wibutsa uburyo dukwiye guha agaciro gakomeye ubushyinguro butagatifu, twagereranya uyu munsi na Taberinakoro (reba 1Bami 8): Ubwo Umwami Salomoni yatambagizaga ubushyinguro butagatifu abuvana mu ihema akajya kubwimika mu Ngoro y’Imana yari amaze kuzuza.
Ukaristiya mu buzima bwacu
Ukaristiya ni ikimenyetso cy’urukundo mu bantu “Uko yagakunze abe bari munsi, abakunda byimazeyo" (Yh 13, 1), maze adusigira umubiri we ngo tubeshweho na we muri uru rugendo rwacu hano ku isi nk’uko kandi byari byaragenuwe kuva na kera ngo “Byuka urye kuko urugendo rukiri rurerure" (1 Bami 19, 7).
Bityo Ukaristiya ni ifunguro ry’abagenzi.
Burya umuntu asa n’ibimutunga.
Abakristu dukwiye guharanira gusa n’uwo duhabwa.
Ntiducike intege z’uko muri ibi bihe nta buryo buraboneka hirya no hino bwo guturira hamwe igitambo cy’Ukaristiya nk’umuryango mugari w’abakristu.
Nyagasani yagendanye natwe kandi azakomeza.
Mu bihe byiza n’ibibi ntajya adusiga.
Twigire ku Bayisiraheli igihe bari impunzi i Babiloni.
Nta Muherezabitambo, nta Jambo ry’Imana, nta Kiliziya, nta Rusengero bari bafite ariko basengeraga mu mitima yabo, mu mahema yabo, bagakumbura Yeruzalemu cyane kuko batigeze bibagirwa ibyiza baharonkeye (reba Zab 137).
Dukomeze dusenge kandi tugire icyizere ko tuzongera gusangira Ukaristiya mu Ngoro y’Imana.
Umwanzuro: Ni byo koko, Yezu ni Muzima mu Ukaristiya, ni ukwemera kubihamya.
Ku buryo butagaragarira amaso yacu, Yezu Kristu ni muzima mu Isakramentu ry’Ukaristiya.
Mutagatifu Sirilo w’i Yeruzalemu yagize ati“Ntukibaze niba ibi ari byo cyangwa atari byo ko Yezu ari muri Ukaristiya, ahubwo akira mu mutima wawe amagambo ya Yezu kuko ari We Kuri kudapfa".
Nyuma y’igihe kirekire kandi aya magambo yaje gushimangirwa na Mutagatifu Tereza w’Avila, aho yagize ati “Ukaristiya ni cyo gitangaza gisumba ibindi mu byo Yezu yakoze.
Nta Ukaristiya isi yareka kubaho".
Ukaristiya nk’umubiri wa Kristu duhabwa wari warashushanyijwe n’igitambo cya Izaki, n’ituro ry’intama ya Pasika ndetse na Manu y’abakurambere bacu.
Dusenge: Nyagasani Yezu Kristu, wowe wadusigiye urwibutso bw’ububabare bwawe mu Isakramentu ry’agatangaza, turakwinginze: Muri uyu mwaka w’Ukaristiya duhimbaje mu bihe bidasanzwe, ngwino iwacu utambagire mu mitima yacu, utambagire mu ngo zacu, utambagire aho dukura umugati utunga imibiri yacu maze uduhe kuzirikana kuri urwo rukundo ruhebuje wadukunze, ukatubera igitambo, ifunguro n’inshuti tubana Igihe cyose.
Turakwinginze ngo udukize ibyaha byacu byose n’ibyago byose, ubidukirishe umubiri wawe n’amaraso yawe, maze uduhe guhora dukomeye ku mategeko yawe no kutagira ubwo twakwitandukanya nawe bibaho.
Padiri Victor AMERIKA
Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali nshya ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya 1930
Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali igezweho ya Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge benshi bazi nka 1930, ni nyuma y’igihe kirekire hibazwa ikizakorerwa ku butaka bwahozeho iyi gereza yimuriwe i Mageragere mu 2018.
Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali igezweho ya Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge benshi bazi nka 1930, ni nyuma y’igihe kirekire hibazwa ikizakorerwa ku butaka bwahozeho iyi gereza yimuriwe i Mageragere mu 2018.
Ubusanzwe Katederali ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, aho ari nto kandi ikaba ishaje.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’imiturire n’imitunganyirize y’Umujyi wa Kigali, Eng Mugisha Fred, avuga ko ubutaka bw’ahahoze gereza bungana hegitari 5.
5, Kiliziya Gatolika yamaze kwemererwa gukora igenamigambi y’uko yabukoresha nubwo ari igitekerezo kikiri mu ntangiriro.
Ati “Hari igitekerezo cyo kwegurira ubutaka Kiliziya Gatolika yerekanye ubushake bwo kubwubakamo katederali.
Barimo gukora ku mushinga ugaragaza ubwoko bw’inyubako bifuza kuhashyira hanyuma tububegurire".
Mugisha avuga ko mu rwego rwo gusigasira ibimenyetso by’amateka by’inyubako, Kiliziya yasabwe gutanga igishushanyo cyerekana uburyo bateganya kubungabunga inyubako zishaje zihari.
Akomeza avuga ko icyo Umujyi wa Kigali ushaka ari ukubungabunga ibimenyetso by’amateka ku buryo byaba n’ibisurwa n’abakerarugendo.
Uyu akaba ari umurongo w’ibanze wahawe kiliziya.
Mugisha avuga ko mu mpera za Gashyantare, igishushanyo kizaba cyarangiye, kikazaba cyerekana imiterere ya katederali, ubushobozi bwayo n’ibindi, ku buryo imirimo yo kubaka izaba yarangiye mu mpera za 2021.
Mu birori byo kwakira Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda nka Arikiyepisikopi wa Kigali asimbuye Musenyeri Thaddée Ntihinyurwa wagiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, yagaragaje inyota nyinshi yo kubaka katederali.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Bakirisitu b’uyu mujyi, icyifuzo ni uko twazubaka ingoro y’Imana, Katederali y’uyu mujyi kandi ihesha Imana icyubahiro.
Perezida Kagame na we witabiriye ibyo birori yemeye inkunga mu kubaka iyo katederali, yongeraho ko bishobotse yanubakwa ahantu hashya.
Ati “Tuzafatanya kuyubaka, twubake katederali nziza kandi icyo gihe nibikunda twanayubaka ahandi hashya, ariko bizava mu bushake bwa Kiliziya cyangwa mu bwumvikane tuzaba twagize mu gutera inkunga tugere kuri icyo cyifuzo kandi bidatinze.
Mu gitambo cya Misa ya Noheli iheruka, Musenyeri wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Antoine Kambanda, yakomoje kuri iyi katederali avuga ko umushinga wo kuyubaka urimo kugenda neza.
Prophet Sultan yasabye korali ye kuririmba injyana zigezweho, ashimagiza Kinyatrap ya Bushali
Umuyobozi wa River of Joy and Hope Ministries, Prophet Sultan Eric, yahishuye ko akunda umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul [Bushali The Trigger], anasaba korali yo mu itorero rye kuririmba mu njyana zikunzwe kuko Imana ikwiye ibigezweho.
Umuyobozi wa River of Joy and Hope Ministries, Prophet Sultan Eric, yahishuye ko akunda umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul [Bushali The Trigger], anasaba korali yo mu itorero rye kuririmba mu njyana zikunzwe kuko Imana ikwiye ibigezweho.
Ni ubutumwa yatanze mu materaniro yo ku wa 5 Mutarama 2019 yabereye Cosmos i Nyamirambo aho itorero riri; yibanze ku ntego y’uko abakirisitu bakwiriye gusenga mu kuri no mu mwuka.
Ubwo yari ageze mu mwanya wo kwakira amashimwe ku buhanuzi bwasohoye, Munyemana Eric [Prophet Sultan] yavuze ko akunda umuraperi Bushali ndetse ko azamuha impano.
Yatangiye aririmba ati “Ese ni muebue, ni tuebue?
’’ Abari mu iteraniro bahise basekera rimwe.
Yateye Hallelujah, akomeza n’indirimbo ya Bushali yitwa ‘‘Kinyatrap’’.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Umwana w’umwirabura, ….
Kinyatrap ku mugongo [akabisubiramo].
Ibi yabikoraga anabyina nk’ugerageza kwigana Bushali, akabaza ati ‘‘Hallelujah! Siko babyina?
’’ abakirisitu bakamwikiriza banamwenyura.
Prophet Sultan ati ‘‘Abaziranye na we bazamubwire ko hari umuhanuzi umukunda.
Amahoro abe kuri Bushali, akomeze kuzamuka, abahanzi bacu bakomeze kuzamuka mu izina rya Yesu.
Nta kibazo mfitanye na bo, bataramana neza.

Ati “Korali musirimuke, murusheho kuba abasirimu, muse neza.
Korali yacu yarazamutse.
Imana yacu ishaka ibintu bishya.
Ishaka ko tuyisenga twambaye amakote agezweho kuko ari Imana ijyana n’ibigezweho.
Ni Imana y’abazima n’ibizima.
Abajije injyana ikunzwe cyane, yasubijwe ko ari Trap.
Ati “Niyo ba Cardi B baririmba?
Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar azwi mu muziki nka Cardi B.
Uyu muraperikazi w’imyaka 27 ari mu bagezweho muri Amerika; akora injyana ya Trap ifatwa nka hip hop igezweho ariko yavukiye mu Majyepfo ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ahagana mu 1990.
Mu bahanzi bakora iyi njyana harimo T.
, Gucci Mane, Waka Flocka Flame, 2 Chainz, Lil Uzi Vert na 21 Savage.
Bushali washimagijwe na Prophet Sultan aheruka kwishimirwa bidasanzwe mu gitaramo ngarukamwaka cya East African Party cyabereye i Kigali ku wa 1 Mutarama 2019.
Umwaka wa 2019, Bushali ni wo wamuzamuriye igikundiro, yitabiriye ibitaramo bikomeye birimo Iwacu Muzika Festival, MTN Izihirwe n’ibindi.
Bushali yatangiye umuziki mu mpera za 2013.
Izina rye ryazamuwe n’indirimbo ‘Nituebue’ yahuriyemo na B-Threy n’uwitwa Slum Drip.
Afite album zirimo ‘Nyiramubande’ n’iyo yise ‘Ku gasima’ iriho indirimbo zikunzwe; iyi iriho indirimbo 12 zirimo iyitwa ‘Kinyatrap’, ‘Sindi Mubi’, ‘Zunguzayi’, ‘Ipafu’, ‘Kinyarock’, ‘Mamayiwe’, ‘Kugasima’, ‘Inganjyi’, ‘Ayura’, ‘Bitinze’, ‘Impanda’ na ‘Niyibizi’.
Prophet ni umuhanuzi uvuga ko yasigiwe guhanurira amahanga.
Mu ntangiriro za 2018, yahaye abakirisitu be ‘papier mouchoir’ zo kwifashisha mu gukemura ibibazo.
Imyemerere y’abayoboke be ishingiye ku kuba Yesu yaratanze imbabazi z’iteka ryose ku byaha bakoze, ibyo bakora ubu n’ibyo bazakora mu bihe bizaza.
Hari abakirisitu yatuyeho gukira indwara zirimo ibibyimba byo mu nda na kanseri ndetse hari n’abatanze ubuhamya ko bakize, banitwaza inyandiko zo kwa muganga zibishimangira.

Gatsibo: Umupasiteri n’Umubwiriza barwaniye mu materaniro, harakekwa ko bapfuye amaturo
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE aravuga ko abo bagabo barwaniye imbere y’abayoboke b’ishami ry’Itorero Inkuru Nziza, riherereye mu Murenge wa Ngarama mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Abakristu bahise batabaza inzego z’umutekano, ubu abo bagabo bombi bacumbikiwe kuri Sitasiyo y’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha ya Ngarama.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ngarama Rugaravu Jean Claude yabwiye IGIHE ko basanze bapfa amakimbirane bari bafitanye ashingiye ku kutubahana nubwo hari amakuru avuga ko baba bapfuye amaturo.
Ati “Barwanye bari bafitanye amatiku mu Itorero ryabo yo gusuzugurana, ejo rero barashwanye barwanira mu rusengero bari mu materaniro.
Yavuze ko abakristu bahise babatabaza nk’inzego z’ibanze bafatanyije n’iz’umutekano basanga koko bari gushwana.
Ati “Twahise tuhagera abakristu badutabaje, dusanga barimo bashwana birumvikana bagombaga guhita bafatwa bagafungwa kuko bari bateje amakimbirane mu bakristu.
Rugaravu yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo shami ry’itorero Inkuru Nziza bari baranarifungiye urusengero rikoreramo kubera rutujuje ibyangombwa, nyuma riza gukomeza amateraniro rwihishwa.
Ati “Ni itorero ubona ritanashinga twari twaranarifunze nyuma biza kugaragara ko baje kugenda bagasubiramo bataratubwira ariko ntabwo bapfa amaturo kuko si itorero rifatika.
Barafunzwe bari muri RIB Ngarama.
Rugaravu asaba abaturage kwirinda amakimbirane ariko na none afatiye kuri iryo torero asaba abakristu gusengera mu nsengero zujuje ibyangombwa.
Si ubwa mbere humvikana imirwano mu bayoboke b’itorero ry’Inkuru Nziza kuko nko mu 2017 abayobozi baryo bo mu Karere ka Ngoma ahitwa ku Cyasemakamba bafatanye mu mashati barwanira imbere y’imbaga y’abayoboke yari yagiye kumva ijambo ry’Imana bapfa amaturo no kuba bamwe barimuwe bakanga kujya aho bimuriwe bitwaje ko nta maturo atubutse ahaboneka.
Icyo gihe bamwe baranakomeretse kuko byageze n’aho bakristu bajya muri iyo mirwano yashyamiranyije abari bahasanzwe n’abari bahimuriwe.
Amakimbirane mu matorero akomeje kuvugwa no mu bindi bihugu.
Mu minsi ishize mu mujyi wa Mombasa, muri Kenya, Elisha Misiko w’imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God ‘s gospel Ministries.
Ese gusenga uhumirije hari icyo byongera ku Isengesho ?
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso n’ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso n’ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
N’ubwo gufunga amaso igihe umuntu ari gusenga byabaye nk’ihame mu madini atandukanye, nta byahumetswe byera na bimwe bigaragaza ko ari ngombwa kubikora igihe ugiye gusenga, bitandukanye n’ibindi Bibiliya yagiye itegeka nko kujya ahantu hatuje.
Umuyobozi wa Zion Temple mu ntara y’amajyepfo Pasiteri Eric Ruhagararabahunga avuga ko n’ubwo ntaho uyu muco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije wanditse muri Bibiliya, ko ariko ufasha usenga kutarangara.
Ati “Ntaho twahita tubibona muri Bibiliya ako kanya ariko guhumiriza bigufasha kutarangara, usenze ureba hari igihe urangara, ikinyuraho cyose uba ukireba rero ntabwo uba witaye cyane kuri uriya muntu uri gusabana nawe, niyo mpamvu rero akenshi umuntu afunga amaso, n’ubwo ntaho Bibiliya ivuga ngo muzasenge mufunze amaso".
Ruhagararabahunga yongeyeho ko iyo usenze uhumirije Imana ibona ko ibyo uvuga bikuvuye ku mutima “Urumva ko iyo usenze uhumirije icya mbere nturangara ikindi n’uriya uri kuramya biratuma abona ko ukomeje mu byo ukora, bituma Imana ibona ko uyihanze amaso".
N’ubwo gusenga bifasha usenga kutarangara, Pasiteri Ruhagararabahunga, avuga ko umuntu usenga areba kandi akabikora neza nta kosa aba akoze.
Umutoni Sandrine, Umukirisitu usengera muri Kiliziya Gatolika avuga ko kuri we gusenga ahumirije bigira icyo byongera ku isengesho.
Ati “Iyo mumpirije mba numva niyumva mu isengesho, nkumva ibyo ndi kuvuga bimvuye ku mutima, ariko iyo uri kureba hari ibintu byinshi bikurangaza ni yo waba uri ahantu hatari kunyura abantu".
N’ubwo abakirisitu bavuga ko uyu muco wo guhumiriza ubafasha kutarangara, ku rundi ruhande abahanga mu mateka bo bavuga ko umuco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije ukomoka mu bihe by’abami, aho umuntu atashoboraga kujya imbere y’umwami cyangwa undi muyobozi ngo amuhange amaso.
Kureba umuyobozi cyangwa umwami byafatwagwa nk’ikinyabupfura gike, ni yo mpamvu uwabajyaga imbere yafungaga amaso cyangwa akareba hasi.
Ibi byaje gukomeza no mu muco w’amadini, gufunga amaso mu gihe uri gusenga biba ikimenyetso cyo kwiyoroshya no kubaha uwo uri kubwira.
Ubutatu Butagatifu nibwo soko y’Urukundo Imana yakunze abayo
Kuva mu ntangiriro, Imana yagiye yiyereka Muntu mu buryo butandukanye.
Iyo tuzirikanye ku buryo Imana itwibwira mu Ijambo ryayo tuyibona mu butatu butagatifu (Imana Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu).
Ni ya Mana imwe rukumbi igendana natwe igihe cyose.
Ariko kubera uburyo tutabasha kuyishyikira, iza idusanga, natwe tukayimenya neza uko tugenda turushaho kuyegera.
Kuva mu ntangiriro, Imana yagiye yiyereka Muntu mu buryo butandukanye.
Iyo tuzirikanye ku buryo Imana itwibwira mu Ijambo ryayo tuyibona mu butatu butagatifu (Imana Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu).
Ni ya Mana imwe rukumbi igendana natwe igihe cyose.
Ariko kubera uburyo tutabasha kuyishyikira, iza idusanga, natwe tukayimenya neza uko tugenda turushaho kuyegera.
Ikimenyetso cy’ Ubutatu Butagatifu bw’ Imana ni isomo rikomeye kuri twe ryo kwibumbira hamwe nk’abavandimwe ngo dufatanye muri uru rugendo rusanga Imana.
Ku Munsi Mukuru Ukomeye w’ Ubutatu Butagatifu twishimira Urukundo Imana yifitemo ubwayo rwabanje na mbere y’ uko natwe iturema tukarumenya; muri urwo rukundo rw’Imana niho natwe dukomora ubushobozi bwo gukunda.
Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose
Imana ni Urukundo iteka ryose nkuko Ijambo ry’ Imana ribivuga, bikanahurirwaho n’ abayemera bo mu madini n’amatorero menshi.
Imana ni yo rukundo rwuzuye; kandi ukunda by’ukuri agira undi akunda; naho uwikunze, ntibavuga ko afite urukundo rwuzuye, ahubwo babyita ubwikunde, inda mbi cyangwa inda nini, ubugugu, umururumba n’ibindi bibi bitaba mu Mana, ntibinagire umwanya aho iganje.
Ukunda abandi akirinda guhemuka ahubwo akagira neza, niwe bashima bavuga ko afite urukundo, kuko akunda inshuti ze, abaturanyi, ababyeyi be, abana be, umufasha we, yaba akunda abababaye cyangwa abanzi be akabababarira nkuko Imana ibitugirira, bati “afite urukundo rukomeye, rwuzuye, nta rwango agira".
Ni ko n’Imana yaturemye mu ishusho ryayo iteye.
Imana yibwiye Musa iti "Ndi Uhoraho, Uhoraho Imana igira impuhwe n’ineza, itinda kurakara, yuje ubuntu n’ubudahemuka"( Iyim 34, 6).
Imana yari Urukundo na mbere y’ iremwa ry’ ibindi biriho byose, ni Urukundo kandi izahora ari Urukundo, ntacyo ijya ibura ku rukundo rwayo.
Ni yo mpamvu na mbere yo kurema, nta rungu n’ubwigunge yigeze igira.
Ibi bidufashe kwakira ibyo twahishuriwe mu Ijambo ry’ Imana ko Imana ari imwe mu Batatu bakundana, bunze ubumwe bwuzuye, ku buryo batari Imana eshatu, ahubwo ari Imana Imwe mbere y’iremwa, ubu ndetse n’iteka ryose.
Si ukubara nk’ ababara ibyo tubonesha amaso nk’ uko tuzi imibare dushobora kumvisha ubwenge bwa muntu, kuko Imana irenze ubwenge bwa muntu, Urukundo rwayo rukaba ruturenze.
Tukaba tubyemera kuko yabiduhishuriye mu Ijambo ryayo kuruta kure uko ubwenge bwacu bwabyiyumvisha.
Urukundo Imana yifitemo ruhuza Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu ntiyarwihariye, yararudukunze iturema, tunacumuye, iduha amahirwe yo kwemera kureka icyaha no gukira ingaruka zacyo, nuko iduha Mwana ngo nitumwemera dukire ingaruka mbi z’icyaha.
Ukwiye kunezezwa n’ uko Imana yadukunze
"Koko Imana yakunze isi cyane, bigeza aho itanga Umwana wayo w’ikinege, igira ngo umwemera wese atazacibwa, ahubwo agire ubugingo bw’iteka"(Yh 3, 16).
Urwo rukundo Yezu Umwana w’Imana yadukunze yumvira Imana se, ntatinye no kwitangira abo akunda ngo babeho, rwera imbuto rugatanga ubuzima bushya, ari bwo bugingo bw’iteka.
Abantu baha agaciro urukundo rwuzuye Imana ibakunda nabo bakarukunda Imana na bagenzi babo, bagira Ubuzima bw’ iteka, budahungabanywa n’urupfu rw’ umubiri abantu bose bacamo.
Turi mu gihe cyo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo giterwa n’agakoko ka coronavirus, bigatuma tutabasha kwegerana nka mbere, ariko ntibitubuze kurushaho kugaragariza urukundo abantu bose, cyane cyane abo tubana ndetse n’abari kure twifashishije itumanaho ririmo gutera imbere muri iki gihe turimo.
Umwihariko w’abakristu ni ukwemera Imana Imwe mu Batatu: Data, Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu: babatijwe mu Izina ry’Imana Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu.
Twese abakristu turangwe n’Urukundo ruduhuriza mu bumwe, mu muryango umwe w’abana b’Imana.
Kuzirikana Ubutatu Butagatifu bitwibutse ko natwe duhamagarirwa kugira Urukundo ruri mu Mana ubwayo, ari na rwo idukunda.
Uzarushaho gusa n’Imana yakuremye mu ishusho ryayo niwihatira gukunda nka yo, no guharanira Ubumwe nk’ubwayo.
Ubumwe bubyara imbaraga ("Unity is strength"/ "L’ union fait la force"), kandi abagiye inama Imana irabasanga; abahujwe n’Urukundo rwitangira abandi nta kibananira.
Uwemera Imana abigaragaza aberaho gufasha abandi, agaharanira uguhuza abantu, agatsinda igitanya abantu, inabi akayitsindisha ineza.
Yezu Kristu yasabiye abamwemera kuri Se "kugira ngo bose babe umwe".
Ati: "Nk’uko wowe, Dawe, uri muri jye, nanjye nkaba muri wowe, ndasaba ko nabo bunga ubumwe muri twe, kugira ngo isi yemere ko ari wowe wantumye"(Yh 17, 21).
Bityo kunga ubumwe ku bahuje kwemera Kristu bituma n’abatemeraga bemera; naho gushyamirana mu bibwira ko bemera Kristu bikagusha abanyantege nke, kandi hagowe uwo biturukaho.
Muri iyi minsi isi yugarijwe n’ ibibazo by’ivangura mu bihugu bitandukanye nko muri Amerika ahavugwa ivangura rishingiye ku ibara ry’uruhu n’andi mavangura; twebwe rero tube intumwa z’ubumwe n’Urukundo aho turi hose, kugira ngo turwanye kandi dukumire ibyadutanya byose, ahubwo ubuvandimwe butironda busakare ku isi, kuko umuntu uko asa kose yaremwe mu ishusho ry’ Imana.
Dusenge: Mana Data Mubyeyi wacu, wowe watwoherereje Jambo wawe watumenyesheje ukuri, ukanatwoherereza Roho wawe w’ubutungane, duhe guhamya ukwemera nyako no guhora twunze ubumwe n’abantu bose waremye mu ishusho yawe y’Urukundo! Amen!
"Ineza y’Umwami wacu Yezu Kristu, n’urukundo rw’Imana Data, n’ubusabane kuri Roho Mutagatifu, bihorane namwe mwese!"(2Kor 13, 13).
Padiri Marcellin Dusabumuremyi
Tanzania: Abantu 20 baguye mu mubyigano wabereye mu rusengero
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nyuma y’igiterane cyabaye kuri iki Cyumweru, Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Moshi uherereye mu Majyaruguru ya Tanzania ibyo byabereyemo, Kippi Warioba, yavuze ko atewe impungenge n’uko umubare w’abapfuye ushobora gukomeza kwiyongera biturutse kuri uwo mubyigano.
Ati “Kugeza ubu abantu 20 bapfuye ariko imibare ishobora kwiyongera kuko hari abakomeretse.
" Abakomeretse habarurwa 16.
Ibyo byago byabaye ubwo abantu benshi bari bitabiriye igiterane cyayobowe n’umupasiteri ukunzwe cyane muri icyo gihugu, Boniface Mwamposa, uyoboye itorero Arise and Shine Ministry ryo muri Tanzania.
Jennifer Temu wari muri ayo materaniro yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP, ko ikibazo cyaje kuvuka ubwo Mwamposa wiyita intumwa y’Imana, "Apôtre", yasukaga ibyo yise amavuta yera hasi abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo.
Mwamposa yahise ahunga.
Umuyobozi wa Polisi muri icyo gihugu Simon Sirro wemeje ko hapfuye abantu 20 mu kiganiro kuri Televisiyo y’igihugu muri Tanzania, TBC1, yasabye Mwamposa kwishyikiriza Polisi kuko ari umuntu uzwi, ntaho yacikira.
Yavuze ko Polisi igiye kureba uburyo amadini n’amatorero ategura amateraniro arimo abantu benshi.
Perezida John Magufuli na we yavuze ko ababajwe n’abantu 20 baguye i Moshi ndetse n’abandi 20 bahitanywe n’imyuzure mu Majyepfo ya Tanzania, mu Karere ka Lindi mu cyumweru gishize.
Umuramyi Kagame Charles yasohoye indirimbo ikebura abasubizwa bagahita badamarara
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Indirimbo nshya Kagame Charles yasohoye ni iya gatatu ye ashyize hanze mu mezi arindwi amaze yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana,.
“Ntuzibagirwe" igizwe n’iminota itanu n’amasegonda ane, yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Boris.
Ubutumwa buyirimo buvuga ku muntu wasubijwe ariko agasabwa ko nagera muri ayo masezerano atagomba kwibagirwa Imana yabikoze.
Kagame Charles yavuze ko yinjiye mu muziki ngo akorere Imana yivuye inyuma kandi n’umutima ukunze.
Yagize ati “Nahisemo gukora umuziki uhimbaza Imana kuko ari umuhigo nahigiye Imana nkiri muto ko nzayiririmbira, ngasakaza ubutumwa bwo kugira neza kwayo.
Ni ibintu nkora nta nyungu runaka mbishakamo ahubwo bigamije kugarurira abantu benshi kuri Kirisitu.
Kagame Charles ni umuramyi winjiye mu muziki yiyongera ku bandi basanzwe bawukorera hanze y’u Rwanda.
Uyu muhanzi ufatira icyitegererezo ku muramyi Israel Mbonyi, mu mishinga ye ya bugufi arateganya gutunganya amashusho y’indirimbo ze kugira ngo zikomeze kugera kuri benshi.
Kuva atangiye kuririmba, Kagame Charles amaze gusohora indirimbo eshatu zirimo “Ahindura ibihe" yatangiriyeho, “Tubagarure" na “Ntuzibagirwe" ari nayo nshya.
Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Itorero Angilikani riteganya ko Pasiteri cyangwa Musenyeri wujuje imyaka 65 ku munsi yizihirijeho isabukuru y’imyaka 65 ahita ajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Hashize iminsi ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga hacicikana amakuru y’uko Rev.
Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kirihuko cy’izabukuru ariko ugasanga abantu batabivugaho rumwe benshi bavuga ko agikenewe mu murimo w’Imana.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Rutayisire yavuze ko ayo makuru ari ukuri kandi ko agenda abyibutsa abantu iyo avuga ubutumwa mu materaniro atandukanye.
Ati “Ibyo ni ukuri nta kinyoma kirimo kubera ko twebwe buriya mu Itorero Angilikani iyo wujuje imyaka 65 ujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Nta muntu wabimpimbiye ni njye wabivuze.
Nkunze no kubivuga muri iyi minsi.
Kugeza ubu Rev.
Antoine Rutayisire afite imyaka 62.
Yavuze ko ku itariki 29 Gicurasi 2023 azaba asoje imirimo ahabwa n’itorero, gusa avuga ko atazahagarika ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ku itariki 29 z’ukwezi kwa Gatanu nzabyuka ntakiri umukozi wa Diyoseze.
Ntabwo nzaba nahagaritse ubutumwa ariko nzaba nahagaritse kuyobora Paruwasi n’indi mirimo yose.
Uyu mugabo wize imiyoborere avuga ko iyo umuntu asigaje imyaka itanu ngo ajye mu kiruhuko cy’iza bukuru aba agomba gutegura ubuzima bwe buri imbere kandi ngo we yarabirangije.
Yavuze ko iyo ari kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana bimunezeza ariko ko hari n’undi munezero yumva ategereje kandi ngo ntibizamubuza gutanga umusanzu mu itorero atari mu buyobozi.
Ati "Mfite undi munezero numva ntegereje imbere Imana nintiza ubuzima burenga imyaka 65.
Namaze gukora gahunda y’akazi k’ubuzima bwanjye, uko nzasaza ntabwo nzasaza nsaziye mu biro, ntabwo mbyifuza.
Akomoza ku byo azibandaho mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, yavuze ko azakomeza kwandika ibitabo akarushaho no kwishimana n’umuryango we cyane abuzukuru be.

Coronavirus: Mgr Rukamba yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko hajya hakoreshwa ikiyiko mu guhazwa, abajya mu misa bakandikwa
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.
Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umwanzuro w’inama y’abaminisitiri uvuga ko “Insengero zizakomeza gufunga, abanyamadini barashishikarizwa gukomeza gushyiraho ingamba zo gukumira no kwirinda Covid-19, mu rwego rwo kwitegura kuba insengero zafungurwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere hashingiwe ku bizava mu isesengura ry’ubuzima".
Magingo aya, Abasenyeri n’abayobozi b’amadini batangiye kwitegura uko bashyira mu bikorwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus, kugira ngo nibaramuka bakomorewe bazabe bariteguye ku buryo amasengesho azakorwa hanirindwa ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo,
Mu ibaruwa Musenyeri Rukamba yandikiye abapadiri ayoboye n’abakirisitu, yabamenyesheje ingingo 20 zazakurikizwa mu gihe leta yaba ikomoreye insengero nk’uko iheruka ku bitangaza.
IGIHE yamenye amakuru y’uko muri iki gihe hari kuba ibiganiro n’abakirisitu ku buryo basobanukirwa neza aya mabwiriza, ndetse hagatoranywa n’abazafasha abandi mu kuyumva no kuyakurikiza.
Muri izo ngingo, harimo ko ahasengerwa hagomba kuba hafite ibikoresho byose byifashishwa mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19; ndetse ko mu kwirinda ubucucike mu nsengero, abapadiri bagomba gutanga aho bazasengera muri paruwasi yabo, ubuso bwaho n’umubare w’abantu bashobora gusengeramo bakurikije ingano yaho.
Yakomeje ababwira ko abagiye gusenga bagomba kuzajya bambara agapfukamunwa igihe cyose kandi bagashyira intera ya metero ebyiri hagati y’umuntu n’undi.
Ati “Ibyo bizasaba kwerekana imyanya abantu bicaramo.
Misa zizongerwa ku buryo abifuza kuzazijyamo bose bazabibonera uburyo ndetse misa zimwe zo mu mibyizi zikaba zasimbuza izo ku cyumweru.
Ikindi ni uko mu kiliziya hagomba gushyirwa umuti wo gukaraba wica udukoko cyangwa se za kandagira ukarabe ku buryo abantu babona uko bakaraba intoki binjiye ndetse banasohotse mu kiliziya.
Yakomeje agira ati “Kubera ko guhazwa mu biganza bitemewe, uhaza azakoresha ikiyiko kandi yambare agapfukamunwa.
Mu gihe cyo gutura, yavuze ko mu kiliziya hazaba hari ibiseke bine kugira ngo abantu badahura kandi bature vuba.
Ati “Niho bazashyira amaturo y’amafaranga.
Amaturo y’imyaka bazajya bayashyira ahantu bagende badakoze ku maturo basanze aho, nyuma Padiri ajye kuyaha umugisha, awuha n’abatuye.
Muri aya mabwiriza harimo kandi ko umubare w’abaririmba (Chorale) uzagabanuka.
Imwe mu ngingo yakunze kwibazwaho cyane mu gihe Kiliziya n’insengero bizaba bikomorewe, ni ijyanye n’uburyo bwo kugabanya umubare w’abantu bajya gusenga; Musenyeri Rukamba yanditse ko hazabaho kugena misa hakurikijwe imiryango remezo.
Ati “Umuyobozi w’Umuryango remezo azakora urutonde rw’abantu baje mu misa bo mu gace ke, agaragaza aho batuye na nimero zabo za telefoni.
Ikindi ni uko ku bana, abemerewe kuzajya bajya mu misa ari abarengeje imyaka 12 kandi nabo bakajyayo baherekejwe n’ababyeyi.
Yakomeje avuga ko nta misa izajya irenza amasaha abiri, ndetse ko mbere y’uko indi itangira, hazajya habaho umwanya wo gusukura Kiliziya w’isaha imwe.
Ku bapadiri n’abasomyi, bo ngo ntibazajya bambara udupfukamunwa ndetse ntibemerewe guhererekanya ibitabo n’indangururamajwi.
Abayoboke b’amadini bari bamaze amezi atatu batagera mu nsengero, bavuga ko bizeye ko isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima nta kabuza rizabemerera gusubira mu nzu z’Imana kuko ingamba abanyamadini bafashe zisobanutse.
Kayitare Jean Claude wo muri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rutonde muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, yavuze ko nubwo misa zakomeje binyuze kuri radiyo na televiziyo, yishimiye kuba insengero zigiye kongera gufungura.
Ati “Hari abantu usanga gusengera mu rugo bibagora kubera ibibarangaza.
Kuba insengero zishobora kongera gufungurwa turabyishimiye cyane kandi turabishimira Imana".
Kuva muri Werurwe iki cyorezo cyagaragara mu Rwanda, abanduye ni 787 mu gihe abamaze gukira ari 370 naho abakirwaye ni 415 mu gihe babiri aribo bitabye Imana.
Hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 113 544.
Umuvugabutumwa wo muri ADEPR yinjiranye mu muziki indirimbo iri mu njyana ya Hip Hop
Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".
Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".
Izina rya Tuyishimire Diogène rirazwi cyane ariko rikunzwe by’umwihariko muri ADEPR.
Yamamaye cyane mu nyigisho avugamo uko Yesu afite imbaraga zidasanzwe, akamusanisha n’ibintu byose.
Agira ati “Nta kintu adasa nacyo.
Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo aba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti aba umuzabibu w’ukuri mwe [abakirisitu] muri amashami…’’
Uyu muvugabutumwa yakuranye inzozi zo kuzaba umuhanzi ariko wibanda ku butumwa bufitiye akamaro sosiyete Nyarwanda.
Tuyishimire yakuze yiyumvamo cyane Hip hop ndetse indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘‘Byanteye ubwoba’’ icuranze muri iyo njyana.
Aganira na IGIHE Tuyishimire yavuze ko gusohora indirimbo ari inzozi ze zabaye impamo.
Ati ‘‘Nakuze nifuza kuba umuhanzi, igihe nyacyo cy’Imana nasanze ari iki ngo nsohore indirimbo yanjye ya mbere.
Mu ndirimbo ye avuga ko nubwo Isi irushya abantu ariko Imana izahindura byose bishya, akongera ati “Mu buzima nubwo tubabazwa ariko Imana izaduha guhozwa.
Yakomeje ati “Nashatse kugaragaza ko nubwo mu Isi umuntu ashobora kunyura mu buzima bukomeye ariko hari Imana ibuyobora; ubuzima bukomeye bugahinduka ubworoshye binyuze mu kwizera Imana.
“Byanteye ubwoba" ifite iminota itatu n’amasegonda 36 yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Trackslayer.
Tuyishimire yayiririmbye afatanyije na Dushimiyimana Emmanuel uzwi nka Manud na we ubarizwa muri ADEPR.
Yiyongereye ku bandi bahanzi bake bo mu itorero rya ADEPR baririmba mu njyana ya Hip hop.
Yashimangiye ko gukora umuziki muri Hip hop bidakwiye gufatwa nabi mu gihe atanga ubutumwa butomoye.
Yagize ati ‘‘Ubusanzwe nta njyana iva ku Mana, zose nizo abantu bihangiye, ziva mu bwenge bwabo.
Numva rero injyana atari ikibazo ahubwo ikibazo cyaba ubutumwa burimo.
Tuyishimire Diogène afite imyaka 27, ni umugabo wubatse, ufite umugore n’umwana umwe.
Asengera mu Itorero rya ADEPR muri Paruwasi ya Jabana.

Kuri uyu wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 muri Kiliziya Gatolika n’andi madini yemera Yezu barazirikana igihe Yezu Kristu yasubiraga mu Ijuru maze akaboherereza Roho Mutagatifu.
Mu kuzirikana uyu munsi no gufasha abakirisitu kuwizihiza, abaririmbyi ba The Bright 5 Singers bahimbye indirimbo yitwa ‘Roho, ngwino utumurikire’ ijyanye n’uwo munsi kugira ngo bafashe abakristu bose kuzirikana ibanga ryawo.
Iraguha Alain Marius uhagarariye The Bright 5 Singers yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo bashyize hanze irimo ubutumwa busaba roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu.
Ati “Irimo ubutumwa busaba Roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu kugira ngo babashe gukorera Imana badategwa, kuko muri iyi minsi benshi bacitse intege.

Barangije amashuri yisumbuye, bane muri bo bahuriye mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda i Huye (NUR) muri korali yitwa Le Bon Berger.
Ubwo habaga amahugurwa yari yateguwe na Choeur International et Ensemble Instrumental de Kigali agenewe abaririmbyi mu 2011 igatumira umugabo w’umuhanga muri muzika wo muri Cameroun witwa Jean Jacques Gregoire Belobo, niwe wabateye iyo nyota yo kurushaho gukunda umuziki, ariko anabasigira ubumenyi ari nabwo bifashishije mu kuzamura imiririmbire yabo.
Nyuma y’aho basoreje amashuri nibwo bihuje bakora iri tsinda.
Bakunda gukora ibitaramo bitandukanye biteguriye cyangwa se batumiwemo.
Iri tsinda ryanashyize hanze Album ya mbere yitwa ‘Musabe Muzahabwa’.

Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye n’Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Nyuma y’aho Igishushanyo mbonera cyerekana imiterere y’iyi Basilika kigiriye hanze, kuwa 9 Mutarama Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru n’ubwa Kiliziya Gatolika bwahuye n’abazayubaka kugira ngo harebwe uburyo imirimo yo kuyubaka izashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko François yavuze ko imirimo y’ibanze yo kubaka iyi Bazilika igeze kure ndetse ko mu 2021 izaba yuzuye.
Yagize ati “Izuzura mu Ugushyingo 2021.
Imirimo y’ibanze irimo iy’inyigo no gushyiraho ikigega kigamije gukusanya inkunga yararangiye".
Iyi Bazilika izaba yubatse ku butaka butagatifu bw’i Kibeho busanzwe bugendererwa n’Abakirisitu batari bake kubera amabonekerwa yahabereye mu myaka ya 1980.
Kuri ubu inzego zose bireba zarangije gusuzuma ibikenewe, bikaba biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi Bazilika izatwara amafaranga y’u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari 70.
Binyuze kuri Twitter, ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwasabye abikorera gushora imari muri Nyaruguru, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n’ibikorwa remezo by’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru buvuga ko kandi iyi Bazilika izaba ifite ibindi bikorwa remezo birimo inzu z’amacumbi zishobora basanzwe bagenderera aka karere buri mwaka mu ngendo z’iyobokamana, by’umwihariko abaza ku munsi wizihizwaho kujya mu ijuru kwa Bikira Mariya.
Tariki 28 Ugushyingo 1981, ni bwo Bikira Mariya yabonekeye umukobwa wa mbere witwa Mumureke Alphonsine wigaga mu Rwunge rw’Amashuri rwa Mère du Verbe i Kibeho.

Kanuma Jean Damascène yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’
Umuhanzi Kanuma Jean Damascène uri mu bahanzi bafite igikundiro mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’.
Umuhanzi Kanuma Jean Damascène uri mu bahanzi bafite igikundiro mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’.
Indirimbo nshya ya Kanuma Jean Damascène yayise ‘Nkurya Munsi’ yubakiye ku butumwa buganisha kuri Pantekote, Umunsi abarokore bizera ko ariwo Umwuka Wera yamanukiyeho Intumwa.
Mu gitero cya mbere agira ati “Urya munsi wa Pantekote, bose bari hamwe mu mwanya umwe, bahuje imitima n’uko umuriro ubatungura umeze nk’umuyaga uhuha cyane wuzura inzu bari bicayemo.
Mu nyikirizo y’iyi ndirimbo Kanuma asaba Imana ko yongera kohereza Umwuka Wera kuko wafasha mu kongera ububyutse mu itorero ryayo.
Kanuma Jean Damascène yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yayihimbye agamije gukumbuza abantu igihe Umwuka w’Uwiteka yamanukiraga intumwa.
Ati “Ni ndirimbo itwibutsa igihe Umwuka Wera yamanukiraga itorero rya mbere arizo Ntumwa za Yesu.
Igitekerezo cyo kuyikora cyanjemo umunsi nabonaga itorero riri guca mu miraba.
Kanuma yavutse yisanga mu muryango w’abaramyi.
Yanditse indirimbo ya mbere mu 2005 ayishyira hanze mu 2012.
Afite album ebyiri amaze gukora zo mu buryo bw’amajwi.

Umunya-Canada uririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana yatunguranye avuga ko atayizera
Jonathan Steingard, inkingi ya mwamba mu itsinda rya riririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu Njyana ya Rock rizwi Hawk Nelson, yavuze ko atacyizerera mu Mana.
Jonathan Steingard, inkingi ya mwamba mu itsinda rya riririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu Njyana ya Rock rizwi Hawk Nelson, yavuze ko atacyizerera mu Mana.
Mu butumwa burebure uyu muririmbyi yasangije abamukurikira kuri Instagram yagaragaje atari umwe mu bizera Imana.
Ati “Maze igihe kinini nterwa ubwoba no kubasangiza ibi ariko ubu ndiyumvamo ko ari cyo gihe cyiza kuri njye kuba navugisha ukuri.
Ndizera ko iri atari iherezo ry’ikiganiro ahubwo ari intangiriro.
Yakomeje avuga ko kuba yarakuriye mu muryango usenga, akaba umwana w’umupasiteri agacuranga ndetse akaba n’umuririmbyi muri band ya gikirisitu akanitwa umukirisitu mu bintu byinshi yagiye anyuramo mu buzima bwe yaje gusanga ‘ubu atacyizerera mu Mana’.
Arongera ati “Amagambo aheruka make mu nteruro yari akomeye kuyandika, nashakaga no koroshya iyi nyandiko nkabyandika bitandukanye n’uko nabikoze ariko ntabwo byari kuba ukuri nk’uko bimeze gutya.
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo yigeze avuga niba ateganya kureka kuririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana.
Steingard yari amaze igihe kinini atekereza uburyo azabyandikamo.
Ngo yatangiye ashidikanya we ubwe aza kubiganiriza inshuti ze za hafi.
Yaje gutungurwa no gusanga hari abandi bakuriye mu nsengero nkawe batinya kubivuga kubera ko babura buri kimwe.
Abo basanzwe babana muri band bamushyigikiye bavuga ko intego yabo ari ugufasha abantu no kubatera imbaraga mu byo bakora mu kuri kuko Imana iri kumwe nabo kandi iri mu ruhande rwabo.
Hawk Nelson, itsinda Jonathan Steingard abarizwamo rigizwe n’abasore batanu [Daniel Biro, Jonathan Steingard, Micah Kuiper na David Niacaris].
Ni rimwe mu matsinda akomeye aramya Imana mu buryo bw’injyana ya rock na pop punk.
Ryashingiye mu Mujyi wa Peterborough, Ontario.
Rimaze gukora album umunani.
I’ve been terrified to post this for a while - but it feels like it’s time for me to be honest.
I hope this is not the end of the conversation, but the beginning.
I hope this is encouraging to people who might feel the same but are as afraid to speak as I am.
I want to be open.
I want to be transparent with you all - and also open to having my heart changed in the future.
I am not looking for a debate at all - just a chance to share my story in the hopes some good can come from it.
I love you all.

Tuyishimire Diogène.
Mu byigisho bye, icyamamaye ni icyo aba avugamo ukuntu Yesu nta kintu adasa nacyo kuko ‘Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo akaba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti akavuga ati ninjye muzabibu w’ukuri mwe muri amashami…’
Umurebye mu maso ntiwamukekera ko yakwigisha mu buryo bukomeye ariko we ahamya ko ari imirimo yakoze kugira ngo agarure benshi mu nzira y’agakiza.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 27, ni umuvugabutumwa mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yatangiye no gukora umuziki aho yamaze kwinjira mu njyana ya Hip hop.
Akurondoreye iby’urugendo rw’ubuzima ab’imitima yoroshye amarira arashoka bitewe n’uko yakubititse akiri muto ntabashe kwiga amashuri yisumbuye kubera ubuzima bugoye n’ubushobozi buke, ariko ubu ashima Imana aho igejeje ikora!
Mu buhamya bwe ntajya yibagirwa kugaragaza uko yari umusinzi unakora inzoga z’inkorano ndetse n’uburyo nyina umubyara yamusamye mu gihe yigiraga kuba umubikira.
Yakuriye kwa nyina wabo kuko nyina yamutaye akajya kwishakira undi mugabo.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE yavuye imuzi iby’ubuzima bwe.
Ati “Ubundi mama wanjye yigiraga kuba umubikira, yaje guhura n’umusore amutera inda rero birangira havutse njye.
Icyakora ntabwo yandeze kuko we yahise ashaka undi mugabo kandi ntabwo twari kubana.
Ibi byatumye nkura nderwa na mama wacu muto ku mubyeyi wanjye.
Ahamya ko yakuriye mu muryango w’abantu bakora inzoga z’inkorano, byatumye ku myaka icyenda gusa atangira kunywa inzoga.
Akurira mu buzima bwo gucuruza no gukora izo nzoga.
Arangije amashuri abanza ntabwo yabonye uko akomeza ayisumbuye kuko nta bushobozi bwari buhari, ati" Nyine ishuri narivuyemo mpita ninjira mu byo gukora inzoga kuko nibyo mu rugo bakoraga.
Ubu buzima yabubayemo ariko akunda umuziki, biza kumuviramo gushaka gukora indirimbo za mbere nubwo bitamuhiriye.
Ati “Numvaga naba umukinnyi wa APR FC cyangwa nkaba umuhanzi wa Hip Hop nari umufana ukomeye wa Riderman.
Yavuye iwabo ababeshye ko agiye gukora umuziki, naho agiye gucuruza inzoga z’inkorano mu Karere ka Musanze aza guhomba bikomeye.
Ubwo yari amaze guhomba mu by’inzoga z’inkorano yacuruzaga, Ev.
Tuyishimire yisanze asigaranye amafaranga make cyane nyamara yaramaze gutoroka kwa nyina wabo.
Inzoga zari zahombye abona ubuzima bwanze afata icyemezo cyo kwiyahura ndetse aranabigerageza Imana ikinga akaboko.
Ati “Narahombye bikomeye numva ubuzima burarangiye, nahisemo kwiyahura icyo gihe ngura inzoga nyinshi ngo niyahure nasinze, naguze ikinini cy’imbeba nsinda ntiyahuye birangira ndyamye, ariko nkajya numva ko ndi bwiyahure mu gitondo.
Bukeye hari ikiganiro cyacaga kuri Radio Flash Fm cyakorwaga na Pasiteri Ntambara.
Icyo gihe yavuze ijambo ryatumye mpindura umugambi wo kwiyahura.
Tuyishimire avuga Pasiteri Ntambara yigishije avuga ko hari umwana ugiye kwiyahura kandi naramuka abiretse azaba umuntu ukomeye w’umugabo.
Umugambi we uhita upfuba binyuze kuri uyu mukozi w’Imana.
Ati “Igitekerezo cyo kwiyahura cyahise kimvamo gutyo nyuma njya kureba mama wanjye wabaga mu Bugesera.
Ageze mu Bugesera yasanze umubyeyi we azi ko umwana we yabuze, icyakora kuko ubuzima butari bwiza ntabwo yahatinze ahubwo yagiye gushakisha uko yabaho.
Iki gihe yakoze muri restaurant, aha ni naho yatangiye gukora ibikorwa byo kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana ahereye ku hantu basengeraga.
Akora muri iyi restaurant yo mu Bugesera nibwo Ev.
Tuyishimire yatangiye kujya ajya gusengana n’abantu bari baturanye akarara aho basengeraga.
Abo basenganaga bakundaga uko yigisha anasoma ijambo ry’Imana umugabo umwe basenganaga aza kumusaba ko yazajya kubwiriza muri ADEPR i Huye.
Kuva icyo gihe yahise atangira kuba umuvugabutumwa wo mu itorero rya ADEPR atangira gutumirwa cyane mu materaniro anyuranye.
Mu 2016 umugabo basenganaga yamusabye ko yamurera akava aho basengeraga bakajya babana nk’umwana na Se.
Nyuma uyu mugabo yaje kwiyemeza kumwubakira inzu birangira mu 2018 akoze ubukwe aza kurushinga n’umwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yerekeje amaso ku muziki
Kuva mu bwana bwe yakundaga umuziki by’umwihariko injyana ya Hip Hop, ibi byatumye uyu mugabo kuri ubu yumva yawukora ndetse indirimbo ya mbere ye ikaba igomba kujya hanze mu minsi ya vuba.
Ati “Nubwo nakora iyi yonyine ngahita ndekera aho, inzozi zanjye zaba zibaye impamo kuko mpfuye ntaririmbye nagendana agahinda kuko nabikunze kuva cyera.
Avuga ko yari kuba yarabikoze cyera ariko agira ubwoba bw’ukuntu abo basengana bazabifata ahitamo kubigendamo gake.
Iyi ndirimbo ye yitegura gusohora yitwa “Mfite ubwoba" yakozwe na Trackslayer, izaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’ubuzima busanzwe ariko nanone buganisha ku Mana.
Ikiganiro na Ev.
Tuyishimire winjiye mu njyana ya Hip hop
Icyerekezo cya Onomo, hoteli imaze umwaka ku isoko ry’u Rwanda- Ikiganiro na Nizey Emile uyiyobora
Muri Gicurasi 2018 u Rwanda rwungutse hotel y’inyenyeri eshatu (Onomo Hotel), iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati mu Kagari ka Rugenge, mu Murenge wa Nyarugenge ahazwi nko kuri Sopetrade.
Muri Gicurasi 2018 u Rwanda rwungutse hotel y’inyenyeri eshatu (Onomo Hotel), iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati mu Kagari ka Rugenge, mu Murenge wa Nyarugenge ahazwi nko kuri Sopetrade.
Onomo Hotel yubakishijwe imirimbo ijyanye na gakondo y’u Rwanda mu mitako y’imigongo, ibiseke n’ibishushanyo by’ubugeni bikoreshejwe amase avanze n’ibyondo biri mu mabara abereye guhangwa ijisho.
Iyi hotel igenzurwa na ONOMO Hotels imaze kubaka izina muri Afurika, ishami ryayo rya Kigali riri muri 16 ifite kuri uyu mugabane.
Onomo hotel ifite ibyumba 109 birimo 10 byigiye hejuru, iby’inama byakira abantu hagati ya 200-250, aho abantu bogera, parking n’ibindi.
Mu gihe imaze ku isoko ry’u Rwanda, yakira ibikorwa bitandukanye n’inama zibera mu Mujyi wa Kigali nk’uburyo bwo gutanga umusanzu wayo mu iterambere rishingiye ku bukerarugendo.
Kuva muri Nyakanga 2019, Onomo hotel yabonye umuyobozi mushya, Nizey Emile, ufite ubunararibonye mu by’amahoteli akesha ubumenyi yavanye mu Bwongereza no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Nizey w’imyaka 37 yavukiye mu Rwanda ariko aba cyane mu bihugu by’i Burayi no muri Amerika.
Ibijyanye n’amahoteli yabitangiye mu 2003 ari mu Bwongereza.
Mu buhamya bwe yatangiye akora akazi gaciriritse muri hoteli.
Mu 2008 yaje kwimukira muri Amerika ahakomereza ibijyanye n’amahoteli, ubu afite Impamyabushobozi y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza mu by’amahoteli yavanye muri Kaminuza ya Florida mu Mujyi wa Miami, yanahakuye iy’Icyiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye n’Imari.
Nizey yagiranye ikiganiro na IGIHE cyibanze ku cyerekezo cya Onomo Hotel n’imishinga ifite mu isoko ry’amahoteli mu Rwanda.
IGIHE: Onomo Hotel ihagaze ite ku isoko rya serivisi zo kwakira abantu mu Rwanda?
Nizey: Mu mahoteli tungana urebye n’igihe tumaze ku isoko, ubona ko tugeze ku rwego rwiza kandi turimo guhatana mu byo dutanga, mu myaka ibiri cyangwa itatu iri imbere tuzaba tugeze ku rwego rukomeye.
IGIHE: Ni iki Onomo Hotel yihariye kiyitandukanya n’andi mahoteli?
Nizey: Turi hoteli yibanda mu gukorana n’abanyabugeni n’abahanzi b’imbere mu gihugu.
Ibi ni ibintu twashyizemo imbaraga, nureba muri hoteli uzasangamo ibintu by’ubugeni kandi byakorewe mu Rwanda, abanyamideli na bo ni abantu tugomba gukorana na bo.
Gahunda dufite ni uguteza imbere ibintu bikorerwa mu Rwanda ariko cyane cyane dushyira imbaraga ku banyabugeni.
Ikindi navuga ni uko turi hoteli y’Abanyafurika, turi mpuzamahanga ariko muri twe dufite Afurika imbere, ni hoteli ifite icyicaro muri Maroc ariko ikorera n’ahandi muri Afurika.
Izina Onomo ubwaryo rifite inkomoko muri Mali, andi mahoteli hano ubona ko ari ayo muri Amerika n’i Burayi ariko twe twazanye iryo tandukaniro.
IGIHE: Murateganya kuzajya mukorana n’abahanzi mu buhe buryo?
Nizey: Tuzajya tugira imurikabikorwa ry’abahanzi, noneho ONOMO ibe aho abahanzi bose bumva ko bagomba gukorana nayo.
Iyi ni gahunda nshya mfite nk’umuyobozi, tugomba kwegera abahanzi yaba amastudio, abakora iby’ubugeni bose bakerekana ibihangano byabo hano.
Turashaka ko Onomo Hotel iba igicumbi cy’ubuhanzi Nyarwanda, turanashaka kuzahashyiraho ahantu bacururiza ibintu byabo kuko twabonye ko abanyamahanga benshi baba babishaka.
IGIHE: Nk’umuyobozi mushya ni uruhe ruhare uzatanga mu guteza imbere serivisi za hoteli ?
Nizey: Mfite ubumenyi buhagije mu by’amahoteli, iyo urebye iby’amahoteli mu Rwanda ubona ko byibanzwemo cyane n’abanyamahanga, gusa ni ibintu byumvikana kuko ni bishya mu gihugu kandi urebye ingufu u Rwanda rwashyize mu cyerekezo cyo kwakira abantu, hagombaga amahoteli mpuzamahanga kandi koko akeneye ubwo bumenyi.
Nta Munyarwanda wakoze mu mahoteli mpuzamahanga igihe kirekire, njye rero nagize ayo amahirwe yo kuba narakoranye n’amahoteli nka Radisson, Hilton, Marriott n’andi.
IGIHE: Muri Kamena 2020, u Rwanda ruzakira Inama ihuza Abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinonma bigize Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza (CHOGM).
Onomo Hotel yiteguye ite kwakira abayobozi?
Nizey: Nk’andi mahoteli yose hari ibirimo gukorwa kugira ngo twitegure, hari inama tuzagirana n’abafatanyabikorwa kandi twamaze kubona ubutumwa buva muri RDB na Rwanda Convention Bureau butubwira iyo gahunda.
Hari ibyo turimo guhindura bijyanye n’iyo nama ariko bigomba kuba ari ibintu bizamara igihe kirekire.
IGIHE: Onomo Hotel ihagaze he mu bijyanye no guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda?
Nizey: Twe dukoresha iby’iwacu kandi dufite n’akarusho kuko dufite akarima k’igikoni, Made in Rwanda itangirira iwacu.
Ibyo dukoresha byinshi tubikura mu Rwanda, yego hari ibikiva hanze wenda tutaragira ubushobozi bwo gukorera mu Rwanda ariko ibyinshi dukoresha ibiva hano mu Rwanda.
IGIHE: Mubona Abanyarwanda bitabira kujya mu mahoteli?
Nizey: Icyo ni ikibazo kikidukomereye kuko Abanyarwanda benshi bumva ko aya mahoteli ari ibintu by’ibitangaza, ariko biterwa n’umuco wacu wo kudakunda gusura ibintu nyaburanga byo mu Rwanda.
Iyo hajemo amahoteli byo usanga ari ibindi, nzi abantu babona nka Marriott Hotel ariko ntibajyeyo kandi babishoboye.
Simvuze ngo ibiciro byose abantu babishobora ariko reka dufate ikintu twese ducuruza mu Rwanda (Fanta), igiciro cyayo muri Onomo Hotel ni 1000 Frw; ibyo bituma abantu badakwiye kumva ko ari ahantu hatabagenewe.
Ibyo nk’abanyamahoteli nitwe tugomba kubihindura.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe cyerekezo cya Onomo Hotel?
Nizey: Dufite abakozi kandi bafite ubumenyi buhagije, abo dufite bakoze mu mahoteli akomeye barimo n’abafite ubumenyi burengeje imyaka itandatu mu kazi k’amahoteli.
Intego yacu ni ugukomeza gutanga serivisi nziza ariko byaba na ngombwa tugafungura irindi shami rya Onomo Hotel mu Rwanda, icyo gihe bizagaragaza ko yateye imbere, turashaka ko aha haba ahantu Abanyarwanda biyumvamo.
Amafoto: Muhizi Serge na Niyonzima Moses
Intare zo muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera zikubye kane ziba 37
Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.
Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.
Mu 2015 nibwo nyuma y’imyaka igera kuri 15 intare zaracitse mu Rwanda, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB gifatanyije na ‘African Parks’ bagejeje mu Rwanda intare zirindwi zirimo iz’ingore eshanu muri gahunda yo kugarura izi nyamaswa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera.
Mu mwaka wa mbere izi ntare zari zimaze kwikuba kabiri ubwo havukaga ibyana 11.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 haje kongerwamo intare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, zirushaho kwiyongera.
Ibyo byagiye bigendana no kuvugurura amategeko akumira abashimuta inyamaswa, hashyirwaho itsinda rishinzwe kubashakisha ryifashishije imbwa zatojwe, hanashyirwaho uruzitiro rwa kilometero 120 rurimo amashanyarazi akomoka ku zuba rutandukanya Pariki n’ubutaka bwagenwe nk’ubuhumekero bwayo, hagamijwe kugabanya uguhura kw’abantu n’inyamaswa.
Ikigo African Parks gifatanya n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, mu gucunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera guhera mu 2010, cyatangaje ko umubare w’izi ntare ukomeje kwiyongera.
Mu butumwa cyanyujije kuri Twitter cyagize iti “Twishimiye kubasangiza ko Intare zo muri @AkageraPark zikubye inshuro enye kuva zahagarurwa mu myaka itanu ishize.
Mu mwaka ushize ziyongereyeho ibyana bine, bituma umubare wazo ugera kuri 37.
Ubu iyi pariki ni imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika kuko ifite inyamazwa eshanu zifatwa nk’izikaze kurusha izindi kuri uyu mugabane, ari zo Inkura, Intare, Imbogo, Inzovu n’Ingwe.
Gukomeza kwiyongera kw’inyamaswa byakomeje kugendana n’abasura iyi pariki, byatumye mu 2018 yinjiza amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $2, ari nabwo bwa mbere yari ageze kuri icyo gipimo mu mateka y’iyi pariki.
Muri uyu mwaka ariko umubare w’abasura Pariki zo mu Rwanda uzagabanuka cyane kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ingendo mpuzamahanga, ndetse n’izo mu gihugu zikorwa mu buryo bwitondewe.
RDB kuri uyu wa Gatanu yatangaje ko kuva ubukerarugendo bwongeye gufungurwa mu cyumweru gishize, ifite abantu 69 bamaze gusaba mbere y’igihe (booking) gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga.
Muri Nyungwe ni bane, naho abamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Akagera ni 215.

Last year the pride welcomed 4 sets of cubs, bringing the total population to 37 individuals! 📷 Hein Meyers pic.
