Inzego z’umutekano zavuze ko Ishimwe yabajijwe impamvu yarashe mugenzi we w’imyaka 16, asobanura ko bari barimo gukinisha imbunda Niyibizi yari yazanye, maze birangira Ishimwe akoze mu mbarutso imbunda yerekeye nyakwigendera aba ahasize ubuzima.
Ishimwe w’imyaka 17 yahise ajyanwa mu kigo ngororamuco aho akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo kwica umuntu.
Bivugwa ko uyu musore Ishimwe afite inkomoko mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Sénégal bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Sénégal ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda baba mu bihugu bya Mali, Gambia, Guinée-Bissau na Cap Vert n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Uyu munsi usanzwe wizihirwa tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2021, ibirori byawo byabaye ku wa 13 Werurwe 2021, mu muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rya WebEx unatambuka kuri Televiziyo Isango Star no ku zindi mbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo YouTube na Twitter.
Abatanze ibiganiro barimo Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Iyubahirizwa ry’ihame ry’Uburinganire n’Ubwuzuzanye mu Rwanda (GMO), Rwabuhihi Rose; Umuyobozi uhagarariye UN Women mu Rwanda, Fatou Lo; Umuyobozi w’Umuryango uharanira guteza imbere Uburinganire no kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina (RWAMREC), Rutayisire Fidèle; Ngeruka Fabiola ukorera muri UNFPA Mali, Agnès Ammeux ukorera Enabel muri Guinée-Bissau na Dr Mukeshimana Angelique wiga Ubuvuzi muri Kaminuza ya Havre mu Bufaransa.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yagarutse ku butumwa bugusha ku nsanganyamatsiko yo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore uyu mwaka igira iti “Munyarwandakazi, ba ku ruhembe mu Isi yugarijwe na COVID-19”.
Abatanze ibiganiro bikije by’umwihariko ku rwego umugore agezeho mu kwiteza imbere, uruhare afite mu iterambere ry’igihugu ndetse n’ibibazo bahura nabyo mu mibereho ya buri munsi n’ibisubizo bikwiye kubifatirwa.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yibukije ubutumwa bwa Perezida Kagame ubwo uwo munsi wizihizwaga.
Icyo gihe abinyujije ku rukuta rwa Twitter, yagize ati ““Uyu munsi ni ukwibuka ko uburinganire butareba abagore gusa. 
Nta terambere ryabaho hatabaye ubwitabire n’amahirwe angana kuri bose. Buri wese muri twe afite uruhare mu kurwanya ubusumbane kandi ihezwa nta mwanya rifite mu gihe kiri imbere.”
Abatanze ikiganiro bagarutse ku ntambwe ifatika u Rwanda rwateye mu byiciro birimo uburezi, ubuzima n’ubuvuzi, ubukungu, imiyoborere n’inzego z’ubuyobozi, umutekano n’ubutabera. Bavuze ko ubwiyongere bw’abagore mu nzego zose, bikwiye kwishimirwa no guterwa imbaraga Kandi bigakomeza.
Mu nzego z’ubuyobozi u Rwanda rwakoze amavugurura atandukanye atuma ruza ku myanya ya mbere ku Isi mu kugira umubare munini w’abagore mu nzego zifata ibyemezo, nk’aho mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko bangana na 61%, muri Guverinoma bagera kuri 50 %.
Itegeko Nshinga u Rwanda rugenderaho kuri ubu naryo riha abagore uburenganzira bwo kugira 30% ry’imyanya ifata ibyemezo.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yibukije ko ibi byose byashobotse kubera ubuyobozi bwiza bwa Perezida Paul Kagame yubatse kuva igihugu kivuye mu icuraburindi rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Yakomeje ati “Kuva mu 1962 u Rwanda rubona ubwigenge kugeza mu 1994, umugore n’umwana w’umukobwa nta gaciro bahabwaga haba mu miryango yabo ndetse no muri politiki y’igihugu. Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Guverninoma y’Ubumwe bw’igihugu yashyizweho na FPR ni yo yashyize mu bikorwa politiki yo guha agaciro abagore, kubateza imbere, kubashyigikira muri byose kuko n’ubundi byari muri gahunda ya politiki ya FPR kuva yavuka.’’
U Rwanda kandi rwashyizeho gahunda nyinshi zakozwe zijanye no gufasha abagore mu kwiteza imbere muri rusange.
Abitabiriye ibi biganiro bagaragaje ko iki cyiciro gikeneye kwigwaho byihariye hagamijwe kumenya ibibazo abagore bahuye nabyo mu gihe cya Coronavirus mu buryo bwimbitse n’uko byakemuka kandi abafatanyabikorwa ba Leta bakabyitabira ari benshi.
Hibukijwe kandi ko Umunyarwandakazi kuva kera yagaragaje ubushobozi, ubwitange no kwihangana mu bihe bikomeye nko mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ku buryo bitanga icyizere ko n’ubundi abagore bazashobora kuva mu bibazo batewe na Coronavirus cyane cyane ko Leta ibari inyuma kandi ibashyigikiye muri byose.
Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Sénégal, Karamaga Patrick, yashimye ko umugore yahawe umwanya mu nzego zitandukanye.
Ati “U Rwanda rwateye imbere ariko ntabwo turagera aho dushaka kugera. Bitangirira mu rugo, ku mwana muto, ko umwana w’umukobwa agomba kwiga.’’
Abitabiriye ibiganiro batanze icyifuzo ko muri Diaspora ibiganiro bijyanye n’uburinganire byashyirwamo ingufu cyane cyane mu miryango kugira ngo urubyiruko rwo Rwanda rw’ejo ruzashobore gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Sénégal ifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda baba mu bihugu bya Mali, Gambia, Guinée-Bissau na Cap Vert n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Sénégal, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yibukije ko umugore yahawe ijambo kubera ubuyobozi bwiza bwa Perezida Paul Kagame.
Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Iyubahirizwa ry’ihame ry’Uburinganire n’Ubwuzuzanye mu Rwanda (GMO), Rwabuhihi Rose, yagaragaje ko hari amategeko igihugu cyashyizeho aha ijambo umugore.
Urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda dufite amahirwe, kwinjira nta gukomanga- Uwineza Aline Nelly.
Rwiyemezamirimo Uwineza Aline Nelly yagaragaje ko urubyiruko rwo mu Rwanda rufite amahirwe adasanzwe yarushyiriweho, arufasha kwiteza imbere.
Yabigarutseho mu buhamya yatanze ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bya Scandinavia bizihizaga Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore, wateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda ifite Icyicaro muri Suéde ifatanyije n’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye mu gace k’Ibihugu byo mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi bya Suède, Danemark, Norvège na Finlande.
Uyu munsi ubusanzwe wizihizwa ku wa 8 Werurwe buri mwaka, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Scandinavia, bawizihije ku wa 13 Werurwe 2021.
Witabiriwe na Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango (MIGEPROF), Prof. Jeannette Bayisenge; Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Suède, Nkulikiyinka Christine; rwiyemezamirimo Uwineza Aline n’Umuhanzi Masamba Intore.
Amb. Nkulikiyinka Christine yavuze ko ubushobozi bw’abagore bukwiye gushingirwaho mu kubaka ahazaza heza.
Ati “Kuba abagore bashoboye ngira ngo ntibishidikanywaho, ni yo mpamvu bakwiye kugira uruhare mu iterambere ryo ku giti cyabo, imiryango n’iryu Rwanda aho batuye hose.’’
Yabibukije ko bakwiye guhora bazirikana ko nubwo bari mu mahanga bakwiye kugira u Rwanda ku mutima, bakamenya ibiruberamo ndetse bakabigiramo uruhare.
Yakomeje ati “Muri ibi bihugu byo mu Burayi bw’Amajyaruguru bamaze gutera intambwe ishimishije mu buringanire, nubwo nabo bagifite izindi ntambwe zo gutera. Abanyarwandakazi baba ino, bafite amahirwe yo kwigira ku byiza babona ngo bashobore nabo kwiyubaka ariko badataye umuco wacu.’’
Minisitiri Bayisenge yashimiye abateguye uyu munsi kuko kubikora ugashyirwa mu bikorwa ubwabyo ari iby’agaciro gahambaye.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Ni ibintu byiza cyane byerekana ko mushaka guhura mukaganira ku cyabateza imbere nk’abagore kandi nk’Abanyarwanda muri rusange. Icyo mbifurije kandi nabasaba ni uko mwagumana indangagaciro zizakomeza kubaranga nk’Abanyarwanda, mugakomeza gukunda iwanyu, igihugu cyanyu, mukagira ubumwe bwo pfundo ryo gukorera hamwe no kumvikana, mukanakunda umurimo.’’
Mu buhamya bwe, Uwineza Aline yavuze ko urubyiruko rwashyiriweho amahirwe adasanzwe arufasha kwiteza imbere.
Uwineza Nelly Aline ari mu Banyarwandakazi batekereje bwangu ku musanzu we mu kwimakaza isuku y’ibiganza nk’intwaro yo gutsinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus ubwo yabonekaga mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020. Yakoze hand sanitizer y’umwimerere yise ‘Tropical hand sanitizer’ ndetse ahita ayigeza ku isoko ry’u Rwanda.
Uyu rwiyemezamirimo w’umukobwa yashinze Tropical Brewery and Winery ikora imivinyo n’imiti yica udukoko abantu bakaraba mu ntoki nk’abisiga amavuta (hand sanitizer).
Tropical hand sanitizer ikoze mu birimo igihingwa cy’igikakarubamba cy’umwimerere kiva muri Amerika, alukoro (Isopropyl, ethyl) n’amavuta (essential oil) aboneka mu Rwanda.
Uwineza yavuze ko hari abababereye icyitegererezo mu rugendo rwo kwihangira imirimo.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Dufite abo tureberaho beza kandi imiryango y’u Rwanda irafunguye nta gukomonga winjiye, ku rubyiruko dufite amahirwe rwose.’’
Umugiraneza Léontine wari ukuriye itsinda ry’Abagore bateguye igikorwa cyo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore yasabye abakobwa kuzaba ab’ingenzi mu buzima bwabo.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Muri make ndifuriza abakobwa bacu kuzaba nka Ndabaga, mugire ubutwari nk’ubwe bwatumye atabarira igihugu ari umukobwa.’’
Yashimye ko igikorwa cyagenze neza kuko cyitabiriwe bishimishije n’abantu benshi, anashimira Amb. Nkulikiyinka by’umwihariko ubaha inama akanababa hafi mu bikorwa bitandukanye.
Umuganwa Marie Christine uhagarariye Abagore muri Diaspora Nyarwanda Danmark-Jylland &Fyn, mu ijambo rye na we yashimiye uko umuhango wagenze.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Ibyavuye muri ibi biganiro bizatugirira akamaro kandi dukomeze tubyibakireho mu burere bw’abana bacu no gushyira hamwe nk’abagore bafite u Rwanda nk’igihugu bakunda.’’
Butera Josée yatanze ikiganiro ku ikoranabuhanga n’urubyiruko, ibibi n’ibyiza byaryo, atanga inama asaba ko hazabaho ikiganiro cyihariye kubera ibihe Isi irimo bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga rishobora kuba ryiza ku bana cyangwa kubabera ribi.
Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore waranzwe n’igitaramo cyayobowe na Masamba Intore n’itsinda yari ayoboye, bataramiye abawitabiriye.
Uyu muhango wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga nk’uburyo bwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Scandinavia bizihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.
Amb. Hategeka yasabye urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga kwima amatwi abapfobya Jenoside.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, Emmanuel Hategeka, yasabye urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga kwima amatwi no kwamagana abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Yabigarutseho ku wa 21 Gicurasi 2021 ubwo Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, Arabia Saoudite na Bahrain bibukaga ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ni umuhango wabereye i Dubai muri UAE abandi bakurikira mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwibuka hanubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19.
Muri uyu muhango, Ambasaderi Hategeka yibukije ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ari ugutsindwa kwa muntu ndetse n’umuryango mpuzamahanga mu mateka ya vuba aha. Yasabye urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga kwima amatwi no kwamagana abahakana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagize ati “Hashize imyaka 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe. Gusa ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside iracyahari ndetse abakekwaho kugira uruhare muri jenoside bakidegembya bakomeje gukwirakwiza ingengabitekerezo yayo. Ndabasaba by’umwihariko urubyiruko, mwe Rwanda rw’ejo, kwima amatwi abahakana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mwime amatwi abashaka kubarangaza barajwe ishinga no gusubiza inyuma u Rwanda.”
Ambasaderi Hategeka kandi yibukije abakuru ko bafite inshingano zo kuvuga amateka y’ukuri kugira ngo abato n’abandi batayazi bayamenye. Yibukije amahanga ko kuvuga ko jenoside itazongera kuba ukundi bidahagije ahubwo bisaba ibikorwa.
“Twongeye guhamagarira amahanga kongera kwiyemeza ko jenoside itazasubira binyuze mu gushyikiriza ubutabera abakekwaho kugira uruhare muri jenoside bakidegembya. Mu bo u Rwanda rwatanze impapuro zisaba ko batabwa muri yombi 1,100 baracyidegembya.”
Umunyamabanga wa leta ushinzwe ubutwererane mpuzamahanga muri UAE, Reem Ebrahim Al Hashimy, yagaragaje ko igihugu cye cyifatanyije n’u Rwanda ndetse n’Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati “Ntewe ishema no guhagararira igihugu cyanjye muri iki gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 27 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Uyu ni umwanya w’ingenzi mu kwibuka inzirakarengane no gufata mu mugongo abarakotse. Ni umwanya kandi wo kwiyemeza ko ibyabaye bitazasubira ukundi.”
“Abaturage n’ubuyobozi bwa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu twifatanyije cyane n’abavandimwe bari mu Rwanda n’ubuyobozi bw’ u Rwanda burangajwe imbere na Nyakubahawa Perezida Paul Kagame twubaha cyane. Dukomeje kugira imibanire myiza n’u Rwanda.”
Reem Al Hashimy yongeyeho ati “Twifatanyije namwe, turasenga ngo ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi ndetse tugomba gukorera hamwe mu kurwanya icyitwa urwango cyose n’ubuhezanguni.”
Umunyemari Ashish J. Thakkar, washinze uruganda rwa Mara Phones ndetse akaba n’umunyamigabane muri sosiyete Atlas Mara ni umwe mu batanze ibiganiro nk’inshuti y’u Rwanda.
Yavuze ko mu myaka 27 ishize u Rwanda rwagize umugisha wo kugira ubuyobozi bureba kure kuko ngo iyo bitaba ibyo igihugu nticyari kuba kigeze ku ntambwe cyateye.
Mu bandi batanze ibiganiro harimo Dr Bideri Diogene wagaragaje amateka y’uburyo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yateguwe igihe kirekire, agaragaza ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi itabaye impanuka.
Uyu muhango kandi waranzwe no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere, ubuhamya ndetse n’indirimbo zirimo ubutumwa bwo kwibuka no kwiyubaka.
Kwibuka 27: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Perth-Australia bibutse abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Kuri uyu wa 16 Gicurasi, Abanyarwanda batuye mu mujyi wa Perth mu Burengerazuba bwa Australie bibutse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku nshuro ya 27, mu muhango witabiriwe n’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo bagera ku 150.
Mu bashyitsi bitabiriye uyu muhango wo kwibuka, harimo wa Meya w’Umujyi wa Stirling, Mark Irwin, wakunze kwitabira ibikorwa byo kwibuka kuva muri 2017.
Harimo kandi abahagarariye imiryango y’abaturuka mu bindi bihugu batuye muri Australie. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore ari na we Uhagarariye u Rwanda muri Australie, Nouvelle-Zélande na Indonesie, akaba yitabiriye uyu muhango mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Ni umuhango waranzwe no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere ndetse no gufata umwanya wo guha icyubahiro abazize Jenocide yakorewe abatutsi, ndetse hanatangwa ubuhamya.
Muri uyu muhango kandi, urubyiruko rwavutse nyuma ya Jenocide yakorewe Abatutsi kandi rugakurira muri Australie, rukaba ruhuriye mu mushinga wa ‘Amateka Series’, rwamuritse bimwe mu bikoresho byakoreshejwe muri Jenocide yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse n’imbwirwaruhame zavuzwe mu gutegura Jenoside, nka bimwe mu bizaba bigize umushinga bateganya gutangiza muri iki cyumweru wo kumurika mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga amateka ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, uko yateguwe, uko yashyizwe mu bikorwa n’uko Abanyarwanda bagerageza gukira ibikomere no kwiyubaka.
Mu buhamya bwe, umwe mu barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yagaragaje uko Jenocide yateguwe, yashyizwe mu bikorwa, imibereho y’abarokotse nyuma yo kurokoka, nzira ndende kandi y’umusaraba yanyuzemo kugeza arokotse n’urugamba rwo kurwanya abahakana n’abapfobya Jenoside.
Uwavuze ahagarariye Abanyarwanda batuye muri Perth (RCA-Perth) Ernest Kalisa, yashimiye abitabiriye igikorwa cyo kwibuka cyane cyane urubyiruko rwavutse nyuma ya Jenoside, avuga ko berekana umuhate wo kwiga amateka y’u Rwanda no guharanira ko Jenoside itazongera kubaho ukundi.
Kalisa yibukije ko kwibuka ari inshingano za buri wese mu rwego rwo kuzirikana ku ngaruka z’amacakubiri na politiki y’ivangura ndetse ashimira ingabo za FPR-Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside, anasaba buri wese kwibaza uko byari kugenda iyo FPR itagoboka u Rwanda ngo ihashye burundu abicanyi, ati “Ubu Isi iba ivuga andi mateka kuko nta n’uwo kubara inkuru wari gusigara.”
Ambassaderi Jean de Dieu Uwihanganye, yavuze ko ku barokotse, kwibuka ari ibya buri munsi, ariko ko igikorwa nk’iki ‘gituma dufatanyiriza hamwe guha icyubahiro abacu bazize Jenoside, gufata mu mugongo abarokotse, no kuzirikana imizi n’intandaro bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994’.
Yongeyeho ati: “Iyo twibuka, tuba kandi duha icyubahiro abitanze kugira ngo Jenoside ihagarare.”
Ambasaderi Uwihanganye yavuze ko “Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yahisemo gushyira imbere gahunda ya ‘Ndi Umunyarwanda’ no kurenga amacakubiri y’ubwoko. Kwiyunga no kurwanya amacakubiri si igikorwa cyoroshye cy’igihe gito, ahubwo ni urugendo rusaba gushyira hamwe ku bari mu gihugu no hanze yacyo.”
Uku gushyira hamwe gukwiye kwifashishwa mu kurwanya abapfobya bakanahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatusi.
Ati “Ikibabaje ariko kidatangaje, ni uko hari abakinangiye imitima bahakana kandi bagapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ndetse n’abakwirakwiza ko habaye jenoside ebyiri. Icyiza gusa ni uko Leta y’u Rwanda yiyemeje kutazajenjekera uwo ari we wese uhakana cyangwa ngo apfobye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi agamije kudusubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo.”
Meya w’Umujyi wa Stirling, Mark Irwin, yashimiye Abanyarwanda baba muri Perth, avuga ko Isi ikwiye kubigiraho kugira intero ya “Ntibizongera” mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Jenoside yazongera kubaho ahandi hantu ku Isi.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko umuhango wo kwibuka utanga ubutumwa ndetse ukaba n’isomo ku bandi, kuko ari bumwe mu buryo bwo gukumira ko Jenoside yazongera kubaho ukundi.
Nasubiye iwacu ndahayoberwa, ishingwa rya Ibuka-France mu ngorane: Ibikubiye mu gitabo cya Mutuyisa Brossard.
Espérance Mutuyisa Brossard yashyize hanze igitabo “Mon histoire rwandaise, Ibuka (souviens-toi) : ma vie et mes combats (Amateka yanjye nk’umunyarwanda, amateka ya Ibuka n’intambara narwanye”, kigaruka ku mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yaciyemo n’uburyo umuryango we wishwe n’abari inshuti.
Yavuze uburyo nyina yishwe n’abana yigishaga, barumuna be bakicwa n’abana biganye.
Espérance Mutuyisa Brossard mwene Kayihura na Munganyamariya Pétronille, yavukiye muri Nyaruhengeri ya Butare tariki ya 28 Ukuboza 1961 akaba imfura iwabo mu muryango w’abana bane. Mu bana bavukana, harokotse babiri.
Mutuyisa, ni umubyeyi w’abana babiri, Umuriza-Brossard Jonathan w’imyaka 30 na Kayihura-Brossard Mickaël ufite imyaka 28.
Uyu mubyeyi wagizwe Umuyobozi mukuru w’icyubahiro uhoraho na Ibuka France, yize ibijyanye n’ibaruramari (Comptable), ari nabyo akora mu gihe cy’imyaka irenga 20 mu isomero (Bibliothèques) rihurirwemo n’imijyi 47, rifite ikicaro mu mujyi wa Niort.
Muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Mutuyisa yiciwe abavandimwe barimo Uwambazisa Janviére, Ufituwe Marie-Thérèse na nyina Munganyamariya Pétronille.
Mu kiganiro kirambuye na IGIHE, Espérance Mutuyisa Brossard yavuze ko igitabo “Mon histoire rwandaise, Ibuka (souviens-toi) : ma vie et mes combats” yacyanditse agamije guha agaciro abe bishwe muri Jenoside.
Yavuze ko ikindi cyamuteye imbaraga zo kwandika, ari ukugaragaza uburyo Abatutsi batangiye gutotezwa kuva kera.
Ati “Igice cya mbere kivuga uko Abanyarwanda babanaga mbere y’abakoloni, uko ubuzima bwabo bwahindutse nyuma y’aho Abakoloni bahageze, nerekana uko habayeho itotezwa ry’Abatutsi ku bwa Parmuhutu kugeza hakozwe Jenoside.”
“Mbere y’ibyo byose navuze uko nanjye nabayeho aho nkomoka, uko nabayeho niruka mu bindi bihugu kimwe n’abandi twari dusangiye ikibazo.”
Impamvu nyamukuru yo kwandika, Mutuyisa avuga ko byatewe n’ikiganiro yakurikiranye muri Gicurasi 2016 cyatambutse kuri France Inter aho umunyamakuru Natacha Polony yaganiraga na Raphaël Glucksmann wakoze film documentaire izwi ku mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yise ‘Tuez-les tous’
Muri icyo kiganiro, Natacha Polony yabwiye Raphaël Glucksmann ko ngo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ‘ari amasarigoma yarwanaga n’andi.” Byababaje cyane Mutuyisa, ashaka icyo yakora ngo abahakanyi nk’abo n’abapfobya Jenoside babihagarike.
Ati “Nibwo mbitekerejeho bimbuza gusinzira, bukeye niyemeza kwerekana ibyakozwe byose mu Bufaransa igihugu cyagize ubufatanye na Leta y’abicanyi, mbereka ibyagezweho mu kurwanya abahakana n’abapfobya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ntangira nerekana uko Ibuka-France yashinzwe n’indi miryango ifasha abacitse ku icumu rya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, dufatanyije n’Abafaransa bari mu bice no mu mirimo itandukanye bumva akababaro kacu, baharanira ko habaho ubutabera, ubucamanza bugata muri yombi ababigizemo uruhare bose bari ku butaka bw’u Bufaransa.”
Ku bijyanye n’ishingwa rya Ibuka-France, Mutuyisa yagize ati “Kuva nagera mu Bufaransa ntabwo nicaye kubera amateka yanjye nashatse uburyo bwose bushoboka dushinga Ibuka-France, muri iki gitabo nanditse impamvu yo gusiga amateka, inzitizi twahuye nazo.”
“Ibuka-France tuyitangira rero nabanje kujya mu Rwanda mbona neza uko ibintu byagenze kuko Jenoside yabaye njye ndi hanze n’umugabo wanjye aho twari mu kazi, nyuma ngaruka mu Bufaransa icyo gihe twafatanyaga na Adelaide Mukantabana, Dr Bizimana Jean Damascène, Esperance Patureau n’abandi. Hari uburyo twajyaga dutegura kwibuka hano dutuye ariko tukagira ibibazo kuko twabikoraga mu bushobozi bwa buri wese kuko hari hatarajyaho association tubikoreramo.”
Mutuyisa yavuze ko inzitizi zindi bahuraga nazo ari uko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi itari yakwemezwa na Loni, bigatuma nta wumva uburemere bw’igikorwa cyo kwibuka. Ati “Kandi n’ imibanire y’ibihugu byacu byombi ntiyagendaga neza nubwo ibyo njye numvaga bitatureba cyane.”
Nyuma yo kwemererwa gushinga Ibuka France havutse ibindi bibazo kuko ibigo bimwe byangaga gukorana n’uwo muryango mushya, bavuga ko baje guteza akaduruvayo bahiga abakoze Jenoside ku butaka bw’Abufaransa.
No mu biro bishinzwe iperereza mu Bufaransa ngo ntibabashiraga amakenga kuko bagiye bahamagazwa kenshi, bashinjwa kuba abakozi ba Kagame na FPR.
Ati “ Twigeze gutumira Perezida wa Ibuka-Rwanda ngo aze atuganirize uko mu gihugu bimeze, u Bufaransa bubima Visa, ubwo iyo twajyaga kwibuka ibiro by’iperereza byahitaga binsaba uko gahunda iteganyijwe, nkayibaha nkababwira ko ntacyo duhisha.”
“Bari baratubujije no kugira aho duhurira ngo twibuke, ahubwo bagaha urubuga abajenosideri, babaha uburenganzira bwo kujya gukora imyigaragambyo twe rwose bakatwangira, nibwo nifashishaga SOS racisme na UEJF ( Union des Étudiants Juifs de France) bakadushakira aho duhurira, nyuma u Bufaransa bwaje kujya buduha ahantu ariko hadashobotse.”
Yavuze ko na za Kiliziya zari zarabimye aho gukorera imihango yo kwibuka, bavuga ko ngo batabaha urubuga rwo gukoreramo politiki.
Icyakora, Mutuyisa avuga ko nubwo bahuye n’ingorane, bishimira kuba kuri ubu byarakemutse Ibuka France igakora neza.
Ati “Uyu munsi rero ndishimye kuko ibyo byose byaje gukemuka. Uzi kubona ukuntu twamaganwaga ntawe utwumva hano mu Bufaransa kuko tuvuze jenoside yakorerwe Abatutsi, nta muntu n’umwe utwemera, ariko uyu munsi haremejwe itegeko rihana uyihakana.
Uyu munsi mu Bufaransa Perezida Macron akaba yaremeje ko tariki 7 Mata buri mwaka ari umunsi wo kwibuka mu gihugu cyose jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ni intambwe ishimishije.” Kandi jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ikigishwa no mu mashuri yose mu bufaransa.
Muri ki gitabo kandi Mutuyisa yagarutse ku bikorwa bitandukanye umuryango Ibuka-France wagezeho, nk’imanza zitandukanye zarezwemo abapfobya n’abahakana n’abasize bakoze jenoside n’ibindi.
Mutuyisa mu gitabo cye avugamo uburyo abo mu muryango we bishwe bazira ko ari Abatutsi, bigakorwa n’abantu bari basanzwe baziranye, banagiriye neza.
Papa na Mama ba Mutuyisa bari abarimu muri Kibirizi, babanye neza n’abantu bose kuri uwo musozi.
Ati “Ni ahantu twabaye neza, tubana n’abantu bose neza kandi bishimiye uko ababyeyi banjye bigishaga abana b’abaturanyi.”
“Kibirizi rero ukaba umusozi mwiza cyane nkuko mbivuga mu gitabo, ariko sinawugiriyemo amahirwe igihe cyose kuko n’ubwo nari umuhanga ntabwo nigeze mpabwa ishuri rya Leta nk’abandi, ndangije amashuri abanza, byabaye ngombwa ko njya kwiga i Burundi mu buryo bugoranye cyane.”
Yavuze ko kuba hatashywe inyubako nshya za ambasade, ari umukoro ku Banyamerika wo gukomeza umutima wo gufasha no gushyigikira iterambere ry’u Rwanda.
Ahagana saa cyenda, Bush na Laura bagiye muri Lycée de Kigali kuganira n’abanyeshuri baho ibijyanye no kwirinda SIDA, ahava ahawe inkoni ya Kinyarwanda nk’impano.
Ubwo yageraga ku kibuga cy’indege atashye, yaganiriye gato n’abasirikare bari baravuye mu butumwa bw’amahoro mu Ntara ya Darfur muri Sudani, dore ko igihugu cye cyari kimaze iminsi gitanga amahugurwa ku ngabo zigiye kujya mu butumwa bw’amahoro.
Lambda, ubwoko bushya bwa Covid-19 budakangwa n’inkingo.
Abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Chile bahangayikishijwe n’ubwoko bushya bwa Covid-19 bwitwa Lambda bwagaragaye bwa mbere muri Peru, bufite ubushobozi bwo kwihagararaho imbere y’inkingo za Covid-19 ziri gutangwa.
Ubu bwoko burimo gukwirakwira cyane aho bumaze kugera mu bihugu 30 ku Isi yose, ariko bukiganza mu bihugu byo muri Amerika y’Epfo, birimo nka Peru aho 80% by’abarwayi ba Covid-19 barwaye iy’ubu bwoko. Iri kandi mu bihugu nka Chile, Argentine, Equateur n’ibindi.
Igiteye impungenge ni uko ibyo bihugu bigifite ubwiyongere bwa Covid-19 nubwo biri kwitwara neza mu bikorwa by’ikingira, ibituma abantu bibaza niba inkingo zakorewe mu Bushinwa ziri gutangwa muri Amerika y’Epfo zifite ubushobozi bwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Covid-19.
OMS ivuga ko hakenewe ubushakashatsi buzemeza niba ubu bwoko bwa Covid-19 bufite ubudahangarwa ku cyorezo cya Covid-19.
Ibyamenyekanye kuri “Lambda” na “Epsilon”; ubundi bwoko bwa COVID-19 yihinduranya.
Mu bwoko butandatu bumaze kugaragara, bune bubarwa nk’ubuhangayikishije. Ubwo ni Alpha yabonetse bwa mbere mu Bwongereza, Beta yaturutse muri Afurika y’Epfo, Delta yavumbuwe mu Buhinde na Gamma yagaragaye bwa mbere muri Brésil.
Bwose bwandura ku muvuduko uri hejuru ugereranyije na COVID-19 [iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus] isanzwe nubwo nabwo burutanwa hagati yabwo, ndetse inyigo zitandukanye zagaragaje ko inkingo zifashishwa hirya no hino zitagira ubushobozi bwo guhangana nabwo ku rwego rumwe n’ubwo zihangana na COVID-19 yavumbuwe i Wuhan mu Bushinwa.
Nka Delta kuva yaboneka mu mpera za 2020, imaze kugera mu bihugu birenga 100 birimo n’u Rwanda kandi ku wa 11 Kamena 2021 habarwaga ko 90% by’abanduye mu Bwongereza ari yo bafite; ubu 51,7% by’abandura muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ni yo basanganwa, mu Bufaransa abandura 50% ni yo bafite, naho mu Buhinde aho yahereye bivugwa ko 70% by’abanduye mu nkundura ya kabiri yahitanaga ibihumbi buri munsi mu ntangiriro za 2021 ari yo basanganywe.
Ni yo ihangayikishije kurusha izindi zose bitewe n’uko ikwirakwira bwangu ugereranyije nazo, kandi abarwayi bayo bakaremba mu buryo bwihuse.
Alpha yo imaze kugera mu bihugu bisaga 170, Beta mu birenga 120, naho Gamma yagaragaye mu birenga 70.
Ubwoko bwagaragaye mu duce tumwe na tumwe bukatuzahaza ariko ntibwitwe ko buhangayikishije, burimo Lambda yaturutse muri Peru muri Kanama 2020. Habarurwa ko kuva muri Mutarama uyu mwaka 71% by’abandura Coronavirus muri icyo gihugu ari yo bafite.
Nubwo imaze kugera mu bihugu 29 ndetse ikaba yibasiye Afurika y’Epfo cyane, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) riherutse kwemeza ko idahangayikishije.
Abashakashatsi bamwe bagaragaza ko ibaye ikwirakwira vuba bikiyongera ku kuba n’inkingo nka CoronaVac rw’Abashinwa [rwakozwe na Sosiyete yitwa Sinovac Biotech] zicika intege imbere yayo byatuma mu minsi iri imbere izaba ihangayikishije.
Abandi bemeza ko itazahangayikisha kuko inkingo zakozwe mu buryo bwa mRNA nka Pfizer na Moderna zagaragaje ko zishobora guhangana nayo ndetse bikaba bitarasobanuka neza niba ikwirakwira vuba cyane kuko aho yasanzwe akenshi igaragara ku baba bakoze ingendo zambukiranya imipaka.
Nta bimenyetso byihariye Lambda igira, abayandura n’ubundi baba bafite ibirimo guhinda umuriro, inkorora no kudakora neza kw’ibyiyumviro by’ururimi n’amazuru.
Ubundi bwoko bufatwa nk’ubudahangayikishije ni Epsilon bwagaragaye bwa mbere i California muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu mpera za 2020.
Muri Mutarama 2021 abaganga b’Ibitaro bya Cedars-Sinai biri i Los Angeles batangaje ko 50% by’abasanganywe icyorezo muri uko kwezi bari baranduye Epsilon, naho muri Gashyantare 16% by’ubwandu bushya muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bwari ubwayo.
Byatumye Ikigo gishinzwe Kurwanya Indwara (CDC) muri icyo gihugu kiyishyira mu zihangayikishije, ariko bigeze muri Kamena iboneka kuri 1% by’abayanduye gusa bituma noneho ifatwa nk’idakanganye.
Ikigo gishinzwe Kurwanya Indwara mu Burayi nacyo cyemeje ko Epsilon idakwiye kongerwa ku zihangayikishije kuko itagiye iboneka ku migabane yose mu buryo busanzwe nk’izindi, ahubwo aho igaragara hamwe na hamwe iba yahagejejwe n’abahakoreye ingendo.
Inyigo ya Kaminuza ya Washington yerekanye ko Epsilon ifite uburyo butatu yihinduranyamo (mutations), ku buryo ubudahangarwa umubiri uba warakuye ku rukingo rwa COVID-19 cyangwa wararemye nyuma yo kuyikira, bugabanukaho inshuro ziri hagati y’ebyiri n’eshatu n’igice mu gihe ubwo bwoko bugeze mu mubiri.
Kubera ko ubukana yari ifite ikigaragara bwagabanutse ndetse ikaba itarakwirakwira mu bihugu byinshi ku Isi, abashakashatsi bavuga ko idakwiye guhangayikisha.
Abarenga miliyoni 186,4 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Isi yose, aho muri bo abasaga miliyoni 170,5 bayikize, naho abarenga miliyoni enye ikaba imaze kubahitana.
Kugaruza inguzanyo zatanzwe muri VUP byabaye agatereranzamba.
Ibi byagaragajwe n’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta muri raporo ye avuga ko hari gahunda yo kugaruza inguzanyo yatanzwe mu gihe cy’imyaka 11 ishize ariko inzego z’ibanze zikaba zitarigeze zikora raporo ku mafaranga yabasha kugaruzwa cyangwa uburyo azagaruzwa.
Gahunda ya VUP yatangijwe mu 2008 ifite intumbero yo guhangana n’ubukene no kwivana mu bukene nk’imwe mu nkingi z’Umuryango w’Abibumbye zigamije iterambere rirambye yo kurandura ubukene bukabije mu 2030 ariko u Rwanda rwifuzaga kubigeraho mbere y’imyaka icumi n’ubwo bitagezwe.
Kuba hatabaho uburyo buhamye bwo kugaruza ayo mafaranga bituma atagera ku bagenerwabikorwa benshi ngo bikure mu bukene.
Muri gahunda ya VUP amafaranga yatangwaga mu byiciro bitatu bitandukanye birimo abashoboye gukora bahabwaga imirimo, inguzanyo zo gutangiza imishinga mito mu rwego rwo kwiteza imbere n’amafaranga yahabwaga abageze mu za bukuru (inkunga y’ingoboka) batagishoboye gukora agamije kubafasha kubaho mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Ibi ariko ntituri bubitindeho, reka twigarukire ku cyiciro cyo gukoresha abaturage bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 65 bari bagize 40% by’abaturage bashoboraga gukora muri icyo gihe ndetse bamwe muri bo bagahabwa n’inguzanyo ngo bitangirire imishinga.
Mu gutanga izi nguzanyo hibandwaga cyane ku bakorera mu makoperative kugira ngo bahuze imbaraga bazamurane, mu bihe bitandukanye hagiye hakorwa igenzura bagasanga amwe mu makoperative yari baringa, yarashinzwe agamije kurigisa amafaranga yagenewe kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Muri raporo y’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta ya 2019/20, yerekana neza ko amafaranga 5 794 922 324 Frw yatanzwe nk’inguzanyo zo guteza imbere Abanyarwanda kugeza muri Kamena 2020 hari hamaze kugaruzwa 390 947 193 Frw bingana 8% by’ayatanzwe gusa. Nyamara muri icyo gihe cyose cy’imyaka isaga 11 ishize nta raporo igaragaza ashobora kugaruzwa n’atagaruzwa, bigatuma habaho kudindira.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere ibikorwa by’iterambere mu nzego z’ibanze,LODA, gifite mu nshingano zacyo gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere, gahunda mbaturabukungu EDPRS na VUP ntikigeze kigaragaza uburyo bwo kugaruza ayo mafaranga angana na 82% by’ayatanzwe.
Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta yasabye LODA gufatanya n’inzego z’uturere hagakorwa raporo igaragaza amafaranga yagarujwe n’ataragaruzwa kandi bagashyira imbaraga mu kugaruza ayo babona ba nyiri kuyatwara bafitiye ubushobozi bwo kuzishyura.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa LODA, Nyinawagaga Claudine Marie Solange, yavuze ko impamvu amafaranga atagarujwe ku gihe byatewe n’amakosa aba mu itangwa ry’izo nguzanyo n’imbogamizi zo kuba amakuru ajyanye nazo yarabikwaga mu makayi.
Ati “Kubera ko zimaze igihe kinini, inyinshi zatanzwe tudafite uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwo gutanga amakuru bityo ugasanga hari nk’umuntu wimutse dufite amazina naho atuye ariko tudafite indangamuntu kuko ni inguzanyo zatanzwe mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ya 2008/09, ugasanga inguzanyo zirandikwa mu makayi ariko ugasanga nta ndangamuntu yewe harimo n’abari batarabona telefoni icyo gihe.”
Yavuze ko kandi impamvu zo gutinda kwishyura aho baboneye uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga, hari aho baburaga amakuru yuzuye kuri wa muntu watwaye inguzanyo.
Ati “Ikibazo cya mbere byari ukumenya amakuru ku bimutse aho bari batuye, amakuru ku bitabye Imana ndetse n’imishinga imwe n’imwe yagiye ihomba cyane bitewe n’amapfa n’ibindi bibazo ugasanga umuturage yari asanzwe afite amikoro make, inguzanyo yayihawe ngo yiteze imbere ariko yagize ikibazo arahomba.”
Yavuze ko hari gahunda yo gukusanya amakuru bagamije kumenya umuntu wese utarishyura inguzanyo ufite ubushobozi, kumenya uwaba yarapfuye atishyuye, hagamijwe gusobanura amafaranga ashobora kugaruzwa n’atagaruzwa.
Ku bazasangwa bafite ubushobozi biteganyijwe ko bazagirana amasezerano mashya agenga imyishyurire ku buryo nyuma y’umwaka umwe gusa ni ukuvuga ko mu mwaka wa 2022 amafaranga ashobora kugaruzwa azaba yaragarujwe.
Uyu muyobozi yagaragaje ko muri ibi bihe, izi nguzanyo zisigaye zitangwa mu buryo bwizewe kuko zinyuzwa muri Koperative Umurenge SACCO ziri mu mirenge ndetse hanashyizweho abantu bashinzwe gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga yakirwa inguzanyo.
Gutinda kwishyurwa ku bakoze imirimo
Uretse ibibazo byo kudakurikirana amafaranga yatanzwe nk’inguzanyo, muri VUP, hakunze kuvugwa no kutishyura abakozi ku gihe, ibintu byabakomaga mu nkokora mu kwiteza imbere kabone n’ubwo bakoraga ariko hari abagorwaga no kwibeshaho.
Ubusanzwe muri iyi gahunda byari biteganyijwe ko abakozi bagomba guhembwa nibura nyuma y’iminsi cumi n’itanu ariko si ko byagendaga kuko wasangaga abaturage babogoza kugira ngo bishyurwe.
Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta yagaragaje ko mu turere turindwi habayeho gukererwa kwishyura abakozi amafaranga angana na miliyoni 142,3 Frw kandi ubwo bukererwe bwari butwaye iminsi 309 bingana n’amezi 10 abantu bakoze batarahembwa kandi ariho bari bategeye.
Nko mu 2018 hagaragajwe ko abakoze muri gahunda za VUP hishyuwe miliyoni 975,5 Frw nyuma y’ubukererwe bw’iminsi 187.
Nyinawagaga yabwiye IGIHE ko ibibazo byo gutinda kwishyura abakozi kuri ubu byamaze gushakirwa umuti ariko nabyo byaterwaga ahanini n’uburyo amakuru y’abakozi yatangwagamo.
Ati “Twaricaye tubanza kureba ngo byaraterwaga n’iki, dusanga ari uko wasangaga abaturage barakoze ariko lisite zihemba zikozwe impitagihe, aho twashyizeho uburyo bwo kuzikora mu buryo bwihuse, icya kabiri wasangaga iyo amafaranga yageraga ku karere rimwe na rimwe nta guhana amakuru hagati y’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akarere n’Umuyobozi ushinzwe imibereho myiza, ikindi cyagararaye ni uko hari n’aho uturere twoherezaga amafaranga kuri SACCO nazo zikaryama.”
Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta yasabye ko mu kugera ku iterambere ryifuzwa, Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, MINALOC, LODA n’inzego z’Intara bakwiye gutekereza umushinga ari uko uturere twerekanye ko twateguye n’uburyo butarambiranye bwo kwishyura abakoze imirimo kuko akenshi ariho baba bateze amaramuko.
Perezida Suluhu yaciye amarenga ku bwiyongere bwa Covid-19 muri Tanzania.
Ibi yabivuze ko ubwo yari ari kuva mu Murwa Mukuru Dodoma, agatungurwa no kubona ikivunge cy’abaturage benshi bahagararanye begerenye kandi batambaye udupfukamunwa ahitwa Kibaigwa.
The East African dukesha iyi nkuru yavuze ko Perezida Suluhu yavuze ko imijyi mikuru yose muri Tanzania ifite abarwayi ba Coronavirus benshi bityo ko abantu badakwiriye kwirara.
Ati “Inkubiri ya Gatatu yamaze kugera mu gihugu, ntacyo twabahisha. Dufite abarwayi muri Kagera, Arusha, Mwanza, Dar es Salaam ndetse na Dodoma.”
“Ndabona hano ari abantu bake bambaye udupfukamunwa kandi nabo batwambaye nabi kuko bapfutse umunwa gusa amazuru yabo bayasiga agaragara. Ku bw’iyo mpamvu rero ndasaba buri wese uri hano gukurikiza amabwiriza yose yo kwirinda Coronavirus nk’uko tubisabwa n’inzobere mu buzima.”
Perezida Suluhu avuze ibi mu gihe hari hashize igihe gito yeruye agatangaza ko noneho muri Tanzania hari abarwayi ba Covid-19 mu gihe iki gihugu cyaherukaga kubitangaza muri Gicurasi 2020.
Icyo gihe Suluhu yavuze ko kuba muri Tanzania hari abarwayi ba Coronavirus bikwiriye gukangura buri wese akirinda, kugira ngo barinde ko habaho impfu nyinshi za Covid-19.
Afurika y’Epfo : Urukiko rwateye utwatsi icyifuzo cya Zuma cyo gusubika igifungo.
Kugeza ubu Zuma afunzwe nyuma y’aho Urukiko rw’Ikirenga rumukatiye gufungwa amezi 15 azira kwanga kwitaba Komisiyo Ishinzwe Kugenzura Ibyaha bya Ruswa byaranze ingoma ye kuva mu 2009 kugeza mu 2018, ubwo yamukoragaho iperereza.
Nubwo yishyikirije polisi mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatatu, Zuma ntabwo yemera igihano yakatiwe.
Yatanze ubusabe bwo kurekurwa biteganyijwe ko buzasuzumwa n’Urukiko Rushinzwe Itegeko Nshinga, ku wa Mbere w’icyumweru gitaha.
Hagati aho ariko Umucamanza mu Rukiko Rukuru rwa Pietermaritzburg ukurikirana urubanza rwa Zuma, yamaganye ubu busabe.
Bamwe mu bashyigikiye Zuma bigaragambije mu bice bitandukanye byo mu Ntara ya KwaZulu-Natal atuyemo batwika amapine mu mihanda, bamagana ifungwa rye.
Jacob Zuma ashinjwa kuba yaremereye bamwe mu bagize ikigo cya Gupta afitemo inyungu, kugira uruhare mu byemezo yafashe birimo ibirebana n’amasezerano akomeye y’ubucuruzi ndetse n’ibyo gushyira abaminisitiri mu myanya.
Perezida Suluhu yaciye amarenga ku bwiyongere bwa Covid-19 muri Tanzania.
Uganda: Perezida Museveni yasabye inzego z’umutekano guhigisha uruhindu abakwirakwiza ko yapfuye.
Ku wa 26 Kamena 2021 ni bwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hatangiye gucicikana amakuru ko Perezida Museveni yapfuye, ababisakaje bagasobanura ko ngo yazize indwara z’ubuhumekero zifitanye isano na COVID-19.
Nyuma y’aho yagiye agaragara mu ruhame ariko aho ageze “abaturage bakagwa mu kantu” kuko abenshi babaga bazi ko yapfuye. Ibyo bihuha ngo byakomeje gukwirakwizwa cyane n’abantu bifashisha imbuga zitandukanye zirimo na Facebook ariko bagahisha imyirondoro yabo nyayo nk’uko Dail Monitor yabitangaje.
Kuko imbuga nkoranyambaga muri icyo gihugu zifunzwe kuva mu minsi y’amatora yabaye mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka, abaturage benshi basigaye bizera ibihuha kurusha amakuru ya nyayo by’umwihariko iyo babibonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Ubwo yari mu muhango w’irahira ry’abaminisitiri kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 8 Nyakanga 2021, Perezida Museveni yavuganye umujinya uko yageze i Bombo mu Karere ka Luweero abaturage bakikanga kuko bari bazi ko yapfuye.
Yakomeje ati “Nk’uko mubizi imbuga nkoranyambaga ziravuga ko Museveni yapfuye. [Abashinzwe umutekano] bakwiye kugaragaza uwazanye iyo nkuru vuba na bwangu.”
Yahize ko na we ubwe ari bufashe abashinzwe umutekano gushakisha isoko y’ibyo bihuha, ati “Nkeneye gufatanya nabo tukakugeraho. Waba uri mu Burayi, turakwihannye tukubwira ngo ujye mu kuzimu kuko urimo gutakaza igihe cy’abantu.”
Perezida Museveni ayoboye manda ye ya Gatandatu kuva mu 1986. Ni manda itaravuzweho rumwe kuko amatora yatsindiyemo Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) bari bahanganye bikomeye yavuzwemo ubujura bw’amajwi no guhohotera bamwe mu baturage bigatuma badatora, mu gihe hari na site z’itora zabuzeho ibikoresho ahandi udusanduku tw’amajwi tukaburirwa irengero. Yabonye intsinzi ku majwi 58,64%, Bobi Wine agira 34,83%.

Uganda: Bapfumuwe ibirenge, imigongo ihindurwa ibisebe - Iyicarubozo ryakorewe abakekwaho kurasa Gen Katumba.
Abagabo bakekwaho kurasa imodoka ya Minisitiri w’Umurimo n’Ubwikorezi muri Uganda, Gen Edward Katumba Wamala, bagahitana umukobwa we n’umushoferi beretse itangazamakuru iyicarubozo bakorewe, ubwo bavaga mu rukiko rw’ibanze rwa Nakawa nyuma y’iminsi irindwi batawe muri yombi.
Aba bagabo bashinjwa kugaba igitero ku modoka ya Gen Katumba ku itariki ya 1 Kamena 2021, gihitana umukobwa we Brenda Nantongo Katumba wari umaze igihe gito avuye kwiga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 2021, Polisi ya Uganda yatangaje ko yafashe abagabo bakekwaho uruhare muri icyo gikorwa, ariko babiri muri bo baraswa bashaka gutoroka barapfa.
Mu batawe muri yombi benshi bitwaga amazina atari ayabo, aho harimo uwitwa Kamada Walusimbi wiyitaga Mudinka, Hussein Wahab Lubwama bakunze kwita Master, Siriman Kisambira uzwi ku izina rya Mukwasi, Mustafa Kawawa Ramadan witwaga Amin, Muhammad Kagugube witwaga Bafumoya. Abishwe ni uwitwa Lubwama na Kawawa
Ubwo bari bajyanwe kuburanishwa ku rukiko rw’ibanze rwa Nakawa, beretse itangazamakuru iyicarubozo bakorewe ubwo umucamanza, Douglas Singiza yari afashe akaruhuko.
Bamwe muri bo barakubiswe mu mugongo igera ubwo ihinduka ibisebe, abandi bapfumurwa ibirenge ndetse n’iyo ubireba ubona ko bitarakira, abandi amaguru yaratobowe bigaragara ko bakorewe iyicarubozo koko.
Mu gihe urubanza rwabo rukiri kuburanishwa, bamwe muri aba bagabo barakwekaho kuba barakoze ibindi byaha mu bihe bitandukanye, harimo kuba baragize uruhare mu iyicwa rya Maj Muhammed Kiggundu muri Gashyantare 2021, kuba barakoze ubujura bw’ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga mu gace ka Nansana mu 2019 ndetse no kwica abapolisi batatu mu bihe bitandukanye bakabiba imbunda.
Polisi yavuze ko bazakorerwa dosiye y’ibi byaha byose bakabiburana icya rimwe mu rukiko.

Brenda Katumba yifotozanya na Papa we mbere gato y'uko bagabwaho igitero cyamuhitanye
Haiti yasabye ububasha bw’amahanga, u Bufaransa bugiye kuvana ingabo muri Sahel, Biden yihanije Putin; Avugwa mu mahanga
Ubu busabe buje nyuma y’uko Perezida Jovenel Moïse arashwe amasasu 12 asanzwe iwe mu rugo, Polisi ikaba ikomeje gushaka abantu umunani bari mu gitero cyahitanye Perezida, mu gihe abandi 17 bafashwe naho batatu bakicwa.
Amerika yatangaje ko itahita ifata icyemezo cyo kohereza ingabo zayo muri Haiti, ariko yamaze koherereza abakozi b’Urwego rw’Iperereza (FBI) kugira ngo bafashe mu iperereza.
Iperereza ry’ibanze ryerekanye ko bamwe mu bafashwe bari bafite ibikoresho biriho amashusho yerekana uko mu rugo rwa Perezida hameze, abandi bafatanywe intwaro mu gihe abandi bafatanywe ibikoresho bya Perezida bari bibye.
Biden yongeye kwihanangiriza Putin ku bitero by’ikoranabuhanga bigabwa kuri Amerika
Mu kiganiro cyamaze isaha kuri telefoni, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika yavuze ko yongeye kubwira Vladimir Putin w’u Burusiya ku ngamba igihugu cye kizafatirwa nigikomeza kwemerera abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga, kugaba ibitero kuri Amerika.
Ibitero by’ikorabuhanga bikomeje gukaza umurego muri Amerika kuko mu kwezi gushize ibigo birenga 1.500 byagabweho ibitero biturutse mu Burusiya.
Iki kibazo cyari mu byaganiriweho mu nama iherutse guhuza Biden na Putin mu Busuwisi mu kwezi gushize, aho Biden yahaye Putin urutonde rw’inzego 16 zitagomba kugabwaho ibitero biturutse mu Burusiya, kuko nibikorwa Amerika izihorera mu buryo bukomeye.
Hagati aho, impande zimbi zikomeje kwitana ba mwana kuko Amerika ivuga ko yegereye u Burusiya inshuro nyinshi ibasaba kurangiza iki kibazo ariko bukanga, mu gihe u Burusiya buvuga ko butigeze bwegerwa na Amerika kuri iyi ngingo.
Biden yahagurukiye ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga muri Amerika
Joe Biden yasinye itegeko rigizwe n’ingingo 72 rizashyirwa mu bikorwa n’ibigo bya Leta 10, rigamije gukumira ko ibigo bikomeye mu by’ikoranabuhanga muri Amerika, bikoresha ubushobozi bwabyo mu gusenya no kugura ibigo bito, ndetse no gukoresha amakuru y’abantu mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.
Iri tegeko rije nyuma y’uko Abanyamerika banenze ibigo bikomeye by’ikoranabuhanga birimo Facebook, Amazon na Google, byakunze kugura ibigo bito bitanga serivise zimwe nk’iby’izitangwa n’ibyo bigo, mu rwego rwo kugabanya ihangana ku isoko bityo bigakomeza kubyikubira.
Ibi bigo kandi bikomeje gushinjwa gutwara amakuru menshi y’abakiliya babyo, ku buryo iri tegeko ryashyizweho na Amerika rizagena uburyo akoreshwamo, uretse ko zimwe mu ngingo zirigize zishobora kuzajyanwa mu nkiko.
U Bufaransa bugiye kugabanya ingabo bufite mu gace ka Sahel
Perezida Emmanuel Macron w’u Bufaransa yatangaje ko igihugu cye kigiye kugabanya ingabo cyari gifite mu gace ka Sahel, mu rwego rwo kuvugurura uruhare rw’izo ngabo mu kubaka umutekano urambye.
Mu mezi atandatu ari imbere, u Bufaransa buzagabanya ingabo 2.000 mu 5.100 zari mu mutwe wa Barkhane zimaze imyaka umunani zirinda umutekano mu bihugu birimo Mali, Tchad, Niger, Burkina Faso na Mauritania.
Perezida Macron yavuze ko kugabanya izo ngabo bitavuze ko u Bufaransa butereranye ibyo bihugu bihanganye n’imitwe y’iterabwoba ishamikiye kuri ISIS na Al Qaeda. Ingabo z’u Bufaransa zigiye gushyira imbaraga mu bijyanye no kurwanya iyo mitwe mbere y’uko zihindura uburyo bw’imirwanire, zikazajya zibanda cyane ku kurinda umutekano ku mipaka ihuza ibyo bihugu.
Temitope Balogun Joshua uzwi nka TB Joshua, yashyinguwe nyuma y’ukwezi kurenga yitabye Imana, nyuma y’uburwayi bw’igihe gito yagize.
Nk’uko byari byetezwe, ishyingurwa rya TB Joshua ryitabiriwe n’abantu benshi barimo n’abaturutse mu mpande zitandukanye z’Isi, uyu mugabo w’imyaka 57 wafatwaga ‘nk’Intumwa y’Imana’ asoza urugendo rwe rw’ubuzima.
TB Joshua ni umwe mu bavugabutumwa bari bakomeye muri Afurika, aho yabarirwaga umutungo uri hagati ya miliyoni 10$ na 15$, urusengero rwe rwahoraga rwuzuyemo abantu bifuza gukorerwa ibitangaza birimo ibyo gukira indwara zirimo SIDA n’izindi zikomeye nka cancer.
Mu munsi ishize ariko yari amaze iminsi ari mu nkiko nyuma y’uko urusengero rwe rugwiriye abantu barenga 100 bakitaba Imana, ndetse YouTube ikaba yari iherutse gusiba shene ye yakurikirwaga n’abarenga miliyoni, kubera amakuru bise ibinyoma yanyuzwaga kuri uwo murongo.
OMS yaburiye Afurika ku bwiyongere bukabije bwa Covid-19
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima muri Afurika, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, yavuze ko Afurika ifite ibyago byinshi by’ubwiyongere budasanzwe bw’icyorezo cya Covid-19 nyuma y’uko ikomeje kubura inkingo zo gukingira icyo cyorezo.
Afurika imaze kubona inkingo zingana na 2% by’izikenewe, nyamara ubwiyongere bwa Covid-19 buri kwikuba kabiri buri minsi 18, bwarahoze bwikuba kabiri mu minsi 21.
OMS ivuga ko inkingo miliyoni 20 zatanzwe na Amerika zikazagabanywa ibihugu 49 ari intambwe nziza ndetse ziri mu nzira, ariko zidahagije ku buryo Afurika yakwizera ko ubwiyongere buzagabanuka mu buryo bworoshye, usaba ko ibihugu bifite inkingo bitaratanga byakwihutisha iyo gahunda.
Abarenga miliyoni 5.7 bamaze kwandura Covid-19 muri Afurika, mu gihe abarenga 147 bamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo,, uretse ko imibare nyakuri y’uburyo iki cyorezo gihagaze ishobora kuba iri hejuru cyane y’itangazwa.
Tanzania igiye kwakira gari ya moshi ya mbere ikoresha amashanyarazi
Leta ya Tanzania yahaye amasezerano ikigo cya Hyundai Rotem afite agaciro ka miliyoni 296$, azatuma gishyira gari ya moshi zikoresha amashanyarazi mu mijyi itandukanye y’icyo gihugu.
Tanzania ifite gahunda yo kuvugurura imihanda yayo ya gari ya moshi, igasanwa ndetse ikanavugururwa ku buryo ikoresha amashanyarazi, ibizatuma gari ya moshi zihuta ku muvuduko wa kirometero 160 ku isaha (160km/h), zivuye kuwa kirometero 40 zigenderaho ku isaha (40km/h).
Byitezwe ko uyu mushinga uzatangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa mu mwaka wa 2024, ndetse ukazaba ubaye uwa mbere wa gari ya moshi zikoresha amashanyarazi, ariko ibikorwa byo kuvugurura inzira zazo bizakomeza mu myaka iri imbere, aho byagenewe ingengo y’imari ya miliyari 6.9$.
U Rwanda rwashyizwe mu bihugu byagejeje umuriro w’amashanyarazi ku baturage benshi.
Iyi Raporo yakozwe n’ibigo bitandukanye birimo Banki y’Isi, Ikigo Mpuzamahanga cyita ku Ngufu (IEA), Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe ibarurishamibare, UNSD, iryita ku Buzima, OMS, ndetse n’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga cyita ku Ngufu z’imirasire, IRENA, hagamijwe kureba aho Isi igeze mu kugeza abaturage ku ntego ya 7 y’iterambere rirambye, SDG7, yo kugeza umuriro w’amashanyarazi ku batuye Isi bose bitarenze 2030.
U Rwanda rwashyizwe mu bihugu byabashije kugeza umuriro ku baturage benshi ugereranyije n’ubwiyongere bwabo buri mwaka, aho mu 2019 rwagejeje umuriro ku baturarwanda ku rugero rwa 38% ruvuye kuri 35% rwari rufite mu 2018.
Yagize iti “Hagati ya 2010 na 2019, kimwe cya kabiri cy’ibihugu 20 bifite umuriro w’amashanyarazi muke byabashije kuwongera buri mwaka ku rugero rurenze uruba ruteganyijwe ku Isi. Naho kuva mu 2017 kugeza mu 2019, ibihugu birimo u Rwanda, Uganda Tanzania, Liberia, Guinea-Bissau na Guinea byongereye umuriro ku rugero ruruta urw’ubwiyongere bw’abaturage.”
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abaturage bafite umuriro w’amashanyarazi bangana na 65%, muri bo 17,8% bakaba bakoresha umuriro ukomoka ku mirasire y’izuba.
U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2024, buri muturarwanda azaba ashobora gukoresha amashanyarazi yaba afatiye ku muyoboro mugari cyangwa izindi ngufu (amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire y’izuba, nyiramugengeri, gaz methane iri mu Kiyaga cya Kivu n’ibindi)
Mu kubigeraho, hashyizwe ingufu nyinshi mu gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zigamije kongera umuriro nubwo zagiye zikomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19. Harimo ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga yagutse izatuma igihugu kirushaho kwihaza mu mashyanyarazi.
Muri yo harimo uruganda rwa Hakan Peat to Power rugiye gutangira gutanga amashanyarazi akomoka kuri Nyiramugengeri ruherereye mu Murenge wa Mamba mu Karere ka Gisagara aho mu cyiciro cyarwo cya mbere ruzajya rutanga Megawati 40 ndetse biteganyijwe ko nirumara kuzura neza ruzajya rutanga Megawatt 70.
Hari kandi n’umushinga w’inganda zo ku rwego rw’Akarere zirimo urwa Rusumo ruhuriweho n’u Rwanda, Burundi na Tanzania, uzatanga Megawatt 80, u Rwanda rukabonaho Megawatt 27.
Umushinga wa Rusizi III nawo uri mu izatanga umuriro w’amashanyarazi, akaba ari umushinga u Rwanda ruhuriweho na Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo n’u Burundi, ukazatanga Megawatt 200, u Rwanda rukazabonaho Megawatt 67.
Raporo ya Energy Progress Report yerekanye ko kandi u Rwanda rufite umushinga rwatangiye mu 2019, wo guha abaturage umuriro w’amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire y’izuba uzatwara miliyoni 45$.
Mu 2000 abari bafite umuriro w’amashanyarazi bari 2%, mu mwaka wa 2010 bageze ku 9%,muri uyu mwaka abagerwaho n’ amashanyarazi ni 65%. Uyu mwaka wa 2021 uzarangira bangana na 71%. Biteganyijwe ko bazaba ari 100% mu 2024.
Ibyo kumenya ku kibazo cy’iterabwoba muri Mozambique cyahagurukije u Rwanda.
Ni ikibazo cyashituye amahanga guhera muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, ubwo izo nyeshyamba ziyitiriye umutwe wa Al Shabab nubwo ntaho bihuriye, zagabaga ibitero mu Mujyi wa Palma zigahitana ubuzima bw’abasaga 12 bishwe bunyamaswa, mu gihe ibihumbi by’abaturage bavuye mu byabo.
Ingabo n’Abapolisi b’u Rwanda bagiye muri Mozambique mbere ho icyumweru ngo hagere iz’umuryango w’ibihugu byo mu Majyepfo ya Afurika (SADC) zo zitezweho kuhagera kuwa 15 Nyakanga 2021.
Inshingano ni ugufasha iza Mozambique guhashya ibikorwa by’iterabwoba n’ubugizi bwa nabi mu ntara ya Cabo Delgado.
Uyu mwanzuro ugezweho nyuma y’uruzinduko Perezida Filipe Nyusi yagiriye mu Rwanda muri Mata uyu mwaka, akaganira na Perezida Paul Kagame. Hari amakuru y’uko Nyusi akiva mu Rwanda, hari itsinda ry’abashinzwe umutekano b’u Rwanda bakoreye ingendo muri Cabo Delgado bashaka kumenya neza uko ikibazo giteye.
Igihugu gikungahaye ariko kimaze igihe mu bibazo
Mozambique ni igihugu giherereye mu Majyepfo ashyira Uburasirazuba bwa Afurika gifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 801.590 , gikubye u Rwanda inshuro 30.
Gituwe n’abasaga miliyoni 31 aho icyizere cyo kubaho kiri ku myaka 56. Umuturage wacyo umwe abarirwa amadolari 1200 ku mwaka, ni ukuvuga hafi miliyon 1,2 Frw.
Iki gihugu gihana imbibi n’ibindi bitandatu birimo na Tanzania mu Majyaruguru. Gikungahaye ku mutungo kamere urimo amabuye y’agaciro na gaz. Kuba ari igihugu gikora ku nyanja, bigiha amahirwe y’ubucuruzi bukorerwa mu Nyanja y’Abahinde.
Nubwo ari igihugu gifite umutungo, cyakunze guhura n’ibibazo by’umutekano na politiki guhera mu 1975 ubwo cyabonaga ubwigenge. Umutwe wa Renamo utavuga rumwe n’ishyaka Frelimo riri ku butegetsi wakunze gushoza intambara kenshi, gusa Leta ikihagararaho. Kuri ubu impande zombi ziri mu gahenge nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano y’amahoro mu 2019.
Nubwo umwanzi w’igihe kirekire Mozambique yamuciye intege, mu 2017 havutse undi ufite ingufu zidasanzwe. Mu ntara ya Cabo Delgado hadutse umutwe w’iterabwoba wiyise al shabab, nubwo nta mikoranire ufitanye na Al Shabab ya nyayo.
Uwo mutwe watangiye ari inyeshyamba zisanzwe ariko uko iminsi yicuma wagiye ugirana umubano n’imitwe y’iterabwoba mpuzamahanga nka IS yo muri Syria na Iraq.
Ibitero uwo mutwe wagiye ugaba mu Majyaruguru ya Mozambique, wagiye wica abaturage bunyamaswa, ubaciye imitwe nk’uko IS ibigenza. Kugeza muri Mata uyu mwaka, abaturage basaga 3000 bari bamaze kwicwa bunyamaswa mu gihe abasaga ibihumbi 800 bavuye mu byabo.
Umutwe wavutse mu burakari bw’abaturage
Uyu mutwe wakomotse ku burakari bw’abaturage bari bamaze igihe binubira guhezwa no kutitabwaho na Guverinoma, nubwo batuye mu gace kinjiriza Leta akayabo.
Intara ya Cabo Delgado iherereye mu bilometero 1600 uvuye mu Murwa Mukuru Maputo, ikagira ubuso bwa kilometero kare 82.625, bivuze ko ikubye gatatu ubuso bw’u Rwanda. Ni agace gatuwe n’abasaga miliyoni ebyiri.
Iyo ntara ikora kuri Tanzania, ikagira imijyi itatu ikomeye irimo Pemba, Montepuez na Mocimboa da Praia. Uyu wa nyuma ni nawo inyeshyamba zimaze umwaka zigaruriye ku buryo ingabo za Leta zananiwe kubatsimbura.
Kubera gaz nyinshi iboneka muri Cabo Delgado, sosiyete y’Abafaransa Total niyo yahawe ikiraka cyo kuyicukura mu mushinga uzwi nka Liquid Natural Gas (LNG). Ni wo mushinga nk’uwo ufite agaciro kanini muri Afurika kuko ubarirwa miliyari 60 z’amadolari.
Abaturage batangiye binubira ko amafaranga ava muri iyo mishinga ikomeye, atagarurwa mu bikorwa remezo n’iterambere muri Cabo Delgado, bagafata Leta nk’umukoloni ugamije kubanyunyuza gusa. Abarambiwe bafata intwaro.
Izo nyeshyamba ziyise al Shabab, ijambo ry’Icyarabu risobanura ‘abasore’. Nubwo biyita izina ry’umutwe w’iterabwoba usanzwe warayogoje amajyaruguru ya Afurika cyane cyane muri Somalia, ntaho bahuriye na mba.
Al Shabab yo muri Mozambique ifitanye umubano n’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa IS ukorera muri Iraq na Syria. Batangiye gukorana na IS mu 2019, kuva ubwo ufatwa nk’ishami ryayo ryo muri Afurika yo hagati, ryiswe Islamic State Central Africa Province (ISCAP).
Ubukana bwawo bwatangiye gushitura amahanga muri Werurwe uyu mwaka ubwo abasaga 12 bicwaga mu gitero cyagabwe mu Mujyi wa Palma. Mu bishwe harimo n’abanyamahanga bituma byinshi mu bikorwa by’amahanga muri ako gace bifunga imiryango harimo n’umushinga wa Total.
Kuki ingabo za Leta zitabaje amahanga ?
Inyeshyamba zayogoje Amajyaruguru ya Mozambique zikomeye cyane mu bijyanye n’ibikoresho ariko inzobere mu bya gisirikare zivuga ko zifite imyitozo ihagije cyane cyane mu mirwano ibera mu duce tw’imijyi dutuwe.
Ni urubyiruko kandi ruterwa akanyabugabo n’inyigisho z’amahame akaze y’idini ya Islam n’ubuhezanguni bigishwa n’indi mitwe y’iterabwoba ikomeye ku Isi.
Icyakora, igisirikare cya Mozambique nacyo kivugwaho intege nke haba mu bikoresho no mu bumenyi bwatuma babasha gusubiza inyuma inyeshyamba nk’izo, nubwo hari andi makuru avuga ko muri Cabo Delgado Leta itakunze koherezayo abasirikare bafite imyitozo ihagije.
Brigadier Ben Barry wo mu kigo International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS), yigeze kubwira BBC ko ikindi kigora ingabo za Leta ari amayeri y’inyeshyamba za IS mu kurwanira ahantu hatuye abantu benshi nko mu mijyi, ari nabyo Al Shabab ya Mozambique yatangije mu duce nka Palma na Mocimboa da Praia.
Yagize ati “Kugira ngo utsinde mu ntambara yo mu mujyi bisaba ko ingabo za Guverinoma zigira imyitozo n’imiyoborere yo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Ibyo nibyo bigaragaza intege nke z’ingabo za Mozambique. Bafite ikibazo cyo kutabona abajyanama b’inzobere mu bya gisirikare ndetse n’ubushobozi bwo kurwanira mu kirere, intwaro zikomeye n’imodoka z’intambara.”
Guverinoma ya Mozambique imaze kubona ko yugarijwe, mu mpera z’umwaka ushize yahaye ikiraka abajyanama 200 mu bya gisirikare bo mu kigo kigenga cyo mu Burusiya, Wagner Group.
Iyo mikoranire yatangiye muri Nzeri 2020 nyuma yo guhabwa umugisha na Leta y’u Burusiya. Benshi mu bahawe icyo kiraka, bahoze mu mutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo z’u Burusiya.
Ubudahangarwa bari bazanye bwashize ubwo bagabwaho ibitero bitandukanye n’inyeshyamba zigahitana bamwe muri bo, biba ngombwa ko babivamo.
Muri Werurwe, igisirikare cya Amerika cyohereje itsinda ry’abasirikare bo mu ngabo zidasanzwe bajya gutoza abo muri Mozambique. Portugal nayo yohereje abasirikare bake bo gutoza ingabo za Leta.
Mu ntangiriro, ntabwo Leta ya Mozambique yifuzaga ingabo z’amahanga ku butaka bwayo ariko uko ikibazo cyarushagaho gukomera, byabaye ngombwa ko iva ku izima. Mu byo yatinyaga mbere, harimo kuba ubusugire bwayo bwavogerwa n’ishusho mbi bizayisigira mu mahanga.
Icyakora mu kwezi gushize ubwo igihugu cyizihizaga umunsi w’ubwigenge, Perezida Nyusi yavuze ko ingabo za SADC n’iz’ibihugu by’inshuti zizabafasha guhashya inyeshyamba, gusa yizeza ko nta kindi bazakora kirenze kubafasha kugarura umutekano muri Cabo Delgado.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa SADC, Stergomena Lawrence Tax, aherutse kuvuga ko ingabo zizajya muri Mozambique zizaba zifite inshingano zo kubungabunga amahiro n’umutekano, kurinda abaturage.
Kuwa Gatatu tariki 7 Nyakanga, Tax yandikiye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, Antonio Guterres amumenyesha iby’ingabo za SADC zigiye gufasha iza Mozambique guhangana n’imitwe y’iterabwoba.
Tax yavuze ko izo ngabo zizatangira imirimo yazo tariki 15 Nyakanga zikahamara amezi atatu ashobora kongerwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bizaba byifashe.
Ntabwo umubare w’ingabo zizoherezwa n’ibihugu bya SADC bizabohereza biramenyekana, gusa muri Mata hari raporo y’impuguke z’uwo muryango yagiye hanze, igaragaza ko hakenewe ingabo 3000 zo kohereza muri Cabo Delgado.
Izo ngabo zizaba zifite inshingano zo gufasha Mozambique kurwanya iterabwoba n’ibikorwa by’ubuhezanguni muri iyo ntara.
Tariki 28 Kamena, Inama y’Abaminisitiri ya SADC yemeje ingengo y’imari ya miliyari 12 z’amadolari azakoreshwa n’Umutwe w’ingabo zidasanzwe z’uwo muryango muri Mozambique. Ayo mafaranga bavuze ko agomba kuboneka bitarenze tariki 9 Nyakanga 2021.
Raporo y’impuguke za SADC zabanje kujya gukora isesengura muri Cabo Delgado, yagaragaje ko kugira ngo Mozambique ibashe gutsinda intambara zisubirane umujyi wa Macimboa da Praia, bakeneye ibikoresho, ubutasi bukomeye n’ingabo zihagije.
Iyo raporo yavuze ko hakenewe ingabo zo mu mutwe udasanzwe zihangana n’ibitero by’inyeshyamba zinjirira mu nyanja y’Abahinde, ubwato bugendera munsi y’amazi, ingabo zirwanira mu kirere, kajugujugu esheshatu z’intambara, indege enye zitwara ibikoresho, ubwato bubiri bushinzwe gucunga na drones ebyiri z’ubutasi.
Ntabwo Mozambique iratangaza uburyo izo ngabo za SADC zizakorana n’izivuye mu bindi bihugu birimo u Rwanda rwamaze kohereza izarwo. Inshingano zihariye za buri ngabo nazo ntabwo zirashyirwa hanze .
Intambara irenze iy’amasasu
Kubera agace intara ya Cabo Delgado iherereyemo no kuba ikora ku nyanja, yakunze kuba icyambu cy’ubucuruzi bwa magendu burimo ibiyobyabwenge, icuruzwa ry’abantu n’ibindi birimo n’ingingo z’abantu.
Urugero, abantu bishwe muri Palma muri Werurwe uyu mwaka, bagiye bagaragara ingingo zabo zimwe zirimo n’imitwe nta yiriho, bigakekwa ko yagiye ijyanwa kugurishwa.
Kubera ko iyo ntara iri kure y’umurwa mukuru no kuba Leta itarakunze kuhitaho cyane, byagiye bituma ruswa iba nyinshi hagati y’abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze n’abanyabyaha bakorera muri ako gace ari nabyo byorohereza inyeshyamba.
Icyakora hari abasesenguzi babona ikibazo cya Cabo Delgado nk’ikitazakemurwa n’intambara kurusha amayeri yo kwigarurira abaturage.
Tekiniki inyeshyamba zo muri Mozambique zikoresha zigaba ibitero, niyo ikoreshwa na IS yo kwica bunyamaswa abasivile. Ibyo bitandukanye n’amayeri nka Al Qaeda ikoresha yo kurobanura ikamenya abo yica n’abo itica kuko gukomera kwayo gushingira ku mubano mwiza n’abaturage b’agace yagezemo.
Ikigaragaza ko nta mpuhwe inyeshyamba za Mozambique zifitiye abaturage, ni ubugome bakoresha mu kubica kugeza nk’aho mu gitero cyo muri Werurwe, bishe umwana w’imyaka 11 bakamwicira mu maso ya nyina.
BBC yatangaje ko byakorohera Leta kumvisha abaturage ububi bw’uwo mutwe ariko ikabijyanisha no kubaha ibyo basabaga ubwo batangiraga kwivumbura. Ibyo abatuye Cabo Delgado basabaga ni uguhabwa ibikorwa ibikorwa by’iterambere nk’amashuri, imihanda, imirimo n’ibindi bituma babona ko bitaweho.
Ibyo ngo bizatuma bagarukira Leta. Urugero rutangwa ni urwo mu 2007 ubwo umutwe wa Al Qaeda wakoraga amakosa utera ubwoba abaturage b’aba-Sunni mu ntara ya Anbar muri Iraq.
Icyo gihe abagabo bo muri ako gace batangiye gutotezwa n’inyeshyamba, baba bakoze amakosa yoroheje nko kunywa itabi, bagacibwa intoki. Byarakaje abaturage, byorohera ingabo za Leta zibifashijwemo n’igisirikare cya Amerika kwigarurira imitima y’abaturage.
Byatumye abaturage bahindukirana al Qaeda barayamagana, aho umusirikare wayo anyuze bagatunga agatoki ku buryo uwo mutwe watsinsuwe mu buryo bworoshye.
Huye: Miliyoni 98 Frw zimaze gucibwa abarenze ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye, Sebutege Ange, yavuze ko muri rusange abanye-Huye bubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho yo kwirinda Covid-19 ariko hari abagiye bafatwa bayarenzeho, bahabwa ibihano. Bose hamwe bamaze gucibwa amande agera kuri miliyoni 98 Frw.
Ati “Kuva Covid-19 yagera mu Rwanda abarenze ku mabwiriza bamaze gucibwa amande angana n’amafaranga miliyoni 98 Frw. Ayo ni amafaranga baba bakwiye gukoresha mu bibateza imbere ariko kubera kutubahiriza amabwiriza, ibihano bigomba kubaho.”
Sebutege yavuze ko ikigamijwe atari uguhana ahubwo ari ugukangurira abantu kwirinda icyorezo no kubibutsa ko icya mbere ari ukugira ubuzima bwiza.
Yavuze ko kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatatu imibare igaragaza ko abafite ubwandu bwa Covid-19 mu Karere ka Huye ari abantu 127 naho abo imaze guhitana ari 19.
Abahanwe ni abafatiwe mu makosa arimo gufungura utubari, gucururiza inzoga muri restaurant bakazihindura utubari, gutinda gutaha ku masaha yagenwe, kwambara nabi agapfukamunwa, gukora ibirori bitemewe, guhindura ingo utubari n’andi.
Sebutege yongeye gusaba abaturage gushyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyo cyorezo kuko ari yo ntwaro yonyine ihari muri iki gihe yo kugitsinda.
Kuri ubu mu Karere ka Huye Abajyanama b’Ubuzima bari gusura ingo zose bareba niba hari ufite ibimenyetso bya Covid-19 kugira ngo yisuzumishe amemye uko ahagaze.
Hafashwe umwanzuro ko urugo rubonetsemo uwanduye, abarubamo bose basabwa kwishyira mu kato kugeza igihe bisuzumishirije.
Abarwariye mu ngo basabwe gukomeza gukurikiza amabwiriza bahawe na muganga, ubuyobozi bubizeza ko abafite ubushobozi budahagije bwo kubaho buzajya bubunganira.
Abaturage bo mu Karere ka Huye babwiye IGIHE ko biyemeje gufatanya n’ubuyoboz guhashya Covid-19 kuko ari icyorezo cyica kandi io hafashwe ingamba zibagiraho ingaruka mbi.
Mukamana Chantal ati “Twabigize ibyacu kuko iki cyorezo gikomeje kwica abantu benshi. Ubu ntitugikora buri munsi kubera ingamba zafashwe kandi nkatwe ducuruuza tubihomberamo. Icyo tugomba gukora ni ugukomeza kubabiriza amabwiriza kugira ngo dutsinde Covid-19 noneho ubuzima bwongere gukomeza nk’uko byari bisanzwe mbere.”
Kugeza ubu Umurenge wa Tumba mu Karere ka Huye ni wo ufite abanduye Covid-19 kuko mu bagera ku 127 abagera kuri 70 ari abawutuyemo.
Huye: Abakobwa babiri bacucuye umugabo bamusindishije.
Abafashwe ni umukobwa w’imyaka 24, uwa 21 n’umusore w’imyaka 27 bafashwe nyuma yo gucyekwaho kwiba amafaranga y’u Rwanda ibihumbi 300.000 kuri telefoni umugabo w’imyaka 40.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, SP Theobald Kanamugire, yavuze ko abo bantu bacyekwaho icyaha cy’ubujura Polisi yabafashe biturutse ku bufatanye n’abaturage.
Ati“Tariki ya 24 Kamena [uwo mugabo] yagiye mu kabari kakoraga mu buryo butemewe kuko utubari tutemewe muri iki gihe cya COVID-19. Yasanzemo bariya bakobwa babiri basanzwe bagakoramo yaka inzoga zidasembuye ariko bo bamuha inzoga yitwa Bazooka Coffee bamubwira ko idasindisha akomeje kuyinywa aza gusinda.”
SP Kanamugire akomeza avuga ko uwo mugabo amaze gusinda abakobwa bamusabye kwishyura ababwira ko amafaranga ari kuri telefoni mu gihe ari kubishyura umwe abona umubare w’ibanga batangira kumwiba amafaranga yari ariho.
Ati “Yabanje kumwiba telefoni kuko yari yamaze kumenya umubare w’ibanga, yibyeho ibihumbi 50 Frw ahita aha wa mubare w’ibanga mugenzi we nawe akuraho ibihumbi 15 Frw.”
Muri iryo joro haje umusore agiye kunywera muri ako kabari nawe ahabwa umubare w’ibanga. Yahise amwiba kuri iyo telefoni ibihumbi 160. Abakekwa bavuga ko amafaranga bavanye kuri telefoni ari ibihumbi 264.500 Frw mu gihe nyirayo we avuga ko hariho ibihumbi 300.”
SP Kanamugire yavuze ko muri iryo joro yahise yimuka ajya kunywera mu kandi kabari.
Nyuma mu gitondo tariki ya 25 Kamena uwo mugabo akimara kubona ko yibwe amafaranga ye yahise ajya gutanga amakuru kuri Polisi, ba bantu bamaze kumenya ko yabivuze bahita batoroka ariko Polisi ikomeza kubashakisha ifatanyije n’abaturage bafatwa ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 06 Nyakanga.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo yaburiye abararikira iby’abandi bakabitwara bakoresheje uburyo ubwo aribwo bwose.
Ati “Abantu bazi ko bashinzwe kwakira umuntu bakamuha serivisi nk’uko bikwiye bo bagahitamo no kumwambura ibye bibwira ko ahari uwo babikoreye atabimenya bashatse babicikaho burundu kuko ntibizabahira. Abantu bakwiye gukora bagashaka ibyabo mu mucyo batambuye cyangwa ngo bararikire iby’abandi.”
Yanibukije kandi abantu ko amabwiriza yo kurwanya Covid-19 agomba kubahirizwa na buri wese harimo no kumenya ko utabari dufunze. Nzabarushimana akabari ke karafungwa acibwe n’amande kuko yarenze ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.Ni mugihe aba batatu bafashwe bashyikirizwa Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha (RIB) rukorera kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Huye.
Itegeko nº68/2018 ryo ku wa 30/08/2018 riteganya ibyaha n’ibihano muri rusange Ingingo ya 166 ivuga ko Umuntu wese uhamijwe n’urukiko icyaha cyo kwiba, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka umwe (1) ariko kitarenze imyaka ibiri (2) ,ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi ya miliyoni imwe (1.000.000 FRW) ariko atarenze miliyoni ebyiri (2.000.000 FRW), imirimo y’inyungu rusange mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu (6) cyangwa kimwe gusa muri ibyo bihano.
Polisi y’u Rwanda ikorera mu Karere ka Huye mu Murenge wa Huye ku bufatanye n’abaturage bafashe abantu batatu bari bamaze ibyumweru bibiri bashakishwa bacyekwaho kwiba umuturage amafaranga nyuma yo kumusindisha.
Tariki 08 Nyakanga ni umunsi w’ijana na mirongo cyenda mu minsi igize umwaka, hasigaye iminsi ijana na mirongo irindwi n’umunani.
Dore bimwe mu byaranze uyu munsi
1099: Mu ntambara ya mbere y’amadini, izwi nka Crusade ingaboz’ Abakirisitu bagera ku bihumbi cumi na bitanu bakoze imyigaragambyo yo kwiyicisha inzara hafi ya Yeruzalemu, biturutse ku Bayisilamu bari babagose.
1497: Umushakashatsi Vasco da Gama, ukomoka mu gihugu cya Portugal yatangiye urugendo rwo kwerekaza mu gihugu cy’u Buhinde.
1775: Hashyizwe umukono ku masezerano yiswe Olive Branch Petition hagati y’intumwa zari zihagarariye Leta cumi n’eshatu zakoze bwa mbere Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika.
1776:Mu rukurikirane rwa Leta ya Philadelphia na Pennsylvania, zatangaje ku mugaragaro ubwigenge bwazo, havuzwa inzogera yiswe iy’ubwigenge( Liberty Bell)
1889: Hatangiye gusohoka ikinyamakuru cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika cyitwa Wall Street Journal.
1948: Igisirikare cyirwanira mu kirere cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika (United States Air Force), cyatangiye kwakira abasirikare b’igitsinagore, muri gahunda yiswe Women in the Air Force(WAF).
1970: Perezida Richard Nixon, yatangarije congres y’Amerika, ubutumwa budasanzwe bwageneraga uburenganzira budasanzwe abaturage kavukire ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika.
1982:I Dujail, mu Majyaruguru y’umurwa mukuru Bagdad hakozwe igikorwa cyo gushaka kwivugana Perezida Saddam Hussein, wayoboraga igihugu cya Irak.
1997: NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) yasabye igihugu cya Czech Republic, Hungary, na Poland kwinjira muri uyu muryango mu masezerano yagombaga gukorwa mu mwaka w’1999.
1999: Bwa nyuma, muri Leta ya Florida hatanzwe igihano cy’urupfu hifashishijwe intebe y’amashanyarazi(electric chair).
Bamwe mu bavutse uyu munsi
1895: Igor Tamm, umuhanga mu bugenge ukomoka mu gihugu cy’Uburusiya, akaba yarabiherewe n’igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel.
1908: Nelson A. Rockefeller, Visi Perezida wa 41 wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Abakuriye inzego z’ubutasi bwa gisirikare mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari bemeranyije guhashya iterabwoba.
Iyi nama yabaye ku nshuro yayo ya Kane, yibanze ku nsanganyamatsiko yo “Kurwanyiriza hamwe imitwe yitwaje intwaro”; yitabiriwe n’u Rwanda, u Burundi, Tanzania, Uganda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Mashariki TV yatangaje ko abayitabiriye bashimye intambwe imaze guterwa mu kugarura umutekano mu Karere, bashimangira ko icyabahuje ari ukurushaho kuwubungabunga barwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro by’umwihariko ikorera mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Uburasirazuba bwa RDC bufatwa nk’indiri y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro ihungabanya umutekano mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari, dore ko habarurwa irenga 120 mu mashyamba y’ako gace. Iyo irimo irwanya Leta y’u Rwanda, iya RDC, iy’u Burundi, iya Uganda n’iya RDC.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Iperereza mu Burundi, Habarurema Ildephonse, yatangaje ko iyo nama yize ku bufatanye bw’ibihugu mu guhashya iyo mitwe kandi abayitabiriye babyemeranyijeho.
Ati “Iyi nama ibaye ku nshuro ya Kane yashyizweho kugira ngo ahanini ishobore gukurikirana no gukora ibikorwa bitari ibya gisirikari kugira ngo ibikorwa nyir’izina byo kurwanya iyo mitwe bishoboke; [..] abashinzwe inzego z’ubutasi n’iperereza mu gisirikari no mu gihugu bashobore kwemeza icyo nakwita nk’urupapuro ngenderwaho rw’ibizakorwa mu kurwanya iyo mitwe; n’ibizakurikiraho kugira ngo bashobore kuyica muri aka Karere.”
Muri iyo nama hemejwe gahunda y’ibizakorwa mu myaka ibiri iri imbere, hakazakurikiraho ishyirwaho ry’itsinda rishinzwe gukurikirana ibikorwa nyir’izina byo guhashya iyo mitwe rizakorera mu Mujyi wa Goma uri mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Mushikiwabo yihanganishije Abanye-Haïti ku bwa Perezida Jovenel wishwe.
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Twitter, Mushikiwabo yamaganye ubwo bugizi bwa nabi.
Yanditse ati “Nyuma y’itangazwa ry’ubwicanyi bwakorewe Perezida Jovenel Moïse, namaganye nivuye inyuma iki gikorwa cy’ubugizi bwa nabi kandi nihanganishije abavandimwe be n’Abanye-Haïti bose. Muri ibi bihe bigoye, OIF yifatanyije na Haïti cyane kurusha ikindi gihe.”
Perezida Jovenel wayoboraga Haïti kuva mu 2016 yiciwe mu rugo rwe arashwe. Minisitiri w’Intebe w’agateganyo wa Haïti, Dr Claude Joseph, yatangaje ko ahagana saa Saba z’ijoro ryo ku wa 6 Nyakanga, itsinda ry’abantu bataramenyekana barimo abavuga Icyesipanyolo bateye urugo rwa Perezida baramukomeretsa bimuviramo urupfu, n’umugore we, Martine Moïse akomeretswa n’isasu ariko ari kwitabwaho.
Abantu 27 baguye mu myigaragambyo yamagana Ingoma ya Cyami muri Eswatini.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu ni bwo Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi Manqoba Khumalo, yatangarije Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP, ko mu cyumweru gishize abantu 27 baguye mu myigaragambyo y’abasaba impinduka yaberaga muri icyo gihugu giherereye muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo.
Minisitiri Manqoba Khumalo yagize ati “Ni byo, ku bw’amahirwe make abantu 27 babuze ubuzima.”
Khumalo yahise yisegura avuga ko bagombaga gukoresha ingufu z’umurengera kugira ngo babashe guhagarika iyo myigaragambyo.
Ati “Ntibyari byagambiriwe ariko uburyo imyigaragambyo yabagamo byabaye ngombwa ko hakoreshwa ingufu kuko hanabayemo kurasana bigatuma haboneka inkomere.”
Khumalo yavuze ko urugomo rwinshi rwabaye hagati yo ku wa Mbere no ku wa Kane mu cyumweru gishize ndetse abaturage bamwe umuriro ukabasanga mu nyubako zatwitswe.
Abigaragambya bakomeje gusaba impinduka muri Eswatini, icyakora iyi leta yamaze kohereza imitwe y’ingabo kugira ngo ifashe abapolisi guhosha iyi myigaragambyo ikomeje kugenda ifata indi ntera.
Iki gihugu cyahoze cyitwa Swaziland, ntigikora ku nyanja gifite abaturage bangana na miliyoni 1.3 kikaba giherereye hagati ya Afurika y’Epfo na Mozambique.
Huye: Abaturage bazajya bavoma amazi bifashishije ikarita imeze nka Tap & Go.
Iryo koranabuhanga ryo kuvoma amazi rikoresha imashini zitwa ‘AQtap Water Dispenser Machine’, ryamaze kugeza mu Mudugudu wa Sekera mu Kagari ka Kabatwa mu Murenge wa Kigoma.
Abaturage bagera kuri 564 bo muri uwo mudugudu bose bafite ikarita yo kuvoma. Iyo karita iba iriho amafaranga noneho nyirayo akayirambika ahabugenewe ku mashini, agakanda amazi akaza, icyo avomesha cyamara kuzura akongera gukanda kugira ngo amazi ahagarare.
Iyo karita buri muturage ayihabwa ku buntu agashyirirwaho amafaranga ashaka bijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe. Litiro imwe igura 0,4 Frw naho ijerekani ya litiro 20 igura 8 Frw.
Umuyobozi w’umudugudu wa Sekera, Butorano Wellars, yabwiye IGIHE ko ari we ufasha abaturage gushyira amafaranga ku makarita yabo bavomeraho.
Ati “Umuturage aba afite agakarita ke akaza isaha ku isaha agashyira mu mashini ikaka, agakanda ahabugenewe amazi akaza akavoma. Amazi ashaka iyo amaze kugeramo, arongera agakanda akarekera aho kuza. Iyo amafaranga ashize ku ikarita, araza tukamwongereraho andi kuko dufite ikarita yindi iyabashyiriraho.”
Bamwe mu baturage bo muri uwo mudugudu bishimira ko begerejwe amazi meza kandi bahabwa n’ikoranabuhanga ryo kuyavoma igihe bashakiye badategereje ubavomera, nk’uko bigenda ku yandi mavomo.
Mukamuvara ati “Bataratwegereza amazi nari mfite ikibazo cyane kuko ntari ngifite intege zizamuka kuri Nyamugari ku iriba riri mu kabande. Mbere nanduranyaga n’abana mbabaza impamvu batagiye kuzana amazi ariko ubu igihe cyose dushakiye turaza tukavoma kuko ari hafi yacu.”
Imashini itanga ayo mazi ikoresha amashanyarazi. Kuri ubu bifashisha amashanyarazi akomoka ku zuba kuko akomoka ku muyoboro mugari atarahagezwa.
Abo baturage bishimira ko kuvoma bakoresheje ikarita bibafasha no guteganya hakiri kare amafaranga bazakoresha kugira ngo babone amazi.
Sibomana Aphrodis ati “Mu bintu byari bitugoye ni ukubona amazi meza hafi yacu. Ubu buri wese abasha guteganya amafaranga azakoresha mu kuvoma amazi meza hakiri kare, ni ibintu twishimira kandi n’igiciro baduheraho ni cyiza kuko ijerekani imwe tuyishyura 8 Frw.”
Bemeza kandi ko isuku mu ngo zabo yiyongereye kuko bafite amazi, bitandukanye na mbere ubwo bajyaga kuyavoma mu kabande bakoresheje igihe kigera ku isaha imwe.
Niyonsaba Francine ati “Mu rugo tugira isuku kuko amazi tuyafite hafi. No muri ibi bihe bya Covid-19, tugira isuku cyane cyane dukaraba intoki kugira ngo hatagira uwanduza abandi.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye, Sebutege Ange, avuga ko ubwo buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga bwatangiriye mu Murenge wa Kigoma ariko bateganya no kubugeza ahandi.
Ati “Iki ni icyiciro cy’ibanze, turakomeza gukurikirana uko bifasha abaturage, nyuma bikazagenda bigezwa n’ahandi.”
Yashimiye abaturage uruhare bagize mu kugira ngo ayo mazi abagereho kuko batanze umuganda mu gucukura aho umuyoboro uzanyura, abasaba kuyafata neza.
Ati “Abaturage turabashimira uruhare rwabo mu kubaka umuyoboro. Turabasaba kuwufata neza, bakirinda icyatuma cyose iki gikorwa kitaramba, bakarangwa kandi n’isuku kuko ni isoko y’ubuzima bwiza.”
Iryo koranabuhanga mu kuvoma amazi ryashyizweho mu mushinga mugari w’umuyoboro w’amazi wa kilometero 19,7 watwaye arenga miliyoni 205 Frw.
Akarere ka Huye katanze arenga miliyoni 143 Frw naho World Vision isanzwe ari umufatanyabikorwa wako itanga miliyoni 61 Frw.
Uwo muyoboro ugeza amazi ku baturage 7.943 babarizwa mu midugudu 19 no ku bigo bitatu by’amashuri.
Uwo muyoboro w’amazi ni kimwe mu bikorwa abaturage bavuga ko bishimiye mu kwizihiza ku nshuro ya 27 isabukuru yo kwibohora k’u Rwanda.
Dore impamvu ukwiye kwita ku nshuti yawe magara.
Abantu b’inshuti magara kandi usanga bakunda kwitana utuzina tw’utubyiniriro baziranyeho, cyangwa se ugasanga bakunda guhana impano zitandukanye.
Ikigo cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika gikora ibikorwa n’ubushakashatsi ku buvuzi, ‘Mayo Clinic’, kivuga ko inshuti magara zifasha abazifite guca mu bibazo by’ihungabana nka gatanya, uburwayi bukomeye, gutakaza akazi cyangwa kubura uwo umuntu akunda.
Ubu bushakashatsi kandi buvuga ko “Inshuti itera umuntu imbaraga zo guhindura cyangwa se kwigobotora ubuzima bushaririye n’imico mibi aba ari gucamo, nko kumufasha kugabanya cyangwa kureka kunywa ibisindisha mu gihe byamaze kumuhindura imbata, ndetse inshuti nk’iyo ntinanirwa kukubyutsa igihe cyose uguye.”
Urubuga Well+Good rutangaza ko abahanga mu bumenyi bw’imitekerereze ya muntu bahamya ko kugira inshuti magara ari ikintu cy’ingenzi mu buzima ndetse ko kubona cyangwa kugira umuntu inshuti yawe magara atari ikintu cyoroshye.
Dr. Marisa Franco ufite impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga mu bijyanye n’imitekerereze ya muntu n’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, akanaba inzobere mu mibanire hagati y’inshuti, avuga ko kugira nibura inshuti imwe, yaba isanzwe cyangwa magara, bigufasha kurwanya ubwigunge no guhora wumva uri wenyine.
Yagize ati “Kugira inshuti magara nziza bishobora kuba ingirakamaro ku buzima bwo mu mutwe ndetse no kugira inshuti zifite imitekerereze itandukanye na byo bishobora kugira inyungu.”
Akomeza avuga ko akunze kubazwa umubare w’inshuti umuntu yagakwiye kuba afite, ariko ashimangira ko atari cyo cy’ingenzi cyane ahubwo imyitwarire yazo ari cyo gihebuje ibindi kuba ingenzi, ku buryo n’iyo yaba inshuti imwe ariko nzima byakugirira akamaro.
Mu gitabo ‘Best Friend Forever’ cya Dr. Marisa Franco, avuga ko umuntu w’inshuti magara ari uwo mubasha kuganira mu buryo bworoshye bitagoranye, uwo mufitanye ubwumvane bwisumbuye ndetse munabasha kubwizanya ukuri.
Ese umukunzi wawe yakubera inshuti magara?
Dr. Franco avuga ko inshuti magara ya nyayo ari imwe izaza isubiza icyo abantu bakunze kwibaza kigira kiti “Ni inde uzaba uhari igihe cyose mukeneye?”
Avuga ko inshuti zo mu kazi, izo musohokana, izikugira inama zose ari ingenzi ariko by’umwihariko ya nshuti wiyambaza mu gihe bigukomeranye ari yo ya nyayo.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko iyo umukunzi wawe ari inshuti magara yawe bituma ibyishimo byawe mu rukundo byikuba kabiri kurusha uko byamera umukunzi wawe aramutse atari inshuti magara yawe, nk’uko bishimangirwa na Dr. Franco, nubwo anavuga ko bidasobanuye ko umukunzi wawe ari yo nshuti yonyine ugomba kugira.
Kuri iyi ngingo kandi, Dr. Irene Levine na we ufite Impamyabumenyi y’Ikirenga mu by’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe n’imitekerereze ya muntu, avuga ko kugira umukunzi wawe wenyine nk’inshuti magara bidahagije kuko hari ibintu uba ushobora kuganiriza inshuti zawe zindi ariko bitakorohera kuganiriza umukunzi wawe.
Philippines: Duterte arifuza umwanya wa Visi Perezida avuye kuwa Perezida.
Duterte w’imyaka 76 yavuze ko hari ibyo atabashije gukora mu myaka itanu amaze ayoboye Philippines, bityo ko byaba byiza abaye Visi Perezida akabirangiza.
Itegeko Nshinga rya Philippines ntabwo ryemerera Perezida kuyobora manda zirenze imwe.
Mu nama yagiranye n’abayobozi b’amashyaka ya Politiki kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Duterte yavuze ko yakozwe ku mutima n’amarangamutima abaturage bamugaragarije, bamwereka ko bakimukunze.
Yagize ati “Icyifuzo cyo kuba nakwiyamamariza umwanya wa Visi Perezida, nanjye ndagishyigikiye. Ndi kubitekerezaho.”
Bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na Duterte bagize impungenge kuri icyo cyifuzo cye kuko Visi Perezida ari we uhabwa inshingano za Perezida iyo Perezida watowe apfuye cyangwa atakibasha kuzuza inshingano ze.
Bavuga ko biramutse bibayeho, byaba bihabanye n’Itegeko Nshinga igihugu kigenderaho.
Nubwo ubutegetsi bwe bwazanye inkundura yo guhiga bukware abakekwaho gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge harimo no kubarasa, ibyegeranyo bitandukanye bigaragaza ko Duterte agikunzwe n’abaturage.
CNN yatangaje ko Duterte ashobora kwiyamamariza kuba Visi Perezida umwaka utaha kugira ngo yirinde kuba yakurikiranwa n’inkiko kuko byagiye biba ku bamubanjirije.
Duterte yavuze ko mu gihe yagira ibyago ubaye Perezida ntabe ari inshuti ye, kuba Visi Perezida kwe ntacyo byaba bimumariye.
