Yakomeje ati “Twashatse ubundi buryo budasanzwe bwo gukora kugira ngo bijyane n’igihe twari turimo cya Covid-19. Iyo turwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ntituvuga ngo ni umugabo, umugore, umwana cyangwa umuhungu wahohotewe, kuri twebwe buri wese agomba guhabwa ubutabera.”
MIGEPROF itanga miliyoni 200 Frw buri mwaka, yoherezwa mu turere agamije gufasha abarimo abana n’abandi bantu bakuru bahohoterwa.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, rutangaza ko hagati ya 2015 na 2018 rwakiriye ibirego 1.098 bifitanye isano n’amakimbirane yo mu muryango birimo ibyo gukubita no gukomeretsa, ubwicanyi no kwiyahura.
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko mu 2015, hakiriwe dosiye 669 zijyanye no gukubita no gukomeretsa, 89 z’ubwicanyi na 23 zijyanye no kwiyahura. Mu 2016, dosiye zakiriwe ni 641 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, iz’ubwicanyi ni 97 mu gihe izo kwiyahura ari 17.
Mu 2017 kqndi hakiriwe dosiye 784 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, 86 z’ubwicanyi na zirindwi zo kwiyahura. Mu 2018 yakiriye dosiye 979 zo gukubita no gukomeretsa, 95 z’ubwicanyi mu gihe izo kwiyahura ari 24.
Inzu yagurishijwe iherereye mu Karere ka Muhanga mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo yagombaga kugurwa miliyoni 22 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda nyamara ibya ngombwa berekanaga byari ibihimbano. Umwe muri bo yiyitaga ko ari nyirayo naho abandi bakigira abakomisiyoneri.
Bafashwe basigaje guhabwa miliyoni zirindwi n’igice. Uko ari batanu bemeye ibyaha baregwa banabisabira imbabazi kuri uyu Gatanu tariki ya 9 Nyakanga 2021.
Umwe yagize ati “Ndi hano kubera ko nafatiwe mu cyaha cyo kugurisha inzu itari iyanjye, umushinga wateguwe na mugenzi wanjye ariko ndabisabira imbabazi.”
Uyu mugabo yemereye polisi kuyigaragariza abandi batekamutwe bose kugira ngo ibashe guhashya abakora ibi byaha.
Uwineza Ange uvuka mu muryango wari watanze amafaranga ugura inzu, we yashimiye RIB anashimangira ko iyo itahaba batari kuzongera kubona abo batekamutwe.
Ati “Umwe muri bo yari inshuti y’umuryango, ni na we waje aturangira iyo nzu mu rugo. Bayisuye kabiri noneho njye nagiyeyo bwa nyuma ni bwo nasanze banyirayo bahari batwereka ko ari iyabo n’ibyangombwa dusanga bitandukanye n’ibyo aba bari batweretse.”
Yongeyeho ko nyuma yo gusanga ibyangombwa berekwagwa ari ibihimbano bahise bitabaza RIB itangira kubashakisha.
Ati “Twahise tubibwira RIB noneho ikajya ibahamagara telefone ntiboneke nyuma nibwo yabahamagaye baza baziko tugiye kubishyura andi ihita ibafata.”
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, Dr Murangira B. Thierry, yavuze ko aba bagabo bakurikiranyweho ibyaha bine.
Ati “Bafashwe mu gikorwa cyo kugurisha inzu itari iyabo bakaba bakurikiranywe ibyaha bine birimo gushyiraho umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi no kuwujyamo, kwihesha ikintu cy’undi hakoreshejwe uburiganya, icyo guhimba, guhindura inyandiko cyangwa gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano ndetse hakanazamo n’icyaha cyo kwigana, guhindura amafaranga cyangwa ibyitiranwa na yo.”
Yasabye abaturage kujya bagura ibintu babanje gushishoza no kwishyurira abantu kuri banki kuko bituma imyirondoro yabo imenyekana anashimangirako ko amafaranga bari bahawe yagarujwe ndetse n’ibintu bari bayaguzemo byafatiriwe.
Ahahoze Kaminuza ya Kibungo hashobora gutangira irindi shuri rikuru vuba.
Ibi bije nyuma yaho iyi kaminuza ifungiwe igateza ibihombo ku baturage bakodeshaga inzu abanyeshuri bayigagamo n’ubucuruzi busubira inyuma mu gace yari iherereyemo.
Umuhoza Oliver utuye mu Mudugudu wa Gatare mu Kagari ka Karenge munsi y’ahakoreraga iyi kaminuza yabwiye IGIHE ko kuva bayifunga bagize igihombo gikomeye cyane.
Yavuze ko ubundi hahoraga urujya n’uruza rw’abanyeshuri baguraga ibintu byinshi, abanyonzi, abamotari, abacuruzi n’abafite inzu zikodeshwa ubu ngo abenshi barahimutse kubera kubura abakiriya bituma muri uyu Mudugudu hakonja cyane.
Ati “Nko kuri njye ndi umwe mu bacuruzi, igihombo cya mbere nagize ni uguhomba abaturanyi kuko baradususurutsaga, igihombo cya kabiri nahombye abakiriya bituma ubucuruzi bwanjye busubira inyuma, ikindi hari bagenzi banjye bari bafite inzu bakodesha ariko kugeza kuri iyi saha ntizigikodeshwa kuko abazibagamo ni abanyeshuri ubu babuze abandi bakiriya.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Ngoma wungirije ushinzwe Iterambere ry’Ubukungu, Nyiridandi Mapambano Cyriaque yavuze ko hari ibiganiro bari kugirana n’andi mashuri kugira ngo aze kuhakorera kandi ngo ibyo biganiro biri kugenda neza.
Ati “Hari ibiganiro byatangiye tubifashijwemo n’ubuyobozi bw’Intara hamwe na Minisiteri y’Uburezi kugira ngo hariya yakoreraga harebwe ikintu cyahakorerwa ariko kijyanye n’uburezi, twakwizeza abaturage ko igisubizo kiri gushakwa kandi kizaboneka mu minsi ya vuba.”
Mapambano yavuze ko hashobora kugaruka kaminuza nubwo yaba ititwa UNIK ariko ko rizaba ari ishuri kandi rizatanga ubumenyi kuri benshi ryongere no gushyushya aka Karere.
Kaminuza ya UNIK yatangijwe mu mwaka wa 2003 ni imwe mu zagiriye umumaro abigaga uburezi kuko yabafashije mu kubigisha mu biruhuko, mu mpera z’icyumweru ndetse no mu mibyizi, nyuma y’igihe gito yaje gufungura ishami mu Karere ka Rulindo ryafashaga abaturuka mu Burengerazuba n’Amajyaruguru.
Yabarizwagamo amashami atatu arimo iry’uburezi, imari n’icungamutungo ndetse n’ishami ry’ubuhinzi n’iterambere ry’icyaro, yafunzwe imaze gushyira ku isoko abarenga 9500.
Amb. Mutsindashyaka yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Repubulika ya Congo.
Mu kiganiro bagiranye, Perezida Denis Sassou N’Guesso yashimye umubano n’ubushuti u Rwanda na Congo Brazzaville bifitanye n’uruhare rwa Perezida Kagame mu guteza imbere u Rwanda, hamwe n’umurava we mu guharanira icyateza imbere Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.
Yavuze kandi ko igihugu cye cyiteguye gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu kuzamura imikoranire igamije kuzamura ubukungu bw’ibihugu byombi.
Ambasaderi Mutsindashyaka nyuma yo gutanga ubutumwa yahawe na Perezida Kagame, yatangaje ko yishimiye guhagararira u Rwanda muri Congo isanzwe ifitanye umubano mwiza n’u Rwanda, anizeza Perezida Denis Sassou N’Guesso ko azakomeza gushimangira ubufatanye ndetse n’umubano mwiza biri hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Yavuze kandi ko azaharanira kuzamura ubuhinzi, ubworozi ndetse n’inganda zitunganya ibibikomokaho. Ibi bizashyirwamo ingufu hifashishijwe amasezerano y’umubano n’ubufatanye hagati y’inzego z’ubuyobozi zibishinzwe, kugira ngo bigirire akamaro abaturage b’u Rwanda na Congo.
Ambasaderi Mutsindashyaka yongeyeho ko azafatanya n’abandi bayobozi, agakora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo uyu mubano urusheho kungura ibihugu byombi mu bijyanye n’ubuhahirane, ubukerarugendo no bindi bifitiye akamaro ibihugu byombi ndetse n’umugabane wa Afurika muri rusange.
Ngoma: Umuyobozi akurikiranyweho kunyereza asaga miliyoni 1 Frw yo kwishyura mituweli
IGIHE yamenye ko uyu muyobozi w’imyaka 31 yatawe muri yombi ku wa 7 Nyakanga 2021.
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, Dr Murangira B. Thierry, yavuze ko uwo muyobozi yafashwe ndetse iperereza riri gukorwa.
Yakomeje ati “Uwafashwe afungiye kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB ya Kibungo mu gihe iperereza rikomeje kugira ngo hakorwe dosiye ishyikirizwe Ubushinjacyaha.’’
Yavuze ko abakora ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo ufitiye inyungu rubanda batazihanganirwa.
Yakomeje ati “RIB iributsa abaturarwanda ko itazihanganira uwo ariwe wese uzafatirwa mu cyaha cyo kunyereza umutungo ashinzwe kugenzura awukoresha mu nyungu ze bwite. Abantu bakwiye kumenya ko iki ari icyaha gihanwa n’amategeko.’’
Ingingo ya 10 y’itegeko N°54/2018 ryo ku wa 13/08/2018 ryerekeye kurwanya ruswa iteganya ko uhamijwe icyaha cyo kunyereza umutungo ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka irindwi ariko kitarenze 10 n’ amafaranga y’u Rwanda yikubye inshuro kuva ku nshuro eshatu kugeza kuri eshanu z’agaciro k’umutungo yanyereje.
Ntimukwiye gutegereza guhamagarwa ngo murwanire igihugu cyanyu- Gen James Kabarebe.
Ibi Gen. James Kabarebe yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa 9 Nyakanga 2021, ubwo yagiranaga ibiganiro n’itsinda ry’abahungu n’abakobwa baba mu bihugu bitandukanye ariko bakaba bamaze iminsi mu Rwanda, aho bari gusobanurirwa amateka y’Igihugu cyabo.
Iri tsinda ry’urubyiruko rigizwe n’abarenga 60 rimaze iminsi mu Rwanda riri gusura ibikorwa bifite aho bihuriye n’amateka y’Igihugu cyabo. Ririmo abakuriye mu Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Canada, Denmark n’ibindi bihugu.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu uru rubyiruko rwasuye Ingoro y’amateka yo guhagarika Jenoside iherereye ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda ari naho bagize amahirwe yo kuganirizwa na Gen James Kabarebe, Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta na Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Rosemary Mbabazi.
Gen James Kabarebe yabwiye uru rubyiruko ko urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu rugikomeje kandi bakwiye kurugiramo uruhare.
Ati “Murangije ibyiciro byose by’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, mwatangiriye Kagitumba, munyuze ku Mulindi kugera hano ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko. Icy’ingezi mukwiye kumenya ni uko urugendo rwo Kubohora Igihugu rutarangirira hano ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko rurakomeza kubera ko urugamba rwo kwibohora ubwarwo ni urugendo rukomeza.”
“Umusanzu muzatanga ku ruhande rwanyu nk’urubyiruko nawo uzaba mu bigize uru rugendo rwo Kwibohora. Nawo uzajya mu mateka y’iki gihugu nk’umusanzu wanyu. Kubera ko kwibohora bivuze impinduka mu bukungu n’imibereho by’u Rwanda kandi ni urugendo rugikomeje ruzahererekanywa mu bisekuru.”
Abajijwe na Gasore usanzwe utuye mu Bubiligi icyo bo nk’urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga bakora kugira ngo barwanye abavuga Igihugu cyabo nabi, Gen Kabarebe yamubwiye ko buri cyiciro cy’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu cyagiye kigira imbogamizi zacyo kandi ko badakwiye gutegereza ko bahamagarwa kugira ngo batangire kurwanira igihugu cyabo.
Ati “Buri cyiciro cy’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu gifite imbogamizi cyihariye. Icyiciro cya mbere cyo kubohora igihugu cyaranzwe no guhangana mu buryo bw’imbaraga, kurwana n’abantu bafite intwaro.”
“Iki cyiciro cyo kwibohora gifite imbogamizi nyinshi zirimo n’uko abagize uruhare muri Jenoside bakomeje kuvuga nabi Guverinoma bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga kugira ngo gusa bavuge nabi Guverinoma.”
Gen Kabarebe yakomeje avuga ko aho urugamba rugeze ubu ariho urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rwaba uruba mu mahanga no mu gihugu rukenewe cyane.
Ati “Muri iki cyiciro niho mugira uruhare nk’urubyiruko kandi niho mwitezweho gutangira umusanzu kubera ko ntimubuze ibyo kuvuga, ntimubuze amakuru ajyanye n’Igihugu cyanyu kuko niba hari igihugu gitanga amakuru kuri cyo ku bijyanye n’ibyo cyagezeho, ibyo kiri gukorera abaturage ni u Rwanda. Ku bw’ibyo amakuru arahari ariko icyo tutarabona ni urubyiruko rwacu rwinjira muri uru rugamba ngo rurwanire igihugu cyarwo rukoresheje imbuga abagisenya nabo bakoresha.”
“Bakoresha internet namwe murayifite, imbuga nkoranyambaga muba muziriho buri gihe. Nta kintu na kimwe mubura kandi ntimugomba gutegereza guhamagarwa kugira ngo mubwirwe kurwanira igihugu cyanyu.”
“Oya murahari mugomba kuba mubikora ijoro n’amanywa. Bashyiraho ibinyoma ku gihugu cyanyu, muzi ukuri ku gihugu cyanyu kandi mushobora no kubaza, ubundi mu kinjira muri uru rugamba kandi mukarurwana mushyizeho umutima mukabatsinda. Nimuvuge ibyiza muzaba mutumye abantu bamenya ibyiza.”
Gen Kabarebe yavuze ko ikibazo u Rwanda ruri guhura na cyo cy’abaruharabika n’abagoreka amateka yarwo cyari cyitezwe kuko ngo nyuma yo gukora Jenoside abayikoze bakurikizaho kuyihakana.
Eric Ngabo ukuriye itsinda ryateguye iyi gahunda yo kuba urubyiruko rwava mu mahanga rukaza gusura u Rwanda yavuze ko iki gitekerezo ubwacyo cyaturutse mu rubyiruko barufasha kukinoza.
Ati “Niba bagize igitekerezo baravuga bati urubyiruko ruba rushaka kujya gusura igihugu cyarwo bari hamwe nk’itsinda. Baravuga bati ’byaba byiza ariko urwo rugendo rugomba kuba rufite amasomo agamije kutwigisha amateka y’Igihugu, kutwereka ubwiza bw’Igihugu, ibibazo igihugu cyari gifite n’uburyo byagiye bikemurwa.’”
Ngabo yavuze ko kuba urubyiruko rwahabwa amahirwe nk’aya yo gusura igihugu bibaha ubumenyi bubafasha guhangana n’abagoreka amateka y’u Rwanda.
Ati “Guha urubyiruko amahirwe yo kuza kwirebera rukava mu byo rubwirwa gusa, biruha ubumenyi n’ubushobozi bwo kuzahangana na bariya bavuga nabi u Rwanda kandi babeshya. Nibo ba mbere bazadufasha mu kubwira ukuri abandi Banyarwanda bayobye cyangwa bayobejwe no kubatumira kuko turashaka ko iki kiba igikorwa ngarukamwaka.”
Yavuze ko urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda ruba mu mahanga rugorwa no kumenya ukuri ku mateka y’igihugu cyarwo kuko aho baba haba hari amakuru avuga ibintu byinshi bitandukanye.
U Rwanda rugiye kohereza abasirikare n’abapolisi 1000 muri Mozambique.
Cabo Delgado ni intara iri mu Majyaruguru ya Mozambique, ituwe n’abaturage barenga miliyoni ebyiri bari ku buso bwa kilometero kare 82.625. Iri ku mupaka wa Tanzania ndetse ituwe n’abaturage bo mu bwoko bw’aba- Makonde, Makua na Mwani.
Ibikorwa bya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda byo koherezayo ingabo muri iki gihugu bije nyuma y’ubusabe bwa Perezida wa Mozambique, Filipe Nyusi, wagiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda muri Mata.
Kuva icyo gihe bivugwa ko u Rwanda rwahise rutangira kugenzura neza uko ikibazo cy’umutekano muke n’iterabwoba gihagaze muri ako gace. Hari amakuru avuga ko rwahise rwoherezayo itsinda rigamije kureba uko byifashe.
Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda rivuga ko izi ngabo zizoherezwayo zizakorana n’iza Mozambique cyo kimwe n’iz’Umuryango w’Iterambere ry’Ibihugu byo mu Majyepfo ya Afurika, SADC.
Riti “Uku kohereza ingabo gushingiye ku mubano mwiza hagati ya Repubulika y’u Rwanda n’iya Mozambique, nyuma y’isinywa ry’amasezerano y’ubufatanye atandukanye hagati y’ibihugu byombi mu 2018 kandi rishingiye ku bushake bw’u Rwanda ku mahame yo kurinda (R2P) n’amasezerano yo mu 2015 ya Kigali yo kurinda abasivile.”
Izi ngabo zigiye muri Mozambique nyuma y’ibiganiro hagati y’ibihugu byombi. Muri Mata uyu mwaka, Perezida wa Mozambique, Filipe Nyusi yasuye u Rwanda aganira na Perezida Paul Kagame ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo ubufatanye mu guhashya iterabwoba.
Ntabwo hatangajwe byinshi ku biganiro abakuru b’ibihugu byombi baganiriye, icyakora Perezida Nyusi yaje mu Rwanda mu gihe Mozambique yari imaze iminsi yibasiwe n’ibitero by’iterabwoba bigabwa n’umutwe ushamikiye ku mutwe w’iterabwoba wa ISIS ugendera ku mahame akaze ya kisilamu.
Nubwo ingabo za Leta zikomeje gutsinsura uwo mutwe mu Mujyi wa Palma mu Ntara ya Cabo Delgado iherereye mu Majyaruguru ya Mozambique, hari amagana y’abaturage bahitanwe n’ibitero mu gihe abandi bavuye mu byabo.
Aka gace uwo mutwe ugabamo ibitero gakungahaye kuri gaz ndetse sosiyete y’Abafaransa, Total yashoye miliyari 20 z’amadolari mu kubaka uruganda rwo gucukura iyo gaz. Gusa nyuma y’ibitero, iyo sosiyete yatangaje ko ibaye ihagaritse uwo mushinga.
Mu bishwe muri ako gace harimo abanyamahanga ndetse ibikorwaremezo nk’amabanki, amahoteli n’ibindi na byo byarangiritse, bikaba byaratumye benshi bahagrika ibikorwa bahakoreraga.
Umujyi wa Palma wagabweho ibitero utuyemo abanyamahanga basaga 1000 bari mu bikorwa bifite aho bihuriye n’icukurwa rya gaz.
Guhera mu 2017, agace ka Cabo Delgado kagiye kibasirwa n’ibitero by’imitwe y’iterabwoba rimaze guhitana ubuzima bw’abasaga 3000 mu gihe ibihumbi by’abaturage byahunze.
Mu kwezi gushize abakuru b’ibihugu bigize umuryango uhuza ibihugu byo muri Afurika y’Amajyepfo (SADC), bahuriye i Maputo muri Mozambique baganira ku kibazo cy’umutekano muke kiri mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu.
Bemeje koherezayo umutwe wa SADC w’ingabo zishinzwe kurwana aho rukomeye ngo zifashe mu guhashya imitwe y’iterabwoba ikorera muri Cabo Delgado ishobora no gukwirakwira mu bindi bihugu byo mu karere idahagaritswe.
Inzira igejeje Ingabo z’u Rwanda muri Mozambique
Mu Ukwakira 2017, abagizi ba nabi bafitanye isano n’umutwe wa Islamic State wo muri Iraq n’uwitwa Levant (ISIL) batangiye kugaba ibitero mu gace ka Cabo Delgado muri Mozambique.
Rimwe na rimwe, abo barwanyi biyita al-Shabaab, nubwo nta sano na rito bafitanye na al-Shabaab yo muri Somalia.
Ingabo za Mozambique zimaze igihe zihangana n’abo barwanyi gusa byatumye abasivili benshi bahunga iyo mirwano.
Abo barwanyi bagabye ibitero muri Kanama 2020 bafata Umujyi wa Mocimboa da Praia.
Muri Mata 2020, abantu barenga 50 bishwe baciwe imitwe ndetse abagera kuri uwo mubare nanone bishwe muri ubwo buryo mu Ugushyingo 2020.
Muri Nzeri 2020, abarwanyi ba ISIL bagabye igitero ku kirwa cya Vamizi kiri ku Nyanja y’Abahinde.
Ku wa 24 Werurwe 2021, aba barwanyi bafashe Umujyi wa Palma, bica n’abaturage mu gihe abarenga 35.000 by’abaturage 75.000 bawutuyemo bavuye mu byabo.
Minisitiri Biruta na Mbabazi bahanuye urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda ruba mu mahanga.
Abayobozi barimo Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko, Rosemary Mbabazi na Minisitiri w’Ubabanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta n’Umujyanama wa Perezida Kagame mu by’umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe; baganirije urubyiruko rw’abanyarwanda ruba mu mahanga.
Kuri uyu wa 9 Nyakanga 2021 nibwo itsinda ry’urubyiruko rutuye mu mahanga rumaze iminsi mu ruzinduko mu Rwanda ryagiranye ibiganiro n’abayobozi batandukanye.
Iri tsinda rigezwe n’abagera kuri 60 baturutse mu bihugu byiganjemo ibyo ku Mugabane w’u Burayi nk’u Bubiligi, u Bufaransa n’u Budage.
Uretse abakomoka ku babyeyi bose b’Abanyarwanda, iri tsinda ririmo n’abavanze. Ni ukuvuga abafite umubyeyi umwe w’Umunyarwanda.
Mu minsi bamaze mu Rwanda basuye ibikorwa bitandukanye byiganjemo ibifite amateka yihariye mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Nyuma yo gusura aha hantu hatandukanye, babonanye n’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu kugira ngo babaganirize ku cyerekezo cy’u Rwanda.
Minisitiri Biruta yashimiye uru rubyiruko kubera umuhate rwagize wo gusura u Rwanda ngo rumenye amateka y’aho rukomoka.
Ati "Ndashaka kubashimira ku bw’uyu muhate mwagize wo kuza hano mugasura u Rwanda n’ahantu h’umwihariko hafitanye isano n’urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu. Nk’urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga, aho abenshi muri mwe mutazi u Rwanda ni byiza ko mugira aya mahirwe yo kuza mugasura Igihugu cyanyu ndetse mukamenya amateka yacyo."
Yabagaragarije ko nyuma y’ibibazo u Rwanda rwanyuzemo ubu ruri mu bihugu biri kwitwara neza mu bintu bitandukanye birimo korohereza ubucuruzi. Ati "Biturutse aha muzabasha kubona ibyo mukeneye byose ngo muganire na bagenzi banyu batabashije kuzana namwe kandi muzabasha kubabwira byinshi bitari gusa urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ahubwo n’intambwe iki gihugu cyateye kuva mu 1994."
"Niba mwarabashije gusura ibindi bihugu bya Afurika mwabonye ko u Rwanda ruri gukora neza kurusha ibyinshi muri ibyo bihugu bitanyuze mu bikomeye nk’ibyo twanyuzemo. Twanyuze muri Jenoside mu 1994 ariko twabashije kubaka igihugu no kugera kuri byinshi."
“Murabizi ko u Rwanda ruza imbere mu nzego zitandukanye, mu bijyanye no korohereza ishoramari, mu buzima, hari inzego nyinshi aho u Rwanda ruza imbere kurusha bimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika bitagize Jenoside cyangwa andi makimbirane.”
Yabasabye gukomeza kugaragaza indangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda aho baba hose kandi bagahangana n’abakomeje guharabika igihugu bavuga ibitari byo.
Ati "Murabizi hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kureba u Rwanda uturutse mu mahanga, mubana n’abantu bari ku mbuga nkoranyambaga birirwa bangiza isura y’u Rwanda kandi buri gihe bagerageza kubona ibintu bibi ku gihugu nubwo byaba bidahari."
"Kandi bumva ko bifashishije uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo nk’uko bivugwa n’ibyo bihugu mubamo. Bari kubukoresha nabi bumva ko ari byiza kuvuga ibinyoma ku gihugu cyawe, abayobozi bacyo bakumva ko ibyo biri mu bigize uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo."
Yakomeje agira ati "Ariko nk’Abanyarwanda dukwiye kuguma ku ndangagaciro zacu. Tugomba kuvuga ko u Rwanda ari igihugu cyacu kandi dufite indangagaciro zo gukunda igihugu, indangagaciro y’ubunyangamugayo kandi dukwiye gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka igihugu. Tugomba kuvuguruza aba bantu bumva ko gusebya igihugu ari demokarasi."
Yabasabye ko iki gikorwa batangiye cyo kugaruka bagasura igihugu cyabo cyazakomeza kandi bakarushaho kongera umubare w’abacyitabira.
Minisitiri Rosemary Mbabazi we yagaragarije uru rubyiruko bimwe mu bigize umuco w’u Rwanda. Yababwiye ko mu gihe kinini cyashize Abanyarwanda bibonaga mu moko y’Abahutu, Abatutsi n’Abatwa yemeza ko ariko ubu bose bibona nk’Abanyarwanda binyuze muri Ndi Umunyarwanda.
Ati "Imwe mu ndangagaciro zacu ni Ndi Umunyarwanda, murabizi mu myaka 27 ishize twitwaga Abahutu, Abatutsi, Abatwa aho kuba Abanyarwanda, niba ushaka gukomezanya Ubuhutu, Ubututsi n’Ubutwa nta gaciro bifite, icy’ingenzi ni uko uri Umunyarwanda. Iki ni cyo kituranga kandi kikaduhuza, ni yo sano muzi.”
Louise usanzwe utuye mu Bubiligi akaba n’umwe mu bagize iri tsinda ry’urubyiruko yavuze ko aya ari amahirwe yagize yo kumenya byinshi kuri politike y’igihugu cye ngo kuko aho aba atabasha kuyibonaho amakuru cyane.
Umwihariko mu birori by’imideli ya ‘Made in Rwanda’ (Amafoto).
Ibi birori by’imideli byari byiswe ‘Made in Rwanda Fashion Night Out’ byateguwe n’abahanzi b’imideli bitabiriye imurikagurisha ry’ibyakorewe mu Rwanda. Aba bahanzi bagamije guteza imbere imideli yahangiwe mu Rwanda ndetse no kuzamura ireme ry’abakora uyu mwuga bakamenyekana ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Imideli yerekanywe irimo amakanzu, amashati, amapantaro, inkweto, ibikapu byo mu moko yose, ingofero n’imirimbo inyuranye byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda. Iyi mideli yakorewe mu Rwanda muri Sonia Mugabo,Uzi Collections, Inzuki Designs, Inkanda,Moshions,Haute Baso,Made in Kigali, Rwanda Clothing ndetse na Rupari Designs.
Ibi birori byabereye ahasanzwe habera imurikagurisha i Gikondo gusa kuri iyi nshuro abamurikabikorwa baryitabiriye ni abacuruza ibyakorewe mu Rwanda gusa[Made in Rwanda].
Byari umwihariko ugereranyije n’ibindi birori byo kumurika imideli bisanzwe bimenyerewe mu Rwanda kuko abanyamideli bambaraga imideli mu mok anyuranye hanyuma bagahagarara mu matsinda hanyuma abaje kureba ibirori bakabazengurukamo bareba imideli baje kumurika ubishoboye agahita agura.
Aba bahanzi b’imideli kandi bari bazanye imyenda, imitako n’ibindi basanzwe bakora ku buryo ibirori byabaye bibangikanye n’igikorwa cyo gusobanurira abari baje kwihera ijisho umwihariko wa buri nzu y’imideli.
Sonia Mugabo umwe mu bahanzi b’imideli bitabiriye iki gikorwa yabwiye IGIHE ko ‘byamusigiye isomo ryiza no kurushaho kugira umuhate mu byo akora’. Ati “Ibikorwa nk’ibi byerekana ko Abanyarwanda baturi inyuma kandi ko bashaka kwambara ibintu byakorewe mu Rwanda, natwe biradusunika cyane ngo turusheho gukora cyane kandi byiza.”
Yongeraho ati “Ibi byerekana ko nshyigikiye gahunda ya leta yo guteza imbere Made in Rwanda, kandi bishimangira ko turi muri gahunda nziza yo kwishakira imirimo. Nkanjye natangiye ndi umwe ariko ubu tumaze kuba abantu icumi.”
Yavuze ko nyuma y’iri murikagurisha agiye gufungura iduka rinini muri Marriot Hotel mu kurushaho kwagura ibikorwa bye. Ati “Nyuma ya hano ngiye guhita mfungura iduka rindi muri Marriot Hotel, ni ugushyiramo ingufu tugakora cyane…”
Ibi birori bibaye nyuma y’igihe gito habaye ikindi gikorwa kinini cyahurije hamwe abahanzi b’imideli bibanda cyane ku yakorewe mu Rwanda bibumbiye muri ikompanyi Collective Rw ari nayo benshi muri aba bamuritse ibikorwa byabo babarizwamo.
Iri murikagurisha ry’ibikorerwa mu Rwanda ribaye ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryitabiriwe n’abanshoramari bari mu byiciro bitandukanye birimo, abakora ibijyanye n’u bwubatsi, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, imyenda, ibikoresho by’isuku, ubukorikori, abatanga servise mu ikoranabuhanga n’ibindi.
Imurikagurisha ry’uyu mwaka ku bikorerwa mu Rwanda rifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Duharanire kwigira duhaha iby’iwacu.”
Ubwiza bw’imideli ya Nyambo, umusore ukomeje kurimbisha abantu muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Masa Mara ni izina yahimbye, aryita inzu ye y’imideli arikomeye ku ijambo amamara. Ubuhanzi bw’imideli bwo bwamukuriyemo kuko sekuru yari umudozi mu gihe nyina yacuruzaga ibitenge.
Nyambo w’imyaka 30 amaze imyaka irenga itanu akora akazi ko guhanga imideli gusa gutangira byaramugoye kubera ubushobozi buke.
Ati “Byakomotse kuba naratangiye guhanga imyambaro nta mafaranga mfite icyo nari mfite icyo nari mfite ni inkuru nashakaga gusangiza abantu ndetse n’uburyo bwo kongera kuvuga inkuru nyazo za Afurika.”
“Natangiye guhanga imideli mu 2012 ubwo nari ndi kurangiza kaminuza muri University of South Africa.”
Avuga ko yisanze mu ruhando rwo guhanga imideli mu buryo atabitekerezaga gusa ko bitamutunguye kuko yakuze akunda gusa neza no kwitandukanya n’abandi cyane.
Ati “Bityo igihe cyose nageragezaga gutandukana n’abandi ku kigo nigagaho bituma abantu benshi bashaka kumenya ikibintera mu kubasubiza byabaye ngombwa ko ntangira kwibaza aho iyo mpano ituruka nza gusanga mbikomora kuri sogokuru wari umudozi bikubirataho kuba narakuriye mu bitenge kuko aribyo mama yacuruzaga bituma ndushaho gushaka kumenya byinshi ku bijyanye n’imideli aribwo natangiye kwiyigisha bimviramo no gutangiza Masa Mara.”
Avuga guhanga imideli kwe yibanda ku muco nyafurika no kwerekana isura nyayo y’abanyafurika, mu buryo bwo gukundisha abanyafurika iby’iwabo n’abo baribo. Akerekana ubwiza n’ubukungu butatse uyu mugabane.
Amaze imyaka itanu yitabira ibirori byo kumurika imideli bitandukanye muri Afurika y’Epfo , nka South Africa Men’s Wear Fashion Week, Africa Exchange Fashion ihuza abahanga imideli baturuka mu bihugu bitandukanye, Africa Fashion International n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Paul Van Doren watangije sosiyete y’inkweto zizwi nka Vans yitabye Imana.
Inkuru y’urupfu rw’uyu mugabo watangije sosiyete ikigarurira Isi nyuma yo gucikiza amashuri yisumbuye, yatangajwe ku wa 7 Gicurasi 2021.
Ubutumwa yanditse bugira buti “N’agahinda kenshi, Vans iramenyesha ko umwe mu bayishinze yitabye Imana. Paul ntiyari rwiyemezamirimo, yari umunyadushya.”
Paul Van Doren wavukiye i Boston muri Leta ya Massachusetts mu 1930, yatangije Vans mu myaka ya 1960 afatanyije na murumuna we Jimmy Van Doren n’abandi babiri.
Iduka ry’urwo ruganda rya mbere ryafunguriye imiryango mu Mujyi wa Anaheim muri Leta ya California mu 1966, abagera kuri 12 bahita bagura izo nkweto ku munsi wa mbere.
Vans zaje kwambarwa na Sean Penn ubwo yakinaga muri filimi yakunzwe cyane yitwa “Fast Times at Ridgemont High;” igaragaza ubuzima bwo kuryoshya bw’abanyeshuri bo mu Majyepfo ya California, burimo inkundo, umuziki n’ibindi by’irari nk’imibonano mpuzabitsina no gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge.
Nyuma y’iyo filimi zakunzwe kurushaho, ugasanga imihanda yose ni zo zambawe haba ku rubyiruko, abanyamuziki n’abamurika imideli.
Paul Van Doren yakomeje kuyobora iyo sosiyete kugeza mu 1980 ubwo yajyaga mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru akayishyira mu maboko ya Jimmy Van Doren, ariko iza guhomba bituma afata umwanzuro wo kugaruka kuyiyoborera.
Mu 1988 Vans yaragurishijwe, magingo aya iri mu maboko y’Ikigo cy’Abanyamerika cyibanda ku nkweto, VF Corporation, gisanzwe kinafite izindi sosiyete z’amazina akomeye nka Supreme, Timberland, Dickies, The North Face na Jansport. Bivugwa ko ubu Vans imaze kugira amaduka 300 hirya no hino ku Isi.
Mbere y’uko Paul Van Doren atabaruka yari aherutse kumurika igitabo kigaruka ku buzima bwe yise “A Memoir by the Founder of Vans” gikubiyemo amakuru y’ubuzima yaciyemo n’uko urwo ruganda rwakuze.
Inkweto za Vans zikoze mu buryo zishobora kuba zizamuye ku buryo zigera hejuru y’utubombambari cyangwa zikagera munsi yatwo.
Ni zimwe mu zikundwa cyane n’abanyamideli, abahanzi n’abandi b’abasirimu bambara ibikeye.
Uburyo bugezweho bwo kwisiga "makeup" ku bakunda gusa neza (Amafoto na Video).
Makeup ikundwa cyane n’igitsina gore, ariko n’abagabo barayikoresha kuko hari byinshi yongera ku isura bituma uyikoresheje arushaho gusa neza.
Hari benshi bifuza gusa neza ariko bakabura aho bamenera kuko badafite ubumenyi mu bijyanye na ’makeup’. Gusa kubyiga ntibisaba ibihambaye kuko wanifashisha amashusho ukabyiga ukabimenya.
Mu kiganiro na Kenneth umaze kwamamara mu gusiga ibirungo by’ubwiza nka Trendy Shadow, yagaragaje ukuntu buri wese ashobora kwisiga ’makeup’ arebeye ku mashusho akazabimenya.
Ati “Ubundi niba ushaka kujya wisiga ’makeup’, ugomba kubanza kugura ibikoresho by’ibanze, iyo ubifite ushobora kujya ku muntu akakwigisha cyangwa ukabyigira kuri YouTube. Icyo gihe ibyo bakoze uko ubisubiramo niko ubimenya cyane.”
Yakomeje avuga ko kwisiga ’makeup’ bifite ikintu kinini byongera ku gusa neza k’umuntu, ari yo mpamvu uwifuza gukomeza gusa neza aba akwiye kubiharira umwanya.
Ati “Makeup ifite ikintu kinini cyane yongera kuko uruhu rurushaho gusa neza iyo warusize, hari ubwo usiga amaso usanzwe ugira mato akaba manini akaba n’umweru bitewe n’ibyo wasizeho. Muri rusange makeup igira ikintu kinini yongera ku buryo umuntu asa.”
’Makeup’ ibamo amoko atandukanye bitewe n’aho umuntu agiye n’icyo agiye gukora.
Mu mashusho, Trendy Shadow yerekana uburyo wakwisiga "makeup" ukajya ku kazi, mu bukwe, gutembera n’ahandi hantu hatandukanye usa na bicye.
Mu kwisiga ’makeup’, icy’ibanze ugomba kwitaho ni ibikoresho ndetse n’isuku yabyo. Mbere ya byose ubanza koga mu maso warangiza ugasigaho amavuta yabugenewe atuma ya "makeup" itinjira mu ruhu imbere.
Iyo umaze kuyasigaho ukurikizaho gukora ibitsike n’amaso, usigaho ’tiro’ ituma mu maso harushaho kugaragara neza, hejuru y’amaso usigaho ’mascara’ zituma amaso asa n’ayabaye manini ndetse akanarushaho kuba umweru.
Ikindi cy’ibanze ni ukwisiga neza ku ruhu aho ukoresha ’fond de teint’ cyangwa ’face powder’, ariko biba byiza kubivanga kuko bituma uruhu rworoha kandi rukumuka. Ibi byose iyo ubisoje usiga iminwa "lipstick" kugira ngo itumagara.
Mu kiganiro na Trendy Shadow, uramenya byinshi kuri Kenneth ndetse unarebe birambuye uburyo "makeup" ikorwa bikaryohera amaso.
Inkweto za Nike Kanye West yambaye mu 2008 zaciye agahigo ko kugurishwa akayabo.
zi nkweto zakozwe n’uruganda rwa Nike zaguzwe mu buryo bwihariye na sosiyete ya RARES. Uyu ni umuyoboro ushora imari mu kugura no kugurisha imigabane. Umuyobozi w’iki kigo, Gerome Sapp, yavuze ko babikoze bashaka kugura inkweto zihenze mu mateka.
Umuyobozi wa Sothbey’s, Brahm Wachter, yari yashyize ku isoko izi nkweto yavuze ko kuba zaguzwe aka kayabo bigaragaza ibigwi bya Kanye West mu bijyanye no kurimba ndetse no mu bahanga inkweto za Sneakers.
Izi nkweto zashyizwe hanze nyuma y’imyaka 13 zambawe bwa mbere, zashyizwe ku isoko mu cyamunara yitwa Sotheby’s.
Izi nkweto zifite nimero 12, zibaye iza mbere zo mu bwoko bwa Sneakers zigurishijwe amafaranga menshi, zihita zikura ku mwanya wa mbere iza Nike Air Jordan zambawe bwa mbere na Michael Jordan mu 1985, zagurishijwe mu 2020 agera ku bihumbi 615$.
Nike Air Yeezy za Kanye West zifite ibara ry’umukara zakozwe mu 2007, ishusho yazo yakozwe na Kanye West ubwe afatanyije na Mark Smith wo muri Nike.
Brahm Wachter, umukozi muri Sothbey’s yavuze ko izi nkweto za Kanye West zakunzwe cyane ku buryo byatumye abasaba uburenganzira bwo kuzikora baba benshi, bituma zandika amateka.”
Ni zo nkweto za mbere Nike yari ikoranye n’umuhanzi, mu gihe ubusanzwe uru ruganda rwamenyekanye cyane mu gukora inkweto rukunda kugirana ubufatanye bwo gukora inkweto n’abakinnyi cyane aba Basketball.
Kanye West yazambaye bwa mbere mu bihembo bya Grammy Awards mu 2008.
Turahirwa abinyujije mu mideli yahaye icyubahiro Umwamikazi Gicanda.
Uyu mudeli ukozwe mu gishushanyo cy’isura y’Umwamikazi Gicanda, cyikaba cyiganjemo amabara y’umukara, umweru,umuhondo n’icyatsi kibisi.
Rosalie Gicanda niwe mwamikazi wa nyuma w’u Rwanda akaba yari umugore w’ Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, ari mu nzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi 1994.
Gicanda yishwe ku wa 20 Mata 1994 azira ko ari Umututsi. Mu kumuha agaciro no kumwibuka we n’abandi bagore b’inzirakarengane bazize Jenoside, Turahirwa yakoze umudeli ugaragaza isura ye.
Mu kiganiro Turahirwa Moses, yagiranye na IGIHE , yavuze ko gukora uyu mudeli byamufashe amasaha 48 agira ngo yerekane uruhare rw’abahanzi mu kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi 1994.
Ati “Mu gihe twibuka abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi 1994, natekereje ku ruhare rw’abahanzi mu ngeri zose. Mu kuzirikana abavukijwe ubuzima. Nakoze uyu mudeli mu kwerekana uko twakunamira abishwe binyuze mu gihangano.”
Yakomeje avuga ko uyu mudeli yawukoze mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga ariko buzimije bufite ubutumwa butanga.
Ati “Byamfashe amasaha 48 kuko gushushanya Umwamikazi bisaba ubushishozi n’ubwitonzi bukarishye. Nakoresheje uburyo bugezweho kugira ngo ishusho isohoke ijimije ariko ifite ubusobanuro bwimbitse.”
Uyu mudeli ukozwe mu gishushanyo kigaragaza isura y’Umwamikazi Gicanda, Turahirwa yavuze ko yamuhisemo kuko ari umugore w’icyitegererezo, buri wese yashima kugira nk’umubyeyi we.
Ati “Umwamikazi Gicanda yari azwi cyane kandi yarakunzwe na benshi. Yafatwaga nk’icyitegererezo mu bwiza, ubuntu n’ikinyabupfura. Usanga kandi ababuze ababyeyi babo muri Jenoside, bagaruka ku myitwarire nk’iyi yaranze Umwamikazi.”
“Nahisemo rero kwifashisha isura buri munyarwandakazi yakwibonamo, ariko nanone ishingiye ku muco dusangiye. Buri mwari n’umutegarugori wazize Jenoside ni Umwamikazi mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi.”
Abicishiej ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze yavuze ko uyu mudeli utazigera ucapwa cyangwa ngo ube wagurishwa, akaba yasobanuye ko iki ari igihangano yakoze kigamije kunamira abazize Jenoside nta nyungu z’amafaranga ategerejemo.
Ati “Kiriya gishushanyo ndetse n’ijipo. Nabikoze mu buryo bwo kunamira abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.”
“Nta nyungu y’amafaranga igamijwe. Ahubwo nifuza ko byatera abandi imbaraga zo gukoresha impano zabo mu kuganira ku mahano yakozwe. Ariko by’akarusho, bagakoresha ubumenyi mu kubika amateka, bakayarinda kuzima cyangwa kugorekwa.”
Turahirwa yashinze inzu y’imideli ya ‘Moshions’ muri 2015, ikaba imaze kuba ubukombe mu guhanga imyambaro itandukanye ikunzwe n’abatari bake. Imyambaro iheruka iyi nzu yashyize hanze ni iyo bise ‘Ishuri Collection’ yasohotse muri 2020.
Chimano wa Sauti Sol yagaragaye mu mashusho y’indirimbo yambaye umwambaro ya Tanga Designs.
Uyu mwambaro uri mu yo aherutse gushyira hanze yise ‘Ikamba Collection’ ariko wo ukaba uri mu y’abahungu.
Chimano yagaragaye yambaye uyu mwambaro mu ndirimbo nshya iheruka kujya hanze yasubiranyemo n’umuhanzikazi wo muri Zimbabwe witwa Gemma Griffiths yitwa ‘Easy’.
Niyitanga Olivier yabwiye IGIHE ko kugira ngo umwambaro we wifashishwe muri iyi ndirimbo ariko uyu muhanzi yawubonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga akawukunda akamusaba ko yawumukorera.
Ati “Yakunze ibihangano byanjye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, noneho mvugana n’uwabikora kugira ngo mbone ibipimo bye bya nyabyo. Ndawushushanya nyuma nza kuwukora.”
Niyitanga aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko ‘Ikamba Collection’ yagize igitekerezo cyayo mu bihe bya Miss Rwanda 2020. Ngo yayise gutyo kuko buri wese wahatanaga yari afite amahirwe yo gutsinda akegukana ikamba.
Iyi myambaro mu buryo ikozwemo, ijyanishwa n’ibyitwa ‘Ibyanganga’ byambarwa mu mutwe, biba biriho amasaro. Biba bisa n’umwitero wo ku ikanzu iba imeze nk’umushanana. Igaragaza umuco w’u Rwanda.
Mu ikamba Collection harimo amakanzu y’abakobwa yiswe ‘Umutanana’. Kuyita gutya byaturutse n’ubundi ku izina rya Tanga yahuje n’umushanana.
Umutanana ni ikanzu igizwe n’imitako igiye itandukanye ku buryo umuntu ashobora kukubona akagira ngo wambaye umushanana ariko yakwitegereza agasanga ari ikanzu. Ifite nayo ibyanganga byayo.
Muri iyi myambaro harimo imeze nk’imikenyero ariko ifite amababa y’ibinyugunyugu, ndetse n’andi mababa. Avuga ko impamvu yahisemo kurimbisha iyi myambaro amababa yiganjemo ay’ibinyugunyugu ari uko utu dusimba tugira umwihariko wo kutajya dupfa ahubwo tugenda twihinduramo ibindi binyabuzima tugakomeza kuba ku Isi.
Niyitanga amaze kwambika ibyamamare bitandukanye mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo. Ubwo Mr Eazi yakoreraga igitaramo mu Rwanda mu 2017 yari yambaye imyambaro ye. Ni nawe ukunze kwambika ba nyampinga mu bihe bitandukanye.
Yari aherutse gushyira hanze imyambaro yise ‘Out Of This World TangaSS21’.
Reba indirimbo Chimano aba yambayemo umwambaro wa Tanga Designs.
Imvano yo guhanga imideli kwa Umutoniwase urajwe ishinga no guteza imbere ‘Made in Rwanda’ (Amafoto).
Abahanga imideli bavuka umunsi ku wundi bigatuma imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda igenda iba myinshi kandi ari ubwoko butandukanye ku buryo ntacyo umuntu yaburana abahanga imideli mu Rwanda.
Mu bashya bakwiriye guhangwa amaso harimo umukobwa witwa Umutoniwase Brenda washinze inzu ya BrenFashion, w’imyaka 24 na we umaze igihe kitari kinini cyane yinjiye ku isoko ryo guhanga imyambaro.
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko ari ibintu abona bimaze kugira agaciro gakomeye mu Rwanda kuko abanyarwanda basigaye baterwa ishema n’ibikorerwa iwabo.
Ati “Maze imyaka ibiri gusa ntangiye guhanga imyambaro mu buryo bw’umwuga. Ni byiza kugeza ubu kuko abanyarwanda ntabwo bagifite imitekerereze yo kwambara imyambaro yo hanze ahubwo bwose baba batewe ishema n’ibikorerwa iwabo.”
Yavuze ko ubusanzwe ari umudozi akaba akorana n’abandi bakozi batatu bamufasha kuko atari yamara kwagura ibikorwa bye uko abyifuza, ariko akemeza ko ariho bigana.
Ati “Ubusanzwe ndi umudozi. Nakuze mbikunda ndetse numva ko nimara gusoza amashuri nzahanga imyambaro. Nkora imyambaro yose yaba iy’abakobwa n’abagabo. Nahisemo gukora imyambaro kuko ari ibintu nakundaga kandi mbona nshoboye. Mpitamo kubikora kugira ngo ndusheho kuzanira abanyarwanda ibintu byiza kandi bikorewe iwacu.”
Iyo abajijwe umwihariko asubiza ko ari uko ahanga imideli mishya adakuye ahandi, akavuga ko afite intego ikomeye yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ati “Intego yanjye ni uguteza imbere imyambaro myiza ikorerwa mu Rwanda tunajyana hanze y’u Rwanda.”
BrenFashion ya Umutoniwase Brenda ije nyuma y’izindi nzu z’imideli zimaze kubaka izina mu Rwanda z’ab’igitsinagore, zirimo ‘Joyce Fashion Designs’ ya Uwamahoro Joyce, Rupari Designs ya Rupari Cynthia, Sonia Mugabo, Mugeni Diane washinze Mundi Designs, Joselyne Umutoniwase watangije Rwanda Clothing n’abandi batandukanye.
Umwaka Umujyi wa Kigali wahangiweho wahawe umwihariko ku myambaro ya KGL (Amafoto).
Ubu imyaka 114 irashize Kigali ibayeho, amateka yayo ni mareremare gusa uwayigezemo wese anyurwa n’isuku n’umutekano biwuranga bigatuma atifuza gutaha.
Buri Munyarwanda wese atewe ishema no kugira umurwa mukuru mwiza nk’uyu, bigatuma iteka ahora ashishikajwe no kuwushakira icyawuteza imbere no kuwurinda ngo hatagira ikiwuhungabanya.
Mu barinzi b’Umujyi harimo na Kigali Guardian For Life (KGL), ikirango cy’urubyiruko rwibumbiye mu itsinda ryitwa Dawn Central Investment Bureau (DCIB) rikora imyambaro itandukanye.
Iki kigo gikora imyambaro ariko igaruka ku mateka n’ubwiza bw’Umujyi wa Kigali, kuri ubu bahisemo gusohora iriho umwaka wa 1907.
Abadasobanukiwe n’amateka bagira ngo uyu mubare ni umurimbo washyizwe kuri iyi myambaro, ariko ufite byinshi usobanuye ku mateka ya Kigali n’ u Rwanda muri rusange.
Hasohotse ingofero ziri mu mabara atandukanye zanditseho imibare minini ya 1907 nk’umwaka Kigali yahangiweho, inyuma hari inyuguti nto za KGL nk’ikirango cy’iyi myambaro ndetse ku mpande hariho DCIB igaragaza iki kigo.
Umwe mu bayobozi ba DCIB, Habimana Félix, yabwiye IGIHE ko gukomeza kwibanda ku myambaro igaragaza Kigali ari ubutumwa bashaka gutanga ndetse no kurushaho kuyimenyekanisha.
Ati “Igituma dukomeza kwibanda ku myambaro igaragaza Kigali ni ubutumwa dushaka guha urubyiruko kugira ngo barusheho kurinda umujyi, kandi ni no guteza imbere ubukerarugendo no kumenyekanisha amateka yawo.”
Yakomeje avuga ko izi ngofero ziriho umwaka Kigali yabereyeho zakiriwe neza ku isoko kuko hari abakunda ibidafite amagambo, ubu bakaba babonye iriho imibare kandi igaragaza Kigali.
Ati “Abantu bazakiriye neza ku isoko kuko hari abadakunda ingofero ziriho amagambo, ubu babona iziriho imibare kandi zisobanuye byinshi kuri Kigali bakazikunda. Urumva ko ubu abantu bafite amahitamo atandukanye.”
KGL imaze imyaka ine ikora ikaba yaratangiriye ku ngofero ebyiri gusa none ubu bafite ubushobozi bwo kugira iduka ririmo imyambaro itandukanye irimo ingofero z’ubwoko butandukanye, imipira ndetse n’inkweto.
Nike yatsinze ikirego cyo guhagarika inkweto ziswe ‘Satan’ zikozwe mu maraso y’abantu.
Izi nkweto zikozwe mu mabara y’umukara n’umutuku zakozwe ku bufatanye bw’ikigo MSCH n’umuhanzi Lil Nas X. Ziriho amagambo yo muri Bibiliya muri Luka 10:18 ahanditse ngo “Nabonye Satani avuye mu ijuru, agwa asa n’umurabyo”.
Nike ikimara kubona izi nkweto zarakozwe higanywe izayo, yahise ishyikiriza urukiko rw’i New York ikirego, isaba ko izi nkweto zahagarikwa gucuruza kuko nta ruhare yagize mu ikorwa ryazo bikaba bishobora guteza urujijo ku isoko.
Kuri uyu wa Kane urukiko rwanzuye ko izi nkweto zitongera gucuruzwa, gusa uyu mwanzuro ukaba uteye urujijo kuko n’ubundi hari hasohotse imiguru 666 yose ihita ishira.
Buri muguru w’izi nkweto waguzwe amadolari 1.018, kandi zari ziriho ikirango cya Nike, umusaraba, akamenyetso ka Pentagone n’imirongo itukura yakozwe mu bitonyanga by’amaraso byatanzwe na bamwe mu bagize iki kigo cyazikoze.
Ku ruhande rw’abanyamategeko ba MSCHF bo bavugaga ko izi nkweto 666 atari ubwoko bushya bashyize ku isoko ahubwo ko ari igihangano cy’ubugeni bakoze kigenewe abantu bake.
Inkweto ziswe Satani zatangiye guteza impagarara ku wa Mbere ubwo hasohokaga indirimbo y’umuhanzi Lil Nas X yise Montero (Call Me By Your Name), imugaragaza ari ku cyuma cyikaraga ava mu ijuru ajya ikuzimu bigaragaza ya magambo yo muri Luka 10:18.
Zikimara gusohoka zahise ziteza impagarara ku mbuga nkoranyambaga abantu batandukanye bagaragaza ko uku ari ugusebya abakirisitu. Muri bo harimo Guverineri wa Leta ya South Dakota, Kristi Noem, wavuze ko ibyakozwe kuri izi nkweto ari amarorerwa.
Inkweto ziswe Satani zikoze mu maraso y’umuntu zateje ururondogoro.
Izi nkweto zikozwe mu mabara y’umukara n’umutuku zakozwe ku bufatanye bw’ikigo MSCH n’umuhanzi Lil Nas X. Ziriho amagambo yo muri Bibiliya muri Luka 10:18 ahanditse ngo “Nabonye Satani avuye mu ijuru, agwa asa n’umurabyo”.
Ziriho ikirango cya Nike, umusaraba, akamenyetso ka pentagone n’imirongo itukura yakozwe mu bitonyanga by’amaraso byatanzwe na bamwe mu bagize iki kigo kiri kuzicuruza.
Izi nkweto zasohotse kuri uyu wa Mbere hasohorwa imiguru 666 buri umwe ugura amadolari 1.018, ariko mu gihe gito zari zashize ku isoko.
Nike imaze kubona ko hari abiganye ikirango cyayo, yatanze ikirego mu rukiko rw’i New York, ko rwabuza MSCHF gukomeza gucuruza izi nkweto kuko zishobora guteza urujijo mu bakiliya bayo bacyeka ko aribo bazikoze.
Bagize bati “Nta bufatanye buri hagati ya Nike na MSCHF mu gukora inkweto za satani, izi bakoze zishobora guteza urujijo ku isoko ryacu abantu batekereza ko hari uruhare twagize mu ikorwa ryazo.”
Izi nkweto zagaragaye bwa mbere mu ndirimbo nshya ya Lil Nas X yitwa Montero (Call Me By Your Name), yari yabanje gutangazwa ku wa Gatanu.
Muhire watangije ‘Inkanda House’ ihanga imyambaro yavuze uko “Gourmette” zambarwaga mu muco nyarwanda.
Ni mu kiganiro Muhire yagiranye Urusaro Carine cyari gifite umutwe ugira uti ‘Imyambarire yo hambere mu iterambere rya Made in Rwanda’ aho aba bombi baganiriye ku ruhare rw’inzu ndangamurage mu gufasha bamwe mu bahanzi b’imideli.
Muhire yavuze ko imyumvire ku myambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda imaze kugenda ihinduka bitewe ahanini n’uko na Leta yabigizemo uruhare igaca imyambaro ya Caguwa.
Ati “Kuba imyumvire igenda ihinduka ku bijyanye n’imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda ni intambwe ikomeye tugenda dutera. Tukiza mu mwuga wo kudoda imyambaro nta kibazo twari dufite cy’icyo kubona ibyo twifashisha mu guhanga imyambaro ariko ubu kubera ko twabaye benshi hari igihe bibaho. Gusa, hari ibyo dufite twifashisha byo mu bihingwa, hari amagweja akora ubudodo dufite ibyo twifashisha bikorerwa inaha, ndetse hari n’umusore wo mu Rwanda ukora ibipesu mu mahembe hari n’ibiva hanze.”
Yabajijwe niba abona ingoro ndangamurage ari ahantu umuntu yavoma ibintu byiza byamufasha gukora ibintu byiza nk’ibyo akora undi mu gusubiza avuga ko bishoboka cyane ndetse anitangaho urugero.
Ati “Natangiye gusura inzu ndangamurage cyane i Butare ndi umwana muto ubu ndashaje. Hari ibintu byinshi nagiye mbona bikamfasha. Hari ibintu byinshi byo mu nzu ndangamurage byagiye bintera imbaraga zo guhanga imyambaro.”
Aha niho yavuze ko hari imirimbo yo hambere yitwa ‘ubutega’ yambarwaga n’abagore bo hambere, yatumye atangira guhanga imirimbo yakwambarwa n’igitsinagore.
Ati “Hariho imirimbo bitaga ubutega abagore bo hambere bambaraga ku birenge ntekereza ko n’abagabo babyambaraga, tugerageza gukora utuntu n’umuntu yakwambara ku birenge hari abajya bavuga ko ari imico mibi n’ubwomanzi cyangwa uburara kandi ariko no mu Rwanda rwo hambere byarahabaga.”
Yavuze ko inzu ndangamurage azishimira ko hari umusanzu ziha abahanga imyambaro iyo bazisuye.
Ati “Nibaza ko inzu ndangamurage twabashimira cyane, hari ababona ari bito bitewe n’uko bareba ariko njye ndabashimira cyane. Ndabashimira aho mugeze ubu. Hari byinshi mutuma tubona kandi nimubyongera bizaba ari akarusho.”
Dr Kandt witiriwe iyi ngoro iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali muri Nyarugenge ari nayo umuyobozi wayo yaganiraga na Patrick Muhire, yabaye igihe kirekire mu bikorwa by’ubushakashatsi i Shangi, nyuma aza gusubira mu Budage, agarutse mu Rwanda yakomeje ibikorwa by’ubushakashatsi ariko aza no kugirirwa icyizere, agirwa Rezida w’u Rwanda, ahita yimukira ahazwi nk’Ingoro yo kwa ‘Richard Kandt’.
Iyi nzu yitiriwe ifatwa nk’imwe mu zigezweho zimaze igihe kirekire mu Rwanda, ni imwe mu zisurwa cyane na ba mukerarugendo ndetse yihariye amateka yaranze Abanyarwanda n’Abadage.
Muhire wari watumiwe mu kiganiro n’umuyobozi w’Ingoro yitiriwe Richard Kandt yatangiye guhanga imideli mu 2008. Inkanda House yashinze ni imwe mu nzu zihanga imideli zimaze igihe mu Rwanda kuko yatangiye mu buryo bweruye mu 2010. Ikora imyambaro itandukanye irimo imico ivanze y’Abanyamahanga n’uwo mu Rwanda.
Izina ‘Inkanda’ risobanuye umwambaro w’abagore bo mu Rwanda rwo hambere nk’uko abakobwa n’abagabo bambaraga ishabure bagatega amasunzu, abagore bambaraga Inkanda bagasokoza uruhanika.
Inkanda yabaga ikoze mu ruhu bakayambara bayikenyereye mu mabere. Uyu musore yahisemo iri zina mu gukomeza gusigasira umuco.
Intego Muhire yari afite atangira yari ukumvisha abanyarwanda ko uruganda rw’imideli atari umwuga w’injiji nk’uko benshi bamubwiraga agitangira. Imyambaro ya Inkanda House yamamaye harimo “Inka ya Data Collection” yagiye hanze mu 2018, yari imyamabro ihuza gakondo nyarwanda n’ibigezweho.
Hari kandi ‘The black days of Marie Antoinette’ yerekanye ku bufatanye na Ambasade y’Ababiligi mu Rwanda. Iyi myambaro avuga ko yayihimbye ashaka kwibuka abantu bagize uruhare mu ruganda rw’imideli batabarutse.
Patrick Muhire Nshuti yize ibijyanye no gucunga imari. Iyi nzu ye ikora imyambaro y’abagabo n’abagore. Ni umwe mu batangije ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ yamenyekaniyemo abamurika imideli n’abayihanga benshi bo mu Rwanda.
Joyce Fashion Designs yashyize hanze imyambaro yatuye ba Nyampinga (Amafoto).Iyi myambaro ya Uwamahoro yayise ‘Nyampinga dedicated Collection’. Igizwe n’amakanzu cyane cyane ndetse n’indi mike irimo amashati n’amakabutura byose by’abakobwa.
Uwamahoro yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi myambaro mishya yashyize hanze yatekereje kuykora mu gihe hari amarushanwa atandukanye aherutse kuba mu Rwanda arimo Miss Rwanda ndetse na Miss Supranational kuko hari abakobwa bamwe bo muri ayo marushanwa yambitse.
Ati “Ni imyambaro natuye ba nyampinga kuko nayambitse abakobwa batandukanye barimo abo muri Miss Rwanda ndetse nabo muri Miss Supranational, byose by’ubu mwaka. Natekereje kuyikora mu gihe aya marushanwa yari arimbanyije.”
Nko muri Miss Rwanda yambitse abakobwa bari basanganywe amakamba ubwo bajyaga kuyatanga ku munsi wa nyuma w’iri rushanwa, aba barimo Umutesi Denise wabaye Igisonga cya kabiri muri Miss Rwanda mu 2020 ndetse na Umwiza Phionah wabaye Igisonga cya Mbere muri Miss Rwanda mu 2020, uzahagararira u Rwanda mu irushanwa ry’ubwiza rya Miss University Africa ribera muri Nigeria.
Uretse aba kandi niwe wambitse Musana Teta Hense ku munsi wo gutangaza abakobwa 20 bagombaga kujya mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda. Musana Teta Hense ni nawe uyu mwaka ufite umushinga urimo Agashya.
Joyce Fashion Designs ni nayo yambitse abakobwa bose barindwi bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cya Miss Supranational mu 2021, ku munsi wo gutanga ikamba.
Uwamahoro ni umwe mu bahanga imideli bahagaze neza muri iki gihe. Avuga ko n’ubwo atari yagera ku nzozi yari afite atangira, ashima Imana mu buryo bukomeye.
Uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe ufite inzu ihanga imyambaro ya ‘Joyce Fashion Designs’ avuga ko kugira ngo amenye kudoda byaturutse ku kuba yarakuze abona iwabo hari imashini zibikora, akagenda abyiga akiri muto kugeza ubwo yabaye mukuru akabikomeza.
Ati “Kubera ko nakundaga kubona imashini iri aho nta kintu bari kuyikoresha, natangiye kujya nyifata nkiga kudoda gusa ntabwo nabikundaga cyane. Mu 2015 natangiye kwiga imashini neza ariko numvaga ntazabikora nk’umwuga, nkirangiza kwiga imashini nahise njya kwiga kaminuza.”
Mu 2017 nibwo yaje kubitangira bya kinyamwuga ariko biza kugenda biguru ntege kuko atari afite ubushobozi buhagije kandi anabifatanya n’amasomo ya Kaminuza. Nyuma yaje gushinga inzu ihanga imyambaro yise ‘Joyce Fashion Designs’.
Afite intego yo gukomeza gukora neza no guhaza isoko ry’imyambaro mu Rwanda akagera no ku isoko mpuzamahanga.
Wig, imisatsi mihangano iharawe i Kigali ishobora gusubiza ku isuka abatunganyaga imisatsi.
Mu myaka yashize umuntu washakaga kwisukisha cyangwa kugira imisatsi mireremire yoroshye bizwi nko kudefiriza,yagana abize iby’uwo mwuga bakamufasha kuba yashyira ku mutwe ibyo ashaka.
Kuri ubu ibintu bimaze guhindura isura ko hasigaye hari imisatsi n’ibisuko bicuruzwa bikozwe mu buryo bumeze nk’ingofero, ku buryo igihe ushakiye kuwukoresha uhita uwambara bitagusabye kujya kubabyize.
Na mbere ubu buryo bwariho ariko ntibyari biteye imbere ku buryo buri wese yabonaga ibikoze neza, mu bwoko bw’imisatsi buri wese yakwifuza. Wasangaga benshi bavuga ko abazikoresha ari abantu badasobanukiwe n’ibyubwiza.
Kuri ubu ibintu byarahindutse ko iyi misatsi ishyirwaho igihe cyose yateye imbere, aho iboneka mu bwoko butandukanye, haba imiremire, imigufi n’ibindi.
Iyi misatsi ikozwe mu ngofero usibye kuba yorohereza abayikoresha kandi igezweho cyane kuburyo umugore cyangwa umukobwa utayitunze aba atakisanga mu basirimu.
Wig ikoreshwa mu buryo bworoshye ku buryo uhita uyambara nk’ingofero wabanje gusuka ibituta cyangwa waryamishije umusatsi usanganwe, washaka gufatisha ugakoreshaho amavuta yabugemewe ikaguma ku mutwe.
Bamwe mu bayikoresha baganiriye na IGIHE , bavuze ko igituma bayikunda ari uko yabaganyirije umwanya bamaraga mu nzu zitunganya imisatsi ,ndetse bakaba bahinduranya ibyo bafite ku mutwe uko babishaka.
Umulisa Kelly Sandra yavuze ko gukoresha ubu buryo bimufasha guhora asa neza.
Ati “Gukoresha wig biramfasha cyane kuko mba mfite iz’imisatsi miremire n’izisutse. Icyo nkeneye nicyo nshyiraho kandi kuko nzi kubyikorera byatumye ngabanya wa mwanya namaraga muri Salon, kandi uhora ukeye kuko uba wahinduye uko usa kenshi”.
Mutoni Barber we avuga ko ubu bwoko bw’imisatsi bumafasha guhora akeye kandi ko byamuruhuye ingoyi yo kwisukisha akababara umutwe nkuko byajyaga bimugendekera.
Ati “Usibye kuba mpora nkeye none nkaba mfite ibisuko, ejo ngashyira imisatsi ya kinyafurika cyangwa imiremire uko nshaka byanduhuye kubabara bari kunsuka. Mbere nasukaga amarasita nkarwara ariko ubu mpita nyishyiramo nta kibazo ngize.”
Yakomeje avuga ko bibafasha no kudasesagura kuko wig uyigura ukayimarana igihe kinini, nyamara ibisuko bisanzwe nyuma y’ukwezi biba byashaje.
Ati “Erega biranagufasha mu buryo bwo kudasesagura ko niba nko mu kwezi wasukishaga ukabikuraho ukajugunya, ubu siko bimeze ko uyikuraho ukayoza ukabika.”
Ku ruhande rw’abazicuruza nabo bavuga ko abantu bakwiye kureka gusesagura bisukisha ibintu bakuraho kandi hari uburyo bwo gutunga ibirambye, kandi ko bituma n’isuku yo mu mutwe yiyongera.
Umucuruzi w’ibirungo by’ubwiza, Maty Beauty yagize ati “Kugura wig ni ukwiteganyiriza kuko uyikoresha igihe, ntabwo ipfa gusaza kandi iriya uyishyiraho wasutse ibituta cyangwa hejuru y’umusatsi wawe muke. Uyikuraho ukoga mu mutwe uko ushaka, biroroha kurusha kuzategereza koga mu mutwe nyuma y’amezi atatu wasukuye.”
Nubwo hari abashima ibyiza bya wig ariko abize umwuga wo gusuka no gutunganya imisatsi y’abagore bo bahangayikishijwe n’ikwirakwira ryayo, kuko bishobora kuzatuma ibyo bize bibapfira ubusa.
Umusutsi ubimazemo imyaka itanu, Mujawamariya Valentine yavuze ko iterambere ari ryiza,ariko ko ubwiyongere bwa wig nibukomeza gusakara hose ibyo bize bizabapfira ubusa.
Ati “Kuba haza ibintu bishya ni byiza, ariko se ko ureba abantu basigaye bagura iriya misatsi bakayishyiriraho ubwo tuzaba abande? Ikizakurikiraho tuzabura abo dusuka kandi ibi nibyo byari bidutunze n’abacu”.
Uyu mubyeyi wari usanzwe ufite abakiliya b’abanyamujyi yavuze ko batangiye kugabanuka bitewe n’ubu bwoko bushya bw’imisatsi.
Ati “Nari mfite ukuntu nkorana n’abakobwa b’abanyamujyi kuko hari abo nziranye nabo bitabiriye amarushanwa y’ubwiza bakanzanira na bagenzi babo, ubu ntibakiza nkuko byari bisanzwe, aza ari uko yabuze wenda ubwoko bwa wig bw’ibisuko ashaka. Ibi bintera ubwoba ko mu minsi iri imbere bazagenda burundu”.
Izi mpungenge azihuje na Abubakar Mupenzi utunganya imisatsi y’abagore uvuga ko ahangayikishijwe no kuba abakiliya bakoresha imisatsi bagabanyuka.
Ati “Abantu bazaga kudefiriza no kwiyogoshesha ari benshi ariko ushatse imisatsi idefirije agura wig ndende, yashaka imigufi akaba ariyo agura, bidatinze turashaka ikindi dukora”.
Iyi misatsi kuri ubu ikoreshwa n’abifite kubera ko igiciro kiri hejuru. Imyiza iboneka guhera ku bihumbi 50frw ariko igenda igabanuka uko iminsi ishira.
Uko Guma mu rugo yatumye Dusenge Steffa yinjira mu bucuruzi bw’ibikomo.
Uyu musore mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yahisemo gutangira uyu mushinga nyuma y’uko yari amaze igihe kinini atekereza kuwukora ariko akabura umwanya kubera akandi kazi yakoraga.
Ubwo Coronavirus yugarizaga abantu mu Rwanda n’ahandi henshi ku Isi bakajya muri Guma mu rugo, nibwo yahisemo guhita yinjira mu gukora ibikomo ndetse kuri ubu yemeza ko yatangiye kungukirwa n’ubu bucuruzi. Ibi bikomo bye yabyise HIIGHK Bracelets.
Ati “Nari mfite igitekezo kuva cyera cyo kubikora ariko nkabura umwanya ariko muri Guma mu rugo y’umwaka ushize nibwo nabonye umwanya uhagije wo gushyira mu bikorwa igitekerezo cyanjye. Nashyize hanze agakomo kanjye mbona abantu barabikunze bintera imbaraga yo kubikomeza.”
“Ibikomo ntabwo ari ibintu byo kwambara habaye ibintu bidasanzwe runaka kandi ntabwo bigenewe itsinda runaka ry’abagabo cyangwa abagore. Ntabwo umuntu abyambara ashaka kwiyerekana cyangwa kugaragara neza. Ahubwo byakwifashishwa mu kubara inkuru cyangwa kwerekana uwo uri we.”
Ibi bikomo bigaragaramo ikamba, Gusenga akavuga ko impamvu batekereje kurishyiramo, ari uko bashakaga kugaragaza ko umwami yakoraga byiza abyikorera kandi akabikorera abandi.
Impamvu babikoze ni uko umuntu wambitswe aka gakomo aba ari kubara inkuru ze nk’uko umwami yabikoraga, yikorera ibyiza kandi anabikorera abaturaga ayoboye.
Ntabwo mu Rwanda hazwi abantu benshi bakora ibikomo kuko bifatwa nk’ibintu biciriritse ariko Dusenge asigaye abyaza impano ye umusaruro, kandi byatangiye kumufasha.
Yavuze ko hari abantu amaze guha akazi n’ubwo atari benshi cyane, yemeza ko uko ubucuruzi bwe buzagenda bwaguka ariko na we azagenda yagura ubucuruzi bwe.
Ati “Maze guha akazi abantu batanu barimo ushinzwe kunshyirira ibintu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , ugeza ibintu ku bantu baba babisabye ndetse n’abandi babiri bamfasha gukora no gutunganya udukomo n’amasaro.”
Yavuze ko ibintu bimuvuna ari ukumenyekanisha ibyo akora kuko hari benshi batarabimenya uko abyifuza.
Yemeza ko ubu akazi yari asanzwe akora yamaze kukareka. Ati “ Akazi nakoraga narakaretse kuko nashaka kubanza gushyira imbaraga mu kubaka izina ry’ibi nkora kugira ngo abantu bose babimenye baba abari mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo.”
Yavuze ko ku munsi bashobora gukora udukomo turi hagati 10 na 20, gusa akavuga ko umubare w’utwo bagurisha ukiri hasi bitewe n’ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Teddy Riley uri mu Rwanda yasuye House of Tayo (Amafoto).
Amafoto yashyizwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’iyi nzu ikora imyambaro, agaragaza Teddy Riley ari kumwe na Mathew Rugamba watangije iyi nzu ndetse hari n’aho agaragara yigera imyambaro ikorerwa muri iyi nzu.
Iyi nzu yanditse ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo iti “Byari ibyishimo by’ikirenga kwakira umunyabigwi w’umuririmbyi akaba n’utunganya indirimbo n’uzandika, Teddy Riley; aho dukorera ejo.”
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 53 yageze mu Rwanda ku wa Gatandatu abanza gushyirwa mu kato no gupimwa Coronavirus nk’uko biri mu mabwiriza yashyizweho n’inzego z’ubuzima mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki 7 Ukuboza 2020, Teddy Riley yasuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwa Kigali ruri ku Gisozi, anunamira inzirakarengane ziharuhukiye.
Teddy Riley uyu munsi yasuye Ishuri ry’Umuziki rya Muhanga aho agirana ikiganiro n’abanyeshuri baryigamo ndetse n’abariyobora. Azamara icyumweru mu Rwanda.
Ubusanzwe uyu mugabo w’Umunyamerika yitwa Edward Theodore Riley. Ni umuririmbyi, umwanditsi w’indirimbo, akaba anazitunganya. Azwi cyane nk’umwe mu batangije injyana ya New jack swing, yamamaye cyane muri Amerika no ku Isi yose mu myaka ya 1980.
Mu 1987 yari ari umwe mu bagize itsinda rya Guy, yari ahuriyemo na Aaron Hall na Timmy Gatling.
Nyuma yo gukora album ya kabiri y’iri tsinda afatanyije n’uwitwa The Future bakoze kuri album ya Michael Jackson ya munani yitwaga ‘Dangerous’ yagiye hanze mu 1991, ikaza no gukundwa bihambaye.
Teddy Riley yaje gutandukana na bagenzi be babanaga muri Guy, mu 1991 ahita ashinga irindi tsinda ryitwaga Blackstreet. Iri tsinda ryakunzwe mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo “Don’t Leave Me” yagiye hanze mu 1997, “No Diggity” yagiye hanze mu 1996, bakoranye na Dr. Dre na Queen Pen n’izindi. Iri tsinda ryasenyutse mu 2011 rikajya ryongera rikihuza.
Ishimishamubiri? Bikini mu marushanwa y’ubwiza, umwambaro ukunze kuvugirizwa induru ku Isi yose.
Ku bo muri iri dini, abenshi bakunze kwambara umwambaro uzwi nka burkini wahanzwe n’Umunya-Australia, Aheda Zanetti, uhisha umubiri wose uretse isura, intoki n’amano. Nawo hari ibihugu bitemerera abakobwa babyo kuwambara n’iyo yaba agiye koga ku mazi.
Bikini isanzwe yambarwa mu marushanwa y’ubwiza ikunze kwambarwa, iyo hagezeho icyiciro kizwi nka ‘Swim Suit competition’. Icyo gihe abakobwa bambara utwenda duhisha amabere ndetse n’imyanya y’ibanga ubundi si ukwivayo bakiyekerekana imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka nta nkomyi.
Ni umwambaro washyizwe mu marushanwa y’ubwiza ugamije kugaragaza ubwiza bw’umukobwa bujyanye n’uko ikimero cye gikurura abantu.
Uyu mwambaro akenshi wambarwa, hari sosiyete zatanze agatubutse zigamije kwamamaza cyangwa se gushaka abamurika imideli bajya bifashishwa mu kwambara imyambaro yazo.
Ariko, hari n’abawifashisha mu marushanwa y’ubwiza bagamije ishimishamubiri (kugaburira amaso yabo imiterere y’umukobwa ujya gusa n’uwambaye ubusa), ibintu bikundwa cyane n’abiganjemo abagabo bageze mu zabukuru.
Bikini yabaye kimwe mu bigize amarushanwa atandukanye akomeye y’ubwiza ku Isi arimo Miss Earth na Miss World, ndetse abaterankunga nka Hawaiian Tropic bari bamwe mu bamamaza mu gihe cy’iki cyiciro.
Uretse kwambara bikini mu marushanwa y’ubwiza hari ibihugu akorerwa mu tubari, utubyiniro, imikino ya boxing n’ahandi; aho abahize abandi bahabwa ibikombe, amafaranga cyangwa se amasezerano yo gukora ibijyanye no kumurika imideli.
Muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, amarushanwa y’ubwiza ku bari n’abategarugori arimo imyambaro ya bikini yatangiye kumenyakana mu myaka yo mu 1880. N’ubwo ayo marushanwa yabaga ari menshi, ntabwo yahabwaga agaciro.
Yatangiye kubahwa ubwo hatangiraga ‘Miss America’ mu 1921, ariko andi marushanwa yasaga nk’aciriritse yakomeje kubaho n’ubundi.
Amarushanwa ya bikini, hari akorwa agamije kureba umukobwa ufite ikibuno kinini kandi cyiza kurusha abandi, urugero nka Miss Bum Bum ibera muri Brésil ndetse na Miss Reef ibera mu bihugu bitandukanye byo mu Majyepfo ya Amerika.
Twirengagije ukwamamara kw’amarushanwa y’ubwiza atandukanye kandi umukobwa akaba yitabira ku bushake bwe, iyo bigeze ku cyiciro cyo kwambara bikini bikunze kuvugisha benshi.
Abanenga iki cyiciro mu marushanwa y’ubwiza, bavuga ko ubwiza bw’umwari budakwiriye kureberwa ku miterere y’umubiri we. Ndetse amarushanwa amwe akomeye ku Isi yagiye yotswa igitutu kugeza afashe umwanzuro wo gukuramo iki cyiciro.
Miss World yabaye bwa mbere mu 1951 yateguwe na Eric Morley [wahoze ari umugabo wa Julia Morley uhagarariye Miss World Oraganization itegura iri rushanwa uyu munsi], yashyizwemo uyu mwambaro agamije kumenyekanisha umwambaro wo kogana mu iserukiramuco ryo mu Bwongereza ryitwaga ‘Festival Bikini Contest’.
Umunya-Suède, Kiki Håkansson, wegukanye ikamba icyo gihe yaryambitswe yambaye bikini, maze ibihugu bigendera ku migenzo n’imico y’amadini ntibyabivugaho rumwe, ndetse bimwe byafashe umwanzuro wo kutazongera kwitabira.
Bikini yaje gukurwamo ahubwo zisimbuzwa amakanzu maremare azwi nka Evening Gowns. Bikini zongeye kugaruka muri iri rushanwa ariko nabwo biteza impagarara. Mu myaka yo hagati yo mu 1970 no mu 1980, ryamaganwe na benshi biganjemo abaharanira uburenganzira bw’igitsinagore.
Nyuma abategura irushanwa bahisemo ko icyiciro cya bikini cyajya kibera mu muhezo, imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka k’abantu bake ntibishyirwe mu itangazamakuru.
Ryaje kuba rihagaze gato, ryongera kuba mu 1996 mu Mujyi wa Bangalore mu Buhinde, ariko nabwo Abahinde benshi bararyamagana, bavuga ko ritesha agaciro umwari kubera bikini.
Habaye imyigaragambyo ikomeye muri icyo gihugu, ku buryo icyiciro cyo kwiyerekana muri bikini cyabereye mu birwa bya Seychelles.
Mu 2013 iri rushanwa rya Miss World ryabereye muri Indonesia ahantu habarizwa umuryango munini w’abemera amahame ya Islam, nabwo riramaganwa.
Hari n’umuryango wo muri icyo gihugu wasabye ko irushanwa ritagomba kuhabera kuko ryamamaza ibikobwa by’ubusambanyi n’ubunebwe mu bakobwa, kandi nta mpamvu n’imwe yo kwerekana ibice by’abagore byakabaye bihishwa.
Icyo gihe, abateguraga iri rushanwa barisimbuje indi myambaro itagaragaza ubwambure bw’abakobwa.
Igitutu cyatumye amarushanwa amwe akura Bikini ku bigenderwaho hatangwa amanota…
Nyuma y’induru n’imijugujugu yagiye ikurikizwa irushanwa rya Miss World kubera bikini kuva ryatangira, mu Ukuboza 2014, byatangajwe iki cyiciro kitazongera kugaragara muri iri rushanwa ryari rimaze imyaka irenga 60 rihanganye na benshi bangaga bikini.
Bikini ikurwamo, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Miss World Organization Julia Evelyn Pritchard Morley yavuze ko bafashe iki cyemezo bashaka ko ‘aho kureba imiterere y’umukobwa bazajye bareba ubwenge bwe n’indi myitwarire’.
Muri Kamena 2018, irushanwa rya Miss America naryo ryatangaje rigiye gukuraho icyiciro cyasabaga abakobwa kwiyerekana mu mwambaro wo kogana ndetse hakurwaho gusuzuma ubwiza bw’abahatanira ikamba hagendewe ku miterere y’umubiri wabo.
Gusa umukobwa ushaka kuwambara muri iri rushanwa ari ubushake bwe, we ntabwo yakumiriwe.
Ibihugu bimwe byashyizeho ingamba zikarishye ku bakobwa, zibuza kwambara bikini…
Umunya- Afghanistan, Vida Samadzai, yahataniye ikamba rya Miss Earth mu 2003, yaje kutishimirwa mu gihugu cye yaba mu baturage ndetse no mu buyobozi bamunenga kujya mu irushanwa bambaramo bikini.
Uyu mukobwa yavukiye muri Afghanistan ariko akurira muri Amerika, gusa ajya muri iri rushanwa icyo gihe yabaga mu Buhinde.
Byatumye Afghanistan ica burundu kwambara bikini mu marushanwa y’ubwiza abera muri icyo gihugu ndetse no ku bakobwa bashobora kuyihagararira mu marushanwa y’ubwiza.
Uyu mwanzuro waje uherekejwe n’ibisobanuro bivuga ko kugaragara umuntu yambaye ubusa mu marushanwa y’ubwiza bihabanye amahame ya Islam ndetse bihabanye n’umuco wo muri Afghanistan, bigatesha umuntu ikuzo.
Icyo gihe, Habiba Sarabi wari Minisitiri ushinzwe ibijyanye n’abagore yavuze ko kugaragara umuntu asa nk’uwambaye ubusa atari ubwisanzure bw’umugore cyangwa umukobwa.
Ati “Ahubwo ku giti cyanjye mbona ari mu rwego rwo gushimisha abagabo.” Icyo gihe iki gihugu cyavuze ko Vida Samadzai yagiye atagihagarariye.
Vida Samadzai wari wabaye umukobwa wa kabiri wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Afghanistan nyuma y’uwitwa Zohra Daoud wambitswe iri kamba mu 1972, yagiye akangishwa kwicwa ndetse yamaze amezi atatu acungirwa umutekano na FBI.
Bikini yaketsweho kwifashishwa nk’igikoresho ku bashaka gukoresha abakobwa ubusambanyi
Irushanwa rya Miss Tanguita risobanurwa nk’irushanwa ry’ubwiza ry’abana rya bikini [Miss Child Bikini] ryo muri Colombia , rifatwa nka kamwe mu duce tugize del Rio Suarez Festival, ryashinjwe gukururira abana bato mu busambanyi.
Gusa abategura iri rushanwa bo babyamaganiye kure bavuga ko atari ko bimeze, ko ahubwo rigamije kugaragaza akamaro k’imiterere myiza y’umwana.
Impirambanyi ku burenganzira bwa muntu zavuze ko iri rushanwa n’ubwo ryemewe rihonyora uburenganzira bw’abana batarageza imyaka y’ubukure.
No mu Rwanda Bikini ikunze kurikoroza!
Kuva mu 2016 nibwo bikini yatangiye kutavugwaho rumwe cyane mu Banyarwanda.
Icyo gihe, Miss Akiwacu Colombe wari uri mu irushanwa ry’ubwiza rya Miss Supranational mu 2016 yemeye kwiyerekana yambaye ‘Bikini’ mu gihe abandi bakobwa bari baragiye baserukira u Rwanda bajyagayo bakabyangaga.
Mu 2013 Mutesi Aurore wari uhagarariye u Rwanda yanze kwambara ‘Bikini’ nk’abandi kugira ngo yerekane indangagaciro z’Abanyarwandakazi. Mu 2014, Neema Umwali na we yunze mu rya mugenzi we yanga kwambara utu twenda ahubwo yiyerekana yambaye umwitero.
Icyo gihe hari abacunaguje Mutesi Aurore bamushinja gukoza isoni igihugu no kucyandagaza mu maso y’amahanga we akavuga ko ataciye inka amabere.
Abanyarwandakazi batangiye gutinyuka bikini mu 2015, Sonia Gisa yabimburiye abandi ayambara ntacyo yikanga ndetse icyo gihe yatahanye ikamba rya Nyampinga uhagarariye Umugabane wa Afurika.
Ubwo yitabiraga iri rushanwa mu 2016, Akiwacu Colombe niwe wambaye bikini biravugwa cyane ndetse bamwe bavuga ko nyampinga w’u Rwanda atari akwiriye kujya kwanika amatako ku gasozi, gusa hari n’abandi bavugaga ko ibyo yakoze aribyo.
Abandi bose bakurikiyeho mu irushanwa rya Miss Supranational barimo Ingabire Habiba wagiyeyo mu 2017, Uwase Clémentine [Tina] wagiyeyo mu 2018 na Umunyana Shanitah bose bambaye uyu mwambaro ntacyo bikanga, gusa amafoto yabo yasakazwa agakurikizwa amagambo yiganjemo avuga ko ‘bahonyoye umuco’.
Miss Uwase Hirwa Honorine ‘Miss Igisabo’ ubwo yitabiraga Miss Earth 2017 nawe yanze kwambara bikini, icyo gihe abantu bamwe bamwutse inabi bavuga atari akwiriye kwitabira abizi ko atazayambara. Ibi bikomeza kuba urujijo ku mukobwa witabira amarushanwa asaba kwambara bikini, kuko yayambara cyangwa ntabikore atabura abamwibasira.
Ubwiza ntibureberwa mu busa
Tariki 25 Ukwakira 2020 bwa mbere mu Rwanda abakobwa bakoze amarushanwa ya Miss Africa Carabal, biyerekana muri bikini ibintu bitari bisanzwe kuko n’abayambaraga mu myaka yashize bayambariraga hanze.
Hari habaye gutoranya abakobwa batanu bagomba gukurwamo umwe uzaserukira u Rwanda muri Miss Africa Calabar izabera muri Nigeria mu mpera z’uyu mwaka.
Uku gutoranya aba bakobwa kwakurikiwe n’induru , benshi bavuga ko batishimiye uburyo abakobwa basabwe kwiyerekana mu mwambaro wa bikini ubusanzwe benshi bavuga ko uhabanye n’umuco nyarwanda.
Bamwe bavugaga ko mu gihe aya marushanwa abera mu bindi bihugu, nta kabuza abakobwa bo mu Rwanda bazasabwa kwambara bikini nta mananiza. Abandi bakavuga ko bidakwiye ku munyarwandakazi, maze rubura gica!
Umuyobozi w’Umuryango Urwanya ruswa n’Akarengane, Transparency International Rwanda, Ingabire Marie Immaculée, yavuze ko uburyo abakobwa bari bambayemo ntaho bitandukaniye n’ubusa buri buri. Yagize ati “Ubusa ni ubusa nyine kandi ubwiza ntibureberwa mu busa.”
Iyahoze ari Inteko Nyarwanda y’ururimi n’umuco (RALC) ntabwo yigeze yemeranya na gato n’abakobwa Bambara bikini mu marushanwa y’ubwiza ariko n’abavagayo bakaza mu Rwanda nta bihano bafatirwaga.
Hari abantu bamwe bagiye bavuga ko “Bikini” yambawe mu rwego rw’akazi yaba idahabanye n’umuco nyarwanda.
Reba amashusho y’abakobwa ba mbere 10 muri Miss Universe 2019 mu cyiciro cyo kwiyerekana bambaye Bikini.
Inkanda House yashyize hanze imyambaro mishya (Amafoto).
Muhire yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi myambaro ari imyambaro yatekereje mu bihe bya Coronavirus, ashaka kwerekana ko nyuma y’ubuzima bubi hashobora kubaho ubundi bwiza.
Ati “Nashatse kwerekana ko na nyuma y’urupfu hari ubuzima. Nyuma y’iminsi mibi twaciyemo ya Covid-19 ubuzima buracyakomeza. Ni aho nakuye igitekerezo cyo guhanga iyi myambaro.”
Iyi myambaro ni iya 23 mu yo yagiye ashyira hanze, akayereka abanyarwanda baba mu Rwanda ndetse n’abo hanze.
Uyu musore avuga ko nk’umuhanzi w’imideli, uri mu ba mbere bafashe iya mbere mu gukangurira abanyarwanda cyane cyane urubyiruko ko imideli ari ikintu cyateza umuntu ku giti cye imbere ndetse n’igihugu muri rusange yishimira urwego uru ruganga rugezeho.
Ati “Nishimira urwego imideli igezeho uyu munsi wa none mu Rwanda, tugitangira nta watwumvaga ndetse hari n’abadusekaga ariko ubu tumaze kuba benshi. Ibihangano byacu birambarwa hirya no hino mu Rwanda ndetse no hanze yarwo. Ni ikintu gishimishije.”
Inkanda House ni imwe mu nzu zihanga imideli zimaze igihe mu Rwanda kuko yatangiye mu 2010. Ikora imyambaro itandukanye irimo imico ivanze y’Abanyamahanga n’uwo mu Rwanda.
Izina ‘Inkanda’ risobanuye umwambaro w’abagore bo mu Rwanda rwo hambere nk’uko abakobwa n’abagabo bambaraga ishabure bagatega amasunzu, abagore bambaraga Inkanda bagasokoza uruhanika.
Inkanda yabaga ikoze mu ruhu cyangwa mu mpuzu bakayambara bayicyenyereye mu mabere. Uyu musore yahisemo iri zina mu gukomeza gusigasira umuco.
Muhire yavuze ko intego yari afite atangira ari ukumvisha abanyarwanda ko uruganda rw’imideli atari umwuga w’injiji.
Ati “Dutangira nari mfite icyifuzo cyo kurema mu mitwe y’abanyarwanda ko imideli cyangwa ubudozi atari umwuga w’injiji, ahubwo ko ushobora kurangiza kaminuza ugakora ubudozi kandi bugateza imbere igihugu nawe ubwawe.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Nashakaga gutinyura abana b’abanyarwanda ko kwihangira umurimo atari ugufungura Cyber Café gusa cyangwa Restaurant kandi nabigezeho. Nashakaga no kumvisha abanyarwanda muri rusange ko bashobora kwambara iby’iwabo bakaberwa batiriwe birukira muri caguwa n’imyenda iva i Burayi kandi bigenda biza rwose.”
Imyambaro ya Inkanda House yamamaye harimo “Inka ya Data Collection” yagiye hanze mu 2018, yari imyamabro ihuza gakondo nyarwanda n’ibigezweho.
Hari kandi ‘The black days of Marie Antoinette’ yerekanye ku bufatanye na Ambassade y’Ababiligi mu Rwanda. Iyi myambaro avuga ko yayihimbye ashaka kwibuka abantu bagize uruhare mu ruganda rw’imideli batabarutse.
Ati “Nashakaga kwibuka no guha agaciro abantu batuvuyemo baba Abanyarwanda cyangwa Abanyamahanga bagize uruhare mu mateka ya y’uruganda rw’imideli. Marie Antoinette nayitiriye yari Umwamikazi mu Bufaransa.”
Imyambaro Inkanda yatangiriyeho mu 2010 yayise “Bagilinkanda”, bishatse kuvuga ngo “Arahirwa ufite icyo akinga ku mubiri, ni umugisha kubona icyo wambara”.
Patrick Muhire Nshuti yize ibijyanye no gucunga imari. Iyi nzu ye ikora imyambaro y’abagabo n’abagore. Ni umwe mu batangije ‘Kigali Fashion Week’ yamenyekaniye abamurika imideli n’abayihanga benshi bo mu Rwanda.
Mazimpaka Christelle wabaye igisonga cya Miss Career Africa mu 2019 yatangiye gukora imirimbo y’ubwiza.
Uyu mukobwa agiye kujya akora imirimbo itandukanye irimo amaherena ndetse n’imikufi yo mu ijosi. Azajya abikora binyuze muri sosiyete ye yatangije yise ‘Ijunja Crystals’.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora uyu mushinga kuko yabonaga mu Rwanda nta zindi sosiyete nyinshi zikora ibintu nk’ibi.
Ati “Ni ibintu ubusanzwe njye ubwanjye numvaga nzakora kuva kera. Ni ibintu nkunda ku buryo gutangira kubikora ari intambwe ikomeye kuri njye. Nkunda kugaragaza neza kandi mu buryo butandukanye n’abandi. Abantu bose dukorana dukunda gushyira ibyo dutekereza n’inyungu zacu mu byo twabasha kugira.”
Yakomeje avuga imirimbo yabo igenewe abantu b’ingeri zose.
Yavuze ko yahisemo gukora iyi mirimbo atekereza ko byafasha Abanyafurika bose, ndetse bikagera mu bihugu byose byo kuri uyu mugabane bakagabanya kugura ibituruka i Burayi n’ahandi.
Mazimpaka Christelle yitabiriye Miss Career Africa mu 2019 , yegukana umwanya wa kabiri. Aha yari afite umushinga witwa witwa Rugori.

Kenzō wagize uruhare runini mu kumenyekanisha u Buyapani mu ruganda rw’imideli yitabye Imana.
Uyu mugabo yubatse izina rikomeye mu ruganda rw’imideli ku Isi yari afite inzu y’imideli yitwa ‘Kenzo’. Yapfiriye mu bitaro biherereye mu Bufaransa mu Mujyi wa Paris.
Yibukirwa ku buhanga bwe buhambaye mu guhanga imideli ndetse no kuba ariwe muhanzi w’imideli ukomoka mu Buyapani wabashije kugaragara muri Paris Fashion Week ku nshuro ya mbere.
Abayapani benshi ku rubuga rwa Twitter bagaragaje uyu musaza nk’umuntu wagize uruhare rukomeye mu kongera kuvuka k’uruganda rw’imideli mu Buyapani.
Abandi bavuze ko kugira ikintu cyakozwe n’uyu mugabo ari ishema kuri bo, umwe yanditse ati “Ikofi ya mbere natunze yari yarakozwe na Kenzo. N’ubwo ari akantu gato, nzahora mbyibuka. Ruhukira mu mahoro.”
Undi yagize ati “Mfite umwambaro ya Kenzo nahawe na Mama, na n’ubu ndacyawambara.”
Kenzo yavutse mu 1939 ahitwa Himeji. Yagiye mu Mujyi wa Paris mu 1965 akoresheje ubwato, yirengagije ko atari azi kuvuga Igifaransa na gato, atangira guhanga imyambaro akayigurisha ku nzu z’imideli zikomeye, nyuma aza gufata umwanzuro wo gushinga iduka yari yarise ‘Jungle Jap’.
Yakoraga imyambaro igendanye n’ubundi n’umuco wo mu Buyapani, yigeze kuvuga ko impamvu yabikoze ko ariko atashakaga gukora nk’ibyo yasanze Abafaransa bakora.
Kenzo yamamaye cyane ubwo Elle Magazine yashyiraga kimwe mu bikorwa bye ku gifuniko cyacyo.
Kenzo yatangiye kwamamara cyane mu ruganda rw’imideli mu Bufaransa ndetse n’iwabo mu Bufaransa guhera mu myaka yo mu 1970 kuzamura ndetse atangira no kwegukana ibihembo bitandukanye.
Rwanda Cultural Fashion Show igiye gutangiza ishuri ry’ibijyanye n’imideli.
Iri shuri rizatangira mu 2021, ryigisha kumurika imideli ndetse no kuyihanga; aho nibura riteganya ko ku ikubitiro rizakira abanyeshuri 110 baziga ibi byombi.
Ntawirema Célestin usanzwe utegura ibirori bya Rwanda Cultural Fashion Show, yabwiye IGIHE ko impamvu batekereje gutangiza iri shuri ari uko nta rindi risanzwe riri mu Rwanda bityo abona hari icyuho gikomeye cyane.
Ati “Ikintu cya mbere cyabiteye ni urukundo rw’uruganda rw’imideli. Ni ikintu twabonaga ko ari icyuho gikomeye mu Rwanda kuba nta shuri ryigisha ibijyanye n’imideli rihari. Dushaka kuzana impinduka nyinshi kandi nziza mu ruganda rw’imideli no kugaragaza impano nziza kandi nyinshi.”
Yakomeje avuga ko bazifashisha abarimu bakomoka mu Rwanda n’abo hanze yarwo.
Bimwe mu bisabwa ku bashaka kwiga muri iri shuri harimo kuba umuntu ashobora kuvuga neza icyongereza, ku bakobwa bagomba kuba bashobora kugendera mu nkweto ndende, bashobora gukoresha camera, kwiyishyurira amafaranga y’ishuri ndetse no kuba afite mudasobwa akaba yabasha kwiga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Yakomeje avuga ko mu 2021 nibatangiza iri shuri COVID-19 icyugarije Isi, bazigisha hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
