Hari abandi bakinnyi bakomeje kuvugwa mu makipe ndetse n’ubwumvikane bwamaze kugerwaho ku mpande zombi nka Jadon Sancho wamaze kumvikana na Manchester United n’abandi.
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 13 Kanama 2021 ari bwo Shampiyona y’u Bwongereza izatangira. Umukino wa mbere uzahuza Brentford yazamutse uyu mwaka, izaba yakiriye Arsenal saa Tatu z’ijoro.
Haringingo watozaga Police FC yasimbuye Ndayiragije Etienne muri Kiyovu.
Haringingo yasinyiye Kiyovu amasezerano y’umwaka umwe uzarangirana n’umwaka w’imikino 2021-2022. Kugeza ubu ntacyo Ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports buravuga kuri aya makuru.
Uyu mutoza yemereye IGIHE ko aya makuru ari ukuri yamaze gusinyira iyi kipe.
Ati “Nibyo. Namaze gusinya amasezerano y’umwaka umwe muri Kiyovu Sports.”
Haringingo Francis yari amaze imyaka ibiri muri Police FC, aho ku mwaka we wa mbere yagejeje iyi kipe ku mwanya wa gatatu, ku mwaka we wa kabiri yahagaritswe habura imikino ibiri ngo shampiyona irangire ariko iyi kipe yasoreje ku mwanya wa kane.
Mu 2018 uyu mutoza ari kumwe na Mukura Victory Sports et Loisirs. Yegukanye igikombe cy’Amahoro atsinze Rayon Sports FC ku mukino wa nyuma biciye muri penaliti.
Muri iyi kipe yo ku Mumena arasabwa kubyaza umusaruro abakinnyi beza iyi kipe ifite, akegukana kimwe mu bikombe bikinirwa mu Rwanda (icya shampiyona n’icy’Amahoro).
Scandinavia yamenye itsinda irimo muri CECAFA.
Ni muri Tombola yabaye kuri uyu wa Kane, isiga amakipe ahagarariye Akarere ka CECEFA yose amenye amatsinda aherereyemo n’amakipe bazatahana.
Scandinavia Women Football Club ihagarariye u Rwanda, iri mu itsinda rya Gatatu (C) aho iri kumwe na FAD yo muri Djibouti na Vihiga Queens yo muri Kenya.
Andi matsinda ni irya mbere (A) ririmo Lady Doves yo muri Uganda, PVP Buyenzi y’i Burundi na Simba Queens yo muri Tanzania. Itsinda rya Kabiri (B) ririmo Comm. Bank of Ethiopia yo muri Ethiopia, YEI Joint Stars yo muri Sudani y’Epfo na New Generation Queens yo muri Zanzibar.
Iri rushanwa rya CECEFA ryo mu mazone biteganyijwe ko rizatangira ku wa 17 Nyakanga 2021 kugeza ku ya 1 Kanama. Buri Zone izahagararirwa n’ikipe imwe.
Bisobanuye ko Igikombe cya CAF Champions League y’abagore kizabera mu Misiri mu mwaka utaha.
Amakipe atandatu ya mbere (imwe muri buri Zone) kongeraho ikipe zo muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba (Niger, Nigeria, Ghana, Bénin, Burkina Faso, Côte d’Ivoire na Senagal) kongeraho Misiri yabonye itike kuko izakira irushanwa, ni yo azaba abonye itike yo gukina iri rushanwa.
Ku wa 30 Kamena 2020 ni bwo Komite Nyobozi y’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika ’CAF’ yemeje ko amakipe y’abagore yabaye aya mbere iwayo agomba kujya akina CAF Champions League. Bisobanuye ko ari ubwa mbere iri rushanwa rigiye gukinwa.
Scandinavia Women Football Club ikomeje kwitegurira mu Karere ka Rubavu aho isanzwe ibarizwa ndetse amakuru avayo avuga ko iyi kipe yongeyemo amasaramo mashya y’abakinnyi yakuye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Usengimana Danny yasubiye muri Police FC yahozemo
Nubwo Ubuyobozi bw Police FC butaratangaza aya makuru, ariko inshuti za hafi za Usengimana zahamije ko yamaze gusinyira amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri iyi kipe y’abashinzwe umutekano.
Uwaganiriye na IGIHE mu nshuti ze za hafi yagize ati “Nibyo Danny yamaze gusinyira Police FC imyaka ibiri. Ku bijyanye n’amafaranga yahawe naba nkubeshye.”
Nubwo bigikomeje kuba ubwiru, ariko bivugwa ko Usengimana ashobora kuba yahawe miliyoni 13 Frw akanemererwa umushahara ungana n’ibihumbi 800 Frw buri kwezi.
Mu kwifuza kumenya icyo ba nyir’ubwite bavuga kuri aya makuru, IGIHE yahamagaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Police FC, CIP Bikorimana Obed, ariko ntiyitaba telefone ye igendanwa.
Mu 2015 nibwo Usengimana yasinye muri Police FC amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri ubwo yari avuye mu Isonga FC yari isubiye mu cyiciro cya kabiri. Yakiniye iyi kipe imyaka itatu.
Mu 2016/17 Danny niwe waje imbere mu batsinze ibitego byinshi, kuko yatsinze 18 muri uwo mwaka w’imikino.
Mu myaka itatu yamaze muri iyi kipe y’abashinzwe umutekano yatsinze ibitego 38 ahava yerekeza muri Singida United yo muri Tanzania ariko ahamara umwaka umwe gusa ahita aza muri APR FC kuva mu 2018.
Mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda mu kipe y’Ingabo, yabanje kwerekeza mu Misiri muri Tersana SC ariko Singida United yari yamaze kumugurisha muri APR FC ariko umukinnyi we yifuzaga gukina mu Misiri birangira agarutse mu Rwanda gutyo.
Tariki ya 13 Nyakanaga 2018 nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru yavugaga ko Usengimana Danny yashoboraga kwerekeza mu ikipe ya APR FC atanzweho miliyoni 20 Frw agatandukana na Singida United yari asigajemo umwaka nyuma yo kutubahiriza amasezerano uyu rutahizamu yari yagiranye n’iyi kipe yo muri Tanzania.
Mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda, APR FC yari yumvikanye na Singida United ku masezerano y’umwaka uyu musore yari asigajemo ndetse yishyurwa miliyoni 20 Frw, uyu rutahizamu nawe ahabwa miliyoni 10 Frw.
Singida United yemeye kurekura uyu musore ndetse banamwandikira ibaruwa igaragaza ko bamurekuye ‘Release letter’ barayimushyikiriza arayibika ariko ntiyayishyikiriza APR FC yari imuguze.
Nyuma yo kubona ko APR FC irimo kugenda biguru ntege mu kumusinyisha no kumuha ibyo yamwemereye, nibwo tariki ya 3 Kanama 2018 uyu rutahizamu yerekeje muri Tersana SC mu cyiciro cya kabiri mu Misiri, aho yibwiraga ko ibyo APR yatanze azayibisubiza.
Uyu musore yasabye iyi kipe y‘Ingabo ko yayisubiza ibyo yatanze ariko ikamureka agakina mu Misiri, gusa Ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe bumubera ibamba kuko bwari bumukeneye.
Kuri uyu wa 8 Nyakanga nibwo Ubuyobozi bwa Paris Saint Germain bwahaye ikaze Ramos wasinyiye iyi kipe amasezerano azageza mu 2023.
Uyu myugariro w’imyaka 35 y’amavuko yiyongereye kuri Achraf Hakimi wavuye muri Inter Milan n’umunyezamu Gianluigi Donnarumma wasinye amasezerano azageza mu 2026 avuye muri AC Milan.
Magingo aya, PSG ikomeje kurwana urugamba rwo kugumana rutahizamu, Kylian Mbappé usigaje amasezerano y’umwaka umwe muri iyi kipe.
Ramos yegukanye ibikombe bine bya Uefa Champions League, bine bya shampiyona, bitatu bya Super Coupe ya Espagne, bibiri bya Super Coupe y’i Burayi, icy’Isi cy‘Ibihugu n’ibindi.
Uyu myugariro yavuye muri Real Madrid nyuma y’imyaka 16 yari ayimazemo gusa impande zombi zari zananiwe kumvikana ku kuyongera.
PSG isanzwe ari umufatanyabikorwa w’u Rwanda aho yamamaza ubukerarugendo bwarwo binyuze muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda. Mu 2019 nibwo RDB yasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye na PSG azamara imyaka itatu.
Imikino Olempike: Sha’Carri Richardson wasanzwemo urumogi yazamuye amarangamutima ya benshi.
Richardson w’imyaka 21 y’amavuko asanzwe asiganwa ku maguru muri metero 100 na 200.
Muri iki Cyumweru nibwo byemejwe ko ibipimo yafashwe ku wa 28 Kamena byagaragaje ko yanyoye urumogi, bityo ahita ahanwa mu gihe cy’ukwezi atitabira amarushanwa mpuzamahanga.
Bisobanuye ko atazaba ari mu ikipe ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika izakina imikino Olempike iteganyijwe mu Buyapani.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizahagararirwa na Gabby Thomas, English Gardner na Aleia Hobbs mu gusiganwa ku maguru mu bagore mu gihe mu bagabo ari Javianne Oliver, Teahna Daniels Jenna Pradini na Thomas mu gusiganwa ku maguru ku ntera ya metero 100.
Richardson ni umukobwa wahabwaga amahirwe yo kuzegukana imidali muri iyi mikino.
Abicishije kuri Twitter, Richardson yiseguye ku bakunzi be avuga ko atazitabira imikino Olempike iteganyijwe kubera i Tokyo mu Buyapani mu minsi mike iri imbere.
Ati “Mumbabarire mwese, ntabwo nkishoboye kwitabira imikino Olempike uyu mwaka. Ariko nijeje ko umwaka utaha nzaba ndi muri Shampiyona y’Isi.“
Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, yavuze ko kuba Richardson yakuwe mu rutonde rw’abakinnyi bazahagararira iki gihugu mu mikino Olempike, bifite ishingiro kuko ntawe uri hejuru y’amategeko.
Ati “Amategeko ni amategeko. Kandi buri umwe azi ko amategeko agomba kubahirizwa.”
Umuhungu wa Donald Trump, Donald Trump J, abicishije kuri Twitter we yavuze ko uyu mukobwa ababishinzwe bari bakwiye kumureka akajya guhatana.
Ati “Mumureke ahatane. Ndahamya ko urumogi ntawe rwabujije kwihuta.”
Charlotte Clymer usanzwe ari umusirikare w’ipeti rya Corporal muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, abicishije kuri Twitter yagaragaje ko ibyaba byose, bakunda Richardson nubwo atazakina imikino Olempike.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kurwanya Ibiyobyabwenge muri Leta Zunze za Amerika (United States Anti-Doping Agency), cyemeje igihano cyo guhagarika Richardson igihe kingana n’ukwezi nyuma yo gusangwamo uru rumogi.
Richardson akinira LSU Lady Tigers. Biteganyijwe ko imikino Olempike izatangira ku wa 23 Nyakanga 2021 kugeza ku wa 8 Kanama 2021.
Mu 2017 muri Shampiyona y’Isi, Richardson yegukanye umudali wa Zahabu gusiganwa muri metero 100.
Kahmari Montgomery nawe yari aherutse guhagarikwa mu gihe kingana n’ukwezi kuko nawe yasanzwemo urumogi mu irushanwa ryari ryabereye mu Mujyi wa Florida muri iki gihugu.
Bigoranye, u Bwongereza bwasanze u Butaliyani ku mukino wa nyuma wa EURO (Amafoto).
Uyu mukino wa kabiri wa ½ cya EURO 2020, wahuje u Bwongereza bwari butarinjizwa igitego mu irushanwa na Danemark yashyigikiwe na benshi nyuma y’uko umwe mu bakinnyi bayo, Christian Eriksen, agiriye ikibazo cy’umutima mu mukino wa mbere ndetse ntiyongere gukina.
Mbere y’uko umukino utangira, Kapiteni w’u Bwongereza, Harry Kane, yahaye mugenzi we wa Danemark, Simon Kjaer, umupira wasinyweho n’abakinnyi bose ba Three Lions, wanditseho Eriksen na nimero 10 mu mugongo.
Imbere y’abafana ibihumbi 60, Danemark yayoboye umukino kuva ku munota wa 30 ubwo Mikkel Damsgaard yatsindaga igitego ku mupira w’umuterekano.
Byasabye u Bwongereza gutegereza umunota wa 38, bubona igitego cyo kwishyura cyitsinzwe na Simon Kjaer ku mupira wahinduwe na Bukayo Saka mu rubuga rw’amahina.
Mu gice cya kabiri, amakipe yombi yabonye uburyo butandukanye burimo ishoti rikomeye ryatewe na Damsgaard, umunyezamu Jordan Pickford ashyira umupira muri koruneri mu gihe Kasper Schmeichel yakuyemo umupira watewe na Harry Maguire n’umutwe n’undi watewe na Harry Kane.
Kunganya igitego 1-1 mu minota 90 isanzwe y’umukino ni byo byatumye hongerwaho indi 30 y’inyongera kugira ngo haboneke ikipe izahura n’u 
Habura iminota itatu ngo agace ka mbere ka 15 karangire, u Bwongereza bwabonye penaliti ku ikosa ryakorewe kuri Raheem Sterling mu rubuga rw’amahina. Harry Kane yayiteye ikurwamo n’umunyezamu Kasper Schmeichel, ku bw’amahirwe umupira uhura n’uyu Kapiteni w’u Bwongereza awuboneza mu izamu.
Abongereza bashoboraga kubona igitego cya gatatu mu minota ya nyuma y’umukino, uburyo bwabonywe na Sterling busubizwa inyuma n’umunyezamu wa Danemark, washyize umupira muri koruneri.
Gutsinda uyu mukino bivuze ko u Bwongereza buzahura n’u Butaliyani ku mukino wa nyuma wa EURO 2020 uzabera kuri Stade Wembley ku Cyumweru, tariki ya 11 Nyakanga 2021, saa Tatu z’ijoro.
U Bwongereza bwageze ku mukino wa nyuma w’Igikombe cy’u Burayi ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka yabwo, bwaherukaga ku mukino wa nyuma w’irushanwa rikomeye mu 1966 ubwo bwegukanaga Igikombe cy’Isi.
AS Kigali yakangutse ku isoko; yasinyishije babiri barimo Kalisa Rashid
Isoko ry’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinnyi mu Rwanda, rikomeje gushyuha cyane ko abakinnyi benshi basoje amasezerano yabo mu makipe bakiniraga.
AS Kigali FC nk’ikipe izasohokera u Rwanda mu marushanwa Nyafurika ya CAF Confederation, yongereye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri Kalisa Rashid wayijemo mu 2019.
Iyi kipe kandi yasinyishije rutahizamu Saba Robert amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri nyuma y’uko atsindiye Kiyovu ibitego icumi muri shampiyona.
Uretse aba bombi, iyi kipe yasinyishije Uwimana Guillain wakiniraga Etincelles FC, amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri.
Iyi kipe y’Umujyi wa Kigali yamaze gutakaza Hakizimana Muhadjiri werekeje muri Police FC. Ibiganiro byo kongera amasezerano Nsabimana Eric "Zidane" bikaba birimbanyije hagati y’impande zombi.
Iyi kipe yabaye iya kabiri nyuma yo gusoza shampiyona iri ku mwanya wa kabiri nta mukino itsinzwe muri 13 yakinnye.
APR FC yasinyishije Mugisha Gilbert, inongerera amasezerano batatu barimo Djabel
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko Mugisha Gilbert wari usoje amasezerano muri Rayon Sports, yasinye ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 7 Nyakanga 2021.
Bivugwa ko uyu mukinnyi yahawe agera kuri miliyoni 15 Frw kugira ngo yerekeze muri APR FC yashoboraga kumusinyisha mu mpeshyi ya 2020, ariko ntibihite bikunda.
Mugisha Gilbert ukina ku mpande asatira izamu, yabaye umukinnyi wa gatatu mushya uguzwe na APR FC nyuma ya Nsabimana Aimable wakiniraga Police FC mu mutima wa ba myugariro na Kwitonda Alain ‘Bacca’ wakiniraga Bugesera FC asatira izamu.
Uretse uyu mukinnyi mushya wasinye kuri uyu wa Gatatu, abongerewe amasezerano muri APR FC ni Manishimwe Djabel, Nizeyimana Djuma na Rwabuhihi Aimé Placide, bose basinye imyaka ibiri.
APR FC izongera guhagararira u Rwanda muri CAF Champions League nyuma y’uko yegukanye Igikombe cya Shampiyona ku nshuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya idatsinzwe.
Ruremesha Emmanuel utoza Gorilla FC ari mu gihirahiro.
Ruremesha Emmanuel amaze umwaka umwe muri Gorilla FC nk’Umutoza wayo Mukuru ndetse yayifashije kudasubira mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri bisabye gutsinda umukino wa nyuma wa Shampiyona.
Nubwo ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe bukomeje gukora impinduka zitandukanye zirimo kugura abakinnyi, uwitwa ko yari umutoza wayo mukuru, Ruremesha, nta na kimwe aramenyeshwa cyangwa ngo agishwe inama kuri ibyo byemezo bikomeje gufatwa n’ubuyobozi.
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko Ruremesha yari yasinyiye Gorilla FC amasezerano y’umwaka umwe kandi wamaze kurangira. Gusa igikomeje gutuma uyu mutoza ajya mu gihirahiro ni uko ubuyobozi bw’ikipe butaramubwira niba bumwifuza ngo bazakomezanye ariko bukaba bukomeje kurambagiza abakinnyi, abandi bagasezererwa kandi nta ruhare yabigizemo.
Iyi kipe yamaze gusezerera abakinnyi barindwi, yinjiza umunyezamu Ndoli Jean Claude wasinye amasezerano y’imyaka itatu, inongerera amasezerano y’imyaka itatu Iradukunda Simeon ukina hagati mu kibuga. Ibi byose byakozwe nta ruhare rwa Ruremesha Emmanuel rurimo.
Aganira na IGIHE, Ruremesha na we yemeye ko amasezerano ye yarangiye ariko kugeza ubu ntacyo ubuyobozi bwa Gorilla FC buramubwira ku bijyanye no gukomezanya.
Ati “Amasezerano yanjye yararangiye kuko yagombaga kurangirana n’uyu mwaka. Kugeza ubu ntacyo ndavugana n’ubuyobozi bwa Gorilla FC.“
Umwe mu bagira ijambo muri Gorilla FC ariko utifuje ko amazina ye ajya hanze, yavuze ko yifuza ko bagumana n’uyu mutoza. Ati “ Njyewe ndamushaka cyane.“
Andi makuru avuga ko uyu mutoza hari andi makipe bari kuganira, yifuza ko ayibera umutoza mukuru.
Gorilla FC yasoje Shampiyona iri ku mwanya wa 14 mu makipe 16 akina mu Cyiciro cya Mbere.
NBA: Chris Paul yafashije Phoenix Suns gutsinda Milwaukee Bucks umukino wa mbere (Amafoto).
Phoenix Suns yatsinze uduce dutatu tubanza kuri 30-26, 27-23 na 35-27 mu gihe agace ka kane katsinzwe na Milwaukee Bucks kuri 29-26.
Milwaukee Bucks yari yagaruye Giannis Antetokunmpo utarakinnye imikino ibiri iheruka kubera imvune yo mu ivi ry’ibumoso. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu, yafashije ikipe ye cyane mu bwugarizi, asama imipira 17 yavuye ku nkangara nyuma yo guhushwa n’abakinnyi ba Phoenix Suns mu gihe kandi yatsinze amanota 20.
Khris Middleton ni we watsindiye Milwaukee amanota menshi (29), atanga imipira ine yavuyemo andi manota kuri bagenzi be mu gihe yasamye imipira ine yahushijwe n’ikipe bari banganye.
Phoenix Suns yatsinze uyu mukino wayifashije gutangira neza urugendo rw’imikino irindwi ishoboka, ibifashijwemo na Chris Paul w’imyaka 36, we watsinze amanota 32 mu gihe Devin Booker yatsinze 16.
Iyi kipe iheruka gukina umukino wa nyuma mu 1993, irashaka kwegukana igikombe cya NBA ku nshuro yayo ya mbere mu gihe Milwaukee Bucks zihanganye, yo yagitwaye mu 1971 ndetse ikaba iheruka ku mukino wa nyuma mu 1974.
Umukino wa kabiri hagati y’amakipe yombi, uteganyijwe mu ijoro rishyira ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 9 Nyakanga saa cyenda aho n’ubundi uzabera muri Phoenix.
Nishimwe Blaise yiyambaje se ku bijyanye no kwerekeza muri APR FC.
Nishimwe Blaise amaze umwaka umwe akinira Rayon Sports FC yamukuye muri Marines FC, aho yari amazemo imyaka ibiri. Ni umukinnyi wagaragaje urwego rwiza mu gihe gito amaze muri iyi kipe.
Uku kwitwara neza kwe kwatumye APR FC ibitse igikombe cya Shampiyona ya 2020/21, imwifuza ndetse bivugwa ko yifuza kumutangaho angana na miliyoni 30 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Gusa uyu mukinnyi wo hagati aracyafite amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri ya Rayon Sports FC kuko yari yasinye ay’imyaka itatu.
Umuhagarariye ndetse unamugira inama akaba n’umubyeyi we, Mateso Jean de Dieu, ahamya ko ikipe yose yamwifuza yaganira na Rayon Sports kuko akiyifitiye amasezerano nk’uko yabibwiye IGIHE.
Ati “Blaise [Nishimwe] ni umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri iri imbere. Njye nta kindi navuga kuri byinshi biri kumuvugwaho kuko aracyafite amasezerano y’ikipe ye.“
Uyu mubyeyi wa Nishimwe yakuyeho urujijo ku bavuga ko yazamukiye mu kipe ya Intare FC isanzwe imeze nk’irerero rya APR FC.
Ati “Blaise afite irerero yakuriyemo ryitwa Imena kandi yanaciyemo abakinnyi barimo Kimenyi, Evode [Ntwali], Kalisa Rashid n’abandi. Kuva mu 2007 aba bose bari abakinnyi b’iri rerero. Intare FC yaramutiye kugira ngo ayikinire mu cyiciro cya Kabiri. Ntabwo ari ho yakuriye kuko twamutijeyo akuze. Ibyo bisobanuke neza. Kuva ku myaka irindwi, Blaise yari mu Imena.“
Mateso yakomeje avuga ko APR FC ifite abantu basobanukiwe umupira w’amaguru, kandi batakora ibinyuranyije n’amategeko.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri Nishimwe Blaise yaganirije se, amugisha inama ku mahitamo ye y’aho yazakina umwaka utaha, undi amugira inama yo gutegereza amakipe yombi akaganira kandi akemera ibizava mu biganiro kuko yaba APR FC cyangwa Rayon Sports ari amakipe yamufasha.
Abajijwe niba uyu musore amafaranga menshi ari kumutangwaho adashobora kuba impamvu yo gutuma ashyira ku gitutu Rayon Sports FC ngo imurekure, Mateso yavuze ko ari umwana ukibana n’ababyeyi be kandi ugirwa inama zimufasha.
Ati “Ayo mafaranga bavuga ngo ni menshi njye ntayo nzi. Blaise ni umwana ubana n‘ababyeyi be kandi ufite ikinyabupfura. Ntabwo aratangira gukina ubu nibwo yari atangiye. Ntabwo yazamura ibitugu kuko azi neza ko atarakina. Namubwiye ko n’iyo atakinira APR FC uyu mwaka yazanakiyikinira ikindi gihe.“
Andi makuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko Rayon Sports yifuza miliyoni 50 Frw ariko APR FC ikaba iri gutanga miliyoni 30 Frw.
Abajijwe niba Nishimwe akomeje kugaragaza ko yifuza gukinira APR FC bitakora ku mikinire ye, Mateso yavuze ko inama yamugira ari ugutuza akabanza kubaha amasezerano afitanye n’ikipe ye kandi akirinda ko batandukana nabi, gusa avuga ko icyo yifuza ari iterambere ry’umukinnyi.
Mu mwaka umwe Nishimwe Blaise amaze muri Rayon Sports, byamuhesheje amahirwe yo guhamagarwa mu Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi‘ binatuma benshi bamenya ubushobozi bwe.
U Butaliyani bwageze ku mukino wa nyuma wa EURO bwihimuye kuri Espagne (Amafoto).
Ibihugu byombi byahuriye muri uyu mukino wa ½ wabereye kuri Stade Wembley nyuma y’imyaka icyenda Espagne inyagiye u Butaliyani ibitego 4-0 ku mukino wa nyuma wa EURO 2012.
Espagne yakuriye mu irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka ni yo yihariye umupira cyane mu gihe u Butaliyani bwacungiraga kuri contre-attaque.
Ku munota wa 14, Nicolo Barella yatakaje umupira wafashwe na Ferran Torres, ateye ishoti rica ku ruhande gato rw’izamu ry’u Butaliyani.
Nyuma y’iminota 10, umunyezamu Gianluigi Donnarumma yarokoye u Butaliyani ku mupira Dani Olmo yateye mu izamu awuherejwe na Mikel Oyarzabal, araryama awukubita ibipfunsi.
Habura umunota umwe ngo igice cya mbere kirangire, u Butaliyani bwabonye uburyo bwa mbere ku ishoti Emmerson Palmieri yatereye mu rubuga rw’amahina, ufata igiti cy’izamu ujya hanze.
Espagne yari hejuru no mu minota ya mbere y’igice cya kabiri, yabonye uburyo bw’umupira wahinduwe na Olmo ariko Giovanni Di Lorenzo awutanga Ferran Torres awushyira muri koruneri.
Nyuma y’iminota ibiri, Oyarzabal yahinduye umupira mwiza wasanze Sergio Busquets inyuma y’urubuga rw’amahina, ateye ishoti rikomeye rica hejuru y’izamu.
Umunyezamu Unai Simon na we yafashije Espagne kuguma mu mukino ku ishoti ryatewe na Federico Chiesa, afata umupira neza.
Umupira wazamukanywe na Ciro Immobile akananizwa na ba myugariro ba Espagne, ni wo wavuyemo igitego cyinjijwe na Federico Chiesa ku ishoti yatereye mu rubuga rw’amahina ku munota wa 60.
Dani Olmo na Mikel Oyarzabal bahushije uburyo bubiri bukomeye bwashoboraga gufasha Espagne kwishyura mu gihe Domenico Berardi yari gutsindira u Butaliyani igitego cya kabiri ariko umupira yateye usubizwa inyuma n’umunyezamu Unai Simon.
Habura iminota 11 ngo umukino urangire, Alvaro Morata winjiye asimbura, yakinanye neza na Dani Olmo wamusubije umupira, yinjiye mu rubuga rw’amahina aroba umunyezamu Donnarumma.
Iminota 90 isanzwe y’umukino yarangiye amakipe yombi akomeje kunganya igitego 1-1, hongerwaho indi 30. Espagne ni yo yabonye uburyo bukomeye ku mupira w’umuterekano watewe na Dani Olmo, ukurwamo na Donnarumma wigaragaje muri iri rushanwa.
Kunganya mu minota 120 yose, byatumye haterwa penaliti, u Butaliyani bugera ku mukino wa nyuma butsinze 4-2.
Penaliti z’u Butaliyani zatsinzwe na Andrea Belotti, Leonardo Bonucci, Federico Bernardeschi na Jorginho mu gihe iza Espagne zatsinzwe n’abarimo Gerard Moreno.
Abahushije penaliti ebyiri za Espagne ni Daniel Olmo na Alvaro Morata mu gihe imwe y’u Butaliyani yahushijwe na Manuel Locatelli.
Undi mukino wa ½ cya EURO 2020 uteganyijwe ku wa Gatatu, tariki ya 7 Nyakanga saa tatu z’ijoro aho uzahuza u Bwongereza na Danemark.
Umukino wa nyuma w’Igikombe cy’u Burayi cy’uyu mwaka, uzaba ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 11 Nyakanga kuri Stade Wembley.
Ku wa 29 Nzeri 2020 ni bwo abanyamuryango ba Kiyovu Sports bitoreye Mvukiyehe Juvénal, ngo ababere Umuyobozi w’Ikipe mu myaka itatu iri imbere. Ni umuyobozi waje afite imishinga myinshi ndetse na bo bamugirira icyizere.
Agitorerwa kuyobora Kiyovu Sports, Mvukiyehe yahise yizeza abakunzi b’iyi kipe igikombe cya Shampiyona ndetse mbere y’uko iya 2020/21 itangira, yari yavuze ko bageze ku kigero cya 75% byo kucyegukana.
Gusa, si uko byagenze kuko Kiyovu Sports yisanze mu makipe umunani ahataniye kuguma mu Cyiciro cya Mbere, ku bw’amahirwe isoza iyo mikino iri ku mwanya wa mbere.
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko Mvukiyehe Juvénal yoherereje ubutumwa abakunzi ba Kiyovu Sports, ariko abicishije k’ubahagarariye, Minani Hemedi, abasaba gukomeza kwihangana ndetse abizeza ko igihe kigeze ngo begukane igikombe.
Ati “Kudatwara igikombe twakuyemo amasomo ahagije. Igihe ni iki ngo ngaragaze aho tugejeje umuhigo wo gutwara igikombe. Sinzacika intege.”
Dorcas, Vestine n’umubyeyi wabo bahuye na Murindahabi basiga abantu mu rujijo.
Mu kiganiro Murindahabi yanyujije kuri shene ye ya Youtube, yaganiriye n’aba bahanzikazi asanzwe afasha, bahamiriza abari babakurikiye ko nta kibazo na kimwe bafitanye ndetse n’umubyeyi wabo bamaze kwiyunga.
Ni ikiganiro cyibanze cyane ku gukemura ikibazo cyari hagati y’uyu munyamakuru n’umubyeyi w’aba bana, icyakora cyarangiye nta cyemezo runaka cy’imikoranire cyafashwe.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Murindahabi yagize ati "Ikintu cyihutirwaga cyari ukugira ngo ducubye aya magambo n’ibibazo byabayeho nyuma y’ibi ubu tugiye kureba ibyakorwa kugira ngo ibikorwa bikomeze."
Uyu munyamakuru yavuze ko yamaze kumvikana n’ababyeyi b’aba bahanzikazi, ibijyanye n’ibikorwa bya muzika Murindahabi yavuze ko mu minsi iri imbere ari bwo azabigarukaho.
Ubwo uyu munyamakuru yaganiraga n’aba bahanzikazi, umubyeyi wabo wari wabaherekeje yaryumyeho amubwira ko we atameze neza, arwaye bityo ko ntacyo yifuza kuvuga.
Ni ikiganiro cyagarutse ku kuba aba bahanzikazi batarishimiye ibimaze iminsi bivugwa, by’umwihariko abantu bari bakomeje kwibasira umubyeyi wabo.
Vestine na Dorcas bavuze ko batigeze batandukana na Murindahabi, bati “Ibi bintu ukuntu byaje ni Satani wabizanye harimo ibintu byinshi byo kubeshya! Ukuri ni uko icyo Imana yifatanyirije nta muntu washobora kugitandukanya.”
Bakomeje bavuga ko byinshi byabaye atari bo babigizemo uruhare ndetse n’umubyeyi wabo ntarwo yigeze abigiramo.
Bati “Ubundi umubyeyi wacu nta gahunda yari afite yo kukuvuga nabi (bavugaga Murindahabi), ibintu by’itangazamakuru ntabwo ari ibintu yari amenyereye, ntabwo yari afite gahunda yo kubijyamo! Yaje i Kigali aje gufata shene ya Youtube, n’uwamuzanye yamubwiye ko ari yo aje gufata.”
Aba bana bavuze ko batashimishijwe na mba n’ibintu umubyeyi wabo yakoreshejwe, bahamya ko yababwiye ko yahisemo kuvuga kugira ngo abantu barekere gutuka uwitwa Aimable wari wakomeje kwijundikwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Dorcas na Vestine basabye abantu kurekera aho gutuka umubyeyi wabo, bavuga ko bababajwe n’ibyabaye.
Ni ikiganiro cyarangiye yaba Murindahabi ndetse n’aba bahanzikazi batavuze niba inyandiko yasohotse ibatandukanya iteshejwe agaciro cyangwa bakomoje ku kibazo cy’uko bazakomeza muri Rwanda Gospel Stars Live cyangwa niba ari ibintu bari busezere.
Icyakora bongeye gushimangira ko byinshi bibi byavuzwe kuri Murindahabi biturutse ku mubyeyi wabo, byari ibyo yashutswe n’abantu batakunze kugarukaho.
Murindahabi asoza yagize ati “Sinifuza kubabaza ibintu byinshi kuko turi kumwe tuzaganiriza abantu, ni uku birangiye yaba abana barahari ntaho bagiye. Umuziki barawukomeje, yaba ibirego bandegaga namenye ko umubyeyi atari we wabyanditse! Ibindi byose nabisubiramo ikibazo ntabwo cyari umubyeyi ahubwo ni bariya bantu.”
Dorcas na Vestine bo basoza ikiganiro bemeje ko bakiri kumwe na Murindahabi ndetse nta n’igiteze kubatandukanya.
Umubano wa Bushali na B Threy mu isura nshya nyuma y’umwaka badacana uwaka.
B Threy washinjaga Bushali kutamubera umuvandimwe, yahise asezera muri Green Ferry abashinja gushaka gutsikamira impano ye.
Nyuma y’umwaka aba baraperi barebana ay’ingwe kugeza ubu amakuru ahari ahamya ko bamaze kwiyunga.
Ikimenyetso simusiga cy’uko umubano wabo wazanzahutse cyabaye kugaragara kwa Bushali mu mashusho y’indirimbo ‘Mood’ B Threy yahuriyemo na Bull Dogg.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, B Threy yavuze ko umubano we na Bushali uhagaze neza nubwo mu minsi ishize wari warajemo agatotsi.
Ati “Nta zibana zidakomanya amahembe, ntekereza ko kuba mumubona mu mashusho y’indirimbo yanjye ari ikimenyetso cy’uko tubanye neza. Twaje kwiyunga kuko n’ubundi ntacyo twapfaga.”
B Threy yavuze ko n’ubusanzwe ikibazo yari yakigiriye muri Green Ferry Music isanzwe ifasha abahanzi, aza kubabazwa n’uburyo uwari inshuti ye Bushali atamurwaniye ishyaka.
Yanakuyeho urujijo avuga ko ubwo yahuriraga na Bushali mu ndirimbo ’Amabara’ ya Amalon, byari akazi bari batarubaka ubushuti.
Uyu muraperi yavuze ko ibi ari ibintu baganiriyeho bakabifataho umwanzuro wo kwiyunga kuko n’ubusanzwe nta cyakabateranyije.
Muri iki kiganiro kandi B Threy yavuze ko hari imishinga itandukanye ari gutegurana na Bushali, ati “Mu minsi iri imbere hari imishinga duhuriyeho tuzabereka.”
Nyuma yo gusezera muri Green Ferry Music yabanagamo na Bushali, B Threy yatangije Studio ye nshya atangira gukorana n’umu Producer witwa Dizzo ukomeye mu gukora injyana ya Hip Hop.
Bikomeje gufata indi ntera! Umunyamategeko wa Britney Spears yamwigaritse.
Uyu muhanzikazi w’imyaka 39 kuva muri Gashyantare 2008 yahagararirwaga mu mategeko na Samuel D. Ingham III, washyizweho nyuma yo kugaragaza ibibazo bikomeye bijyanye no mu mutwe.
Gusa mu minsi ishize uyu munyamategeko yasabye kwegura we hamwe na Sosiyete ya Loeb & Loeb LLP, bafatanyaga mu gukurikirana ibibazo byose bijyanye n’amategeko by’uyu muhanzikazi wabaye ikirangirire muri Pop ku Isi yose.
TMZ yatangaje ko uyu munyamategeko hari ibyo uyu muhanzikazi yamuhishe akabivugira mu rukiko mu minsi ishize bigatuma amurakarira.
Britney Spears yabwiye Urukiko rwa Los Angeles tariki 23 Kamena ko yifuza ko se afungwa kuko yagiye amuhohotera akamufata nabi bitari ibya kimuntu.
Yasobanuye ko yashyizwemo ku ngufu agapira gatuma adasama mu gihe yaba akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye anavuga ko atemerewe kuba yajya kugakuzamo.
Ati “Data akunda kuyobora, ntatinya no kuba yababaza umukobwa we inshuro 100.000%. Papa cyangwa undi uri mu byo kungenzura ndetse n’abandeberera inyungu bagize uruhare mu kumpana ubwo nangaga kujya mu bitaramo, bakwiriye kujya muri gereza.”
Yakomeje avuga ko ashaka kuvanwa mu maboko ya se nta yandi mananiza abayeho, nta n’irindi genzura.
Umubyeyi wa Britney Spears aherutse kwandikira urukiko asaba ko umukobwa yahabwa uburenganzira akishakira umwunganira mu mategeko mu gihe ari mu manza ashaka kwigenga.
Yavuze ko afite ubushobozi bwo kwifatira imyanzuro no kwiyitaho ndetse akaba yari abifitiye ubushobozi mu myaka yose 13 yarabibujijwe bikorwa n’abandi. Arangije ati “Gukomeza kumugenzura byahagarara nta kindi kintu birebweho. Akaba yaba yemerewe gushakana n’umukunzi we akaba yanagira umwana.”
Kuva mu 2008 imitungo ya Britney Spears yagenzurwaga mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko n’undi muntu wabiherewe uburenganzira. Ibi akenshi bikorwa iyo umuntu adashoboye kwigenzurira ibintu bye, biba cyane ku bantu bafite ibibazo byo mu mutwe cyangwa abashaje. Kuri Britney byatangiye agenzurwa na se by’igihe gito nyuma yo kugaragaza ko yaba yaragize ibibazo byo mu mutwe mu 2007.
Mu minsi ishize Larry Rudolph wabaye ‘manager’ kuva mu 1995 mu by’umuziki w’umuhanzikazi Britney Spears yahishuye ko atakiri umwe mu bamureberera inyungu anavuga ko na we ubwe ateganya kuva mu muziki byeruye mu gihe cya vuba bityo atakomezanya nawe kandi icyabahuzaga kigiye kuvaho.
Se wa Britney Spears, James "Jamie" Parnell Spears yakoranaga na Sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust mu kugenzura umukobwa we ariko nayo iherutse kuvuga ko itagikeneye gukorana nawe, nyuma y’ubuhamya uyu muhanzikazi yatanze mu rukiko mu minsi ishize.
Ku wa 14 Nyakanga 2021 biteganyijwe ko hazakomeza urubanza rw’uyu muhazikazi ukomeje gusaba ko yakwigenga.
Umwana w’imyaka icyenda yatunguranye muri America’s Got Talent
Mu gice gishya cy’iri rushanwa cyo ku wa 6 Nyakanga 2021 yaririmbye indirimbo yo mu buryo bwa opera yitwa “Je Veux Vivre” cyangwa se “Juliet’s Waltz”. Mu bazi uburyo kuririmba ‘opera’ birushya, nta wari witeze ko uyu mwana yayirimba, ariko yarabikoze atungura akanama nkemurampaka n’abari bakurikiye.
Nyuma yo kuririmba Victory Brinker yahagurukije benshi bari bateraniye ahabereye iki gikorwa ndetse na batatu mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka barimo Howie Mandel, Heidi Klum na Sofia Vergara barahaguruka; usibye Simon Cowell we wakomye amashyi yicaye.
Simon Cowell we yasaga nk’utishimiye uburyo uyu mwana yitwaye yahamagaye Terry Crews wari uyoboye barongorerana.
Yahise abwira uyu mwana ko batari bumuhe ‘Yego’ ariko bagiye kumukorera ikintu batigeze bakora mbere hose.
Ati “Nk’uko nabivuze komeza utere imbere mu rugendo rwawe mu muziki, ni ingenzi. Ntabwo turi buguhe ‘yego’ uyu munsi. Tugiye gukora ikintu tutigeze dukora mbere. Tugiye kuguha ikintu kidasanzwe.”
Abagize Akanama Nkemurampaka na Terry Crews wari uyoboye bose bamutunguye bagaragaza ko bamwishimiye barahaguruka ndetse bamuha amanota yabo bose bakubitira rimwe icyuma cya Golden Buzzer bamwemerera gukomeza.
Victory Brinker yakoze amateka yo kuba uwa mbere muri iri rushanwa wishimiwe na buri umwe mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka ndetse n’uyoboye bagakanda ‘Golden Buzzer’. America’s Got Talent[AGT] iri kuba ku nshuro ya 16.
Sintex wasohoye indirimbo ye nshya, yararikiye abakunzi b’umuziki album ye ya mbere.
Amakuru y’iyi album ye nshya, Sintex yayagarutseho ubwo yaganiraga na IGIHE nyuma yo gusohora iyi ndirimbo ye ‘Karitsiye’.
Yagize ati “Mfite indirimbo eshatu nifuza gusohora mu rwego rwo kuvumbya abakunzi b’umuziki wanjye album ya mbere ngiye gusohora.”
Uyu muhanzi avuga ko yari amaze iminsi adasohora indirimbo kuko yari ahugiye cyane ku gutunganya album ye.
Abajijwe ibyerekeranye na album ye ya mbere yifuza gusohora, Sintex yagize ati “Nta byinshi nayivugaho, nimara gusohora indirimbo eshatu kuri yo ni bwo nzahita ntangaza byimbitse byinshi ku makuru yayo! Icyakora icyo nakubwira cyo indirimbo zose ziyigize narazirangije.”
Kabera Arnold [Sintex] ni mukuru wa Nkusi Arthur, umwe mu banyarwenya bakomeye mu Rwanda ari na we umufasha mu muziki binyuze mu ikompanyi iteza imbere impano mu Rwanda ya Arthur Nation ari na yo abarizwamo.
Aba bombi bavuka kuri Mazimpaka Kennedy, umwe mu basaza bifitemo impano zihariye mu ngeri zinyuranye z’ubuhanzi.
Indirimbo nshya ya Sintex ‘Karitsiye’ yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Odilo mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe na Bagenzi Bernard.
James & Daniella bahishuye aho bakomoye umushinga wo gufasha ababaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge
Aba bahanzi baturuka mu muryango umwe kuko ari umugore n’umugabo, bavuze ko uyu mushinga wabo bazawushyira mu ngiro binyuze mu ivugabutumwa, kubafasha kwiga no gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga y’abafashe icyemezo cyo kubivamo.
Ubwo baganiraga n’abanyamakuru basobanura umushinga batanze muri ‘Rwanda Gospel Stars Live’, aba baramyi bavuze ko ari igitekerezo bagize nyuma yo kubona ubuzima bubi bw’umuvandimwe wabo wari wabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge.
Daniella yagize ati “Twe dufite umuvandimwe wa hafi mu muryango wari warabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge, ubuzima yari abayemo wabonaga ko bubabaje. Nk’umuryango twishatsemo ubushobozi tumujyana mu kigo ngororamuco.”
Uyu muvandimwe ngo yatumye babona ko bakwiye gufatanya na Leta muri gahunda yo guhangana n’ibiyobyabwenge mu rubyiruko.
Yavuze ko bifuza kujya bakora ibikorwa by’ivugabutumwa no gutanga ibiganiro mu bigo bitandukanye bigororerwamo urubyiruko rwabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge ndetse no mu magereza.
Nyuma yo kubigisha, James we yavuze ko bifuza kujya bafasha urubyiruko ruvuye kugororwa ku buryo bwo kurwigira imishinga no kuyishakira abaterankunga hagamijwe ko ubuzima bwabo budasubira inyuma bakisanga babisubiyemo.
Si James na Daniella bavuze ku mishinga yabo kuri uyu munsi, itsinda rya True Promises Ministries ryasobanuye umushinga wabo wo gufasha abana baterwa inda batarageza ku myaka y’ubukure.
True Promises Ministries bavuze ko umushinga wabo ujyanye no kwigira aba bana imishinga yabafasha kubaho neza ndetse no kuyishakira abaterankunga.
Umuhanzikazi Gisele Precious we yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gushyigikira abakobwa n’abagore bafite impano benshi bakunze kwitirira iz’abagabo.
Abahanzi bakomeje gusobanurira abakunzi babo imishinga yabo kugira ngo bakomeze kubashyigikira binyuze muri ‘Rwanda Gospel Stars live’.
Byitezwe ko tariki 30 Nzeri 2021 umuhanzi uzahiga abandi kugira umushinga mwiza no gushyigikirwa cyane, azashyikirizwa miliyoni zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ziyongera ku yo yagiye ahabwa mu gushyigikira umushinga we.

Lil Baby afungiwe mu Bufaransa.
Lil Baby na James Harden uzwi muri basketball muri Amerika mu ikipe ya Brooklyn Nets bafashwe na Polisi yo mu Bufaransa nyuma y’aho imodoka barimo yaketsweho kubamo urumogi. Lil Baby n’undi bari kumwe muri iyi modoka bafunzwe mu gihe uyu mukinnyi we bamuretse.
Lil Baby na James Harden bari bagiye mu Bufaransa mu bikorwa by’ibirori byo kumurika imideli bya Paris Fashion Week.
Lil Baby yafunzwe kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 8 Nyakanga nk’uko CNN yabitangaje. Hari gukorwa iperereza kuri uyu muraperi ngo yashyikizwa ubutabera.
Urumogi ntabwo rwemewe mu Bufaransa, mu gihe imodoka Lil Baby yari arimo yasanzwemo garama 20 zarwo. Undi muntu ufunganywe na Lil Baby ntabwo Polisi yigeze yifuza gutangaza amazina ye.
Umwihariko w’imishinga Kingdom Ministries, Serge Iyamuremye na Rata Jah Naychah baserukanye muri "Rwanda Gospel Stars Live"
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Serge Iyamuremye yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gufasha abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye, abaha imyenda n’ibindi nkenerwa bya buri munsi.
Rata Jah Naychah na we wasobanuye umushinga we wo kubaka studio ikora indirimbo mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amashusho mu rwego rwo gufasha urubyiruko kubyaza umusaruro impano zabo no kwirinda kugira agahinda gakabije.
Mu rwego rwo kurinda urubyiruko agahinda gakabije, uyu muhanzi yavuze ko iyi studio azajya ayitunganyirizamo ibiganiro byigisha.
Kingdom of God Ministries yo yavuze ko yinjiranye umushinga wo gufasha urubyiruko ruva kugororerwa i Iwawa mu gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo rwigiyeyo.
Abagize iri tsinda bavuze ko mu gihe uru rubyiruko rwaba rufashijwe gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo rwigiyeyo nta kabuza bagirira umumaro umuryango Nyarwanda kandi ntibongere kwishora mu ngeso mbi.
Abakunzi b’umuziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yaba abo mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo bakomeje gushyigikira abahanzi bakunda binyuze mu mushinga ‘Rwanda Gospel Stars live’.

Umuhanzikazi Shami Denyse yacyeje ubutwari bw’Inkotanyi mu ndirimbo nshya.
Ni indirimbo Shami yahuriyemo na Mbabazi Rosine bombi bakorera umuziki wibanda ku njyana gakondo mu Mujyi wa Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera.
Shami yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo bayikoze mu rwego rwo gushimira Inkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda no kuzereka ko Abanyarwanda bazirikana ubwitange bwazo.
Ati “Ubutumwa burimo ni ugushimira Inkotanyi, uburyo bitanze bamwe bakemera guhara ubuzima bwabo kugira ngo badukure mu icuraburindi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Baritanze, baduheka ku ntugu zabo, none ubu ngubu turatekanye. Iterambere igihugu cyagezeho nibo tubikesha. Inkotanyi zaduhaye ubuzima, niyo mpamvu tubashimira.”
Iyi ndirimbo yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Lucky Douce, ufite inzu ifasha abahanzi ya Lights On Music Studio. Ni mu gihe amajwi yafashwe na King Jay wo muri OGA FILMS.
Shami yasabye urubyiruko bagenzi be kuzirikana ubutwari bwaranze Inkotanyi bityo na bo bagaharanira kugera ikirenge mu cy’ababohoye u Rwanda, bakora ibikorwa by’iterambere bakirinda icyatuma batatira igihango bafitanye n’Inkotanyi.
Umuhanzikazi Shami amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo eshatu zirimo iyitwa ‘Inshuti, Ubutwari ndetse n’iyi aheruka gushyira hanze yise ‘Inkotanyi’. Ebyiri muri zo yazifatanyije na Mbabazi.
Imyambarire idasanzwe y’ibyamamare muri ’Cannes Film Festival’ (Amafoto).
Uyu mwaka ryongeye guhuriza hamwe ibyamamare bitandukanye muri sinema, umuziki, imideli n’ibindi. Buri wese yagiye aseruka yambaye imyambaro y’inzu zitandukanye zikomeye zihanga imideli ku isi nka Louis Vuitton, Dolce & Gabbana, Versace, Christian Dior n’izindi zikomeye.
Mu byaramamare byatambutse ku itapi y’umutuku harimo umukinnyi wa film w’Umunyamerika, Jessica Chastain, umunyamideli Bella Hadid wagaragaye muri ibi birori yambaye ikanzu ya Jean Paul Gaultier, Marion Cotillard wagaragaye muri film Annette yafunguye iserukiramuco n’abandi.
Cannes Film Festival yatangijwe ku wa 6 ikazasozwa ku wa 17 Nyakanga uyu mwaka. Yagombaga kuba guhera ku wa 11 kugeza ku wa 22 Gicurasi ariko yigizwa inyuma. Film yitwa ‘Annette’ yamuritswe ku mugaragaro ku itangizwa ry’iri serukiramuco riri kuba ku nshuro ya 74.
Uretse ‘Annette’, ‘Neptune Frost’ yakozwe n’Umunyamerika Saul Williams n’umugore we w’Umunyarwandakazi, Anisia Uzeyman, ikanifashishwamo abanyarwanda batandukanye, izerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ibe na bwo izamurikwa.
Iyi film yafatiwe amashusho mu Rwanda iminsi mike mbere y’uko icyorezo cya Coronavirus gitera. Yanonosowe mu bihe bya Guma Mu Rugo. Izerekanwa mu cyiciro cya ‘Quinzaine des Realisateurs’ muri Cannes Film Festival kizwiho kwerekanirwamo film nshya zifite umwihariko.
‘Neptune Frost’ izerekanwa muri film ndende zirenga 20 hamwe n’izindi zirimo “A Chiara” ya Jonas Carpignano, “A Night of Knowing Nothing” ya Payal Kapadia, “Ali & Ava” ya Clio Barnard, “Clara Sola” ya Nathalie Álvarez Mesen, “Hit the Road” ya Panah Panahi n’izindi.
Umujyi wa Cannes uberamo iri serukiramuco uherereye mu Bufaransa. Uherereye mu gace ka Côte d’Azur ku Nkombe y’Inyanja ya Méditerranée mu Majyepfo ashyira Uburasirazuba bw’u Bufaransa.
Cannes yamamaye cyane kubera ubwiza bw’ikirere cyaho, amaserukiramuco arimo iryo ku rwego mpuzamahanga rya Sinema rihuriramo ibihangange mu bijyanye na sinema birimo n’iby’i Hollywood muri Amerika ndetse n’amamurikagurisha ahuza ibihugu bitandukanye ku Isi.
Bavuze n’akari imurori! Ukwitana ba mwana k’Umunyamakuru M Irénée n’umubyeyi wa Vestine na Dorcas.
Murindahabi yari amaze imyaka irenga ibiri ari we ureberera inyungu z’aba bahanzikazi bakorera umurimo w’Imana mu Itorereo rya ADEPR ndetse bakaba baririmba by’umwihariko muri Korali Goshen y’i Musanze.
Uwavuga ibyabo bikomeje kuba agatereranzamba ntabwo yaba agiye kure y’ukuri kuko nyuma y’ibaruwa yashyizwe hanze n’umunyamakuru Murindahabi wafashaga aba bakobwa abinyujije mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ye yitwa M. Irene Entertainment [MIE],umubyeyi wabo na we yanze kwiyumanganya.
Bijya gutangira….
Kuri uyu wa 7 Nyakanga 2021, umunyamakuru Murindahabi yashyize hanze ibaruwa yo guseserera ku mugaragaro aba bakobwa b’abavandimwe baririmba nk’itsinda rya Vestine na Dorcas.
Ni inkuru yatunguye benshi mu babakurikiranira hafi, baba abakundaga ibihangano by’aba bakobwa bari bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo eshatu ndetse n’uyu munyamakuru uzwiho kuzamura impano z’abahanzi batandukanye.
Amagambo yabaye menshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga buri wese yibaza ibyabaye kugira ngo aba bahanzikazi batandukane n’uyu munyamakuru wabafashaga cyane ko hatari higeze hatangazwa icyabatandukanyije.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 8 Nyakanga, Murindahabi, yifashe ikiganiro akinyuza ku rukuta rwa YouTube rw’iyi kompanyi ye ya MIE, aho yahishuye byinshi abarenga igihumbi bari bamukiriye mu buryo bwa Live bagatungurwa.
Muri iki kiganiro Murindahabi yavuze ko nta kibazo na kimwe afitanye n’abana yafashaga cyangwa ababyeyi babo, ahubwo avuga ko icyabayeho ari abantu bagiye kumuteranya.
Yahishuye ko hari umugabo [yavuze ko yitwa Aimable] wabanje kumubwira ko akunda aba bahanzikazi ndetse nyuma aza guca ruhinga nyuma ajya kuganira n’umubyeyi wabo amubwira ko Murindahabi ari gusarura akayabo mu mpano y’aba bakobwa kandi akaba nta kintu gifatika abaha.
Yahawe urwandiko rumuteguza kujyanwa mu nkiko
Muri iki kiganiro cyamaze iminota irenga 50, Murindahabi wagaragaraga nk’ufite agahinda ko gutandukana n’aba bahanzikazi, yabwiye abari bamukurikiye ko itandukana ryabo atari we warigizemo uruhare.
Nk’uko byumvikanye mu majwi [Voice Notes] y’aba bahanzikazi, ngo umubyeyi wabo yifashishije umunyamategeko bandikira Murindahabi bamumenyesha ibyo agomba gukora atabikora akagezwa mu butabera.
Muri iki kiganiro uyu munyamakuru yasomye ibaruwa y’umunyamategeko wamwandikiye avuga ko ahagarariye umubyeyi wabo. Mu bikubiye muri urwo rwandiko harimo kuba umunyamategeko asaba uyu munyamakuru gusubiza shene ya Youtube y’aba bana, akerekana uburyo yagiye yinjizamo amafaranga aturutse mu muziki wabo.
Ikindi yasabwe ni ukugaragaza inkunga yahawe n’abantu mu izina rya Dorcas na Vestine.
Uyu munyamategeko yibukije Murindahabi ko natabikora mu maguru mashya, bizatuma ajyanwa mu butabera agakurikiranwaho ibyaha birimo kugundira umutungo w’undi muntu no gukoresha abana ubucakara abashakamo indonke cyane ko nta masezerano afitanye n’ababyeyi babo.
Avuga kuri ibi byose yasobanuye ko ibyo yakoze byose yifuzaga gufasha aba bana ndetse nta ndonke yigeze abashakamo. Yavuze ko yifuje kenshi kugirana amasezerano n’ababyeyi ba Dorcas na Vestine ariko ntibikunde.
Ku bijyanye na shene yabo ya Youtube, uyu munyamakuru yavuze ko yari yaranamaze kwemeranya na bo kuyibasubiza ndetse ko yiteguye kuyibaha n’abantu bayikurikira barenga ibihumbi 90, mu gihe avuga ko yayifashe ifite igihumbi.
Ikindi Murindahabi yongeyeho ni uko urukundo akunda aba bana rutatuma abareka gutyo gusa ahubwo ahamya ko igihe cyose bagarukira mu buryo bwiza yakwemera gusubirana na bo.
Buravan yasohoye indirimbo nshya iri kuri album ye ya kabiri.
Iyi ndirimbo yagiye hanze ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 7 Nyakanga 2021, mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Bob Pro, amashusho akorwa na Cedric Dric.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko guhimba iyi ndirimbo byaturutse ku bintu abona muri sosiyete.
Ati “Guhimba iyi ndirimbo byatewe n’ibyo mba mbona tubamo, ibyo byose nibyo narebye bintera kwandika ibyo nanditse. Mpitamo kwandika ku bintu biba bibera hirya no hino ngaragaza ko ubyitayeho wasara, ko uba usabwa gukora ibyo ugomba gukora hanyuma ukaza kuryoherwa wabirangije.”
Uyu muhanzi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo iri mu zindi nyinshi yamaze gukora ziri kuri album ye nshya ataramenya neza izina ryayo n’igihe izagira hanze.
Ati “Ndi gutegura album yanjye nshya. Izina ntabwo riraboneka. Iyi album yanjye ya kabiri iriho indirimbo nyinshi, ifite umwihariko. Nifuzaga ko indirimbo zaba 10 ariko ndi kwibaza ko twazigira nka 12 nibyo byaba byiza kurushaho.”
Buravan aheruka gushyira hanze album ye ya mbere yise ‘The Love Lab’ mu gitaramo gikomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Conference & Exhibition Village hahoze hitwa Camp Kigali, ku wa Gatandatu tariki 1 Ukuboza 2018.
Buravan mu gitaramo cye yafatanyije n’abahanzi barimo itsinda rya Active, Uncle Austin na Charly na Nina. Ni igitaramo cyitabiriwe ku rwego rwo ndetse abantu aba benshi kugeza ubwo bamwe bakurikiye igitaramo bahagaze kubera ko imyanya yari yashize.
Buravan yaherukaga gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya muri Werurwe uyu mwaka yise ‘Supernatural’.

Mani Martin uri mu bahanzi b’abahanga mu Rwanda, aherutse gutangaza ko yamaze gutunganya ‘Nomad’, Album ye ya gatandatu.

Gaby Kamanzi, MD na Aimée Frank basobanuye imishinga baserukanye muri ‘Rwanda Gospel Star Live’.
Aba bahanzi imbere y’abanyamakuru basobanuye byimbitse imishinga itandukanye bifuza gushyira mu bikorwa mu gihe baba babonye ubufasha bw’abakunzi babo.
Umuraperi Mugemana Dieudonné (MD) ufite nimero eshatu yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukura abana ijana ku muhanda. Igikorwa n’ubundi yari yaratangiye nubwo kitihuta bitewe n’ubushobozi bwe butaraba bwinshi.

Undi watanze umushinga ni Aimée Frank Nitezeho wahawe nimero 14. Uyu musore uri mu batanga icyizere ku hazaza h’umuziki yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukora studio nini yo gufasha abantu bafite impano ariko bagorwa no kubona ubushobozi.
Abahanzi 15 baririmba umuziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, bari guhatanira igihembo cya miliyoni zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda azatangwa na ‘Rwanda Gospel Stars Live’ mu rwego rwo gushyigikira uzahiga abandi mu kugira umushinga mwiza.

Kim Kardashian yakomoje ku kuvugurura ‘make up’ asanzwe akora, Kanye West ashyirwa mu majwi.
Ubundi izina ry’iyi sosiyete y’uyu mugore w’imyaka 40 riri mu mpine y’amazina ye Kim Kardashian yari yarongeyeho West bikaba KKW. Yavuze ko mu minsi iri imbere ashaka kuba ahagaritse iyi sosiyete kugira ngo yongere kuyivugurura.
Kim Kardashian yatangaje ko hari byinshi ashaka gukora by’impinduka birimo uburyo ‘make up’ zizajya zifungwa, uko zimeze ndetse n’ibindi bijyanye cyane n’igihe kurusha uko byari bisanzwe bimeze.
Ntabwo yigeze asobanura impamvu yatekereje gukora impinduka, ntiyanavuze ko azahindura izina ariko byaketswe ko yaba ashaka no kuvanamo irya Kanye West mu mazina ya sosiyete ye.
Yavuze ko mu myaka ine ishize hari ibyo yari yatangiranye ariko guhera ku wa 1 Kanama uyu mwaka akazaba ahagaritse urubuga rw’iyi sosiyete kugira ngo agire byinshi yongeraho bijyanye n’igihe.
Ati “Tuzagarukana brand nshya, uburyo bushya bugezweho kurusha ubwo twari dusanzwe dukoresha, udushya n’ibindi. Nishimiye kwagura no gukuza igicuruzwa cyanjye kuri mwe kugira ngo kizagere ku buryo buri gihe nifuzaga ko kiba kimezemo.”
Nyuma yo kwandika aya magambo benshi bahise batangira kuvuga ko izo mpinduka zifitanye isano no gutandukana na Kanye West.
Umwe yanditse ahatangirwa ibitekerezo kuri ubu butumwa bw’uyu mugore yashyize kuri Twitter, ati “Ndatekereza agiye gukura ‘W’ mu brand ye yose.”
Undi yanditse ati “Ubu kubera ko ugiye gutandukana na Kanye West ntabwo ushaka ‘W’ mu izina. Bivuge unakomeze urigire kuko ntabwo dushaka izo mpinduka.”
Kim Kardashian yatse gatanya na Kanye West muri Gashyantare nyuma y’igihe cyari gishize batabanye neza. Aba bombi batangiye gukundana mu 2012 ndetse bashyingiranwa mu 2014. Bafitanye abana bane barimo umukobwa mukuru North, Saint, Chicago na Psalm.
Nyuma yo gutandukana Kanye West yahise atangira gucudika n’Umurusiyakazi w’umunyamideli Irina Shayk wigeze kugirana ibihe byiza na Cristiano Ronaldo.
Abanyeshuri bo muri Saint André basubiyemo indirimbo "Ça fait rire les oiseaux".
Ni indirimbo yasubiwemo bigizwemo uruhare n’Ibiro bishinzwe Uburezi Gatolika mu Rwanda, Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda mu rwego rw’iserukiramuco ry’Ibihugu bikoresha Ururimi rw’Igifaransa [Festival de la Francophonie].
Ubusanzwe mu 1989, ni bwo itsinda rya Compagnie Créole ryasohoye indirimbo ryise "Ça fait rire les oiseaux" iri kuri Album ryise "Dansez avec" yakunzwe muri Kiliziya Gatolika n’ahandi ku buryo bukomeye kuva muri iyo myaka kugeza n’ubu.
Ni indirimbo ikunze gusubirwamo n’abaririmbyi batandukanye cyangwa amakorali yo hirya no hino ku Isi. Iri mu zitanga ibyishimo iyo Chorale de Kigali iyiririmbye mu bitaramo byayo.
Abayobozi ba Dismos Band bavuze ko basubiyemo iyi ndirimbo kuko uretse kuba yarakunzwe n’abatari bake ariko muri rusange ivuga urukundo.
Indirimbo "Ça fait rire les oiseaux yasubiwemo na Dismos Band yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Emmy Pro umenyerewe mu gukora indirimbo z’abahanzi bo muri Kiliziya Gatolika mu gihe amashusho yafashwe na Aime Pride muri Universal Record.
Dismos Band ni itsinda ryashinzwe mu 2013, ritangijwe na Padiri Faustin Nshubijeho, wari ushinzwe imyitwarire y’abanyeshuri icyo gihe, kugeza ubu akaba ari we muyobozi wa College Saint André guhera mu 2018.
College Saint André izwiho gutanga ubumenyi n’uburere bigira uruhare mu iterambere ry’igihugu by’umwihariko muri muzika Nyarwanda.
Abazwi bayizemo barimo Riderman, Isheja Sandrine, Jah D’ Eau Dukuze, Lick Lick, Andy Bumuntu, Bull Dog, Producer Element wanabaye muri Dismos Band n’abandi benshi.
Reba hano amashusho y’indirimbo "Ça fait rire les oiseaux" yasubiwemo.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Qatar yakiriye itsinda ritegura Miss Rwanda.
Abakiriwe mu biro na Amb. Nkulikiyimfura François baturutse muri ’Miss Rwanda Organisation’ ni Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ubufatanyabikorwa, Miss Iradukunda Elsa; Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa, Miss Iradukunda Liliane; Umuyobozi ushinzwe Itumanaho akaba n’Umuvugizi, Miss Nimwiza Meghan n’Umuyobozi Mukuru, Ishimwe Dieudonnée.
Babanje gusobanurira Ambasaderi Nkulikiyimfura imikorere ya Miss Rwanda Organisation hanyuma aba bakobwa babaye ba Nyampinga b’u Rwanda, basigaye bayoboye byinshi mu bikorwa by’iri rushanwa banaboneraho kumugaragariza isura y’imishinga bagiye bakora n’intera imaze kugeraho.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Itumanaho akaba n’Umuvugizi, Miss Nimwiza, yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye gusura ambasaderi bakaganira.
Ati “Twamusuye ku kazi turaganira tubasobanurira ibyerekeye Miss Rwanda, ibikorwa bitandukanye dukora, ibikorwa by’ingirakamaro abakobwa bitabiriye irushanwa bagenda bakora, uburyo Miss Rwanda ari igikorwa cyo guteza imbere umwana w’umukobwa n’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco.”
Ambasaderi Nkulikiyimfura François yabagaragarije ko ajya akurikira Miss Rwanda, ashima cyane igikorwa cyo guha buruse abana b’abakobwa baryitabiriye.
Yavuze ko ari ibintu byiza, cyane ko uburezi ari ryo pfundo ryo guteza imbere umwana w’umukobwa, ashima na gahunda yongerewe mu irushanwa ya “Most Innovative Project,” ivuga ko abana b’abakobwa bashobora gutekereza bagakora, kuko Miss Rwanda itajyanye n’ubwiza bw’inyuma gusa ahubwo n’ibiri inyuma yabwo byose. Yagaragaje uburyo Miss Rwanda igenda ifasha abana b’abakobwa n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye igiramo uruhare.
Yavuze ko abakobwa bakwiye gukomeza kurangwa n’imyitwarire iboneye kuko “nta kinyabupfura, ntacyo bageraho.”
Miss Nimwiza yongeyeho ko nk’abategura iri rushanwa, Ambasaderi Nkulikiyimfura yabahaye umukoro wo gukomeza imfuruka z’irushanwa n’ibyiza rimaze kugeraho, aho yitsaga cyane ku kamaro karyo ku bana b’abakobwa baryitabira n’uko bakurikiranwa.
Ati “Yadusabye ko dukomeza kubishyiramo ingufu ndetse anakangurira abakobwa gukomeza gukora neza imishinga yabo no gukomeza kuba intangarugero ku bandi bakobwa.”
Ibindi yashimye ni uburyo irushanwa risigaye rifite byinshi nkenerwa mu kurigeza kuri bose nk’ikipe yita ku bijyanye n’amashusho, ariko yitsa cyane ku buryo rigomba kuba rishingiye kuri ako kamaro rigirira abana b’abakobwa na sosiyete babamo.
Amb. Nkulikiyimfura yasabye Miss Rwanda Organisation ko hakomeza gushakwa uburyo butandukanye abana b’abakobwa bashyigikirwa bakanatezwa imbere.
Yijeje umusanzu w’inama n’ibitekerezo aba bakobwa n’ubundi bufatanye bashobora gukenera, anashimira ko basuye Qatar na Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu ababwira ko ibereyeho Abanyarwanda ari byiza kuba na bo bayisuye.
Banaganiriye ku mishinga itandukanye ishobora gukorwa hagati y’impande zombi. Yashimye cyane uburyo abakobwa bakomeza gufatanya mu bikorwa bakora. Miss Nimwiza yavuze ko hari imishinga iri gutegurwa yo gukorana hagati y’impande zombi “izaba ari myiza” Abanyarwanda bazagenda bamenya mu minsi iri imbere.
Bwiza Jolie mu bagore n’abakobwa bari guhatana muri Mrs Washington America.
Intego y’iri rushanwa ni ukongerera ubushobozi abagore kugira ngo bazane impinduka aho batuye. Abatsinze bamara umwaka bahabwa amahugurwa , bagaragara mu biganiro bitandukanye bakanahuzwa n’abafatanyabikorwa.
Gutsinda muri iri rushanwa bitanga amahirwe yo guhatana mu yandi marushanwa arimo Mrs. America na Mrs. World Competitions.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Bwiza Jolie yavuze ko yitabiriye iri rushanwa nyuma yo kutabona amahirwe yo kwitabira Miss Washington America ivamo uhagararira Washington muri ‘Miss America’.
Yavuze ko kubura amahirwe yo kwitabira Miss Washington byatewe n’uko atarabona ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika.
Ati “Nifuzaga kwitabira irushanwa rya Miss Washington, ariko bo basaba kuba ufite ubwenegihugu! Njye rero nubwo mfite ibyangombwa byo kuba hano nkaba nabwo narabusabye ariko sindabubona. Bahise bangira inama yo kwitabira Mrs Washington.”
Uyu mukobwa witabiriye iri rushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi atuyemo wa Tacoma, ahatanye n’abandi 12.
Muri 13 bahatanira ikamba rya Mrs Washington America, batatu bonyine barimo na Bwiza nibo bakiri abakobwa, mu gihe icumi bo ari abagore.
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko aramutse atsinze iri rushanwa, yaba abonye irindi jwi ryamufasha kugira inama abimukira bajya gutura muri Amerika kudatwarwa n’ibintu binyuranye ngo batakaze intego zabo mu buzima.
Ati “Hari abantu benshi baza hano, bagahura n’ibibazo cyangwa n’ibintu bitandukanye bituma batakaza intego zabo mu buzima, Ugasanga kuba barabashije kuza inaha ntacyo bibamariye! Ndamutse ntsinze naba mbonye ijwi ryo kujtya mbaganiriza.”
Bwiza Jolie asanzwe ari umunyamideri utuye i Washington muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akaba n’umunyeshuri wo muri kaminuza aho ageze mu mwaka wa gatatu yiga ‘Political Scinces’.
Uyu mukobwa wavukiye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ariko agakurira mu Rwanda, yahavuye mu 2016 yerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Umunyamakuru M Irene yahagaritse gufasha Vestine na Dorcas yinjije mu muziki.
Mu itangazo ryagiye hanze rigaragaza ko MIE yahisemo gutandukana n’aba bahanzi ku mpamvu zitaramenyekana.
Rigira riti “Nyuma yo gusesengura imikoranire ya MIE na Vestine na Dorcas,MIE yifuje kubwira abakunzi bayo ndetse n’umuryango mugari wa muzika ko guhera tariki 7 Nyakanga yahagaritse ibikorwa yakoranaga n’aba bahanzikazi ku mpamvu muzamenyeshwa mu minsi iri imbere.”
Batandukanye nyuma y’aho uyu munyamakuru ari we wabazanye mu muziki bagakorana indirimbo zirimo ‘Nahawe Ijambo’, ‘Papa’ ndetse na ‘Adonai’ baherukaga gushyira hanze.
Ishimwe Vestine na Kamikazi Dorcas ni abavandimwe babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Musanze, biyemeje kuririmbira Imana mu myaka y’ubuto bwabo.
Ishimwe Vestine Taricy yavutse tariki 2 Gashyantare 2004, ubu yiga mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri yisumbuye. Kamikazi Dorcas we yavutse ku wa 28 Kamena 2006. Yiga mu mwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye, bombi bavuka kuri Uzamukunda Elizabeth na Nizeyimana Mazimpaka.
Bavuka ari batandatu mu rugo iwabo, harimo abakobwa bane n’abahungu babiri. Baririmba muri Goshen Choir y’i Musanze.
Batangiye kuririmba ku giti cyabo mu 2018 ariko ubu ni bwo babashije gushyira hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere. Guhera umwaka ushize ni bwo bakoranaga na M. Irene Entertainment y’umunyamakuru Murindahabi Irénée wa ISIBO TV.
Dorcas & Vestine batandukanye na MIE nyuma y’aho bari mu irushanwa ryiswe "Rwanda Gospel Stars Live" ryahurijwemo abahanzi 15 bari ku ruhembe rw’abafite igikundiro mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, bahataniye igihembo cya miliyoni zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Lava Lava yasohoye indirimbo nshya yabanjirijwe n’ikinyoma cyo kubengerwa kuri radiyo.
Muri iyi minsi abanyamuziki badukanye umuco wo guhimba ibinyoma bikomeye, mu rwego rwo gushitura abakunzi babo mbere y’uko basohora indirimbo.
Lava Lava wo muri Tanzania na we aherutse kuyoboka uyu mujyo. Yahimbye ikinyoma ko yabengewe kuri radiyo, nyamara agamije gushitura abantu ngo bitege indirimbo ye nshya.
Mu minsi ishize ubwo umuhanzikazi Lulu wo muri Tanzania yari kuri Wasafi FM, mu buryo bugaragara nk’ubuteguye, Lava Lava bari bambaye imyenda isa, yamwinjiranye mu kiganiro azanye igipfunyika cy’indabyo, aherekejwe n’itsinda ry’abafata amashusho n’amafoto amupfukama imbere amusaba kumubabarira.
Uyu muhanzikazi yiyamye Lava Lava amubwira ko atabishaka, ati “Sitaki” cyangwa se “Simbishaka”.
Nyuma yo kubona ko abenzwe, Lava Lava wari wigize nk’uri mu rukundo rukomeye, yanze guhaguruka ahubwo akomeza gufata amaguru Lulu yikuruza hasi amusaba ko yamubabarira.
Lulu na we ntiyahwemye kwiyama Lava Lava, amusunika cyane amusaba kumureka, undi na we ariko yanga kuva ku izima.
Nyuma yo kubona ko bigenze nabi, Lulu yemeye gufata izi ndabyo ariko yarakaye cyane.
Bimwe mu binyamakuru bitandukanye byo mu karere byari byanditse inkuru y’uko Lava Lava yabengewe muri studio za radiyo nyamara we ku rundi ruhande yari azi ibyo yakoze.
Nyuma y’iminsi mike ibi bisa n’ikinamico bibaye, Lava Lava yahise asohora indirimbo yise “Nikomeshe”.
Igisohoka benshi bahise basobanukirwa iby’ikinamico yari aherutse gukinana na Lulu muri Wasafi FM.
Indirimbo nshya ya Lava Lava ’Nikomeshe’
Imishinga yihariye Dorcas & Vestine na Gisubizo Ministries binjiranye muri "Rwanda Gospel Stars Live".
Irushanwa ryiswe "Rwanda Gospel Stars Live" ryahurijwemo abahanzi 15 bari ku ruhembe rw’abafite igikundiro mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, bahataniye igihembo cya miliyoni zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Mu mabwiriza agenga iri rushanwa harimo ko abatoranyirijwe kuryitabira bagomba kumurika imishinga yabo.
Gisubizo Ministries iri mu matsinda afite ibigwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana yavuze ko umushinga wayo ari ugufasha abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye binyuze mu kubigisha ijambo ry’Imana no kubafasha kwihangira imirimo.
Nkomezi Alexis wari uhagarariye Gisubizo Ministries yavuze ko ari ibikorwa itsinda risanzwe rikora ariko mu gihe baba babonye andi maboko babyagura bikagenda neza kurushaho.
Gisubizo Ministries yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo "Amfitiye byinshi", "Mana uriho", "Ndaguhetse ku Mugongo", "Narababariwe" n’izindi. Ni umuryango ukora ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu bihugu binyuranye ku Isi ndetse mu bihe bitandukanye ryegukanye ibihembo byinshi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana.
Dorcas na Vestine baturuka mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda ubwo baganirizaga itangazamakuru iby’umushinga wabo, bavuze ko bashaka kubaka studio igezweho ikaba n’ikigo cyo kwigishirizamo urubyiruko umuziki.
Ni igitekerezo aba bana bavuga ko bakuye ku kuntu bakoze umuziki baturuka mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru ariko badafite studio hafi, byatumye bashaka gufungura iyabo yajya inafasha abandi bafite impano ntibavunike nkuko bo bavunitse.
Bagize bati “Twe twavaga i Musanze tuje gukora umuziki mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ni ibintu bituvuna cyane, rero abantu badushyigikiye tugatsindira ariya mafaranga byadufasha gukora ikigo cyigisha umuziki kirimo na studio byajya bifasha n’abandi banyempano.”
Dorcas na Vestine bari mu bahanzikazi bashya bahanzwe amaso mu muziki uhimbaza Imana. Iri tsinda ry’abavandimwe ryamenyekanye mu ndirimbo "Nahawe ijambo’’. Aba bana basengera muri ADEPR ndetse baririmba by’umwihariko muri Korali Goshen y’i Musanze.
Abakunzi b’umuziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yaba abo mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo bakomeje gushyigikira abahanzi bakunda binyuze mu mushinga ‘Rwanda Gospel Stars live’.
Byitezwe ko tariki 30 Nzeri 2021 umuhanzi uzahiga abandi kugira umushinga mwiza no gushyigikirwa cyane, azashyikirizwa miliyoni zirindwi z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda ziyongera ku yo yagiye ahabwa mu gushyigikira umushinga we.
Izi miliyoni zirahatanirwa n’abahanzi barimo Serge Iyamuremye, Israel Mbonyi, Aline Gahongayire, Tonzi, Gaby Kamanzi, Rata Jah Naychah, James na Daniella, Gisubizo Ministries, MD, Dorcas & Vestine, Chorale Christus Regnat, Gisele Precious, True Promises Ministries, Aimee Frank Nitezeho na Aneth Murava.
Abahanzi batangiye gukangurira abakunzi babo kubaha inkunga yo gushyira mu ngiro imishinga yabo, binyuze mu bitaramo binyura kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda.
Buri wese wifuza gushyigikira umuhanzi akunda muri 15 bamaze gutangazwa, arasabwa kujya muri telefone ye umurongo yaba akoresha wose, agakanda *544*300*nimero y’umuhanzi ashyigikiye hanyuma agashyiraho # cyangwa .
Nta giciro cyashyizweho, buri wese yitanga uko yifite mu rwego rwo gushyigikira umuhanzi akunda.
Britney Spears agiye guhagarika umuziki burundu.
Yabitangaje mu ibaruwa yabonywe bwa mbere n’ikinyamakuru Deadline aho yanditse agaragaza ko atakomeza kuba umujyanama [manager] w’uyu muhanzikazi kandi ateganya kuva mu muziki mu minsi iri imbere.
Ati “Hari hashize umwaka n’igice kuva ubwo Britney nanjye twavuganaga akambwira ko ashaka gufata ikiruhuko. Uyu munsi namenye ko Britney ateganya kureka umuziki burundu mu buryo bweruye. Nari nahawe akazi ku busabe bwe ngomba kumufasha mu by’umuziki ndetse no kumushyigikira mu rugendo muri muzika.”
Yakomeje avuga ko atakomeza kumubera umujyanama kandi yararetse umuziki, ati “Ndetse nka manager we mu muziki, nizera ko biri mu nyungu ze kuba nareka inshingano zanjye kuko zitagikenewe. Mwakire iyi baruwa nko kwegura kwanjye ku mugaragaro.”
Iyi baruwa yanayigeneye abarimo se w’uyu muhanzikazi, Jamie Spears, uri mu bakurikirana imitungo ye n’umunyamategeko w’uyu muhanzikazi Jodi Montgomery.
Rudolph ntiyigeze agaragara mu bacunga ibintu byose bya Britney birimo no kumenya ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi uko yitwara [Conservatorship], ibintu uyu muhanzikazi aheruka kuvuga mu rukiko ko atagikeneye ndetse akanavuga ko abifata nko kumuhohotera, ahubwo yari umujyanama mu by’umuziki gusa.
Rudolph yakoranye na Spears guhera mu 1995 ndetse anamufasha mu muziki ku buryo yabaye icyamamare kurusha uko bahuye ameze. Uyu mugabo yanafashije abandi bahanzi barimo itsinda rya Aerosmith, Miley Cyrus, Justin Timberlake, Backstreet Boys, 98 Degrees, O-Town, will.i.am, Toni Braxton, Nicole Scherzinger, Swizz Beatz na Kim Petras.
Muri Gicurasi 2019, Britney Spears, yahagaritse kongera kuririmbira ku rubyiniro mu bitaramo ndetse icyo gihe hari amakuru yavugaga ko bishobora kuba bitazongera kubaho ukundi.
Yari afite ibitaramo muri Gashyantare ariko ntiyabyitabira kubera impamvu yavuze ko zirimo n’iz’uburwayi.
Hagati ya 2007 na 2008, Britney Spears yafashwe n’uburwayi bwo kwigunga no guhuzagurika mu bwonko bwatumye se aba umwe mu bakurikirana ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi, akanamufasha gucunga umutungo we.
Amaze iminsi mu manza aburana na we ku bijyanye no kongera gusubirana uburenganzira ku gucunga imitungo ye. Sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust yari isanzwe ireberera inyungu mu bijyanye n’imitungo uyu mukobwa ifatanyije na se iheruka gusohora itangazo igaragaza ko itagishaka kumukurikiranira imitungo ndetse umucamanza wa Los Angeles ahita abibemerera.
Britney Spears afite imyaka 39, ni umwe mu bahanzi b’ibihangange ku Isi mu njyana ya Pop.
Ubuhamya bw’ababanye na Mukeshabatware uheruka kwitaba Imana.
Ni mu muhango wo gusezera uyu musaza wabaye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 6 Nyakanga mu rugo iwe ku Gisozi ahari hateraniye abantu bake barimo bamwe mu bo basenganaga n’abandi bakinanye amakinamico.
Mu buhamya bwinshi bwatanzwe, benshi bagaragaje ko Mukeshabatware yari umuntu ugira umutima wo gufasha, agakunda Imana n’abantu kandi akitanga cyane mu byo akora.
Pasiteri Hirali wabanye nawe cyane, yavuze ku rugendo rwo gukizwa rwe anakomoza ku kuba we n’umugore we baraviriye mu mubiri ku itariki imwe.
Ati “Nk’umuntu wamusuye atarakizwa. Bari batuye ku Muhima hariya imbere y’ibagiro. Dusengerayo. Twamenyanye bivuye kuri madamu nawe witabye Imana kuri 30 Ugushyingo 2007. Iyo tariki ni imwe bagiye bitabiraho Imana byatumye njya musura, ariko byasabaga kwitonda iyo hazagamo ijambo ry’Imana.”
Yakomeje avuga ko kugira ngo akizwe byafashe igihe kinini cyane ko yari umuntu utarapfaga kwemera ikintu, ahubwo buri cyose yabanzaga kukibazaho ibibazo byinshi.
Ati “Kumuganiriza byasabaga ubwenge bwinshi. Akantu kose akabaza. Byansabaga urugendo rurerure. Nyuma twaje guhuza tukajya tuganira ijambo ry’Imana.”
“Naje kwiyiriza iminsi itatu musengera, nsengera madamu waje kwitaba Imana ndetse no gusengera itorero. Numvise ijwi rimbwira ko azabona ijuru. Hari umwana witwa Lambert yari arwaye ahiga umuhigo ko nakira azakorera Imana, abonye bibaye ahita ayiyegurira.”
Nsanzurwimo Anastase wasenganye na Mukeshabatware yavuze ko yabatijwe ku wa 19 Ukuboza mu 1998, mu myaka 23 yamaze akijijwe akagaragaza urukundo mu murimo w’Imana no mu bantu.
Ati “Amaze gukizwa yashyigikiye agakiza. Yakundaga gusenga n’amateraniro cyane cyane aya nibature adashoborwa na benshi. Byamuviriyemo umusaruro kuko yagize iherezo ryiza. Icya kabiri ni ukugaragariza Imana urukundo. Yari afite indangagaciro yo gukunda abantu bose. Akabakunda, akabashyigikira […] yagize iherezo ryiza.”
Umukobwa wa Mukeshabatware witwa Bonne Marie Ntakwasa yavuze ko se yagiraga umuhate cyane mu kazi ndetse bigatuma agenda ahabwa amashimwe atandukanye kubera ubwitange bwe.
Yavuze ko ibyo se asize ari indorerwamo we n’abandi benshi bazajya bamureberamo.
Ati “Ibikorwa yakoze n’indorerwamo twese twamureberaho. Yari umukirisito ukunda umurimo w’Imana akanakunda kuririmba cyane no gucuranga ndetse n’ubwo nta korali yabayemo yagiye atera inkunga abaririmbyi benshi.”
“We n’umufasha we baranzwe no gukunda Imana no kwitangira umurimo w’Imana. Yarangwaga no kutagira uburyarya ndetse n’urukundo rwinshi. Tuzamwibukira ku gukunda imfubyi n’abapfakazi agafasha abatishoboye abarihira amashuri ndetse akanabishyura ubwisungane mu kwivuza.”
Perezida wa Korali Rehoboth yagiye aba hafi yavuze ko ashima Imana ko uyu musaza yamuhaye iherezo ryiza.
Murizaboro Marie Antoinette bakoranye akina ikinamico yavuze ko bigoye kubona icyo yavuga kuri Mukeshabatware kubera ibigwi bye gusa yemeza ko abo bakoranye yababereye inkingi ikomeye.
Ati “Twe ababanye nawe tugatangirana nawe mu Indamutsa no muri Musekeweya yatubereye inkingi ikomeye, tuzajya tumwibukira kuri byinshi.”
“Yari afite urukundo mu murimo no kuri twebwe. Ikintu tuzahora tumwibukiraho ni ukwitanga. Yabaga anafite intege nke ntabigaragaze. Ndahamya ko mu ijuru bamwakiriye.”
Mukeshabatware yitabye Imana ku wa 30 Kamena 2021, aguye mu bitaro byitiwe Umwami Faisal.
Uyu mugabo wari mu bazwi cyane mu myidagaduro yo mu Rwanda yamenyekanye nka Mbirikanyi, Rutaganira muri ‘Musekeweya’ n’andi mazina mu makinamico atandukanye yagiye akina ndetse agakundwa bihambaye n’abatari bake.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 6 Nyakanga 2021 nibwo habaye umuhango wo guherekeza mu cyubahiro Mukeshabatware.
Umuhango wo guherekeza mu cyubahiro Mukeshabatware, watangiriye kwa muganga ubwo abo mu muryango we bajyaga gufata umurambo mu bitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal.
Nyuma yo kugeza umurambo wa Nyakwigendera mu rugo aho yari atuye ku Gisozi mu Karere ka Gasabo, abantu bake nibo bemerewe kwinjira iwe, cyane ko ingamba zo gukumira icyorezo cya COVID-19 zitemerera abantu benshi guhurira ahantu hamwe.
Umuryango wa Nyakwigendera wabanje gufata umwanya muto wo kumusezera mu cyubahiro, mbere y’uko inshuti n’abandi batumiwe muri uyu muhango bamusezeraga bwa nyuma.
Mukeshabatware yitabye Imana ku wa 30 Kamena 2021, aguye mu bitaro byitiwe Umwami Faisal.
Uyu mugabo wari mu bazwi cyane mu myidagaduro yo mu Rwanda yamenyekanye nka Mbirikanyi, Rusisibiranya n’andi mazina mu makinamico atandukanye yagiye akina ndetse agakundwa bihambaye n’abatari bake.
Mukeshabatware yavukiye i Nyaruguru mu 1950 ku ngoma y’Umwami Rudahigwa. Yasoje amashuri abanza mu 1965 atsinze ikizamini ahabwa amahirwe yo kujya kwiga muri St André.
Akirangiza Icyiciro rusange cy’amashuri yisumbuye yabaye umwarimu mu karere k’iwabo icyakora ntiyahamara igihe kuko mu 1970 yahise yinjira mu gisirikare.
Yigeze kubwira IGIHE ati “Nyuma y’uko Inyenzi ziteye muri Nshiri bahise batujyana mu gisirikare ku ngufu njya muri ESO (Ecole des Sous Officiers) kwiga, sinahatinze kuko namazemo amezi atatu nkora ikizamini cyo kwandika mu binyamakuru mba ndagitsinze mpita njya mu Bubiligi.”
Mukeshabatware avuga ko mu Bubiligi yahamaze umwaka umwe n’amezi atandatu. Ati “Mvuyeyo ndi mu batangije icapiro rya gisirikare.”
Mu icapiro rya gisirikare yahakoraga yarahawe ipeti rya Kaporali. Mukeshabatware avuga ko mu 1973 ari umwe mu bacapye amafoto y’uwari Perezida Habyarimana ubwo yari amaze guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda.
Igisirikare Mukeshabatware yagikoreye imyaka umunani aza kukivamo agaye umushahara muto bahabwaga icyo gihe.
Yahawe akazi kenshi iwabo ariko kuko yari akeneye akaruhuko agenda akanga, icyakora abo biganye mu Bubiligi bakoraga mu icapiro rya ORINFOR mu 1979 basabye ubuyobozi ko bwamutumaho akaza kubafasha.
Yatangiye mu icapiro rya ORINFOR mu 1980. Mu 1982 Mukeshabatware yinjiye mu itsinda ryakinaga amakinamico ya ORINFOR ryaje guhabwa izina rya Indamutsa.
CNN yatangaje ko aba bombi barushinze ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize nyuma yaho mu Ukwakira 2020 bari bemeranyije kubana akaramata.
Gwen Stefani yanditse kuri Instagram agaragaza ko yashimishijwe no kuba yarushinze. Ati “Tariki 3 Nyakanga 2021 inzozi zabaye impamo.”
Blake Shelton na Gwen Stefani, bahuriye mu ifatwa ry’amashusho ya ‘The Voice’ mu 2015. Bakoranye indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo “Go Ahead and Break My Heart”, “If I’m Honest” na “You Make It Feel Like Christmas”.
Banatwaye igihembo bari kumwe cya CMT Music Award babikesheje indirimbo “Nobody But You” bahuriyemo.
Gwen Stefani afite abana batatu barimo Kingston Rossdale, Zuma Nesta Rock Rossdale na Apollo Bowie Flynn Rossdale.
Shelton yatandukanye n’umugore we Miranda Lambert mu 2015 ndetse ni ubwa gatatu arushinze mu gihe umugore we ari ubwa kabiri. Gwen Stefani afite imyaka 51 mu gihe Blake Shelton ari 45.
Urujijo ku bukwe bwa Ykee Benda n’umuhanzikazi Lydia Jazmine.
Mu Cyumweru gishize nibwo iyi nkuru yatangiye kuvugwa cyane nyuma y’uko aba bahanzi bashyize hanze amafoto agaragaza Lydia Jazmine yagiye kwerekana iwabo Ykee Benda.
Ni igikorwa cyasamiwe hejuru n’itangazamakuru ryo muri Uganda bamwe bahamya ko aba bahanzi bakoze ubukwe, mu gihe ku rundi ruhande hari abavuga ko ari ugushaka gusasira indirimbo baba bateganya gusohora mu minsi iri imbere.
Mu gihe bari bakibaza kuri ibi bibazo, aba bahanzi bongeye kuzamura impaka ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no mu itangazamakuru ryo muri Uganda ubwo basohoraga amafoto y’imihango yo gusaba no gukwa.
Icyakora nubwo hari abahamya ko aba bahanzi baba barakoze ubukwe, ku rundi ruhande hari abahamya ko ari umupango wabo wo gushaka kumenyekanisha indirimbo izasohoka mu minsi iri imbere.
Byinshi mu binyamakuru bihakana amakuru yo gukundana kw’aba bahanzi, bishingira ku kuba atari abantu basanzwe ari inshuti.
Ykee Benda na Lydia Jazmine basanzwe ari abahanzi bakomeye muri Uganda, ariko bose bahurije ku kuba ababyeyi babo bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda, byanatumye ubwo bifotozaga amafoto yo gusaba no gukwa bari bakenyeye Kinyarwanda.
Lion Gaga yashyize hanze amashusho ya ‘Intare’ yanditse akomoye ku bwitange bw’Inkotanyi
Ku wa 4 Nyakanga u Rwanda rwizihiza umunsi wo Kwibohora, aho hongera kwibukwa no guha icyubahiro abitanze bose kugira ngo igihugu Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ihagarikwe.
Ibikorwa byakoze na FPR Inkotanyi yagize uruhare rukomeye mu kubohora igihugu byagiye bikora benshi ku mutima ndetse bigatuma abahanzi bamwe bahanga bazirahira.
Lion Gaga ari muri abo ndetse afite iyo yise ‘Intare’. Yabwiye IGIHE ko ubutumwa yayikoze ashaka gushimira ‘Inkotanyi’ no kwerekana ubwitange bwazo.
Ati “ Nayikoze nshaka kwerekana ko ubutwari bw’ababohoye igihugu batweretse bwatubereye umurage.”
Avuga ko akenshi iyo agiye hanze y’u Rwanda abona ko igihugu cy’u Rwanda kimaze kwiyubaka no kugera ku rundi rwego ugereranyije n’ahandi yagiye agera.
Muri iyi ndirimbo ya Gaga hari aho aririmba ati “Turi Intare duhagaze bwuma, turi Intare turi intavogerwa turakomeye. Twe turi ruti, turi rutikura, turakomeye […]”
Lion Gaga yakoze indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo ‘Rekura amazi’, ‘Uhoraho’, ‘Ba intwari’ n’izindi nyinshi.
Lion Gaga ubusanzwe witwa Gaga Jean Bosco afite izindi ndirimbo zikoze mu njyana ya Reggae ndetse afite album yuzuye. Uyu musore w’imyaka 33, yatangiye umuziki mu 2012. Mu buryo bw’amajwi iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yakozwe na Bob Pro muri The Sounds naho amashusho yakozwe na Eliel Sando.
Muri aya mashusho yakoresheje imyenda ya mukotanyi nk’imyenda yibutsa ishusho y’inkotanyi zihagarika Jenoside.
Ni umwana bareranywe! Ndanda yambitse impeta umukobwa bagiye kurushinga.
Nizeyimana wirinze gutangaza amazina y’umukobwa bitegura kurushinga, aganira na IGIHE yahamije ko ari umwe mu bo babyirukanye.
Ati “Ni umwe mu rungano twabyirukanye ku Gisozi aho nakuriye, twakundanye kuva cyera ahubwo ni kumwe igihe kiba kitaragera ngo usobanukirwe uwawe.”
Bitewe n’ingamba zikomeye zo kwirinda Covid-19 u Rwanda rurimo, Nizeyimana yavuze ko atahita avuga gahunda ihamye y’ubukwe bwe.
Nizeyimana Alphonse Ndanda uherutse gusezera umupira yabaye umunyezamu wakinnye mu makipe akomeye nka Rayon Sports, Mukura VS, AS Kigali n’izindi.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo hatangiye kwamamazwa film ‘Intandaro y’Ikibi’ yakinnyemo, icyakora avuga ko atari ibintu agiye kugira umwuga ahubwo yayikinnyemo ashyigikira inshuti ye.
Britney Spears mu ntambara ikomeye imuganisha ku kwigenga.
Aheruka kubwira urukiko byinshi bijyanye n’ihohoterwa yakorewe ndetse anatunga agatoki se James ‘Jamie’ Parnell Spears ufite uburenganzira bwo kumugenzurira imitungo no kumukurikirana mu muziki ko yagiye amufata nabi, bigatuma ahura n’ihungabana.
The New Yorker yatangaje ko nyina w’uyu muhanzikazi witwa Lynne Spears, kubera ibibazo umukobwa we yagiye anyuramo yagiye agira ibyiyumviro bitandukanye.
Ati “Nagiye ngira ibyiyumviro bivanze kuri buri kimwe. Ntabwo nzi icyo gutekereza. Ni umubabaro mwinshi n’impungenge nyinshi.”
Yanavuze ko umukobwa we mbere ho umunsi umwe ngo yumvikane mu rukiko atanga ubuhamya, yabanje guhamagara Polisi akishinganisha avuga ko akorerwa ihohoterwa mu kumugenzurira imitungo n’ibindi bijyanye n’ubuzima bwe.
Se wa Britney aheruka guhakana ibyo umukobwa amushinja birimo no kuba yaranze ko abyarana n’umusore bakundana.
Nyamara mu minsi ishize sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust yari isanzwe ireberera inyungu mu bijyanye n’imitungo uyu mukobwa ifatanyije na se iheruka gusohora itangazo igaragaza ko itagishaka kumukurikiranira imitungo ndetse umucamanza wa Los Angeles ahita abibemerera.
Mu nyandiko People yabonye yandikiye urukiko, iyi sosiyete yavuze ko nyuma y’ubuhamya bwa Britney yahisemo kuba ivuye mu bamureberera inyungu.
Muri Mata uyu mwaka Britney yari yasabye ko yazaburanira mu ruhame ndetse ku wa 23 Kamena biza kuba aho yatanze ubuhamya bwababaje benshi bakavuga ko akwiriye guhabwa ubwigenge.
Nyuma yaho iyi sosiyete ikuyemo akayo, se wa Britney niwe usigaye areberera inyungu umukobwa we ariko bitegerejwe ko hari icyo urukiko ruzanzura mu gihe kiri imbere.
Kuva Britney yatanga ubuhamya bwe mu rukiko, abantu batandukanye barimo ibyamamare bagaragaje ko ibyo yakorewe bidakwiriye cyane cyane ubwo yavugaga ko se amugenzura kugeza aho yamubujije kubyarana n’umukunzi we.
Nka Justin Timberlake yaranditse ati “Nyuma y’ibintu byose twabonye tugomba gushyigikira Britney kuri iyi nshuro. Twirengagije ahahise hacu ibyiza cyangwa se ibibi ndetse tukirengagiza uko igihe gishize kingana. Ibiri kumubaho ntabwo bikwiye. Nta mugore ukwiriye kubuzwa uburenganzira ku mubiri we. Nta muntu ukwiriye kubuzwa uburenganzira kugeza aho yaka uburenganzira kuri buri kintu yakoreye cyane.”
Abandi barimo Mariah Carey, Rose McGowan, Missy Elliott, Meghan McCain, Brandy, Khloé Kardashian, Halsey n’abandi benshi bagaragaje ko Britney Spears akwiriye kwigenga.
Britney byatangiye agenzurwa na se by’igihe gito nyuma yo kugaragaza ko yaba yaragize ibibazo byo mu mutwe mu 2007.
Kuva mu 2008 kugeza mu 2019 se niwe wakurikiranaga ibikorwa bye byose birimo gufata imyanzuro itandukanye mu buzima, gusurwa no gusura, ibijyanye n’amasezerano ashobora gukora n’ibindi.
Muri Nzeri 2019 yasimbuwe by’agateganyo na Jodi Montgomery kubera ibibazo by’ubuzima ariko muri Mutarama 2020 James "Jamie" Parnell Spears arongera asubirana umwanya we. Ubusanzwe se wa Britney yafatanyaga na sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust mu kumureberera inyungu none yakuyemo akayo.
Don Cheadle yarushinze na Bridgid Coulter nyuma y’imyaka 28 bakundana.
Cheadle w’imyaka 56 mu kiganiro aheruka kugirana na “The Ellen DeGeneres Show” yabwiye Wanda Sykes wari ukiyoboye ko we na Bridgid Coulter ufite imyaka 52 bari bamaze igihe kinini bakundana, bafashe icyemezo cyo kurushinga.
Sykes yavuze ko Cheadle ko yamubwiye ko yarushinze umwaka ushize agatungurwa. Ati “Waranyandikiye mu ntangiro z’umwaka umbwira ko warushinze. Naravugaga nti igihe cy’icyorezo gitumye Don na Bridgid barushinga.”
Cheadle mu kumusubiza yagize ati “Yego. Ndabumva cyane ko twari tumaranye imyaka 28 dukundana mbere yo kurushinga. Ntabwo nakurenganya.”
Aba bombi bakundanye guhera mu 1992. Bafitanye abana babiri b’abakobwa barimo uwitwa Ayana ndetse na Imani.
Don Cheadle ni umwe mu bakomeye muri sinema ya Hollywood. Yamamaye muri filime zitandukanye zirimo Hamburger Hill , Colors, Blue Dress , Captain America: Civil War, Avengers: Infinity War , Captain Marvel n’izindi nyinshi.

Mico The Best yambitse impeta umukunzi we; Reba amafoto y’uburanga bwe.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri Cyumweru tariki 4 Nyakanga 2021 nibwo uyu muhango wabaye mu ibanga rikomeye, nta inshuti z’uyu muhanzi zari zihari kuko imihuro y’abantu benshi ibujijwe muri iki gihe.
Amakuru IGIHE ifite ni uko aba bombi bemeranyije kurushinga nyuma y’iminsi mike uyu mukobwa yerekanye Mico The Best iwabo, umuhango nawo wagizwe ibanga.
Uyu mukobwa bagiye kubana, twamenye ko yitwa Clarisse. Ntabwo azwi cyane mu myidagaduro yo mu Rwanda gusa yigeze kujya amurika imideli nubwo byamaze igihe gito.
