Mu buryo budasanzwe, mu ijambo Museveni yagejeje ku baturage tariki 4 Kamena 2021, yavuze ko iyo mbunda ari nayo yakoreshejwe mu gitero cyari kigamije guhitana Katumba.
Mu yandi magambo, iyo mbunda yari iri mu maboko y’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda kuva mu 2016, yongeye gukoreshwa mu 2021. Ibi ni ibimenyetso simusiga ko iyo Museveni avuga ‘ingurube’, nta handi ziri atari mu butegetsi bwe. Birashoboka ko zihishe mu nzego z’umutekano za Uganda.
Ku kibazo cy’umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda, umwanditsi avuga ko Abanyarwanda baba muri Uganda bagiye bibasirwa, nyamara abyica aho akomeza avuga ko “hari Abanyarwanda batawe muri yombi bakekwaho ubutasi bakoherezwa mu gihugu cyabo.” Ibi ni ibinyoma bisa by’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda.
Ibihumbi by’Abanyarwanda (si amagana nkuko Kazooba abivuga) mu myaka ine ishize bagiye bashimutwa n’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda, bagafungirwa ahantu hatazwi mu mabohero y’inzego z’umutekano. Bagiye bashinjwa ‘ubutasi’, ‘gutunga intwaro mu buryo butemewe’, ‘ishimuta’ n’ibindi. Icyo Kazooba yibagiwe kuvuga, ni uko nta n’umwe wigeze ahabwa amahirwe yo kwiregura mu rukiko. Bakorewe ihohoterwa ngo bemere ku ngufu ibyaha bahimbiwe, bamwe bakanagwa ku mupaka ari intere nabwo kubera igitutu cy’u Rwanda.
Ni inzirakarengane z’ibinyoma byacuriwe i Kampala bigamije kuyobya rubanda, ari naho habarizwa icy’uko u Rwanda rukorana na ADF.
Leta ya Uganda n’inzego zayo z’umutekano ku isonga CMI, ari nazo zicura ibinyoma bigamije kwangiza isura y’u Rwanda, zakunze guhirikira ubwo bwicanyi bw’abayobozi bakuru kuri Leta y’u Rwanda, nyamara bwakozwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Museveni. Kuri iyi nshuro, n’igitambambuga nticyapfa kwemera ibyo binyoma.
Imikoreshereze y’ubutaka ikwiriye guhinduka, Intara y’Amajyepfo igahabwa umurwa mukuru w’ubucuruzi.
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bituwe cyane muri Afurika. Ibarura rusange ryakozwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare mu 2012, ryagaragaje ko Abanyarwanda bari bageze kuri miliyoni 10.5, mu gihe biteganyijwe ko muri 2032 bazaba babarirwa hagati ya milioni 15,4 na 16,9 naho mu 2050 bakazaba bari hagati ya miliyoni 23 na 25.
Muri 2015 ubucucike kuri kilometero kare bwari buhagaze kuri 461 mu gihe muri 2050 buzaba buhageze kuri 934. Ubu bwiyongere bw’abaturage bujyana no gukenera ubutaka bwo guturaho no gukoreraho ibikorwa by’iterambere bitandukanye, twavuga nk’ubuhizi n’ubworozi, ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro n’ibindi.
Bitewe n’ubu bwiyongere bw’abaturage, ahakabaye hakorerwa ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi kandi bitanga n’umusaruro harimo haraturwa ku muvuduko wo hejuru. Urugero twavuga ni nk’igice kinini cy’Intara y’u Burasirazuba ndetse n’Akarere k’Ibirunga bizwiho kuba ari byo bigize Ikigega cy’igihugu mu biribwa.
Nta gikozwe ubu butaka bugakomeza guturwaho ku muvuduko biriho ubu, byazagira ingaruka mu gihe kirekire mu kwihaza mu biribwa kw’igihugu.
Ese ubwiyongere bw’abaturage muri utu turere tw’ubuhinzi buva he?
Intara y’Iburasirazuba
Nkuko bigaragara mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare (NISR-EICV-4), ndetse na raporo ya Banki y’Isi (World bank report) muri iki gihe usanga abaturage bava mu duce tw’imisozi miremire kandi yagundutse, abandi bakava mu duce dufite amasambu mato cyane.
Aha twavuga nk’uturere twa Gakenke, Muhanga, Rulindo, Gicumbi, Nyamagabe, Burera, Nyaruguru, Gasabo na Nyamasheke berekaza aho bashobora kubona amasambu manini kandi atanga umusaruro cyane cyane mu gace k’iburasirazuba mu turere twa Nyagatare, Gatsibo, Kayonza na Rwamagana.
Muri utu turere abaturage bavamo ntibaba bagishobora kubona umusaruro uhagije watunga ingo zabo bityo bagafata icyemezo cyo gusuhuka. Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzin’Ubworozi (Minagri_ Psta 4) igaragaza ko mu turere 10 two mu Ntara z’Iburengerazuba, Amajyepfo ndetse n’Amajyaruguru abahinzi bari hagati 40-50 % bakorera ibikorwa byabo ku buso bungana na 0.2 ha mu gihe mu Karere ka Rubavu abahinzi bangana na 70 % bafite ubutaka muri minsi ya 0.2 ha. Bigaragare rero ko ubutaka butera kandi buto ari imwe mu mpamvu ituma abantu bimukira cyane mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba.
Akarere k’Ibirunga bihagaze bite?
Akandi gace gafite umuvuduko wo hejuru mu guturwa ni ak’Ibirunga aho imijyi ya Musanze na Rubavu ndetse n’udusantere twaho twaguka vuba. Kuba aka gace gahana imbibi n’ibihugu bituranyi aho byoroha gukora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi kandi kakaba gafite n’ubutaka bwera bituma hari abaturage bava hirya no hino bajya kuhatura.
Ibi bituma imijyi n’amasantere byaguka vuba. Hari impungenge ko ugukura kw’iyi mijyi kugenda gutwara ubutaka buhingwa kandi ari bwo bwakabaye buzakomeza gutanga umusaruro w’ibiribwa ku baturarwanda biyongera umunsi ku munsi.
Hakwiriye kurebwa uburyo ubu bwiyongere bw’abaturage butahutaza urwego rw’ubuhinzi mu Rwanda. Mu ngamba abantu barebaho neza harimo ko:Intara y’Amajyepfo ari yo yakwakira cyane ibikorwa by’amajyambere birimo inganda, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’ibindi. Hakwiye gushyiraho umurwa mukuru w’ubucuruzi hagati ya Muhanga na Ruhango kugira ngo ukurure abantu benshi.
Birakwiye ko ahazajya ibikorwa by’amajyambere n’imiturire hategurwa neza igishushanyo mbonera cy’imikoreshereze y’ubutaka; gutuza abantu mu buryo bugezweho kandi bitwara ubuso buto bushoboka no kugabanya cyane umuvuduko w’ubwiyongere mu turere tw’igihugu dufatwa nk’igigega (akarere k’ibirunga, Intara y’Iburasirazuba).
Kubera iki imiturire n’inganda byagenerwa Intara y’Amajyepfo?
Igice kinini cy’Intara y’Amajyepfo ntabwo kiberanye n’ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi kuko gifite ubutaka busharira. Ikindi kandi niho hagarara udusozi tuberanye n’imiturire. Aho iyi ntara iherereye byoroshye guhahirana n’izindi ntara n’umujyi wa Kigali.
Ibi birashoboka kuko u Rwanda ari igihugu gito kandi gifite abaturage benshi. Bityo rero hakwiriye kujyaho ingamba zikomeye zinoza imiturire ndetse zikabungabunga ubutaka bwera cyangwa bugaragaza ko bwatanga umusururo kugira ngo n’abazabaho kera bazabone amahirwe abariho ubu bafite.
Icya kabiri, igihugu kimaze kugira ibikorwa remezo twavuga nk’imihanda n’ibindi bituma ubuhahirane bworoha kandi bushoboka mu gihugu hose. Bikaba rero byakoroha cyane gushyira agace k’inganda ahantu hamwe ndetse hagati aho umusaruro ushobora kuva mu bice byose by’igihugu bikagera aho bitunganirizwa bitarangirika.
Ibi kandi byagabanya cyane igihombo kigenda kigaragara mu nganda zigenda zubakwa hirya no hino kandi nta musaruro uhagije wo gutunganya zifite.
Icya gatatu ni uko umubare w’abantu batuye ahantu h’imisozi miremire kandi hashyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga wagenda utuzwa mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo. Nk’ubu politiki y’imikoreshereje y’ubutaka (Rwanda Land policy) igaragaza ko Intara y’Amajyaruguru ndetse n’Uburengerazuba zifite abaturage benshi batuye mu manegeka kandi badafite aho bimurirwa habashyira mu mutekano.
Karimba Yannick/Umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda
Muve kuri The Guardian, vuba isi izamenya ukuri ku icengezamatwara rya Michela Wrong.
Niba Michela Wrong yari yizeye ko igitabo cye giheruka kizahindura uko Isi ifata u Rwanda, bisa nk’aho uruzinduko rwa Perezida Macron rwamubereye kidobya.
Inkuru ya Wrong ivuga ko “Isi iri kugenda ihumuka gahoro gahoro ku bijyanye n’ibikorwa by’indengakamere bya Perezida Kagame mu Rwanda”, ntisobanura neza “Isi” yashakaga kuvuga iyo ari yo. Ikinyamakuru The Guardian ni umufatanyacyaha kuko nta buryo inkuru yitwa ko ishingiye ku kuri yari kugaragara nk’igamije gutwerera Isi yose isura mbi Wrong afite ku Rwanda. Ibi nibyo mu mvugo iboneye, umuntu ashobora kwita akazi k’icengezamatwara.
Icya mbere, Wrong akunze gukoresha abantu bo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi atavuga amazina kugira ngo agaragaze ibyo avuga nk’ibifite ireme. Hari ngo abadipolomate bo mu Burayi atavuga amazina, abasesenguzi n’abakora muri gahunda z’iterambere bose batifuza ko imyirondoro yabo ijya hanze ku mpamvu umwanditsi azi wenyine.
Ariko umuntu ashingiye ku rwango Wrong afitiye ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, ashobora kuvuga ko aba bantu atari ugushaka kutavuga umwirondoro wabo ahubwo ko batabaho. Atabifashishije aka kazi k’icengezamatwara ke ntikagerwaho cyane ko muri aba avuga abazwi ari babiri gusa.
Umwe ni Gerard Prunier, Umunyamakuru w’Umufaransa wagaragaje uruhare rutaziguye muri gahunda y’agatsiko yo guhirika Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu 1998 mu gitabo yise “Africa’s World War”.
Uwa kabiri ni David Himbara, umwiyemezi umara igihe cye kinini kuri internet asebya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Wrong byamusabye guhimba abasesenguzi batazwi, abadipolomate b’i Burayi n’abakozi muri gahunda z’iterambere kugira ngo atange ishusho y’uko hari abantu benshi bari hanze y’agatsiko gasanzwe gasebya u Rwanda bashyigikiye ibitekerezo bye ndetse bakaba batangiye “guhumuka amaso” ku mateka n’ibindi byose ahimba.
Icya kabiri mu nyungu ze agerageza gukoresha amoko agamije kugwiza umubare w’abanga u Rwanda.
“Kuba abenshi mu bahigwa n’ubutegetsi atari Abahutu ari na bo benshi ahubwo akaba ari abo mu bwoko bwa Kagame bw’Abatutsi ari nabo bake- Aho abenshi muri bo bahoze ari abizerwa na byo byatewe imboni n’abo mu Burengerazuba bw’isi.” Ibi nibyo Wrong avuga, aho anahishura mu byukuri icyo aba ashatse kuvuga iyo avuze ‘Isi’. Birumvikana ko niba Isi igarukira ku bo mu Burengerezuba bw’Isi, mu bigaragara Perezida Macron, Umuyobozi wo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi ntiyaba ari mu mujyo w’ibyo Wrong ashaka.
Hejuru y’ibyo, kuba Wrong afata ivanguramoko yifitiye ryimakaza ibitekerezo bya Hutu-Power nk’uko byagaragajwe n’umunyamakuru w’Umwongereza ukora inkuru zicukumbuye, Linda Melvern akaritwerera u Rwanda ni ibintu byamaze gutahurwa mu Rwanda.
Yego nibyo, Diane Rwigara, Kizito Mihigo, Kayumba Nyamwasa na Patrick Karegeya bagaragazwa neza na Wrong mu gitabo cye, bose bagejejwe imbere y’inkiko z’u Rwanda. Bose uretse Diane Rwigara bahamijwe ibyaha kandi nk’uko bigomba kugenda no mu kindi gihugu cyose kigendera ku mategeko, ubwoko bwabo nta mwanya bwari bufite mu rukiko.
Ku bijyanye n’ibyo yavuze byo kugerageza kwivugana bamwe muri abo, turacyategereje ko Wrong atanga ibimenyetso bishinja Guverinoma y’u Rwanda. Kugeza ubu ni ikirego kimwe kiza gikurikira ikindi kandi byose bidafite ishingiro. Kandi The Guardian ifatwa nk’ikinyamakuru cyakabaye cyizerwa, isa n’aho idashaka kumubaza ibyo akora.
Icya gatatu, mu buryo buhoraho hari ugukomeza guhirikira kuri RPF amahano yabereye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Ariko Wrong ntashobora kugereka ikosa ku Rwanda atabishyize mu mboni z’amoko yamusaritse. Urugero ku bijyanye n’impunzi zari zarafashwe bugwate n’abasize bakoze Jenoside mu nkambi zo muri Congo, Wrong yasubiyemo amagambo ya Gerard Prunier agira ati “Ushobora kwica ibihumbi amagana ntibigire ingaruka zikomeye ku rwego mpuzamahanga, ariko ugufunga umubyeyi ushaka, bigahindura by’iteka ryose uburyo ibihugu by’inshuti byakubonaga.”
Kuba Wrong na Prunier bahabwa urubuga rwo kugoreka ibyabaye mu mateka, bigaragaza ko Isi yabo igifite ibibazo. Imyaka 27 ntihagije kugira ngo umuntu yibagirwe uko iyo “Si” yirengagije ubwo Abatutsi barenga miliyoni bicwaga. Iyi Si niyo yirengagije ubwo abakoze Jenoside bongeraga guhabwa intwaro muri izo nkambi bagatangira kugaba ibitero ku Rwanda bafite intego yo kurangiza akazi bari baratangiye.
Wrong atekereza ko ari u Rwanda rukwiye kugerekwaho amakosa y’imfu zabayeho muri gahunda yo gusenya inkambi z’impunzi aho abantu bari baragizwe ingabo ikingira abakoze Jenoside bari bari mu mugambi wo kwishyira hamwe ngo basoze Jenoside batangiye, aho kuba Isi ye n’abakoze Jenoside yakingiye ikibaba kugeza n’uyu munsi ibarinda ubutabera.
Ariko tuzi neza igikwiye gukorwa, sibyo ? Ubuhamya bukomeye bwa Senateri Marie-Rose Mureshyankwano ni umuburo waziye igihe w’icyo tugomba guha agaciro. Ubuhamya bwe butanga ishusho ya nyayo kandi yagutse ku byabaye muri Zaire.
Ati “Nababwiye ukuntu turi muri ayo mashyamba ya Congo, Inkotanyi zaje zigasanga umugabo wanjye yararwaye yararembye bakamufata bakamuheka, bakatugeza ku Kibuga cy’indege cya Mbandaka, bakadushyira mu ndege tugahunguka, tukagaruka hano mu Rwanda,.., inkotanyi njye ni zo zankijije ubuhutu kuko numvaga bari bunyice kubera ko ndi Umuhutu ariko zankijije ubuhutu kuko zanyeretse ubudasa.”
Ni ubu budasa Wrong ahora arwanya abinyujije mu kurebera ibintu mu ndorerwamo z’amoko, ntashobora kurebera u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda hanze y’amoko. Ariko birumvikana mu maso y’abahakana Jenoside u Rwanda rwari isibaniro y’amoko kandi niko ruzahora.
Nk’uko Perezida Kagame yabivuze mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru ubwo yari ari kumwe na mugenzi we w’u Bufaransa, “Byari byoroshye ko u Rwanda rwashoboraga kuguma ari igihugu kidafite ejo hazaza. Ndetse bamwe bashobora kuba barumvaga ibyo ari byo bikwiye. Abandi banashyize imbaraga mu kugira ngo u Rwanda rube igihugu kidafite ejo hazaza.”
Abanyarwanda bazi aho bashyira Michela Wrong muri ibyo byiciro nubwo bishobora kumusaba gukora cyane kugira ngo niba ashaka ko ibindi bihugu byiyunga kuri Guverinoma za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Bwongereza mu kugoreka amateka y’u Rwanda.
Twamenyereye amasomo duhabwa mu bijyanye n’uburenganzira bwa muntu ndetse dushobora kuyakira bitworoheye. Ariko nta gihugu kiba cy’igihangage ku buryo bigiha ubushobozi bwo guhindura ukuri kuri mu mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Uruzinduko rwa Perezida Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda: Ubutwari ntagereranywa.
Uruzinduko rwa Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda ni imbarutso y’umubano mushya hagati y’ibihugu byombi ndetse n’ibya Afurika bihuriye ku rurimi rw’Igifaransa. Ni impano itanga icyizere ku rubyiruko rw’impande zombi ko imbere harwo hari icyezezi cy’urumuri cyari cyarafunzwe n’abagome.
Ntibigira uko bisa iyo umubano hagati y’abantu cyangwa se n’ibihugu utangiriye ku kuri. Icyo kikaba aricyo Perezida Paul Kagame w’u Rwanda na Emmanuel Macron w’u Bufaransa biyemeje.
Umubano mushya w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa ushingiye ku kuri ko mu mateka. Umubano ushingiye ku bwubahane. Ibyo ndemeza ko bibaye ubwa mbere muri Afurika y’ibihugu bihuriye ku rurimi rw’Igifaransa. Ahandi hose muri iyo Afurika, witonze ukitegereza, usanga u Bufaransa ari bwo bushyiraho Umukuru w’Igihugu nyamara ngo binyuze mu matora, kandi bukaba ari nabwo bumugusha mu mutego wo kuvaho. Kandi nta na rimwe avaho neza.
Iri ni ishimwe rikomeye kuko Perezida Kagame yongeye gukora agashya muri Afurika. Abanyafurika ni bo bagomba kumenya ibibazo byabo, ndetse n’umuti ukwiye wo kubikemura kuko ak’imuhana kaza imvura ihise. Nta muntu ugomba kukwigisha uko uyobora urugo rwawe kuko atakurusha kurumenya nka nyirarwo.
Abavuga Igifaransa bumvise neza amagambo akomeye Perezida Macron yavuze. Nibaza ko abatumvise ko yasabye imbabazi, nyamara yarazisabye mu kinyabupfura, mu magambo yujuje ubuhanga, hari ibyo batari kwifuza.
Nk’umuyobozi w’igihugu, twari dutegereje ko apfukama akavuga ngo mu izina ry’igihugu nyoboye ndasaba imbabazi u Rwanda?
Mbafiteho n’ikibazo: Muribuka Guy Verhofstadt, wari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bubiligi ko yasuye u Rwanda ku wa Mutarama 2000, agasaba imbabazi mu izina ry’Ababiligi? Hakurikiyeho iki? Ntacyo, uretse kutubeshyeshya ngo baciriye imanza abahekuye u Rwanda, bagacira imanza interahamwe nazo nke zuzuyeyo. Ko abarokotse Jenoside nanjye ndimo batsinze, hari icyakurikiye? Abantu bicaranye incarubanza zaho nyamara basabye ibyo inkiko zabageneye, wabaza ikigega kibishinzwe bakakubwira ko ngo keretse icyaha cyarakorewe mu Bubiligi. Nkibaza impamvu bavuga ko baca imanza z’ibyaha bitakorewe iwabo niba ntaho bigeza ababikorewe.
Perezida Emmanuel Macron ni intwari. Ijambo yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi ku bumva Igifaransa ni iry’agaciro. Ni intsinzi ku Banyarwanda kuko uwitonze amira ibinoze.
Kwihangana no kudateshuka ku ntego kw’Abanyarwanda byabaye intwaro ikomeye kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho. Kandi ntihagire uwibeshya ko ijambo rye ryashimishije Abafaransa bose, kuko abagize uruhare mu mateka yatugejeje aha, ntibishimiye kuba yemeye icyaha cyakozwe mu izina ry’u Bufaransa, intwaro ikomeye ikaba ibendera riranga igihugu cyabo ryareshejwe agaciro. Abo rero nabo ubutabera burabategereje.
Ni yo mpamvu nsanga tudakwiye kuvuma iritararenga. Mbere ya Macron hari abandi bayoboye u Bufaransa batateye intambwe nk’iyo ateye. Nanone dutegereze ibyo yasezeranije u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda, tube turetse guca urubanza.
Dore bimwe mu byo Macron yavugiye ku Gisozi. Yatangiye avuga ati “Ijoro ribara uwariraye.’’
Ayo magambo aratwumvisha ijwi ry’abagifite igisebe cyasamye kikiri gishyashya cyo kuba bari bahari na n’ubu bagihari. Abo tutateze amatwi ububabare bwabo, mbere, mu gihe cya Jenoside ndetse na nyuma yayo kikaba gishobora kuba ari nacyo kibi kurusha ibindi.
Abarokotse, imfubyi, ngo dutege amatwi ubuhamya bwabo, umuhate, agaciro byabo ari naho tubonera ko atari umubare cyangwa amagambo, ahubwo kubera uburemere bw’ubuzima bwabo ntasimburwa bushaririye...Imbere yanyu mu cyubahiro no kwicisha bugufi, nje kwemera uruhare rwacu. Kwemera ibyabaye, ariko cyane cyane gukurikirana akazi k’ubutabera.
Abariraye bonyine ni bo baduha impano yo kutubabarira babishatse. Ntawe ukekwaho Jenoside ugomba gucika ubutabera ...Ni umwenda turimo inzirakarengane zishwe. Nyuma yo guceceka igihe kirekire, ni umwenda turimo abakiriho, dushobora, niba babitwemerera kuborohereza ububabare.
U Bufaransa bufite inshingano yo kwemera uruhare bwagize mu mateka yababaje Abanyarwanda igihe kirekire cyane no kugira ngo ukuri kutamenyekana ...Ayo magambo avuga icyiza ariko gifite izina ariryo Jenoside...Kuko ari ukubaho kwa buri wese n’indoto ze byishwe inshuro miliyoni...Jenoside ntigereranywa n’ikindi, ntacyo wabona uha umuntu ngo kiyimwibagize. Igira aho ituruka, abo yibasira, kandi igategurwa. Ikagira gahunda yo gutsemba abantu n’ubumuntu, kandi ntisibangana...Ntitubaho nyuma ya jenoside, tubana nayo. Ariko kandi u Bufaransa bwagize uruhare ndengakamere rwa politiki muri ayo mateka...
Ntabwo gahunda yacu ari uguhindura mu Kinyarwanda ijambo ryose Perezida Emmanuel Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi. Aha turifuza kumara impungenge abumva atavuze abasirikare b’Abafaransa.
Mwibuke ko ziriya komisiyo zombi [iya Duclert yashyizweho na Perezida Macron n’iyitiriwe Muse yashyizweho nu Rwanda], hari ibyo zitarabasha kubona kandi zikaba zikomeje akazi ko gushakisha uruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside.
Abanyepolitiki bakoresheje abasirikare ariko hari impapuro zarigitishijwe, ndetse na Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda mbere yo guhunga hari izo yatwitse n’izo yashwanyaguje. Ubushakashatsi buracyakomeza.
Mu gihe rero ubushakashatsi bugikomeje, ntabwo Perezida w’u Bufaransa yavuga uruhare rw’abasirikare b’igihugu cye. Nitwihangane dutegereze, tureke kuvuma iritararenga.
Ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko ni ibitekerezo bwite by’Umwanditsi w’ibitabo Mukagasana Yolande, washinze Foundation Yolande Mukagasana, Umuryango urwanya abapfobya n’abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya
Ishyano rikomeye risigaye ryaragwiriye urwa Gasabo ni ukumva umuntu wifatira mu gahanga Perezida wa Repubulika akamutuka kandi ukabona abenshi babifashe nk’ibintu bisanzwe, abandi bakabyita uburenganzira bwo kuvuga icyo umuntu atekereza n’ibindi bigayitse.
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka YouTube, Facebook, Instagram n’izindi uhasanga abantu batandukanye, yaba abiyita abanyapolitiki, impirimbanyi z’uburenganzira bwa muntu n’abandi bavuga ko bari kugaragaza ibitekerezo byabo, banenga ibitagenda mu miyoborere y’igihugu ariko ugasanga mu byo bita ibitekerezo hibanzemo kubahuka, kwibasira no gutuka Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Ubusanzwe mu muco Nyarwanda gutukana ni kirazira naho mu muco wa Gikiristu gutukana bikaba icyaha. Mu ndangagaciro z’umuco wa Kinyarwanda, buri muryango wose utoza abana gukura bubaha ariko cyane cyane bakubaha ababaruta.
Gusuzugura cyangwa kubahuka umukuru bifatwa nko kubura ikinyabupfura, akenshi bikagaragaza umwana wabuze uburere, iyo bigeze ku gutinyuka ugukuriye ukamutuka, bifatwa nk’ishyano ryaguye bikururira ubikoze guhabwa ibihano bikomeye, byagera ku gutuka umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru w’umuryango bikaba byakururira ubikoze kuvumwa no gucibwa mu muryango. Akenshi iyo umwana atutse umubyeyi we uwo mwana bakunda kumwita igikenya.
"Wubahe so na nyoko uko Uwiteka Imana yawe yagutegetse, kugira ngo uramire mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha, uboneremo ibyiza.”(Gutegeka Kwa Kabiri 5:16,18.20; Abefeso 6.2,3)
Uretse no kuba Umukuru w’Igihugu, Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari n’umuntu, ufite ibyiyumviro byose, ushobora kubabara cyangwa kwishima, gukomereka haba mu marangamutima, mu mitekerereze no mu mwuka bitewe n’amagambo mabi cyangwa ibitutsi bamutuka. Ni umuntu ufite ubumuntu kandi ufite uburenganzira n’amategeko amurengera nk’undi mwenegihugu wese.
Ikigeretse kuri ibyo kandi Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari umubyeyi mu buryo bubiri. Ubwa mbere ni umubyeyi, ufite umuryango we bwite, ufite abana n’abamukomokaho bagomba kubahwa kandi bakarindwa gukomeretswa mu marangamutima n’ibitutsi bitukwa umubyeyi wabo. Nk’abandi bana bose, ab’Umukuru w’Igihugu bakeneye kubona umubyeyi wabo yubashywe nk’abandi babyeyi bose.
Ubwa kabiri, Umukuru w’Igihugu ni umubyeyi w’abenegihugu mu maso y’abandi baturage b’ibindi bihugu. Abenegihugu hose burya baba bagize umuryango mugari w’abatuye igihugu runaka, ni yo mpamvu itegeko rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda rigaruka ku ijambo rivuga ngo umuryango Nyarwanda, ni ukuvuga ko umuryango Nyarwanda ugizwe n’Abanyarwanda bose kandi nta muryango utagira umubyeyi, uyu muryango Nyarwanda burya umubyeyi uba ufite ni Perezida wa Repubulika.
Abana bagize umuryango Nyarwanda, bafite inshingano zo kubaha no kubahisha umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru w’uyu muryango, bakwiye kubabazwa n’umuntu wese umwubahutse akamutuka, akamuvuga nabi ndetse bafite inshingano zo kumurinda no kugaragariza umuntu wese umututse ko batishimiye ko abatukiye umubyeyi.
Mu mategeko icumi Imana yahaye umuryango w’inyokomuntu ibicishije mu kuyabwira umuryango wa Israel harimo itegeko rikomeye risaba umwana wese kubaha umubyeyi kandi rigaragaza n’inyungu uzabikora azabona. Izo nyungu ni "ukuramira mu gihugu no kukibamo unezerewe" bivuze ko uwishe iri tegeko agerwaho n’ingaruka zo kutumvira no kutubaha arizo "gukenyuka no kuba mu gihugu utanezerewe".
Itegeko ry’Imana ni ihame riba rigomba kubahirizwa uryubahirije akabona umugisha uryishe akabona umuvumo. Kutubaha umubyeyi bizana umuvumo wo gukenyuka, kubaho utishimye ni yo mpamvu iyi nyandiko yacu twayihaye umutwe ugira uti "gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya."
Uretse kandi Perezida wa Repubulika n’umubyeyi ukubyara, Imana isaba umuntu wese kubaha umuntu umukuriye. Bibiliya mu Gitabo cy’Abalewi 19:32 hagira hati "Ujye uhagurukira umeze imvi, wubahe umusaza, utinye Imana yawe. Ndi Uwiteka. "Ni inshingano z’abakiri bato kubaha abakuru kandi n’abakuru na bo bafite inshingano zo kudasharirira abato nk’uko Intumwa Pawulo yabyandikiye Itorero rya Efeso agira ati "1 Bana, mujye mwumvira ababyeyi banyu mu Mwami wacu, kuko ari byo bibakwiriye. Wubahe so na nyoko (iryo ni ryo tegeko rya mbere ririmo isezerano), kugira ngo ubone amahoro uramire mu isi. Namwe ba se ntimugasharirire abana banyu, ahubwo mubarere mubahana, mubigisha iby’Umwami wacu.” (Abefeso 6:1;4).
Iyo urebye ibyo ijambo ry’Imana rimaze kutubwira mu bitabo dusomye, ukareba n’ibikorwa muri ino minsi uhita usobanukirwa impamvu yo gukenyuka mu buryo butandukanye mu rubyiruko no kubaho abenshi bashaririwe n’ubuzima. Abana benshi ntibacyubaha abakuru, ugera mu modoka ugasanga umwana aricaye na ecouteur mu matwi, umusaza w’imvi z’uruyenzi ahagaze, umwana akaba atamwimukira, ku murongo ahatangirwa serivisi zitandukanye usanga urubyiruko rubyigana n’abasaza n’ibindi ariko kubaha abadukuriye ni ihame kandi ni itegeko ry’Imana riduha umugisha wo kurama no kubaho twishimye.
Biratangaza, birababaza kandi bitera kwibaza byinshi, aho ubona umuntu wiyita umukirisitu, umukozi w’Imana afata Bibiliya akayihisha inyuma, undi akihisha mu mwambaro uriho umusaraba cyangwa ikanzu y’abihaye Imana, akifatira Perezida wa Repubulika mu gahanga akamutuka akamwandagaza, cyangwa agahamagarira abantu kwigomeko no kwigumura ku mabwiriza y’ubuyobozi bukuru bw’igihugu kandi abandi bakirisitu na bo bakabireba cyangwa bakabyumva bagaceceka bakumva ntacyo bitwaye ariko ibi ni ishyano ryagwiriye igihugu cyacu kandi rikizanamo umwuka wo gukenyuka no kubaho abantu batishimye.
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero ry’i Roma, yahuguriye abakirisitu baho kubaha ubuyobozi, ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse n’ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi.
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo, ati "Umuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara, kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana n’abatware bariho bashyizweho n’Imana. Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko ry’Imana, kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa n’urubanza. Abatware si abo gutinywa n’abakora ibyiza, keretse abakora nabi. Mbese ushaka kudatinya umutware? Kora neza na we azagushima, kuko ari umukozi w’Imana uguhesha ibyiza. Ariko nukora nabi utinye, kuko adatwarira inkota ubusa. Ni umukozi w’Imana, uhoresha umujinya ukora nabi." (Abaroma 13:1;4). Aya magambo Pawulo yabwiye abaroma tuzayagarukaho mu gice cya kabiri cy’iyi nyandiko.
Umuntu wese akwiye kwirinda gusuzugura, gutuka umukuriye by’umwihariko Perezida wa Repubulika. Urubyiruko by’umwihariko, dukwiye kwirinda kugwa mu mutego w’abanyapolitiki, abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye bagambiriye kubabibamo umwuka wo kwigomeka no gutuka ababyeyi banyu, kuko kwifatanya nabo bituzanira umuvumo wo gukenyuka no kubaho tutishimiye ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko ijambo ry’Imana ritubwira ko nitwemera tukumvira tuzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko nitwanga tukagoma inkota izaturya.
Mu gice cya kabiri tuzarebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye, ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye (umututse), kubabyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange.
"Nimwemera mukumvira muzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu. Ariko nimwanga mukagoma inkota izabarya", kuko akanwa k’Uwiteka ari ko kabivuze." (Yesaya 1:19-20)
Gutanga igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha ni ukwirahuriraho umuriro.
Kuva kera buri Munyarwanda yatozwaga kwimana igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha, kurengera igihugu n’abagituye, agaharanira ko u Rwanda rugira ijambo, rugasumbya icyubahiro n’ishema ibindi bihugu. Abanyarwanda batozwaga kubaha no gusigasira indangagaciro, bakimika umuco wa kirazira.
Abanyarwanda batozwaga kandi no kubumbatira ubumwe, bakarengera ubusugire bw’umuryango wo shingiro ryo kuramuka kw’igihugu.
Uwahemukiraga umuryango yahamagazwaga muri gacaca, agakubitwa icyuhagiro kugira ngo asubire mu muryango agarukanye umutima w’Igihugu, uwinangiraga umutima, yafatwaga nk’umubisha, ntahabwe ijambo na gato, ntagere mu gitaramo cy’abahizi. Guhezwa mu gitaramo cyari igihano gikomeye kubera ko byarakugoraga kuzagabana nk’abandi.
U Rwanda rwubatswe kandi rwagurwa n’ubutwari, aho buri wese yaharaniraga kutagaragarwaho n’ubugwari. Ingabo ku rugamba zaharaniraga kudatanga igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha.
Mu 1924, abakoloni bakuyeho Itorero ry’Igihugu ryari irerero ryatozaga imico myiza n’imyifatire myiza mu bantu. Gusenya ibikorwa by’Itorero byatumye Abanyarwanda bacika igikuba, maze uburere n’ikinyabupfura bikomwa mu nkokora n’imigirire mburamumaro y’imico mibi mvamahanga. Abakoloni bakuyemo Abanyarwanda umutima w’Igihugu bityo bareka ubuntu n’Ubunyarwanda bupfunditse ku bumwe bwabo.
Muri iki gihe hari abacurira u Rwanda urwango
Hari abamaze kugurana urukundo rw’Igihugu indamu n’inda nini, ubugome no kubura ubupfura, bashyira imbere inabi ngo imunge ineza. Ibyari ukurengera inyungu z’igihugu, ba mpemuke ndamuke bamaze kubigurana kurusebya mu mahanga ngo bihungabanye umubano mwiza u Rwanda rufitanye n’inshuti z’amahanga. Aho bageze kwifuza ko u Rwanda rwakomanyirizwa n’amahanga, ngo ubuhahirane n’ubufatanye mu bikorwa by’iterambere bicube.
Iyi myitwarire ikomeje kugaragara ku bacumuye ku Rwanda, bakabura umutima wo gusaba imbabazi. Harimo abasize boretse u Rwanda, bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, inshuti zabo n’ababakomokaho bayobotse umurongo mubi wo gushaka kurimbura u Rwanda. Hari n’abanyamahanga batifuriza u Rwanda ineza kubera urwango barufitiye. Harimo abashinjwa ibyaha bitandukanye, harimo no kumunga umutungo w’igihugu. Aba bose bakurikiranwa n’ubutabera bw’u Rwanda. Ntibifuriza u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda ituze n’iterambere.
Bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambanga aho bahimba ibinyoma no gukabya inkuru, bagamije gushyira icyasha ku Rwanda. Bagaragaza ko u Rwanda rutubahiriza amahame y’uburenganzira bwa muntu, aho bafata abakoze ibyaha bakabandikaho inkuru nziza zigamije kubambika ibyera, bagamije kwerekana ko u Rwanda rubarenganya, nyamara barakoze ibyaha ku manywa y’ihangu.
Ibi byongeye kugaragara cyane, ubwo u Rwanda rwitegura kwakira Inama y’Ibihugu bihuriye mu Muryango wa “Commonwealth”, hagaragaye bamwe mu Banyarwanda bavuga ko batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, basabaga u Bwongereza buyobora iyi nama ku rwego, kutemera ko iyi nama yabera mu Rwanda.
Ubusanzwe iyi nama ikaba igomba gusiga Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bwa “Common Wealth” bukorera mu Rwanda, muri manda y’imyaka ibiri. U Rwanda rukaba rwiteguye gukuramo amahirwe aganisha igihugu mu iterambere rusange Abanyarwanda bakarushaho kunguka uburyo bwo gukora ibikorwa by’ishoramari muri uyu muryango.
Harimo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda mu ruhando rw’amahanga ku buryo abashoramari bashora imari mu Rwanda, Abanyarwanda bakabona imirimo, bakaronka amafaranga azamura iterambere ry’imiryango yabo n’igihugu.
Hagaragaye abiyita abanyapolitiki n’abanyamakuru, bishimira ko iyi nama isubitswe, bamwe bakavuga ko nta kazi bazaba bafitemo, ko kandi nta n’inshuti cyangwa bene wabo bafitemo akazi. Ibi bigaragaza ko aba biyitirira kutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, ari abanzi b’u Rwanda, batarwifuriza iterambere n’ituze.
Ni icyaha cy’ubugome gutanga igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha
Iyo uvutse mu gihugu uba uhanye igihango na cyo, kukigambanira aba ari ugutatira igihango. Ni ubugwari kwifatira ku gahanga igihugu cyakubyaye. Kuva u Rwanda rwabaho, cyari icyaha gutanga igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha no gukora igikorwa cyashyira igihugu mu kaga.
Itegeko Ngenga ryo ku wa 14 Kamena 2012, mu ngingo zaryo 461 kugeza ku ngingo ya 469, by’umwihariko muri iyi ngingo ya 461, risobanura iby’icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa Perezida wa Repubulika, rigateganya n’ibihano byacyo.
Rigira riti “ukora icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa cyo kubuhirika akoresheje intambara cyangwa izindi mbaraga zose; ukora, muri iyo migambi ivugwa mu gaka ka 1º k’iki gika, icyaha kigamije kugirira nabi Perezida wa Repubulika; ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu”.
Aha twibutse kandi ko aba ahemukiye Abanyarwanda kubera ko ubutegetsi ari ubwabo nk’uko biteganywa n’Itegeko Nshinga mu ngingo yaryo ya mbere: “Ubutegetsi bwose bukomoka ku Banyarwanda kandi bugakoreshwa hakurikijwe ibiteganywa n’iri Tegeko Nshinga”.
Uyu ni umurage dukomora ku bakurambere bitanze bagahanga u Rwanda. Kirazira kugaba igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha.
Abanyarwanda dukwiye kuba umwe mu kurengera ubusugire bw’u Rwanda. Ku Ngoma y’Umwami Cyilima II Rujugira, watwaye u Rwanda guhera mu 1675 kugeza 1708, rubanda rwarengeye u Rwanda bikomeye, ubwo u Burundi, u Bugesera, i Gisaka n’i Ndorwa, bagambiriraga kugiria nabi u Rwanda. Kubera icyo gikorwa yafatanyije na rubanda rwamwumviye bagahigika ibihugu bine bikomeye, ni bwo hadutse imvugo igira iti “U Rwanda ruratera, ntiruterwa”.
Abashaka kwirenza igihugu baca muri rubanda, kandi akaba ari na rwo rugerwaho n’ingaruka kurusha abarushoye mu mwiryane, dore ko bo baba barinzwe kandi bafite n’uburyo bwo guhunga ako kaga bashoje.
Kudatanga igihugu mu maboko y’ababisha, ni ukutemera ko kijyaho icyasha, ukakirwanira ishyaka mu Rwanda no mu mahanga. Abakoresha inzira ya politiki n’itangazamakuru basebya u Rwanda, bamenye ko barimo gutatira igihango, bateranya rubanda n’igihugu, dore ko abenshi bakora politiki n’itangazamakuru binyuranye n’amategeko. Igihango kizabasama.
Perezida Ndayishimiye yahawe urw’amenyo kubera kwita Museveni ’Umubyeyi w’u Burundi’
Ubuhamya bwo kurokoka kwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia n’igihango afitanye n’Inkotanyi
“Ndazivuga imyato kuko Inkotanyi ni ubuzima”, ni umutwe w’ubuhamya bwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia wavukiye i Nyamata mu Bugesera bugaruka ku buryo yarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ku wa 14 Gicurasi 2021, imyaka yari ibaye 27 ndokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ndokowe n’Inkotanyi. Kuri njye uyu munsi nywufata nk’uw’umuzuko.
Ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda 1990 rwatangiraga nari nkiri muto. Icyo gihe rero sinasobanukiwe neza ibyabaye.
Umugambi w’Interahamwe wari warateguwe kuva kera. Ndibuka mu 1992 iwacu mu Bugesera habaye igerageza rya Jenoside icyo gihe mu rugo baradusenyeye baradusahura turara twiruka tugana ku mashuri i Nyamata.
Iwacu bahageze ndi mu rwogero, uko nasohotse, ni ko nahunze ntambaye. Icyo gihe abaturanyi bamwe baricwa. Sinjya nibagirwa umubyeyi witwaga Josephine twari duturanye, wishwe icyo gihe.
Iwacu bari barize ndetse baranakoraga batangiye ubuzima bundi bushya ndetse biranaduhira ubuzima burakomeza. Icyo gihe nari mfite imyaka itandatu, nde ni bwo natangiye kumenya ko Abatutsi bicwa n’ubwo nta mubyeyi washoboraga gusobanurira abana neza ibyo ari byo.
Mu buhemu bwinshi, urwango ndetse n’ubugome, bateguye kumara icyitwa Umututsi wese mu Rwanda ku buryo umwaka wa 1994 waje ari rurangiza ndetse sinatinya kuvuga ko abakoze cyangwa abateguye Jenoside bari bazi ko ari imperuka ariko si bo Mana.
Ku wa 6 Mata 1994 ubwo indege yarimo Perezida Habyarimana Juvénal yaraswaga ntitwahise tubimenya ako kanya gusa uko amasaha yakomezaga gukura bigeze nko mu masaa Sita z’ijoro ku muhanda twumvise urusaku. Icyo gihe umubyeyi wanjye yarabyutse ajya ku idirishya ngo amenye ikibaye yumva bari kuvuga ngo ni ukubahumbahumba bose dore uko bigenje ako kanya yahise akoma agatima ku byabaye mu 1992.
Niko kwihutira gufungura radio ahita yumva itangazo ko Kinani yapfuye birumvikana nk’umuntu mukuru yahise abona ko ibyacu birangiye yatekerezaga ko bucya bamaze kutwica! Yaratubyukije atubwira ibyabaye.
Imfura y’iwacu iramubwira ngo imperuka y’Abatutsi irageze, iryo niryo ryasigaye mu matwi yanjye.
Twatangiye kwambara nk’abiteguye guhunga, amapantaro dushyiramo. Mama yafashe amafaranga make aca ikabutura z’abakuru ayashyiramo aradoda aratubwira ati "wenda ntazabura aho abafasha, wenda yazabarengera aho nzaba ntakiri kumwe namwe".
Bugicya Mama yatwohereje kwa musaza we ku musozi wa Nyiramatuntu [Nyamata] we arasigara ajya ku muyobozi w’ishuri twigagaho kuko umugore we bari inshuti, yibwira ko ahari bazamuhisha. Bwarakeye umugore aramwegera aramubwira ati "mvira aha ugende sinshaka kubona intumbi yawe hano umugabo yambwiye ko bakwica uri ku rutonde rw’abantu bagomba guherwaho".
Ni bwo yashatse uko ahava aza adusanga ku musozi twariho. Twari ku musozi utuyeho Abatutsi benshi kandi basanzwe bazi kwirwanaho, bumvaga bari buhuze imbaraga bagatsinda.
Ariko amazi ntiyari ya yandi n’ubwo bagerageje uko bashoboye bagakoresha ingabo, amabuye n’amacumu byarangiye Interahamwe zivanze n’abasirikare ziturushije imbaraga turatsindwa, abantu bacu bakwira imishwaro.
Ubwo urugamba rwari rurimbanyije i Nyamata grenade zaraye zituragurika, twakwiye imishwaro turiruka, twirirwa tugenda mu ntege nke z’abana n’ababyeyi, tugera ku musozi wa Ntarama ahagana saa Kumi.
Umusozi wa Nyiramatuntu twari tuwitegeye wose wari wahindutse umuyonga bari gutwika inzu, inka ziruka tubona ko akacu koko kashobotse.
Twaraye aho, bukeye baravuga ngo dukomeze twambuke tujye ku Mugina wenda ahari byasaga nko kubunza umutima tuti ahari hariya ho nta kizahaba wasanga ari mu Bugesera gusa.
Sinari nzi ko umuntu yarara mu gihuru iminsi itatu igashira, sinari nzi ko umuntu yaburara ndetse akanabwirirwa iminsi igashira, indi igataha. Navuye mu Bugesera n’amaguru ngera ku Mugina.
Twambutse Akanyaru dusanga Interahamwe ziradutegereje zitwambura ibyo dufite tugenda imbokoboko, gusa bo bari bataratangira kwica kubera ko Burugumesitiri wabo yari yabibujije ibikorwa byose by’ubwicanyi.
Twashyikiye ku mashuri. Ntibyatinze rero batangiye kwiremamo udutero bakaza ariko burugumesitiri agategeka abapolisi kubihagarika. Twaje kuva aho twerekera ku kiliziya, tutarahagera igitero cyaraje tugihungira ku ivuriro ryari aho hafi ariko batumishamo amasasu.
Twaraye dushatse uko twinjira mu kiliziya yo ku Mugina. Bwaracyeye igitero kiraza, abakuru bari muri twe birwanaho bagisubiza inyuma, ariko si ko byakomeje kuko Interahamwe zo muri Ntongwe, abasirikare n’impunzi z’Abarundi zabaga mu nkambi baje ari igitero simusiga. Ariko byakozwe babanje gutumaho Burugumesitiri baramwica.
Icyo gihe abantu birwanyeho ariko biranga biba iby’ubusa baraza batemagura abari hanze abarimo imbere bakajya bateramo amagrenades bamishamo n’amasasu uwo rifashe agapfa.
Iryo joro baraye baturaririye, bukeye akazi kabo karakomeza baca inzugi barinjira baratemagura. Bamaze kunanirwa baradusohora bashyira abagabo ukwabo n’abagore ukwabo ngo bagiye kudushakira uko twajya i Kabgayi. Ariko si ko byagenze, abagabo babatemaguye tureba abagore n’abana baradushorera batujyana ku Akanyaru.
Twamanutse ku Mugezi w’Akanyaru badukomera, maze bagafata abagore n’abakobwa bakuze bakabambura ubusa babafata ku ngufu, amaso yanjye yabonye ibyo atakagombye kubona.
Aho ni ho mukuru wanjye Liliane yatanze amafaranga ngo batwambutse, tugira amahirwe tubasha kugaruka i Ntarama. Kubera amagrenade baduteraga tukiri mu kiliziya umubyeyi wanjye za "fragments" zari zamufashe mu maso no ku maboko yacitse ibisebe. Yasaga nk’uwamaze kwakira urupfu ategereje isaha ye.
Ntibyatinze rero haje kuza igitero simusiga ku wa 30 Mata 1994, maze batwiraramo baratemagura. Ni bwo bishe mama umbyara ndetse na mukuru wanjye twakundanaga cyane. Icyo gihe twari kumwe na murumuna wanjye wari muto kuko we yaronkaga ndetse na mukuru wanjye nakurikiraga wari wihishe ahatandukanye natwe gato.
Icyo gihe Interahamwe zaratuvumbuye mu rufunzo ziturasa amasasu menshi abo twari kumwe aho ni njye wavuyemo ndi muzima na murumuna wanjye waviriranaga kuko bari bamurashe ari mu gituza cya mama. Njye baranyegereye ngo banteme, umugabo witwa Gasharankwanzi twari duturanye abonye ko abandi byarangiye aravuga "tugende dukomeze", uwo munsi ndokoka ntyo.
Ng’uko uko banyiciye mu maso abanjye nta cyaha bakoze. Ni bwo natangiye kwitwa imfubyi. Icyambabaje kurushaho ndetse gihora kinshengura umutima ni uko ntashoboye kubashyingura kuko isayo yabamize.
Nyuma y’aho ubuzima bwaranze dusigara twumva gupfa biturutira kubaho, ubuzima nari naravukiyemo sinari nzi ngo ibyo kurya biva he babishaka bate ku myaka umunani uwabwira umwana ngo natangire yibesheho anihishe atazi umuhiga ngo ni uwuhe byari bikomeye.
Uwo nakurikiraga yari afite imyaka 13 ni we wabaye mama, aba na Papa, mbese yabaye byose. Yabaga ahetse murumuna wanjye wari wararasiwe mu gituza cya Mama. Igisebe cye gitangira kubora kugera n’aho tubona ko umwana agiye kudupfira mu ntoki kuko nta n’icyo kurya twabonaga cyo kumuha.
Uko rero Inkotanyi zagendaga zirwana n’abicanyi ari na ko zirokora abo zisanze bagihumeka, ubundi zikagira abo zitesha abicanyi bakirimo akuka, ni ko natwe twagiye kumva twumva ngo Inkotanyi zaje.
Twari mu rufunzo rw’ i Cyugaro muri Ntarama, twumva kurokoka ari nk’inzozi, aho icyo wakwita kubaho twumvaga ari nko kubonekerwa. Kubona Inkotanyi ni wo munezero twabonye uruta iyindi.
Mbega umunezero mbega amarira y’ibyishimo mbega kwiruhutsa ubwo twabakubitaga amaso. Batubwiraga bati muhumure ntabwo mugipfuye.
Inkotanyi zaje zivura inkomere harimo na murumuna wanjye. Njye ndibuka no kugenda byari byanze batwuriza imodoka njye na murumuna wanjye. Tugeze i Nyamata baturamije amata ubuzima burongera buragaruka. Twageze iwacu dusanga inzu yacu Interahamwe zarayitwitse. Inkotanyi zaratugaburiye twari dushonje, zahetse abana bateshejwe ababyeyi, zaduhaye aho kuba, zivura indembe n’inkomere, zidushakira icyo kwambara, mbese zakoze akazi kuzuyemo ibitangaza n’ubumuntu bwinshi.
Ese ubu umuntu yazishimira ate ubundi? NKOTANYI mwarakozeee. Babyeyi batwibarutse, za NKOTANYI mwakundaga zaduhaye UBUZIMA. Zarakoze kundokora urupfu zo kabyara, zo gaheka!
Ndashimira Inkotanyi cyane zirangajwe imbere na Perezida Paul Kagame, bakoze uko bashoboye ngo turokoke Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abajenosideri n’abimitse ingengabitekerezo y’amacakubiri nibirindwe nk’icyorezo cyica.
U Rwanda ni igihugu gifite amahoro asesuye akaba ikiguzi kinini cyishyuwe n’abari urubyiruko. U Rwanda rworetswe n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ivangura n’amacakubiri. Ingabo zari iza RPA zibohora u Rwanda, zihagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi mu 1994, u Rwanda rwongera gutahwamo ituze n’umutima w’u Rwanda wunga bene rwo.
Ntawe ukwiye kwifatanya n’abishoye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Mu Rwanda, urubyiruko ruri hejuru ya 60%, nirwo rwibasirwa cyane n’abashaka kuyobya intekerezo zabo cyane ko nabo bazi ko ari amaboko y’igihugu.
Ni ejo h’u Rwanda, ni amizero yo kuramuka kwarwo, ni abayobozi b’uyu munsi n’ejo, ni ababyeyi b’u Rwanda, bakaba inkingi ya mwamba yarwo. Ni mbaraga z’u Rwanda, nibo bazabazwa u Rwanda.
Mu buzima ntawe utagira ikimwaro iyo atsinzwe, yewe n’iyo ibyo atsinzwemo byari bibi, azongwa n’ikimwaro. Ni yo mpamvu n’abahekuye u Rwanda, ubwo bishoroga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bifuza kugira uwo basangira icyo cyaha cy’indengakamere.
Abakoze jenoside umubare munini bari urubyiruko, bimitse ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside n’amacakubiri, maze mu 1994 bishora muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ubu abo bose buzuye ikimwaro kimunga intekerezo zabo aho bari hose.
Iki kimwaro cyuzuye igisebo, bagiterwa n’uko bishoye mu migambi mibisha, batsindwa n’Inkotanyi zari mu Ngabo za RPA, zari zishamikiye ku Muryango wa FPR, kandi bari urubyiruko nkabo gusa bo bafite icyerekezo kizima na gahunda ihamye yo kubaka Igihugu.
Inkotanyi zabatsinze, zashyizeho inzego n’ubuyobozi buhamye, zikuraho ubutegetsi bubi. Ubwo bagarukaga ari abacengezi, mu gihe gito basanze Abanyarwanda basobetse ubumwe, maze batsindwa burundu, bajyana n’ingengabitekerezo y’amacakubiri na jenoside. Iyi niyo soko y’ikimwaro gikabije interahamwe n’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bahorana.
Abakoze Jenoside n’ababafasha bafite ikimwaro, intekerezo zicuramye zubakiye ku ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’amacakubiri ziracyimitswe ziracyaganje muri bo. Baracyari abagaragu ba Hutu power, aho abahezanguni biyumvamo ubuhutu, bumva ko ari bo batura mu Rwanda bonyine kandi bakaruturamo nta Mututsi ururimo.
Iyi ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’amacakubiri ikomeje kuboneka muri bamwe mu Banyarwanda baba mu mahanga, harimo abakizererezwa n’ikinyoma cy’uko mu Rwanda nta mahoro ahari, ababaye mu muhanga ku bwo gushakira indamu n’indonke mu kwiyita impunzi za politike n’abakomeje kwihisha ubutabera kubera ko bavuye mu Rwanda baruhekuye.
Aha harimo kandi n’abakomoka ku bagize urahare muri Jenoside, bakoreshwa na bene wabo ndetse n’ababyeyi babo kugira ngo bakomeze bahakane, banapfobye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abakoze Jenoside buzuye ikimwaro. Imigambi mibisha yabo yo gushyira mu bikorwa ingengabitekerezo ya “Hutu Power” yaratsinzwe kubera ko Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside, maze zigarura u Rwanda interahamwe zari zimaze kugira itongo.
Interahamwe zatwaye Abanyarwanda mu nkambi zo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, zibafata bugwate, mu 1996, Ingabo z’u Rwanda zabohoje izo mpunzi maze zigarurwa mu Rwanda, zituzwa mu gihugu cyunga Abanyarwanda, cyifashishije Politike y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge ya Leta y’Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda.
Guhera muri Nyakanga 1994, abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, bakurikiranywe n’amategeko y’u Rwanda n’amategeko mpuzamahanga, abatarafunzwe, bihishe mu mahanga, abandi baba mu mashyamba ya Congo, mu mitwe y’iterabwoba, bafite gahunda yo gukomeza umugambi mubisha wo kubuza amahoro u Rwanda.
Aba bose amajwi yabo bishe arabahamagara, bahungabanye intekerezo na roho, ntibariho, babayeho nabi. Mu miterere ya muntu, abananiwe ubunyangamugayo, bakunda ko basangira umubabaro n’ikimwaro n’abandi ndetse n’iyo babona utarafatanyije nabo mu bibi bakoze baba bumva waba umwe muri bo, bikarushaho kubanezeza cyane iyo nawe wakoze icyaha nk’icyabo.
Abahakana, bakanapfobye Jenoside ntibakwiye ijambo. Abakora Jenoside, bayikora, banateganya n’uko bazayipfobya, bakanayihakana, niyo mpamvu abategetsi bayishoyemo umubare munini w’abayikora ku buryo hari n’abibwiraga ko kubera ko ikozwe n’abantu benshi amategeko atabakurikirana.
Ubu amategeko arabakurikiranye aho bari hose. Hari abakiruka mu mashyamba, basaziyemo, hari abafunze basaziye muri Gereza, hari n’abari mu mahanga, basaziyeyo, ariko icyaha bakoze cyo ntigisaza, bashaje nabi kubera ko ibiganza byabo birimo amaraso.
Bari kure y’imiryango bakomokamo, ababyaye ntibashobora kurera abana babo, abatarashyingiwe ntibazamenya icyanga cy’ubukwe n’ubuzima, ntibabona icyerekezo cy’ubuzima. Iminsi yabo ihora yijimye kubera ubuhemu bumunga umutima wabo, kwicuza bitagira igaruriro, ipfunwe no kwiyanga, kwifuza urupfu ntibarubone. Imitima yabo yabaye akahebwe, ubuzima bwabo burangwa no gutekereza nabi bakarota nabi.
Abashakira ineza u Rwanda, ntibakwiye gutwaza aba barukarabankaba umutwaro w’icyaha bakoreye u Rwanda, ubwo bicaga inzirakarengane z’Abatutsi. Abakunzi b’u Rwanda ntibakwiye kuyobywa n’abayobye ngo na bo bayobe ahari urumuri, rwacanywe n’ubuyobozi bwiza bwunga. Ntibakwiye gutekereza nabi ngo barote nabi, mu gihe hari isoko iva ku buyobozi buzira amacakubiri n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside, ntibakwiye kuba ba bangamwabo, Igihugu kigabura amahoro n’umutuzo gisendereye amahirwe.
Abato batari gito b’u Rwanda, ntibazahumwe n’igihu kibazitira kureba imbere, ngo basaye mu macakubiri n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside. Nibiyambure abashaka kubagira abafatanyacyaha, babatoza guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ngo bazaryozwe ibingana n’ibyo abakoze jenoside, babazwa n’itegeko.
Ni bime amatwi, ababyeyi gito bababibamo ivangura iryari ryo ryose. Nibitandukanye n’abimitse inabi yo guhemukira u Rwanda. Ni biremere u Rwanda bazabamo, banezerewe, badashyamirana, basabana, bagabirana mu bufatanye. Niko kuba umuntu. Ineza niganze.
Byagenda gute kugira ngo umuntu agire umuryango ushoboye?
Kugira umuryango bikomoka ku gushinga urugo. Gushinga urugo rero ni urugendo umugabo n’umugore batangirana, batabona neza aho bagana ariko muri urwo rugendo bakiyemeza gusangira byose: bahura n’ibyiza, bagasangira ubudacuranwa, bahura n’ibibi bagahozanya, bagafashanya bagakomeza urugendo.
Umuryango ushoboye ni urimo isangira buzima risesuye ry’umugabo n’umugore mu mibereho yabo, mu bikorwa mu bitekerezo, mu bibazo n’ibisubizo byabo. Aha nibutse ko umuryango utagizwe n’umugabo n’umugore gusa n’ubwo aribo shingiro ry’umuryango.
Kubera impamvu zitandukanye, mu muryango twibona muri ibi bice birindwi by’ingenzi birimo umuryango w’umugabo n’umugore bakibana (jeune couple), umuryango w’umugabo n’umugore n’abana, Umuryango w’umugabo n’umugore babuze urubyaro, Umuryango w’umubyeyi urera abana wenyine (uwabyariye iwabo ku mugabo umwe cyangwa batandukanye...), Umuryango w’imfumbyi zirera, Umuryango w’umupfakazi (incike cyangwa afite abana) n’Umuryango w’ababyeyi batakibana (Divorcés).
Iterambere mu muryango
Ni ibikorwa bya muntu bigamije kumufasha kubaho neza uyu munsi ndetse n’ejo hazaza he n’ah’abe.
Ibyo bikorwa bihera mu bitekerezo, bigashakirwa ubushobozi ubundi bigashyirwa mu bikorwa. Inyungu ishobora kugaragara vuba cyangwa itinze ariko biba bitanga icyizere cyo kubaho neza muri ubu buzima. Urugero, Iyo ababyeyi bumvikanye bakajyana umwana mu ishuri, icyo ni igikorwa cy’iterambere rirambye.
Iyo abagize Umuryango bumvikanye bagashyira hamwe bakagura ikibanza, nyuma y’igihe runaka bakacyubaka, gitangira kwinjiza ubushobozi bushya mu muryango, hagamijwe kuzamura imibereho y’abagize umuryango ku buryo bwizewe.
Umuryango ushoboye ni uwuhe?
Aha umuntu yakwibaza ati "Umuryango ushoboye ni uwuhe? Ushoboye mu biki?"
Umuhanzi Niyo Bosco yigeze niwe waririmbye ati “Ufite amahoro waba ukungahaye” kandi ibi nibyo rwose.
Umuryango ushoboye ni ufite amahoro, ni ufite urukundo, ni uwateguwe neza kuva mu ntangiriro. Abanyarwanda nibo bagira ati “Akaburiye mu isiza ntikabonekera mu isakara."
Umuryango ushoboye ni uyobowe neza bityo abawugize bakagira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga umusanzu ukwiye kandi uri mu cyerecyezo rusange cy’urugo rwabo. Niyo mpamvu ku bwanjye umuryango ushoboye atari ufite za Miliyoni kuri konti gusa!
Si ufite amashuri menshi gusa. Kuko ubutunzi atari bwo gusa butuma abagize umuryango babaho banezerewe. Ijambo ry’Imana riragira riti: “Igaburo ry’imboga z’imbwija ririmo urukundo, riruta iry’ikimasa riherekejwe n’urwango” (reba Imigani 15, 16-17). Uduke turasangirwa.
Gusa ariko na none umuryango ushoboye ntusigara mu iterambere rirambye kuko ahari ubwumvikane n’urukundo ibindi biraharanirwa, bigashakwa kandi bikagerwaho.
Abashakanye bagomba guharanira gukora cyane kugira ngo babeho babesheho n’ababo. Nibyo rwose, nk’uko bizwi, duhamagarirwa gukora neza kandi cyane kugira ngo tuzasige Isi ari nziza kurusha uko twayisanze.
Ibiranga Umuryango ufite iterambere rirambye
Umuryango ufite iterambere rirambye ugaragazwa n’ibintu bikurikira: Nta nzara (Nta mirire mibi, nta ndwara...), nta makimbirane, nta bwikubire ku mitungo, uhari ucungwa neza. Imishinga rusange yo guteza umuryango imbere yumvikanwaho kandi igashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Abana barazigamirwa (Bubaka ejo heza habo n’abana babo). Abana bariga kandi heza bitewe n’ubushobozi. Abagize umuryango bose bagira ubwishingizi bw’ubuzima, basengera hamwe mu bwisanzure n’ubwubahane igihe badahuje imyemerere.
Ijambo ry’Imana riragira riti “Hahirwa abashakanye bakunda Imana kandi nabo bakundana." Abagize umuryango birinda kwishora mu bidafite akamaro, ntibabyara abo badashoboye kurera.
Kugira ngo umuntu agire Umuryango ushoboye, agomba kuwutegura kare kandi agaharanira kubigeraho, aka wa mugani ugira uti “Uzi icyo ashaka, ntafata icyo abonye ahubwo aragiharanira”.
Burya ubushobozi burubakwa. Niba umusingi urugo rwubakiyeho udakomeye nta cyizere ko ibihe by’imihengeri bizasiga rugihagaze. Ikindi gituma umuryango utera imbere ni ukugira umuco mwiza wo gusigasira ibyiza bagezeho. no guhanga udushya twubaka mu nguni zose z’ubuzima mu muryango.
Umuryango ushoboye ni uwubakiye ku Mana no kugushaka kwayo. Ijambo ry’Imana riragira riti “Erega buriya niba Uhoraho atari we wubatse inzu, ba nyir’inzu baba bagokera ubusa. Niba Uhoraho atari we urinze umugi, abanyezamu bawo baba bagokera ubusa” (reba Zab 127, 1).
Umuryango ushoboye kandi utekanye ni ryo shema ryacu. Ni wo musingi shingiro uzatugeza ku iterambere rirambye.
Gusubika CHOGM si igihombo ku Rwanda!
Ijoro ry’uwa Gatanu ushize, nta kabuza ko hari benshi ryasize batagohetse batekereza ku gihombo basigiwe n’imyiteguro bakoze bategereje inama ihuza abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma bo muri Commonwealth, yari iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda muri Kamena uyu mwaka.
Isubikwa ry’iyi nama ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryaje ari inkuru itanyura amatwi ya benshi dore ko nk’abashoramari, yari amahirwe akomeye yo kongera kubyutsa umutwe nyuma y’umwaka urenga ubucuruzi bwabo buguye hasi kubera ingaruka z’icyorezo cya COVID-19. No ku batari abashoramari kandi, byari amahirwe akomeye kuko burya iyo mugenzi wawe yariye, iyo yungutse mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi nawe uba wungutse.
Hari abo nabonye bishimira ko iyo nama itakibaye, kandi ugasanga harimo n’Abanyarwanda, ariko abo nabo nta kibazo, ba bangamwabo bahozeho kandi bazahoraho! Hari abandi nakwita ko batekereza hafi, bishimiye ko inama isubitswe kuko ngo ingamba zari zarafashwe zo kwirinda icyorezo no gusigasira umutekano ngo iyo nama ibe mu mutuzo, ngo zababangamiye! Abo nabo bahozeho, wenda ntibarabona aho umutekano wabuze uko biba bimeze cyangwa se barabyirengiza.
Igishimishije ni uko mu itangazo risubika iyo nama, hagaragajwe impamvu kandi yumvikana, ko inama isubitswe kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19 gikomeje gukaza umurego. Ukurikije aho imyiteguro yari igeze, birumvikana ko ku mpande zombi, haba u Rwanda n’Ubunyamabanga bwa Commonwealth, byagoranye gufata icyemezo nk’icyo cyo gusubika inama ibura ukwezi kumwe ngo ibe, nyuma y’iminsi batangaza ko nta gisibya izaba.
Perezida Paul Kagame yabigarutseho mu itangazo ryasohowe na Commonwealth , ati “Umwanzuro wo gusubika iyi nama ku nshuro ya kabiri ntabwo wafashwe mu buryo bworoshye. Ubuzima n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage ba Commonwealth ni ingenzi muri ibi bihe bikomeye. Duhaye ikaze umuryango mugari wa Commonwealth i Kigali mu gihe nyacyo.”
CHOGM ntiyahagaritswe, yarasubitswe igihe icyorezo kizacogorera izaba kandi izabera i Kigali. Ariko icyo si cyo kibazo, ahubwo ikibazo ni abatumva neza impamvu yo gusubikwa kwayo n’inyungu u Rwanda rubifitemo kurusha igihombo.
Hirya no hino ku Isi hari kuvugwa ubwoko bushya bwa COVID-19 kandi bwandura vuba kurusha ubusanzwe ku buryo n’ibihugu byitwa ko byishoboye, ibyinshi byatangiye kudagadwa ko nta gikozwe bishobora kwisanga mu nkundura mbi y’icyorezo nk’iyabayeho mu gihembwe cya mbere n’icya kabiri cy’umwaka ushize.
Ubwoko bushya bwa COVID-19 buhangayikishije Isi cyane, ni ubwagaragaye mu Bwongereza (buzwi nka B.1.1.7), ubwagaragaye muri Afurika y’Epfo (B.1.351) n’uburi guca ibintu mu Buhinde (B.1.617.2).
Ibi bihugu byose uko ari bitatu, ni abanyamuryango ba Commonwealth, bivuze ko hari abashyitsi runaka batari bake bagombaga kubiturukamo bitabiriye inama mu Rwanda. Kugeza ubu uretse ubwoko bwo muri Afurika y’Epfo n’ubwo mu Bwongereza bwabonetse mu Rwanda muri Werurwe, nta bundi burahaboneka.
Bumaze kuhaboneka, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yahumurije Abanyarwanda ko ababonetseho ubwoko bushya batahuriwe ku Kibuga cy’Indege bagahita bashyirwa ahantu hihariye, bivuze ko nta byago byo kubukwirakwiza mu baturage byari bihari. Ni nako byagenze kuko iyo buza gukwirakwira, twari kuba tuvuga inkuru itandukanye n’iyi uyu munsi!
Nubwo kwipimisha COVID-19 byari kuba ingenzi cyane ku bazitabira inama ya CHOGM, ntabwo ubwabyo ari urukingo rw’uko nta wakwinjiza bumwe muri ubwo bwoko bushya bwa COVID-19 mu gihugu, kuko kugeza n’ubu hari abashobora kwandura ntibagaragaze ibimenyetso ariko bakanduza. Ikindi ni uko umuntu ashobora no kuyandura ari mu ndege yaraye yipimishije. Ikindi kandi, si ibihugu byose bifite ubushobozi bwo kubona ubwo bwoko bwose bushya bwa COVID-19.
Ngaho mwibaze hagize umwe, babiri, batatu cyangwe benshi binjirana iyo virusi yandura mu buryo bwihuse, ikagera mu Rwanda mu gihugu gituwe n’abasaga miliyoni 12, kikaba mu bya mbere bifite ubucucike bukabije ku Isi?
Ibikomere bya Guma mu rugo yamaze hafi amezi abiri umwaka ushize, biracyari bibisi mu buzima n’imitima by’abanyarwanda benshi, ese ni nde wakwifuza ko ubuzima bwongera gufungwa kuriya, tukongera gufungirwa mu nzu ntawe utarabuka, ntawe usura mugenzi we, ntawe ukora ubukwe kubera gusa kurangamira amadolari y’abanyamahanga azakomeza gukenerwa na nyuma y’icyorezo?
N’ibihugu byishoboye birabogoza. Nk’u Buhinde bwa gatatu mu bukungu ku Isi, kuri iki Cyumweru bwatangaje ko abantu ibihumbi 400 (Akarere kose ko mu Rwanda) banduye Covid-19, mu gihe abandi bagera ku bihumbi bine (Akagari ko mu Rwanda) bapfuye mu masaha 24 gusa. Ikirenzeho, ni uko ubushakashatsi butaragaragaza neza ubushobozi bw’inkingo zimaze gukorwa mu guhangana n’ubu bwoko bushya bw’icyorezo. Gusa n’iyo bwaboneka, ntacyo byafasha cyane ku Rwanda rumaze gukingira ibihumbi 300 muri miliyoni 12. Urukingo rwa mbere ni ukwirinda.
Niba u Buhinde bwananiwe kugenzura icyorezo n’ubushobozi bufite, u Bwongereza bukaba bwahangayitse buri mu bihugu byihagazeho, byagenda bite mu gihe ubwoko bushya nk’ubwo bwandura ku kigero cyo hejuru, bwaba bugeze mu gihugu nk’u Rwanda? Igisubizo cyonyine gishoboka ni Guma mu rugo. Bibayeho ko mu Rwanda handura abantu ibihumbi 400 ku munsi, bivuze ko mu kwezi kumwe igihugu cyose cyaba cyanduye Covid-19.
Amavuriro yose yafunga imiryango mu kuvura izindi ndwara akita gusa ku barwayi ba Covid-19, abakozi bita ku barwayi baba ingume abapfa bakiyongera, imiti n’ibikoresho byo kwa muganga byabura, ubucuruzi bwahagarara, ubuzima bwaba bubi kurusha Guma mu rugo twabonye ubushize, ya madolari yo muri CHOGM ntacyo yaba akitumariye.
Aho kwirukira amafaranga n’inyungu z’ubukungu cyangwa ibindi mu nama nka CHOGM izitabirwa n’abarenga ibihumbi umunani ukirengagiza ubuzima, bwa miliyoni 12 (ubwo ntidushyizemo ibyago ku bakwitabira inama n’isura y’igihugu), ubuyobozi bwafashe icyemezo cyiza cyo kuyisubika kuko umugani w’Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda CP John Bosco Kabera “Iminsi mikuru na Noheli bizahoraho”, nakongeraho nti “Inama zizahoraho” ariko twe tubaho rimwe, iyo upfuye cyangwa umugaye biba birangiye.
Icyo kwishimira ni uko ibikorwa remezo byubatswe mu kwitegura CHOGM ntaho byagiye, imihanda yubatswe Abanyarwanda bazakomeza kuyikoresha mu nyungu zabo, hoteli zubatswe zizakomeza gukoreshwa, amatungo tworoye n’imyaka twahinze twanabigurisha ahandi, igihombo si cyinshi nk’inyungu iyo amahitamo ari ‘urupfu cyangwa ubuzima’.
Byaba byiza kurindira icyorezo kikagenza make inama ikazaba mu mutuzo aho gushyuhaguzwa bikarangira duhiye. Erega n’abo banyamahanga nta bwisanzure bagira mu gihe baza bazi ko hanze icyorezo kimeze nabi. Niba yaje afite gahunda yo gusura ingagi mu Birunga ntiyaba akigiyeyo, niba yari gutembera agahaha imyenda y’ibitenge mu isoko rya Kimironko cyangwa imineke ntabyo yakora. Niba yashoboraga gutega umumotari cyangwa Taxi Voiture mu mujyi, ntabyo yaba agikoze.
Umunyarwanda yaciye umugani ngo ‘wirukira byinshi ukabura na duke wari ufite’ nyamara ‘buhoro buhoro ari rwo rugendo’.
Dobbs na Wrong, intumwa z’abashaka kugena ahazaza h’u Rwanda zifashishije The Washington Post.
Hari igihe cyageze umuntu agatekereza ko abagize Umuryango Mpuzamahanga bose bumva kimwe ibyabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994 ndetse bafite ubushake n’umuhate wo kwemera uruhare rwabo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Byagaragaye mu mbwirwaruhame Perezida Bill Clinton yavuze tariki 25 Werurwe 1998 ubwo yasuraga u Rwanda. Mu mbwirwaruhame ye, yavuze ko kwemera uruhare no kurwanya ihakana rya Jenoside bigiye kujya muri politiki mpuzamahanga ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, natwe kandi ni uko twatekerezaga.
Nyuma yo gusoma inyandiko ya Michael Dobbs agira ati “He’s been hailed as Rwanda’s hero. But is he really his country’s villain?” (Yakunze gufatwa nk’intwari y’u Rwanda, ariko se ahubwo siwe mugome w’igihugu cye?) inyandiko ishimagiza igitabo cya Michela Wrong “Do not Disturb’, bigaragara ko icyita rusange ari kimwe mu buryo Guverinoma y’u Bwongereza n’iya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifatamo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse uburyo itangazamakuru ryabo rishimagiza icyo gitabo ni bumwe, ni ubwo guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Dobbs mu nyandiko ye, nta banga bigaragara ko hari impamvu za politiki zimuri inyuma mu guhindura amateka nyayo y’u Rwanda.
Mu gushaka guhindura amateka y’u Rwanda, Dobbs arivugira ati “Ubashije kugena ahahise, ni na we ugena ahazaza kandi ubashije kugena uyu munsi, ni nawe uba ugena ahahise”.
Nta gushidikanya Dobbs yahishuye intego yo guhakana Jenoside bikorwa n’izi Guverinoma n’ibinyamakuru byabo, bagamije ‘kugena ahazaza h’u Rwanda’. Ibi bashaka kubigeraho bahindura amateka Abanyarwanda banyuzemo. Babona ko amateka y’Abanyarwanda ari ikibazo gikomeye ku mugambi wabo wo guhindura ubutegetsi, ibintu bakomeje kugerageza kenshi bitwikiriye umutaka wa demokarasi n’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Mu bigaragara, Dobbs na Wrong bizeye ubufasha bwuzuye bwa Guverinoma zabo mu mugambi bamaze igihe bamamaza.
Gusa umuntu yakwibaza ngo, uzabasha ute kugenzura uko wishakiye abantu bafite amateka yubakiye ku buhamya bw’abarokotse, imyanzuro y’inkiko, ubushakashatsi bw’abahanga aho kuba ku bushake na politiki bya Kagame nkuko Dobbs na Wrong babyibwira?
Mu myaka 23 ishize, ubwo ibimenyetso by’amahano y’ibyari bimaze kuba mu maso y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye byari bikiri byose, na Perezida w’igihugu gikomeye nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ntiyatinyutse guhakana ko habaye Jenoside nkuko Dobbs na Wrong babitinyuka uyu munsi. Bibwira ahari ko abantu bibagiwe.
Icyo gihe Bill Clinton yagize ati “Ni iby’ingenzi ko isi imenya ko ubu bwicanyi butaje kubw’impanuka….ni ibintu byaturutse kuri politiki yari igamije kurimbura imbaga”.
Icyo gihe Amerika yakoresheje ijwi ryayo rikomeye mu kwamagana umugambi w’abari barateguye Jenoside bashakaga guhunga uruhare rwabo bahakana amahano bakoze, bavuga ko Jenoside yatewe n’umujinya w’Abahutu watewe no kubura Perezida bakundaga, kandi ko ngo Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside nta bubasha yari ifite bwo kubihagarika.
Icyo gihe Clinton yagize ati “Ubugizi bwa nabi bwarateguwe, ibinyamakuru byuzuzwa urwango, Abatutsi bagirwa ibitambo by’ibibazo u Rwanda rwari rufite, babima uburenganzira bwo kubaho… Urutonde rw’abagombaga kwicwa, izina ku rindi byari byarateguwe mbere”.
Ntaho Clinton yigeze avuga ko guhanurwa kw’indege ariyo nyirabayazana wo kurimbura Abatutsi.
Nyamara uyu munsi, ibinyamakuru bikomeye muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza biri guha rugari Dobbs na Wrong ngo bamamaze ubwiregure bw’abajenosideri ari nako biha gusobanura Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi uko itari.
Wrong arihandagaza akavuga ko Abahutu bari bafite ubwoba bw’umutekano wabo, ngo ko aribyo byatumye abatutsi basaga miliyoni bicwa, abagore, abana. Ati “Niba gahunda yari nutica nawe uricwa, ni ikintu twese twakumva”.
Mu gukora ibi, ibimenyetso n’ubushakashatsi by’abahanga birirengagizwa muri izi nyandiko kugira ngo bihe imbaraga guhakana kwa Wrong. Hirengagizwa kandi ubushakashatsi bushingiye ku bimenyetso n’imyanzuro y’inkiko ku ihanurwa ry’indege.
Niba rero uyu atari umugambi wihishe unyuzwa mu itangazamakuru mu kumvikanisha uruhande rw’ibi bihugu bibiri bikomeye, ubwo sinzi ukundi twabyita. Bagamije gukwirakwiza andi mateka y’u Rwanda, aho ba bantu batereranye Abanyarwanda mu myaka 27 ishize aribo bagaruka bagahakana ishingiro ry’intwari zatabaye u Rwanda zikarubuza kuzimira. Ni nko kuvuga bati “Niba atari twe ntwari, tuzahimba andi mateka yacu twifashishe itangazamakuru ryacu mu kuyamenyekanisha.”
Igitabo cya Wrong kigaragazwa nk’igishingiye ku iperereza ku iyicwa rya Karegeya, umugabo avuga ko yari afite uruhu “runyerera nk’ubuki’, nyamara urebye neza intego y’icyo gitabo irenze kure ibyo. Arihandagaza agasaba ko u Rwanda ruhabwa akato mu mahanga ariko nta shingiro bifite. U Rwanda ntabwo ari u Rwanda kuko Abanyaburayi baruhanze. Nta n’ubwo ruzarekera aho kubaho kuko abaterankunga basomye igitabo cya Wrong.
Kwikeka amababa kwa Wrong
Mu iyigantekerezo (psychology), kwikeka amababa bisobanurwa nko “gufata ibyiyumviro udashaka cyangwa se imyitwarire utishimiye, ukabitwerera undi muntu”.
Nibyo Wrong akora.Urugero ashimangira uburyo ubwicanyi bwasembuwe n’iyicwa rya Perezida w’Umuhutu. Mbere na mbere, kubigenza gutya bimufasha kwandagaza abo ashaka guhuza n’ubwo bwicanyi.
Icya kabiri, bimufasha kwinjira mu ngengabitekerezo y’abahezanguni b’Abahutu, biyamuruyeho uruhare rwo gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa Jenoside. Icya gatatu ari nacyo cy’ingenzi, yabyifashishije mu gushyashyariza ko ngo u Rwanda “ari nk’ikirunga cyubakiye ku moko gitegereje guturika” nkuko na Dobbs abivuga mu nkuru ye ishimagiza igitabo cya Wrong, nta sesengura na mba bashingiyeho.
Usibye muri Leta yari yaramunzwe n’urwango rwibasiye Abatutsi, ivangura no kubatesha agaciro, nta handi Wrong yabeshyeshya ubuhanuzi bwe ko hari ikirunga kigiye guturika.
Muri Leta idashingira ku moko, aho Guverinoma irajwe ishinga no kubaka igihugu gishingiye ku bumwe, aho Abanyarwanda basanzwe bemeza ko Guverinoma yabo ishishikajwe n’imibereho myiza n’iterambere nta vangura iryo ari ryo ryose nk’ibyaranze Leta zayibanjirije, aho kandi ibitero by’imitwe yitwaje intwaro bidakurikirwa no kwibasira igice kimwe cy’abaturage, nta shingiro na mba Wrong afite mu kuvuga gutyo.
Mu gihe urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rurimo abarokotse bari abana mu 1994, abana b’abarokotse ndetse n’abana b’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside batahiriza umugozi umwe mu kwibuka biyemeza gushimangira ubumwe bwabo, abanyamakuru b’abanyaburayi bo barajwe ishinga no guhanurira u Rwanda ibibi, birengagiza ahubwo ibibi byugarijwe sosiyete bo ubwabo baturukamo.
Ukwivana mu muryango w’Ubumwe bw’Uburayi k’u Bwongereza (Brexit), imyigaragambyo y’abahezanguni, imvururu ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika, ni bimwe mu bikorwa bigaragaraza ko ahubwo aribo bari mu bibazo bishingiye ku moko (ukwishyira hejuru kw’abazungu) bishobora guturika isaha n’isaha.
Niba ubuhanuzi bwa Dobby na Wrong atari ukwikeka amababa, wavuga ko ari iki kindi? Birushaho kuba agahomamunwa noneho aho abo banyamakuru b’Abanyamerika n’Abongereza, bashinja u Rwanda kwiba ibindi bihugu. Ni ibintu bakora bagamije gutesha agaciro impamvu nyayo yatumye ingabo z’u Rwanda zijya muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Kuri iki kibazo, Bill Clinton hari ikintu gikomeye yabwiye Abanyarwanda mu mbwirwaruhame ye yo mu 1998.
Yagize ati “Ntabwo twakabaye twaremeye ko inkambi z’impunzi ziba ubwihisho bw’abicanyi […] Mu majyaruguru ashyira Uburengerazuba bw’Igihugu cyanyu, ibitero by’abagize uruhare mu bwicanyi mu 1994 biracyakomeje kugeza n’uyu munsi.”
Niba u Bwongereza, Guverinoma za Amerika n’ibinyamakuru byabo badafite ikibazo cyo kwibagirwa, bakabaye bongera gusoma imbwirwaruhame ya Clinton wenda byabafasha. Nibwo bafata igitabo cya Wrong uko kiri , bakabona ko Wrong ari indyarya y’umubeshyi, umuhakanyi wa Jenoside utakabaye ahabwa urubuga mu binyamakuru byo mu bihugu byateye imbere.
Ibihugu byateye imbere ntabwo byakabaye bikomeza gutesha umutwe abaturage barajwe ishinga no gukoresha uburenganzira bwabo ngo babeho ubuzima bubabereye. Niba hari ukeneye gutabarwa, ntabwo ari Abanyarwanda. Ibintu byo kwikeka amababa ukayatwerera abandi bikwiriye guhagarara.
Ivumburamatsiko ku mibereho y’Igisiga cyitwa Samusure
U Rwanda uwavuga ko ari igihugu cyatatswe ibyiza na Rurema ntabwo yaba akabije. Nawe se reba imisozi myiza, imirambi, ibirunga, ibiyaga, inzuzi n’imigezi, ibibaya n’amashyamba kimeza ahantu hose n’ibindi byiza nyaburanga bitandukanye.
Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa ahubwo iki gihugu gifite amoko menshi atandukanye y’ibiguruka harimo ibisiga, inyoni, ibinyugunyugu, amavubi, inzuki n’ibindi.
Buriya inyoni n’ibisiga tubona mu kirere biguruka n’ibyo tutabasha kubona kuko tudakunze gusura aho byibera kuko hari ibiba mu mashyamba kimeza, ibiba mu bishanga n’ahandi, ariko burya buri bwoko buba bufite umwihariko mu miterere n’imibereho yabwo ya buri munsi.
Uwavuga igisiga cyitwa Samusure nubwo waba utakiziho byinshi ariko hari amakuru yacyo azwi. Abana bato bakunda kukibaza niba bazapfa cyangwa bazarama. Iyo kirebye hejuru abana barishima bavuga ko bazarama ariko iyo kirebye hasi barababara ngo bazapfa.
Iki gisiga gifite amababa hafi ya yose ajya gusa n’umukara uretse ko agira uturongo tw’umweru ku mirizo. Amaguru ya Samusure ni umweru kandi iyo iguruka ubona utubara tw’umweru mu mababa.
Samusure y’ingore rimwe na rimwe ishobobora kugira amaguru ahinduka ikigina bigaterwa n’imyaka iba igezemo. Ubusanzwe Samusure bayita Samusure wa Rusunzu bitewe n’isunzu riri ku mutwe wayo.
Ingabo n’ingore zose zigira isunzu uretse ko iry’ingore riba ari rito. Amaso ya Samusure aba ari umuhondo wa zahabu. Iyo Samusure ikiri nto iba ijya gusa n’igisiga gikuze ariko amababa y’intoya aba atijimye cyane kandi n’isunzu riba ari rigufi.
Igisiga cya Samusure gishobora kugira uburebure buri hagati ya santimetero 53-58. Ingabo ishobora gupima uburemere buri hagati ya garama 912 na kilogarama 1.3, naho ingore igapima kilogarama ziri hagati ya 1.3 na 1.5.
Ubusanzwe igisiga cya Samusure ntigikunda kugenda kiguruka mu gihe kirimo guhiga, ahubwo kijya ahantu hamwe kigatuza ubundi cyabona umuhigo kikamanuka kikawucakira.
Samusure ikunda kurya imbeba, utunyoni duto, imiserebanya, ibiburangoro n’amafi, uretse ko kandi ishobora no kurya inkeri n’imizabibu byo ku gasozi.
Imyororokere ya Samusure
Samusure y’ingabo n’iy’ingore zikora umuryango urangwa no kudacana inyuma kandi igihe icyo ari cyo cyose mu mwaka iyo zibishatse zitera amagi. Iyo zishatse gutera amagi zubaka icyari hejuru mu giti hagati ya metero 7-45 uvuye ku butaka. Iyo ingore imaze kubangurirwa itera amagi nibura abiri cyangwa igi rimwe.
Ingore yonyine ni yo igira uruhare mu kurarira ariko muri icyo gihe ingabo ni yo ifata inshingano zo kuyigaburira. Gusa rimwe na rimwe ingore ishobora kujya gushaka ibyo kurya. Igihe cyo kurarira ni iminsi 42. Igitangaje ni uko iyo yateye amagi abiri igihe cyo guturaga igi rimwe n’irindi kiba kirimo ikinyuranyo cy’iminsi 15. Umushwi cyangwa imishwi iba imaze gukura mu minsi 53 ariko ikagumana n’ababyeyi bayo hagati y’amezi abiri cyangwa atatu kugira ngo ibone kwigenga.
Ibisiga bya Samusure bikuze nubwo bidafite ibindi bikunda kubirya ariko imishwi yazo iyo ikiri mu cyari inkende zirayirya. Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa kuko n’amagi ya Samusure hari ubwoko bw’injangwe zo ku gasozi zikunda kuyarya.
Ab’ubukwe n’imodoka nituve mu mikino byarahindutse - erega isuku igira isoko
Mu nama ya Komite Nyobozi yaguye y’Umuryango FPR-Inkotanyi yabereye ku cyicaro cyawo i Rusororo mu Intare Arena, Chairman w’Umuryango akaba n’Umukuru w’Igihugu Paul Kagame yahavugiye byinshi byiza, harimo n’ibikomeye. Nifuje ko tugaruka ku ngingo y’imyitwarire yacu nk’Abanyarwanda muri rusange, ariko duhereye ku byo yavuze ku bageni bajyanywe muri stade.
Nyuma yo kwisegura ku baba barabangamiwe, ndetse n’aba bakibangamiwe n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ingamba zo kurwanya COVID-19, yagize ati ubonye ngo batubaze ukuntu dutinyuka gufata abageni, aho kwibaza ukuntu abageni batinyutse kwica amategeko! Ngaho rero mwe mwese abibwiraga maye ko n’Umukuru w’Igihugu atashyigikira ifatwa ry’abageni ubwo mwariyumviye.
Maze kubyumva nibajije ukuntu Umuvugizi wa Polisi CP Kabera John Bosco na bagenzi be bishimiye ririya jambo. Kuko bari barikeneye pe! Dukurikije ukuntu byavuzwe hanze aha batukwa na benshi, bazira ko ngo biriya byari agahomamunwa ku buryo buteje igihugu isoni, Polisi yari ikeneye ubuvugizi bukomeye buyirengera ku mugaragaro. Ni uko rero ubuvugizi mwarabubonye buhamye Polisi mwe, kandi twizere ko iryo joro mwiguriye kamwe. Maze byari binakwiye rwose.
Perezida Kagame ntari ku ruhande rw’abatubahiriza amategeko
Ahubwo nyuma ya ririya jambo sindumva imvugo nshya yakurikiyeho mu bibwiraga ko Umukuru w’Igihugu ari ku ruhande rwabo. Uruhande rwo gushyira mu bikorwa itegeko hakurikijwe imyambaririre, imyanya, imyato, n’ibindi nk’ibyo. Ntabwo muri kumwe, mwihangane. Erega igikuba cyari cyacitse! Ngo yewe abageni barajwe muri stade bavutswa umunezero wuzuye n’uburenganzira bagahawe n’umunsi umwe w’amateka mu buzima bwabo. Bati rwose buriya amafoto nk’ariya y’agatimba ko mu byicaro by’abafana ba ruhago bazajya bayasobanura bate, abandi ngo bazabwira iki abana babo? Ngo aho kuba bagiye mu ijoro rya buki, ahubwo barajwe rwantambi. Ngo twari tuzi ko abageni ari abadahangarwa. Ayinya!
N’uko abandi ndetse bakanavuga ko ngo Polisi yagiye cyera kubusa ariko noneho akayo gashobotse. Ngo rwose ntabwo biri bubahire. Abamaganaga igikorwa nubwo bataburagamo nk’umwe ubibutsa ko amategeko atarobanura, bene uwo baramubwiraga ngo rahira ko noneho ibukuru batari bubahitane babaziza ‘kuba ba ruharwa’.
Sinzi ngo iyo Polisi y’Igihugu iza kuba igira impuhwe n’umutima wa kimuntu ntiyagafashe abageni ngo ibaraze hanze mu mbeho ya stade bahanye intera, kandi ngo iryo joro ryakabaye iryabo rya mbere ryo kuryamana begeranye. Polisi yo si uko yabibonaga, muyibabarire. Covid-19 ntabwo irobanura ku butoni. Yo iraguterura ikakwesa, uwo waba uriwe wese. Ese ni kuki ibyo Abapolisi babizi kuturusha?
Ibyo bibazo bishingiye ku marangamutima byose Perezida Kagame yabisubirije hamwe ashyigikira Polisi y’Igihugu. Ati nimucishe make duhere aho twagahereye: ati mbere na mbere twibaze, ni iki cyatumye abageni batinyuka kwica amategeko? Ese ababatinyuye kuyarengaho, ubwo si bo ba mbere bagakozwe n’isoni? Harya ubu koko abantu tuzajya turenga ku mategeko n’amabwiriza nkana, hanyuma nidufatwa bidutangaze? Nyoni nyinshi we!
Gukosa kenshi tudahanwa bimaze kuturemaza!
Ngaho nimureke twibukiranye, ubwo wenda bishoboka ko kwibagirwa bibaho. Ariya mabwiza hari uyobewe ko ashyirwaho n’Inama y’Abaminisitiri, kandi akenshi iba iyobowe n’Umukuru w’Igihugu? Ese ubwo aberuraga bakavuga ko Perezida Kagame na we yaba ari mu bababajwe n’abageni bakosowe, aho ubwo koko ntibabaga biyibagije ko muri kamere ye hatabamo gufata imyanzuro itazashyirwa mu bikorwa? Abarokole bagira indirimbo igira iti: “Imvugo y’iwe n’ihame, tegereza umunsi n’isaha, ubwo ari Yesu wabivuze bizoshika.” Umuryango FPR-Inkotanyi na wo ugira iyawo mvugo. Igira iti: “Imvugo ni yo ngiro”.
Ubwo se koko harya tugiye kuzajya turenga ku mabwiriza (yashyiriweho gufasha twebwe ubwacu mbere na mbere) kenshi tudafatwa, maze rimwe nidufatwa twisararange twibaza impamvu n’iryo rimwe dufashwe? Cyera mu mategeko y’umuhanda habagamo guhanirwa icyaha cy’agasuzuguro. Ibi ndumva na byo byenda gusa n’ibyo, ku buryo uwaduhanira agasuzuguro yaba ataturenganyije. Ni gute twumva ko ubuyobozi bw’igihugu bwashyizeho amategeko cyangwa amabwiriza, yubahirizwa n’ubishatse gusa, ariko utabishatse ntayubahirize. Nkaho ari ntacyabaye ra?
Ese na we hari ukumenyera gukosa tudafatwa ngo duhanwe, tukanibagirwa ko iminsi 40 ibaho? Ubu imyumvire y’Abanyarwanda bamwe ni aho imaze kugera hababaje mbese? Aho bidutangaza tukanavuza induru, ngo karabaye nimudutabare Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika, dufatiwe mu makosa kandi ubusanzwe bitajyaga bibaho! Imbaraga z’Imana zitube hafi. Na ho ubundi tumerewe nabi kudahanwa biratwishe turaremaye birarangiye.
Naraye muri Stade bucya nishyura 10.000 Frw
Hari abo Perezida Kagame yavuze ko barusimbutse. Abo sinari mbarimo. Gusa nanjye hari aho narusimbutse, kuko ndi mubigeze gutaha ubukwe gatatu bwarimo umubare urenze uwemewe n’amabwiriza. No muri Stade ya Kicukiro narayemo nafatiwe kurenza amasaha ndi muri siporo. Nakomerejeho siporo aho muri stade naraye, biremewe. Mu gitondo nishyuye 10.000 Frw ndarekurwa. Sinzongera.
Gusa igitangaje ni uko mbere y’uko abageni bafatwa, abantu twari tumaze kuremarira mu makosa cyane. Twavaga mu bukwe twishimye ko twishe amategeko. Ayiwe. Wasangaga tuvuga ngo ‘disi we, uzi ko twagize ubukwe utashoboraga kumenya ko ari ubwo muri Covid-19! Mbese kurenga ku mabwiriza ya COVID-19 ntawe byari bigitera isoni. Nta n’uwari ukibitinya. Abato n’abakuru, n’abajenerali, twese wasangaga iby’amabwiriza, imibare n’amasaha, byose tubyitirira Umuvugizi wa Polisi. Ngo cyo nimuhaguruke dutahe dore amasaha ya Kabera arageze. Ararengana Komiseri w’abandi. Ese ni kuki tutayitirira Perezida Kagame, ko ari we uyobora Inama z’Abaminisitiri ziyashyiraho?
Dore ni nka biriya bya camera zo mu mihanda byaducishije ururondogoro. Erega ugasanga turabwirana, duhana amakuru ngo ahashya bayishinze. Polisi na yo iti tuzabashobora igihe tuzabakorera umuti wa Camera zimukanwa. Uwo muhigo barawesheje nimwiruhukire. Ni muze tumenyere kugenda gake, tubyuke kare, duhagurukire igihe, twirinde imivuduko itakabaye.
Tariki 21 Mata nari mu nzira njya i Huye mu kazi. Nari ntwawe n’umushoferi turi babiri gusa mu modoka. Sinari nigeze mubwira ngo wihute, usibye ko ntari nanamubwiye kugenda buhoro. Icyizere nari mufitiye nk’umuntu umenyereye izo nzira kandi witonda, cyari gihaje. Ni uko tumanutse ahagana ICK ya Kabgayi ahari urusengero rwa ADPR, tuvuye mu Mujyi wa Muhanga, camera iteramo. Twabimenye tugeze imbere irembo bohereje ubutumwa ngo: Traffic fine # 1021042157357; Speed: 66 km/h; Location: Gahogo: Amafaranga wishyura: 25,000; Italiki ntarengwa yo kwishyura: 24-04-2021. Murabizi ko nta mbabazi camera igira. Ubwo umushoferi namubwiye ibyo akoze arababara, ndetse aranigaya, ndamuhumuriza (hari ababyita igitero cya satani, kuba wari ubonye ka misiyo, kakazamo imungu uwo mwanya), nanjye ndatuza turakomeza tugerayo amahoro.
Aba polisi baduca amande mu mihanda basigaye babyihutisha
Ku munsi ukurikiye wa Kane 22-04-2021 tugaruka tugeze Kavumu, Inyanza, Traffic Police baraduhagarika. Ubwo ariko nari naregeje, agapfukamunwa namanuye. Iby’uko kutakambara, cyangwa kukambara nabi bihanwa n’amategeko, narabyumvaga gusa, ariko byari bitarambaho.
Umunsi wari wageze sinabimenya. Kandi nari nasenze (nari nasubijwe, Imana yambwiye kwitwararika amategeko sinabyumva). Umupolisi ati ko utambaye agapfukamunwa? Inti disi umbabarire nari narushye. Ati ndabiguhanira, mbanza kugirango arakina. Umushoferi abonye ko bikomeye ati rwose watubabariye ko n’ejo camera yari yadufashe. Umupolisi ati nimwigendere byarangiye. Nashimye nibura ko byihuse. Ariko amande ubwo yo aba ariyongere, 25.000 Frw. Igiteranyo ni 50.000 Frw. Igitero ni cya kindi cya satani kuri bamwe basenga bakanabibona gutyo. Nanjye ndasenga ariko si uko mbibona. Nararangaye. Amande nayishyuye ubukererwe butarinjiramo ngo ibihumbi makumyabiri byongerweho. Ngayo nguko.
Ab’ubukwe n’imodoka twisubireho birakomeye
Umva rero nimureke ab’ubukwe n’imodoka twisubireho, tuve mu mikino. Ntabwo twakwishimira ndetse tukanaterwa ishema no kuba dufite igihugu kigendera ku mategeko , ni byiza cyane, maze ngo twibagirwe ko ibyo tubikesha urwego rwa Polisi y’Igihugu itajenjeka, nk’abashinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko.
Ni mu nyungu zacu kugira Polisi ikanira, na yo kandi ubwayo irikanira, bigatuma irangwa n’ikinyabupfura. Wari uzi ko buri mwaka birukana mu Gipolisi abagera kuri 400, bazira imyitwarire idahwitse? Umva ukuri: Polisi n’iy’Igihugu cyawe nanjye.
Ubuyobozi bw’Igihugu budutoza kubahiriza amategeko tuba twarishyiriyeho ari byo bibereye u Rwanda. Ibyo rero ubwo byari bimaze gufata kandi bikaba binaryoshye, iki ni igihe cyo gukataza, si icyo kuregeza. Umva ukuri: Ntabwo Polisi ari iya CP Kabera John Bosco, yemwe nta n’ubwo ari iya IGP Dan Munyuza. Umwe ni Umuvugizi undi akaba Umuyobozi Mukuru, ba Polisi y’u Rwanda.
Burya abavuga ko ngo isuku igira isoko, n’amata agira gitereka, baba bavuga ko icyiza cyose kigira inkomoko nzima. Maze nidukunda u Rwanda tukarwizihirirwamo, mu mahoro, isuku, umutekano mu mihanda no mu makaritsiye, imbaraga turwanyisha Covid-19 n’ubudasa bundi buturanga, tujye tumenya inzego z’igihugu tubikesha. Rumwe muri zo ni Polisi y’Igihugu. Ubufatanye tubagomba n’ikinyabupfura ibihe byose. Byose ni mu nyungu zawe nanjye ku giti cyacu, mbere yo kuba iz’u Rwanda rwacu muri rusange.
Urubyiruko; igitambo cy’ibisahiranda bitifuza ejo hazaza, amaraso yabo akaba ikiguzi cyo kwinezeza ku babashutse
Ku isi hose, urubyiruko ni imbaraga z’Igihugu. Iyo rurezwe neza rugahabwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi, rugira uruhare runini mu kuzamura iterambere ry’Igihugu ku buryo bwihuse. Iyo ruyobejwe rugahabwa amatiku asenya, ni mu gihe gito rukaba rusenye igihugu kigasigara ari umuyonga.
Niyo mpamvu ugiye kugira icyo akora cyose, urubyiruko nirwo ashyira imbere. Mu bashyize imbere politiki zidafatika, barushyira imbere ngo barwungukireho, bakarwinjiza mu ntambara z’urudaca, akenshi bakabikora barubeshya ko bashaka kuvanaho ubutegetsi ngo barwubakire ejo hazaza, byahe byo kajya!
Iyo urubyiruko rubyemeye nta gushishoza, akenshi rwiroha muri izo ntambara rutazi imvo n’imvano zayo. Abarushoyemo biruka muri bampatsibihugu basaba inkunga zo kugura intwaro n’ibindi bikenerwa mu ntambara.
Abenshi iyo bamaze kubona izo nkunga, amafaranga bakuyemo bayashora mu mishinga yabo bwite ibateza imbere, itagize aho ihuriye n’intambara yo gukuraho ubwo butegetsi bubi bise ubw’igitugu, maze rwa rubyiruko rugakomeza kubabarira mu mashyamba, mu mbeho nyinshi, ku izuba ry’igikatu, kurara mu myobo, kwambara ubusa, guhangayika, kudasinzira n’ibindi, nyamara ba bandi baboherejeyo babayeho neza, mu nzu nziza, bagenda mu modoka ahenze meza, bagenda mu ndege zabo bwite, barya neza, baryama neza, babona umwanya wo gutembera ku mazi.
Nsabimana Callixte wiyise ‘Sankara’ ni urugero rwiza. Mu rukiko aherutse kuvuga uburyo Kayumba Nyamwasa yabashutse, bakikokora bagatanga imisanzu ngo baje gufata ‘Kigali’, yarangiza akajya kwiguriramo za rukururana.
Uzasanga bene abo basaba urubyiruko kuva mu mashuri rukabasanga mu mashyamba, nyamara abana babo biga za Burayi, ntawe uzabona yazanyemo umwana we ngo abere abandi urugero.
